verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒मा उ॑ वः सुदानवो घृ॒तं न पि॒प्युषी॒रिषः॑ वर्धा॑न्का॒ण्वस्य॒ मन्म॑भिः
verses.transliteration: imā́ u vaḥ sudānavo  ghr̥táṃ ná pipyúṣīr íṣaḥ  várdhān kāṇvásya mánmabhiḥ

translation.text: May these our viands Bounteous Ones I that flow in streams like holy oil, With Kaṇva's hymns, increase your might.

verses.sanskrit_deva: क्व॑ नू॒नं सु॑दानवो॒ मद॑था वृक्तबर्हिषः ब्र॒ह्मा को वः॑ सपर्यति
verses.transliteration: kvà nūnáṃ sudānavo  mádathā vr̥ktabarhiṣaḥ  brahmā́ kó vaḥ saparyati

translation.text: Where, Bounteous Lords for whom the grass is trimmed, are ye rejoicing now? What Brahman is adoring you?

verses.sanskrit_deva: न॒हि ष्म॒ यद्ध॑ वः पु॒रा स्तोमे॑भिर्वृक्तबर्हिषः शर्धाँ॑ ऋ॒तस्य॒ जिन्व॑थ
verses.transliteration: nahí ṣma yád dha vaḥ purā́  stómebhir vr̥ktabarhiṣaḥ  śárdhām̐ r̥tásya jínvatha

translation.text: Is it not there where ye of old, supplied with sacred grass, for lauds Inspired the strong in sacrifice?

verses.sanskrit_deva: समु॒ त्ये म॑ह॒तीर॒पः सं क्षो॒णी समु॒ सूर्य॑म् सं वज्रं॑ पर्व॒शो द॑धुः
verses.transliteration: sám u tyé mahatī́r apáḥ  sáṃ kṣoṇī́ sám u sū́ryam  sáṃ vájram parvaśó dadhuḥ

translation.text: They brought together both the worlds, the mighty waters, and the Sun, And, joint by joint, the thunderbolt.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वि वृ॒त्रं प॑र्व॒शो य॑यु॒र्वि पर्व॑ताँ अरा॒जिनः॑ च॒क्रा॒णा वृष्णि॒ पौंस्य॑म्
verses.transliteration: ví vr̥trám parvaśó yayur  ví párvatām̐ arājínaḥ  cakrāṇā́ vŕ̥ṣṇi paúṃsyam

translation.text: They sundered Vr̥itra limb from limb and split the gloomy mountain-clouds, Performing a heroic deed.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अनु॑ त्रि॒तस्य॒ युध्य॑तः॒ शुष्म॑मावन्नु॒त क्रतु॑म् अन्विन्द्रं॑ वृत्र॒तूर्ये॑
verses.transliteration: ánu tritásya yúdhyataḥ  śúṣmam āvann utá krátum  ánv índraṃ vr̥tratū́rye

translation.text: They reinforced the power and strength of Trita as he fought, and helped Indra in battle with the foe.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वि॒द्युद्ध॑स्ता अ॒भिद्य॑वः॒ शिप्राः॑ शी॒र्षन्हि॑र॒ण्ययीः॑ शु॒भ्रा व्य॑ञ्जत श्रि॒ये
verses.transliteration: vidyúddhastā abhídyavaḥ  śíprāḥ śīrṣán hiraṇyáyīḥ  śubhrā́ vy àñjata śriyé

translation.text: They deck themselves for glory, bright, celestial, lightning in their hands, And helms of gold upon their heads.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒शना॒ यत्प॑रा॒वत॑ उ॒क्ष्णो रन्ध्र॒मया॑तन द्यौर्न च॑क्रदद्भि॒या
verses.transliteration: uśánā yát parāvátaḥ-  ukṣṇó rándhram áyātana  dyaúr ná cakradad bhiyā́

translation.text: When eagerly ye from far away came to the cavern of the Bull, He bellowed in his fear like Heaven.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ नो॑ म॒खस्य॑ दा॒वनेऽश्वै॒र्हिर॑ण्यपाणिभिः देवा॑स॒ उप॑ गन्तन
verses.transliteration: ā́ no makhásya dāváne-  -áśvair híraṇyapāṇibhiḥ  dévāsa úpa gantana

translation.text: Borne by your golden-footed steeds, O Gods, come hither to receive The sacrifice we offer you.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यदे॑षां॒ पृष॑ती॒ रथे॒ प्रष्टि॒र्वह॑ति॒ रोहि॑तः यान्ति॑ शु॒भ्रा रि॒णन्न॒पः
verses.transliteration: yád eṣām pŕ̥ṣatī ráthe  práṣṭir váhati róhitaḥ  yā́nti śubhrā́ riṇánn apáḥ

translation.text: When the red leader draws along their spotted deer yoked to the car. The Bright Ones come, and shed the rain.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सु॒षोमे॑ शर्य॒णाव॑त्यार्जी॒के प॒स्त्या॑वति य॒युर्निच॑क्रया॒ नरः॑
verses.transliteration: suṣóme śaryaṇā́vati-  ārjīké pastyā̀vati  yayúr nícakrayā náraḥ

translation.text: Sushomâ, Ṣaryaṇâvân, and Ârjîka full of homes, have they. These Heroes, sought with downward car.

verses.sanskrit_deva: क॒दा ग॑च्छाथ मरुत इ॒त्था विप्रं॒ हव॑मानम् मा॒र्डी॒केभि॒र्नाध॑मानम्
verses.transliteration: kadā́ gachātha marutaḥ-  itthā́ vípraṃ hávamānam  mārḍīkébhir nā́dhamānam

translation.text: When, Maruts, ye come to him, the singer who invokes you thus, With favours to your suppliant?

verses.sanskrit_deva: कद्ध॑ नू॒नं क॑धप्रियो॒ यदिन्द्र॒मज॑हातन को वः॑ सखि॒त्व ओ॑हते
verses.transliteration: kád dha nūnáṃ kadhapriyaḥ  yád índram ájahātana  kó vaḥ sakhitvá ohate

translation.text: What now? where have ye still a friend since ye left Indra all alone? Who counteth on your friendship now?

verses.sanskrit_deva: स॒हो षु णो॒ वज्र॑हस्तैः॒ कण्वा॑सो अ॒ग्निं म॒रुद्भिः॑ स्तु॒षे हिर॑ण्यवाशीभिः
verses.transliteration: sahó ṣú ṇo vájrahastaiḥ  káṇvāso agním marúdbhiḥ  stuṣé híraṇyavāśībhiḥ

translation.text: The Kaṇvas sing forth Agni's praise together with our Maruts' who Wield thunder and wear swords of gold.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ओ षु वृष्णः॒ प्रय॑ज्यू॒ना नव्य॑से सुवि॒ताय॑ व॒वृ॒त्यां चि॒त्रवा॑जान्
verses.transliteration: ó ṣú vŕ̥ṣṇaḥ práyajyūn  ā́ návyase suvitā́ya  vavr̥tyā́ṃ citrávājān

translation.text: Hither for new felicity may I attract the Impetuous Ones, The Heroes with their wondrous strength

verses.sanskrit_deva: गि॒रय॑श्चि॒न्नि जि॑हते॒ पर्शा॑नासो॒ मन्य॑मानाः पर्व॑ताश्चि॒न्नि ये॑मिरे
verses.transliteration: giráyaś cin ní jihate  párśānāso mányamānāḥ  párvatāś cin ní yemire

translation.text: Before them sink the very hills deerning themseives abysses: yea, Even the mountains bend them down.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आक्ष्ण॒यावा॑नो वहन्त्य॒न्तरि॑क्षेण॒ पत॑तः धाता॑रः स्तुव॒ते वयः॑
verses.transliteration: ā́kṣṇayā́vāno vahanti-  antárikṣeṇa pátataḥ  dhā́tāra stuvaté váyaḥ

translation.text: Steeds flying on their tortuous path through mid-air carry them, and give The man who lauds them strength and life.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निर्हि जानि॑ पू॒र्व्यश्छन्दो॒ न सूरो॑ अ॒र्चिषा॑ ते भा॒नुभि॒र्वि त॑स्थिरे
verses.transliteration: agnír hí jā́ni pūrvyáś  chándo ná sū́ro arcíṣā  té bhānúbhir ví tasthire

translation.text: Agni was born the first of all, like Sûrya lovely with his light: With lustre these have spread abroad.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ नो॒ विश्वा॑भिरू॒तिभि॒रश्वि॑ना॒ गच्छ॑तं यु॒वम् दस्रा॒ हिर॑ण्यवर्तनी॒ पिब॑तं सो॒म्यं मधु॑
verses.transliteration: ā́ no víśvābhir ūtíbhir  áśvinā gáchataṃ yuvám  dásrā híraṇyavartanī  píbataṃ somyám mádhu

translation.text: WITH all the succours that are yours, O Aṣvins, hither come to us: Wonderful, borne on paths of gold, drink ye the meath with Soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ नू॒नं या॑तमश्विना॒ रथे॑न॒ सूर्य॑त्वचा भुजी॒ हिर॑ण्यपेशसा॒ कवी॒ गम्भी॑रचेतसा
verses.transliteration: ā́ nūnáṃ yātam aśvinā  ráthena sū́ryatvacā  bhújī híraṇyapeśasā  kávī gámbhīracetasā

translation.text: Come now, ye Aṣvins, on your car decked with a sun-bright canopy, Bountiful, with your golden forms, Sages with depth of intellect.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ या॑तं॒ नहु॑ष॒स्पर्यान्तरि॑क्षात्सुवृ॒क्तिभिः॑ पिबा॑थो अश्विना॒ मधु॒ कण्वा॑नां॒ सव॑ने सु॒तम्
verses.transliteration: ā́ yātaṃ náhuṣas pári-  ā́ntárikṣāt suvr̥ktíbhiḥ  píbātho aśvinā mádhu  káṇvānāṃ sávane sutám

translation.text: Come hither from the Nahushas, come, drawn by pure hymns, from mid-air. O Aṣvins, drink the savoury juice shed in the Kaṇvas' sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ नो॑ यातं दि॒वस्पर्यान्तरि॑क्षादधप्रिया पु॒त्रः कण्व॑स्य वामि॒ह सु॒षाव॑ सो॒म्यं मधु॑
verses.transliteration: ā́ no yātaṃ divás pári-  ā́ntárikṣād adhapriyā  putráḥ káṇvasya vām ihá  suṣā́va somyám mádhu

translation.text: Come to us hither from the heavens, come from mid-air, well-loved by us: Here Kaṇva's son hath pressed for you the pleasant meath of Soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ नो॑ यात॒मुप॑श्रु॒त्यश्वि॑ना॒ सोम॑पीतये स्वाहा॒ स्तोम॑स्य वर्धना॒ प्र क॑वी धी॒तिभि॑र्नरा
verses.transliteration: ā́ no yātam úpaśrutī-  áśvinā sómapītaye  svā́hā stómasya vardhanā  prá kavī dhītíbhir narā

translation.text: Come, Aṣvins, to give car to us, to drink the Soma, Aṣvins, come. Hail, Strengtheners of the praise-song speed onward, ye Heroes, with your thoughts.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यच्चि॒द्धि वां॑ पु॒र ऋष॑यो जुहू॒रेऽव॑से नरा आ या॑तमश्वि॒ना ग॑त॒मुपे॒मां सु॑ष्टु॒तिं मम॑
verses.transliteration: yác cid dhí vām purá ŕ̥ṣayo  juhūré 'vase narā  ā́ yātam aśvinā́ gatam  úpemā́ṃ suṣṭutím máma

translation.text: As, Heroes, in the olden time the R̥ishis called you to their aid, So now, O Aṣvins, come to us, come near to this mine eulogy.

verses.sanskrit_deva: दि॒वश्चि॑द्रोच॒नादध्या नो॑ गन्तं स्वर्विदा धी॒भिर्व॑त्सप्रचेतसा॒ स्तोमे॑भिर्हवनश्रुता
verses.transliteration: diváś cid rocanā́d ádhi  ā́ no gantaṃ svarvidā  dhībhír vatsapracetasā  stómebhir havanaśrutā

translation.text: Even from the luminous sphere of heaven come to us, ye who find the light, Carers for Vatsa, through our prayers and lauds, O yewho hearour call.

verses.sanskrit_deva: किम॒न्ये पर्या॑सते॒ऽस्मत्स्तोमे॑भिर॒श्विना॑ पु॒त्रः कण्व॑स्य वा॒मृषि॑र्गी॒र्भिर्व॒त्सो अ॑वीवृधत्
verses.transliteration: kím anyé páry āsate  -asmát stómebhir aśvínā  putráḥ káṇvasya vām ŕ̥ṣir  gīrbhír vatsó avīvr̥dhat

translation.text: Do others more than we adore the Aṣvins with their hymns of praise? The R̥ishi Vatsa, Kaṇva's son, hath magnified you with his songs.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ वां॒ विप्र॑ इ॒हाव॒सेऽह्व॒त्स्तोमे॑भिरश्विना अरि॑प्रा॒ वृत्र॑हन्तमा॒ ता नो॑ भूतं मयो॒भुवा॑
verses.transliteration: ā́ vāṃ vípra ihā́vase-  -áhvat stómebhir aśvinā  áriprā vŕ̥trahantamā  tā́ no bhūtam mayobhúvā

translation.text: The holy singer with his hymns hath called you, Aṣvins, hither-ward; Best Vr̥itra-slayers, free from stain, as such bring us felicity.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ यद्वां॒ योष॑णा॒ रथ॒मति॑ष्ठद्वाजिनीवसू विश्वा॑न्यश्विना यु॒वं प्र धी॒तान्य॑गच्छतम्
verses.transliteration: ā́ yád vāṃ yóṣaṇā rátham  átiṣṭhad vājinīvasū  víśvāny aśvinā yuvám  prá dhītā́ny agachatam

translation.text: What time, ye Lords of ample wealth, the Lady mounted on your car, Then, O ye Aṣvins, ye attained all wishes that your hearts desired.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अतः॑ स॒हस्र॑निर्णिजा॒ रथे॒ना या॑तमश्विना व॒त्सो वां॒ मधु॑म॒द्वचोऽशं॑सीत्का॒व्यः क॒विः
verses.transliteration: átaḥ sahásranirṇijā  ráthenā́ yātam aśvinā  vatsó vām mádhumad vácaḥ-  -áśaṃsīt kāvyáḥ kavíḥ

translation.text: Come thence, O Aṣvins, on your car that hath a thousand ornaments: Vatsa the sage, the sage's son, hath sung a song of sweets to you.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पु॒रु॒म॒न्द्रा पु॑रू॒वसू॑ मनो॒तरा॑ रयी॒णाम् स्तोमं॑ मे अ॒श्विना॑वि॒मम॒भि वह्नी॑ अनूषाताम्
verses.transliteration: purumandrā́ purūvásū  manotárā rayīṇā́m  stómam me aśvínāv imám  abhí váhnī anūṣātām

translation.text: Cheerers of many, rich in goods, discoverers of opulence, The Aṣvins, Riders through the sky, have welcomed this my song of praise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ नो॒ विश्वा॑न्यश्विना ध॒त्तं राधां॒स्यह्र॑या कृ॒तं न॑ ऋ॒त्विया॑वतो॒ मा नो॑ रीरधतं नि॒दे
verses.transliteration: ā́ no víśvāny aśvinā  dhattáṃ rā́dhāṃsy áhrayā  kr̥táṃ na r̥tvíyāvato  mā́ no rīradhataṃ nidé

translation.text: O Aṣvins, grant us all rich gifts wherewith no man mav interfere. Make us observe the stated times: give us not over to reproach.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यन्ना॑सत्या परा॒वति॒ यद्वा॒ स्थो अध्यम्ब॑रे अतः॑ स॒हस्र॑निर्णिजा॒ रथे॒ना या॑तमश्विना
verses.transliteration: yán nāsatyā parāváti  yád vā sthó ádhy ámbare  átaḥ sahásranirṇijā  ráthenā́ yātam aśvinā

translation.text: Whether, Nâsatyas, ye be nigh, or whether ye be far away, Come thence, O Aṣvins, on your car that hath a thousand ornaments.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यो वां॑ नासत्या॒वृषि॑र्गी॒र्भिर्व॒त्सो अवी॑वृधत् तस्मै॑ स॒हस्र॑निर्णिज॒मिषं॑ धत्तं घृत॒श्चुत॑म्
verses.transliteration: yó vāṃ nāsatyāv ŕ̥ṣir  gīrbhír vatsó ávīvr̥dhat  tásmai sahásranirṇijam  íṣaṃ dhattaṃ ghr̥taścútam

translation.text: Vatsa the R̥ishi with his songs, Nâsatyas, hath exalted you: Grant him rich food distilling oil, graced with a thousand ornaments.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्रास्मा॒ ऊर्जं॑ घृत॒श्चुत॒मश्वि॑ना॒ यच्छ॑तं यु॒वम् यो वां॑ सु॒म्नाय॑ तु॒ष्टव॑द्वसू॒याद्दा॑नुनस्पती
verses.transliteration: prā́smā ū́rjaṃ ghr̥taścútam  áśvinā yáchataṃ yuvám  yó vāṃ sumnā́ya tuṣṭávad  vasūyā́d dānunas patī

translation.text: Bestow on him, O Aṣvins, food that strengthens, and that drops with oil, On him who praises you for bliss, and, Lords of bounty, prays for wealth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ नो॑ गन्तं रिशादसे॒मं स्तोमं॑ पुरुभुजा कृ॒तं नः॑ सु॒श्रियो॑ नरे॒मा दा॑तम॒भिष्ट॑ये
verses.transliteration: ā́ no gantaṃ riśādasā  -imáṃ stómam purubhujā  kr̥táṃ naḥ suśríyo narā-  -imā́ dātam abhíṣṭaye

translation.text: Come to us, ye who slay the foe, Lords of rich treasure, to this hymn. O Heroes, give us high renown and these good things of earth for help.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ वां॒ विश्वा॑भिरू॒तिभिः॑ प्रि॒यमे॑धा अहूषत राज॑न्तावध्व॒राणा॒मश्वि॑ना॒ याम॑हूतिषु
verses.transliteration: ā́ vāṃ víśvābhir ūtíbhiḥ  priyámedhā ahūṣata  rā́jantāv adhvarā́ṇām  áśvinā yā́mahūtiṣu

translation.text: The Priyamedhas have invoked you with all succours that are yours, You, Aṣvins, Lords of solemn rites, with calls entreating you to come.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ नो॑ गन्तं मयो॒भुवाश्वि॑ना श॒म्भुवा॑ यु॒वम् यो वां॑ विपन्यू धी॒तिभि॑र्गी॒र्भिर्व॒त्सो अवी॑वृधत्
verses.transliteration: ā́ no gantam mayobhúvā-  -áśvinā śambhúvā yuvám  yó vāṃ vipanyū dhītíbhir  gīrbhír vatsó ávīvr̥dhat

translation.text: Come to us, Aṣvins, ye Who bring felicity, auspicious Ones, To Vatsa who with prayer and hymn, lovers of song, hath honoured you.

verses.sanskrit_deva: याभिः॒ कण्वं॒ मेधा॑तिथिं॒ याभि॒र्वशं॒ दश॑व्रजम् याभि॒र्गोश॑र्य॒माव॑तं॒ ताभि॑र्नोऽवतं नरा
verses.transliteration: yā́bhiḥ káṇvam médhātithiṃ  yā́bhir váśaṃ dáśavrajam  yā́bhir góśaryam ā́vataṃ  tā́bhir no 'vataṃ narā

translation.text: Aid us, O Heroes, for those hymns for which ye helped Goṣarya erst, Gave Vaṣa, Daṣavraja aid, and Kaṇva and Medhâtithi:

verses.sanskrit_deva: याभि॑र्नरा त्र॒सद॑स्यु॒माव॑तं॒ कृत्व्ये॒ धने॑ ताभिः॒ ष्व१॒॑स्माँ अ॑श्विना॒ प्राव॑तं॒ वाज॑सातये
verses.transliteration: yā́bhir narā trasádasyum  ā́vataṃ kŕ̥tvye dháne  tā́bhiḥ ṣv àsmā́m̐ aśvinā  prā́vataṃ vā́jasātaye

translation.text: And favoured Trasadasyu, ye Heroes, in spoil-deciding fray: For these, O Aṣvins, graciously assist us in acquiring strength.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र वां॒ स्तोमाः॑ सुवृ॒क्तयो॒ गिरो॑ वर्धन्त्वश्विना पुरु॑त्रा॒ वृत्र॑हन्तमा॒ ता नो॑ भूतं पुरु॒स्पृहा॑
verses.transliteration: prá vāṃ stómāḥ suvr̥ktáyo  gíro vardhantv aśvinā  púrutrā vŕ̥trahantamā  tā́ no bhūtam puruspŕ̥hā

translation.text: O Aṣvins, may pure hymns of ours, and songs and praises, honour you: Best slayers everywhere of foes, as such we fondly yearn for you.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्रीणि॑ प॒दान्य॒श्विनो॑रा॒विः सान्ति॒ गुहा॑ प॒रः क॒वी ऋ॒तस्य॒ पत्म॑भिर॒र्वाग्जी॒वेभ्य॒स्परि॑
verses.transliteration: trī́ṇi padā́ny aśvínor  āvíḥ sā́nti gúhā paráḥ  kavī́ r̥tásya pátmabhir  arvā́g jīvébhyas pári

translation.text: Three places of the Aṣvins, erst concealed, are made apparent now. Both Sages, with the flight of Law come hither unto those who live.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ नू॒नम॑श्विना यु॒वं व॒त्सस्य॑ गन्त॒मव॑से प्रास्मै॑ यच्छतमवृ॒कं पृ॒थु च्छ॒र्दिर्यु॑यु॒तं या अरा॑तयः
verses.transliteration: ā́ nūnám aśvinā yuváṃ  vatsásya gantam ávase  prā́smai yachatam avr̥kám pr̥thú chardír  yuyutáṃ yā́ árātayaḥ

translation.text: To help and favour Vatsa now, O Aṣvins, come ye hitherward. Bestow on him a dwelling spacious and secure, and keep malignities away.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यद॒न्तरि॑क्षे॒ यद्दि॒वि यत्पञ्च॒ मानु॑षाँ॒ अनु॑ नृ॒म्णं तद्ध॑त्तमश्विना
verses.transliteration: yád antárikṣe yád diví  yát páñca mā́nuṣām̐ ánu  nr̥mṇáṃ tád dhattam aśvinā

translation.text: All manliness that is in heaven, with the Five Tribes, or in mid-air, Bestow, ye Aṣvins, upon us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ये वां॒ दंसां॑स्यश्विना॒ विप्रा॑सः परिमामृ॒शुः ए॒वेत्का॒ण्वस्य॑ बोधतम्
verses.transliteration: yé vāṃ dáṃsāṃsy aśvinā  víprāsaḥ parimāmr̥śúḥ  evét kāṇvásya bodhatam

translation.text: Remember Kaṇva first of all among the singers, Aṣvins, who Have thought upon your wondrous deeds.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒यं वां॑ घ॒र्मो अ॑श्विना॒ स्तोमे॑न॒ परि॑ षिच्यते अ॒यं सोमो॒ मधु॑मान्वाजिनीवसू॒ येन॑ वृ॒त्रं चिके॑तथः
verses.transliteration: ayáṃ vāṃ gharmó aśvinā  stómena pári ṣicyate  ayáṃ sómo mádhumān vājinīvasū  yéna vr̥tráṃ cíketathaḥ

translation.text: Aṣvins, for you with song of praise this hot oblation is effused, This your sweet Soma juice, ye Lords of ample wealth, through which ye think upon the foe.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यद॒प्सु यद्वन॒स्पतौ॒ यदोष॑धीषु पुरुदंससा कृ॒तम् तेन॑ माविष्टमश्विना
verses.transliteration: yád apsú yád vánaspátau  yád óṣadhīṣu purudaṃsasā kr̥tám  téna māviṣṭam aśvinā

translation.text: Whatever ye have done in floods, in the tree, Wonder-Workers, and in growing plants, Therewith, O Aṣvins, succour me.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यन्ना॑सत्या भुर॒ण्यथो॒ यद्वा॑ देव भिष॒ज्यथः॑ अ॒यं वां॑ व॒त्सो म॒तिभि॒र्न वि॑न्धते ह॒विष्म॑न्तं॒ हि गच्छ॑थः
verses.transliteration: yán nāsatyā bhuraṇyátho  yád vā deva bhiṣajyáthaḥ  ayáṃ vāṃ vatsó matíbhir ná vindhate  havíṣmantaṃ hí gáchathaḥ

translation.text: What force, Nâsatyas, ye exert, whatever, Gods, ye tend and heal, This your own Vatsa gains not by his hymns alone: ye visit him who offers gifts.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ नू॒नम॒श्विनो॒र्ऋषिः॒ स्तोमं॑ चिकेत वा॒मया॑ आ सोमं॒ मधु॑मत्तमं घ॒र्मं सि॑ञ्चा॒दथ॑र्वणि
verses.transliteration: ā́ nūnám aśvínor ŕ̥ṣi  stómaṃ ciketa vāmáyā  ā́ sómam mádhumattamaṃ  gharmáṃ siñcād átharvaṇi

translation.text: Now hath the R̥ishi splendidly thought out the Aṣvins' hymn of praise. Let the Atharvan pour the warm oblation forth, and Soma very rich in sweets.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ नू॒नं र॒घुव॑र्तनिं॒ रथं॑ तिष्ठाथो अश्विना आ वां॒ स्तोमा॑ इ॒मे मम॒ नभो॒ न चु॑च्यवीरत
verses.transliteration: ā́ nūnáṃ raghúvartaniṃ  ráthaṃ tiṣṭhātho aśvinā  ā́ vāṃ stómā imé máma  nábho ná cucyavīrata

translation.text: Ye Aṣvins, now ascend your car that lightly rolls upon its way. May these my praises make you speed hitherward like a cloud of heaven.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यद॒द्य वां॑ नासत्यो॒क्थैरा॑चुच्युवी॒महि॑ यद्वा॒ वाणी॑भिरश्विने॒वेत्का॒ण्वस्य॑ बोधतम्
verses.transliteration: yád adyá vāṃ nāsatyā-  -ukthaír ācucyuvīmáhi  yád vā vā́ṇībhir aśvinā-  evét kāṇvásya bodhatam

translation.text: When, O Nâsatyas, we this day make you speed hither with our hymns, Or, Aṣvins, with our songs of praise, remember Kanya specially.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यद्वां॑ क॒क्षीवाँ॑ उ॒त यद्व्य॑श्व॒ ऋषि॒र्यद्वां॑ दी॒र्घत॑मा जु॒हाव॑ पृथी॒ यद्वां॑ वै॒न्यः साद॑नेष्वे॒वेदतो॑ अश्विना चेतयेथाम्
verses.transliteration: yád vāṃ kakṣī́vām̐ utá yád vyàśvaḥ-  ŕ̥ṣir yád vāṃ dīrghátamā juhā́va  pŕ̥thī yád vāṃ vainyáḥ sā́daneṣu-  evéd áto aśvinā cetayethām

translation.text: As erst Kakshîvân and the R̥ishi Vyaṣva, as erst Dîrghatamas invoked your presence, Or, in the sacrificial chambers, Vainya Pr̥ithî, so be ye mindful of us here, O Aṣvins.

verses.sanskrit_deva: या॒तं छ॑र्दि॒ष्पा उ॒त नः॑ पर॒स्पा भू॒तं ज॑ग॒त्पा उ॒त न॑स्तनू॒पा व॒र्तिस्तो॒काय॒ तन॑याय यातम्
verses.transliteration: yātáṃ chardiṣpā́ utá naḥ paraspā́  bhūtáṃ jagatpā́ utá nas tanūpā́  vartís tokā́ya tánayāya yātam

translation.text: Come as home-guardians, saving us from foemen, guarding our living creatures and our bodies, Come to the house to give us seed and offspring,

verses.sanskrit_deva: यदिन्द्रे॑ण स॒रथं॑ या॒थो अ॑श्विना॒ यद्वा॑ वा॒युना॒ भव॑थः॒ समो॑कसा यदा॑दि॒त्येभि॑र्ऋ॒भुभिः॑ स॒जोष॑सा॒ यद्वा॒ विष्णो॑र्वि॒क्रम॑णेषु॒ तिष्ठ॑थः
verses.transliteration: yád índreṇa saráthaṃ yāthó aśvinā  yád vā vāyúnā bhávathaḥ sámokasā  yád ādityébhir r̥bhúbhiḥ sajóṣasā  yád vā víṣṇor vikrámaṇeṣu tíṣṭhathaḥ

translation.text: Whether with Indra ye be faring, Aṣvins, or resting in one dwelling-place with Vâyu, In concord with the R̥ibhus or Âdityas, or standing still in Vishṇu's striding-places.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यद॒द्याश्विना॑व॒हं हु॒वेय॒ वाज॑सातये यत्पृ॒त्सु तु॒र्वणे॒ सह॒स्तच्छ्रेष्ठ॑म॒श्विनो॒रवः॑
verses.transliteration: yád adyā́śvínāv aháṃ  huvéya vā́jasātaye  yát pr̥tsú turváṇe sáhas  tác chréṣṭham aśvínor ávaḥ

translation.text: When I, O Aṣvins, call on you to-day that I may gather strength, Or as all-conquering might in war, be that the Aṣvins' noblest grace.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ नू॒नं या॑तमश्विने॒मा ह॒व्यानि॑ वां हि॒ता इ॒मे सोमा॑सो॒ अधि॑ तु॒र्वशे॒ यदा॑वि॒मे कण्वे॑षु वा॒मथ॑
verses.transliteration: ā́ nūnáṃ yātam aśvinā  -imā́ havyā́ni vāṃ hitā́  imé sómāso ádhi turváśe yádāv  imé káṇveṣu vām átha

translation.text: Now come, ye Aṣvins, hitherward: here are oblations set for you; These Soma-draughts to aid Yadu and Turvaṣa, these offered you mid Kaṇva's Sons.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यन्ना॑सत्या परा॒के अ॑र्वा॒के अस्ति॑ भेष॒जम् तेन॑ नू॒नं वि॑म॒दाय॑ प्रचेतसा छ॒र्दिर्व॒त्साय॑ यच्छतम्
verses.transliteration: yán nāsatyā parāké  arvāké ásti bheṣajám  téna nūnáṃ vimadā́ya pracetasā  chardír vatsā́ya yachatam

translation.text: Whatever healing balm is yours, Nisatyas, near or far away, Therewith, great Sages, grant a home to Vatsa and to Vimada.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अभु॑त्स्यु॒ प्र दे॒व्या सा॒कं वा॒चाहम॒श्विनोः॑ व्या॑वर्दे॒व्या म॒तिं वि रा॒तिं मर्त्ये॑भ्यः
verses.transliteration: ábhutsy u prá devyā́  sākáṃ vācā́hám aśvínoḥ  vy ā̀var devy ā́ matíṃ  ví rātím mártyebhyaḥ

translation.text: Together with the Goddess, with the Aṣvins' Speech have I awoke. Thou, Goddess, hast disclosed the hymn, and holy gift from mortal men.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र बो॑धयोषो अ॒श्विना॒ प्र दे॑वि सूनृते महि प्र य॑ज्ञहोतरानु॒षक्प्र मदा॑य॒ श्रवो॑ बृ॒हत्
verses.transliteration: prá bodhayoṣo aśvínā  prá devi sūnr̥te mahi  prá yajñahotar ānuṣák  prá mádāya śrávo br̥hát

translation.text: Awake the Aṣvins, Goddess Dawn! Up Mighty Lady of sweet strains! Rise, straightway, priest of sacrifice! High glory to the gladdening draught!

verses.sanskrit_deva: यदु॑षो॒ यासि॑ भा॒नुना॒ सं सूर्ये॑ण रोचसे आ हा॒यम॒श्विनो॒ रथो॑ व॒र्तिर्या॑ति नृ॒पाय्य॑म्
verses.transliteration: yád uṣo yā́si bhānúnā  sáṃ sū́ryeṇa rocase  ā́ hāyám aśvíno rátho  vartír yāti nr̥pā́yyam

translation.text: Thou, Dawn, approaching with thy light shinest together with the Sun, And to this man-protecting home the chariot ofthe Aṣvins comes.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यदापी॑तासो अं॒शवो॒ गावो॒ न दु॒ह्र ऊध॑भिः यद्वा॒ वाणी॒रनू॑षत॒ प्र दे॑व॒यन्तो॑ अ॒श्विना॑
verses.transliteration: yád ā́pītāso aṃśávo  gā́vo ná duhrá ū́dhabhiḥ  yád vā vā́ṇīr ánūṣata  prá devayánto aśvínā

translation.text: When yellow stalks give forth the juice, as cows from udders pour their milk, And voices sound the song of praise, the Aṣvins' worshippers show first.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र द्यु॒म्नाय॒ प्र शव॑से॒ प्र नृ॒षाह्या॑य॒ शर्म॑णे प्र दक्षा॑य प्रचेतसा
verses.transliteration: prá dyumnā́ya prá śávase  prá nr̥ṣā́hyāya śármaṇe  prá dákṣāya pracetasā

translation.text: Forward for glory and for strength, protection that shall conquer men, And power and skill, most sapient Ones!

verses.sanskrit_deva: यन्नू॒नं धी॒भिर॑श्विना पि॒तुर्योना॑ नि॒षीद॑थः यद्वा॑ सु॒म्नेभि॑रुक्थ्या
verses.transliteration: yán nūnáṃ dhībhír aśvinā  pitúr yónā niṣī́dathaḥ  yád vā sumnébhir ukthyā

translation.text: When Aṣvins, worthy of our lauds, ye seat you in the father's house. With wisdom or the bliss ye bring.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यत्स्थो दी॒र्घप्र॑सद्मनि॒ यद्वा॒दो रो॑च॒ने दि॒वः यद्वा॑ समु॒द्रे अध्याकृ॑ते गृ॒हेऽत॒ आ या॑तमश्विना
verses.transliteration: yát sthó dīrgháprasadmani  yád vādó rocané diváḥ  yád vā samudré ádhy ā́kr̥te gr̥hé  -áta ā́ yātam aśvinā

translation.text: WHETHER ye travel far away or dwell in yonder light of heaven, Or in a mansion that is built above the sea, come thence, ye Aṣvins, hitherward.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यद्वा॑ य॒ज्ञं मन॑वे सम्मिमि॒क्षथु॑रे॒वेत्का॒ण्वस्य॑ बोधतम् बृह॒स्पतिं॒ विश्वा॑न्दे॒वाँ अ॒हं हु॑व॒ इन्द्रा॒विष्णू॑ अ॒श्विना॑वाशु॒हेष॑सा
verses.transliteration: yád vā yajñám mánave sammimikṣáthur  evét kāṇvásya bodhatam  bŕ̥haspátiṃ víśvān devā́m̐ aháṃ huve-  índrāvíṣṇū aśvínāv āśuhéṣasā

translation.text: Or if for Manu.ye prepared the sacrifice, remember also Kaṇva's son. I call Br̥ihaspati, Indra, Vishṇu, all the gods, the Aṣvins borne by rapid steeds.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्या न्व१॒॑श्विना॑ हुवे सु॒दंस॑सा गृ॒भे कृ॒ता ययो॒रस्ति॒ प्र णः॑ स॒ख्यं दे॒वेष्वध्याप्य॑म्
verses.transliteration: tyā́ nv àśvínā huve  sudáṃsasā gr̥bhé kr̥tā́  yáyor ásti prá ṇaḥ sakhyáṃ  devéṣv ádhy ā́pyam

translation.text: Those Aṣvins I invoke who work marvels, brought hither to receive, With whom our friendship is most famed, and kinship passing that of Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ययो॒रधि॒ प्र य॒ज्ञा अ॑सू॒रे सन्ति॑ सू॒रयः॑ ता य॒ज्ञस्या॑ध्व॒रस्य॒ प्रचे॑तसा स्व॒धाभि॒र्या पिब॑तः सो॒म्यं मधु॑
verses.transliteration: yáyor ádhi prá yajñā́ḥ-  asūré sánti sūráyaḥ  tā́ yajñásyādhvarásya prácetasā  svadhā́bhir yā́ píbataḥ somyám mádhu

translation.text: On whom the solemn rites depend, whose worshippers rise without the Sun: These who foreknow the holy work of sacrifice, and by their Godhead drink the sweets of Soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यद॒द्याश्वि॑ना॒वपा॒ग्यत्प्राक्स्थो वा॑जिनीवसू यद्द्रु॒ह्यव्यन॑वि तु॒र्वशे॒ यदौ॑ हु॒वे वा॒मथ॒ मा ग॑तम्
verses.transliteration: yád adyā́śvināv ápāg  yát prā́k sthó vājinīvasū  yád druhyávy ánavi turváśe yádau  huvé vām átha mā́ gatam

translation.text: Whether ye, Lords of ample wealth, now linger in the cast or west, With Druhyu, or with Anu, Yadu, Turvaga, I call you hither; come to me.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यद॒न्तरि॑क्षे॒ पत॑थः पुरुभुजा॒ यद्वे॒मे रोद॑सी॒ अनु॑ यद्वा॑ स्व॒धाभि॑रधि॒तिष्ठ॑थो॒ रथ॒मत॒ आ या॑तमश्विना
verses.transliteration: yád antárikṣe pátathaḥ purubhujā  yád vemé ródasī ánu  yád vā svadhā́bhir adhitíṣṭhatho rátham  -áta ā́ yātam aśvinā

translation.text: Lords of great riches, whether through the firmament ye fly or speed through heaven and earth, Or with your Godlike natures stand upon your cars, come thence, O Aṣvins, hitherward.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वम॑ग्ने व्रत॒पा अ॑सि दे॒व आ मर्त्ये॒ष्वा त्वं य॒ज्ञेष्वीड्यः॑
verses.transliteration: tvám agne vratapā́ asi  devá ā́ mártyeṣv ā́  tváṃ yajñéṣv ī́ḍyaḥ

translation.text: THOU Agni, God mid mortal men, art guard of sacred rites, thou art To be adored at sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वम॑सि प्र॒शस्यो॑ वि॒दथे॑षु सहन्त्य अग्ने॑ र॒थीर॑ध्व॒राणा॑म्
verses.transliteration: tvám asi praśásyo  vidátheṣu sahantya  -ágne rathī́r adhvarā́ṇām

translation.text: O Mighty Agni, thou must be glorified at our festivals, Bearing our offerings to the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स त्वम॒स्मदप॒ द्विषो॑ युयो॒धि जा॑तवेदः अदे॑वीरग्ने॒ अरा॑तीः
verses.transliteration: sá tvám asmád ápa dvíṣo  yuyodhí jātavedaḥ  ádevīr agne árātīḥ

translation.text: O Jâtavedas Agni, fight and drive our foes afar from us, Themand their godless enmities.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अन्ति॑ चि॒त्सन्त॒मह॑ य॒ज्ञं मर्त॑स्य रि॒पोः नोप॑ वेषि जातवेदः
verses.transliteration: ánti cit sántam áha  yajñám mártasya ripóḥ  nópa veṣi jātavedaḥ

translation.text: Thou, Jâtavedas, seekest not the worship of a hostile man, However nigh it be to thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मर्ता॒ अम॑र्त्यस्य ते॒ भूरि॒ नाम॑ मनामहे विप्रा॑सो जा॒तवे॑दसः
verses.transliteration: mártā ámartyasya te  bhū́ri nā́ma manāmahe  víprāso jātávedasaḥ

translation.text: We sages, mortals as we are, adore the mighty name oof thee, Immortal Jâtavedas' name.

verses.sanskrit_deva: विप्रं॒ विप्रा॒सोऽव॑से दे॒वं मर्ता॑स ऊ॒तये॑ अ॒ग्निं गी॒र्भिर्ह॑वामहे
verses.transliteration: vípraṃ víprāsó 'vase  devám mártāsa ūtáye  agníṃ gīrbhír havāmahe

translation.text: Sages, we call the Sage to help, mortals, we call the God to aid: We call on Agni with our songs.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ ते॑ व॒त्सो मनो॑ यमत्पर॒माच्चि॑त्स॒धस्था॑त् अग्ने॒ त्वांका॑मया गि॒रा
verses.transliteration: ā́ te vatsó máno yamat  paramā́c cit sadhásthāt  ágne tvā́ṃkāmayā girā́

translation.text: May Vatsa draw- thy mind away even from thy loftiest dwelling-place, Agni, with song that yearns for thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पु॒रु॒त्रा हि स॒दृङ्ङसि॒ विशो॒ विश्वा॒ अनु॑ प्र॒भुः स॒मत्सु॑ त्वा हवामहे
verses.transliteration: purutrā́ hí sadŕ̥ṅṅ ási  víśo víśvā ánu prabhúḥ  samátsu tvā havāmahe

translation.text: Thou art the same in many a place: mid all the people thou art Lord. In fray and fightt we call on thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स॒मत्स्व॒ग्निमव॑से वाज॒यन्तो॑ हवामहे वाजे॑षु चि॒त्ररा॑धसम्
verses.transliteration: samátsv agním ávase  vājayánto havāmahe  vā́jeṣu citrárādhasam

translation.text: When we are seeking strength we call Agni to help us in the strife, The giver of rich gifts in war.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र॒त्नो हि क॒मीड्यो॑ अध्व॒रेषु॑ स॒नाच्च॒ होता॒ नव्य॑श्च॒ सत्सि॑ स्वां चा॑ग्ने त॒न्वं॑ पि॒प्रय॑स्वा॒स्मभ्यं॑ च॒ सौभ॑ग॒मा य॑जस्व
verses.transliteration: pratnó hí kam ī́ḍyo adhvaréṣu  sanā́c ca hótā návyaś ca sátsi  svā́ṃ cāgne tanvàm pipráyasva-  -asmábhyaṃ ca saúbhagam ā́ yajasva

translation.text: Ancient, adorablie at sacrifices, Priest from of old, meet for our praise, thou sittest. Fill full and satisfy thy body, Agni, and win us happiness by offering worship.

verses.sanskrit_deva: य इ॑न्द्र सोम॒पात॑मो॒ मदः॑ शविष्ठ॒ चेत॑ति येना॒ हंसि॒ न्य१॒॑त्रिणं॒ तमी॑महे
verses.transliteration: yá indra somapā́tamo  mádaḥ śaviṣṭha cétati  yénā háṃsi ny àtríṇaṃ  tám īmahe

translation.text: JOY, Mightiest Indra, known and marked, sprung most from Soma-draughts, wherewith Thou smitest down the greedy fiend, for that we long.

verses.sanskrit_deva: येना॒ दश॑ग्व॒मध्रि॑गुं वे॒पय॑न्तं॒ स्व॑र्णरम् येना॑ समु॒द्रमावि॑था॒ तमी॑महे
verses.transliteration: yénā dáśagvam ádhriguṃ  vepáyantaṃ svàrṇaram  yénā samudrám ā́vithā  tám īmahe

translation.text: Wherewith thou bolpest Adhrigu, the great Daṣagva, and the God Who stirs the sunlight, and the sea, for that we long.

verses.sanskrit_deva: येन॒ सिन्धुं॑ म॒हीर॒पो रथाँ॑ इव प्रचो॒दयः॑ पन्था॑मृ॒तस्य॒ यात॑वे॒ तमी॑महे
verses.transliteration: yéna síndhum mahī́r apó  ráthām̐ iva pracodáyaḥ  pánthām r̥tásya yā́tave  tám īmahe

translation.text: Wherewith thou dravest forth like cars Sindhu and all the mighty floods To go the way ordained by Law, for that we long.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒मं स्तोम॑म॒भिष्ट॑ये घृ॒तं न पू॒तम॑द्रिवः येना॒ नु स॒द्य ओज॑सा व॒वक्षि॑थ
verses.transliteration: imáṃ stómam abhíṣṭaye  ghr̥táṃ ná pūtám adrivaḥ  yénā nú sadyá ójasā  vavákṣitha

translation.text: Accept this laud for aid, made pure like oil, thou Caster of the Stone, Whereby even in a moment thou hast waxen great.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒मं जु॑षस्व गिर्वणः समु॒द्र इ॑व पिन्वते इन्द्र॒ विश्वा॑भिरू॒तिभि॑र्व॒वक्षि॑थ
verses.transliteration: imáṃ juṣasva girvaṇaḥ  samudrá iva pinvate  índra víśvābhir ūtíbhir  vavákṣitha

translation.text: Be pleased, Song-lover, with this song it flows abundant like the sea. Indra, with all thy succours thou hast waxen great.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यो नो॑ दे॒वः प॑रा॒वतः॑ सखित्व॒नाय॑ माम॒हे दि॒वो न वृ॒ष्टिं प्र॒थय॑न्व॒वक्षि॑थ
verses.transliteration: yó no deváḥ parāvátaḥ  sakhitvanā́ya māmahé  divó ná vr̥ṣṭím pratháyan  vavákṣitha

translation.text: The God who from afar hath sent gifts to maintain our friendship's bond, Thou. spreading them like rain from heaven, hast waxen great.

verses.sanskrit_deva: व॒व॒क्षुर॑स्य के॒तव॑ उ॒त वज्रो॒ गभ॑स्त्योः यत्सूर्यो॒ न रोद॑सी॒ अव॑र्धयत्
verses.transliteration: vavakṣúr asya ketávo  utá vájro gábhastyoḥ  yát sū́ryo ná ródasī  ávardhayat

translation.text: The beams that mark him have grown strong, the thunder rests between his arms, When, like the Sun, he hath increased both Heaven and Earth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यदि॑ प्रवृद्ध सत्पते स॒हस्रं॑ महि॒षाँ अघः॑ आदित्त॑ इन्द्रि॒यं महि॒ प्र वा॑वृधे
verses.transliteration: yádi pravr̥ddha satpate  sahásram mahiṣā́m̐ ághaḥ  ā́d ít ta indriyám máhi  prá vāvr̥dhe

translation.text: When, Mighty Lord of Heroes, thou didst cat a thousand buffaloes, Then grew and waxed exceeding great thine Indra-power.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्रः॒ सूर्य॑स्य र॒श्मिभि॒र्न्य॑र्शसा॒नमो॑षति अ॒ग्निर्वने॑व सास॒हिः प्र वा॑वृधे
verses.transliteration: índraḥ sū́ryasya raśmíbhir  ny àrśasānám oṣati  agnír váneva sāsahíḥ  prá vāvr̥dhe

translation.text: Indra consumeth with the rays of Sûrya the malicious man: Like Agni conquering the woods, he hath grown strong.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒यं त॑ ऋ॒त्विया॑वती धी॒तिरे॑ति॒ नवी॑यसी स॒प॒र्यन्ती॑ पुरुप्रि॒या मिमी॑त॒ इत्
verses.transliteration: iyáṃ ta r̥tvíyāvatī  dhītír eti návīyasī  saparyántī purupriyā́  mímīta ít

translation.text: This newest thought of ours that suits the time approaches unto thee: Serving, beloved in many a place it metes and marks.

verses.sanskrit_deva: गर्भो॑ य॒ज्ञस्य॑ देव॒युः क्रतुं॑ पुनीत आनु॒षक् स्तोमै॒रिन्द्र॑स्य वावृधे॒ मिमी॑त॒ इत्
verses.transliteration: gárbho yajñásya devayúḥ  krátum punīta ānuṣák  stómair índrasya vāvr̥dhe  mímīta ít

translation.text: The pious germ of sacrifice directly purifies the soul. By Indra's lauds it waxes great, it metes and marks.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स॒निर्मि॒त्रस्य॑ पप्रथ॒ इन्द्रः॒ सोम॑स्य पी॒तये॑ प्राची॒ वाशी॑व सुन्व॒ते मिमी॑त॒ इत्
verses.transliteration: sanír mitrásya paprathe-  índraḥ sómasya pītáye  prā́cī vā́śīva sunvaté  mímīta ít

translation.text: Indra who wins the friend hath spread himself to drink the Soma-draught: Like worshipper's dilating praise; it metes and marks.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यं विप्रा॑ उ॒क्थवा॑हसोऽभिप्रम॒न्दुरा॒यवः॑ घृ॒तं न पि॑प्य आ॒सन्यृ॒तस्य॒ यत्
verses.transliteration: yáṃ víprā ukthávāhaso  -abhipramandúr āyávaḥ  ghr̥táṃ ná pipya āsáni-  r̥tásya yát

translation.text: He whom the sages, living men, have gladdened, offering up their hymns, Hath swelled like oil of sacrifice in Agni's mouth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒त स्व॒राजे॒ अदि॑तिः॒ स्तोम॒मिन्द्रा॑य जीजनत् पु॒रु॒प्र॒श॒स्तमू॒तय॑ ऋ॒तस्य॒ यत्
verses.transliteration: utá svarā́je áditiḥ-  stómam índrāya jījanat  purupraśastám ūtáye-  r̥tásya yát

translation.text: Aditi also hath brought forth a hymn for Indra, Sovran Lord: The work of sacrifice for help is glorified.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भि वह्न॑य ऊ॒तयेऽनू॑षत॒ प्रश॑स्तये न दे॑व॒ विव्र॑ता॒ हरी॑ ऋ॒तस्य॒ यत्
verses.transliteration: abhí váhnaya ūtáye-  -ánūṣata práśastaye  ná deva vívratā hárī  r̥tásya yát

translation.text: The ministering priests have sung their songs for aid and eulogy: God, thy Bays turn not from the rite which Law ordains.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यत्सोम॑मिन्द्र॒ विष्ण॑वि॒ यद्वा॑ घ त्रि॒त आ॒प्त्ये यद्वा॑ म॒रुत्सु॒ मन्द॑से॒ समिन्दु॑भिः
verses.transliteration: yát sómam indra víṣṇavi  yád vā gha tritá āptyé  yád vā marútsu mándase  sám índubhiḥ

translation.text: If, Indra, thou drink Soma by Vishṇu's or Trita Âptya's side, Or with the Maruts take delight in flowing drops;

verses.sanskrit_deva: यद्वा॑ शक्र परा॒वति॑ समु॒द्रे अधि॒ मन्द॑से अ॒स्माक॒मित्सु॒ते र॑णा॒ समिन्दु॑भिः
verses.transliteration: yád vā śakra parāváti  samudré ádhi mándase  asmā́kam ít suté raṇā  sám índubhiḥ

translation.text: Or, Ṣakra, if thou gladden thee afar or in the sea of air, Rejoice thee in this juice of ours, in flowing drops.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यद्वासि॑ सुन्व॒तो वृ॒धो यज॑मानस्य सत्पते उ॒क्थे वा॒ यस्य॒ रण्य॑सि॒ समिन्दु॑भिः
verses.transliteration: yád vā́si sunvató vr̥dhó  yájamānasya satpate  ukthé vā yásya ráṇyasi  sám índubhiḥ

translation.text: Or, Lord of Heroes if thou aid the worshipper who shed; the, juice, Or him whose laud delights thee, and his flowing drops.

verses.sanskrit_deva: दे॒वंदे॑वं॒ वोऽव॑स॒ इन्द्र॑मिन्द्रं गृणी॒षणि॑ अधा॑ य॒ज्ञाय॑ तु॒र्वणे॒ व्या॑नशुः
verses.transliteration: deváṃ-devaṃ vó 'vase-  índram-indraṃ gr̥ṇīṣáṇi  ádhā yajñā́ya turváṇe  vy ā̀naśuḥ

translation.text: To magnify the God, the God, Indra, yea, Indra for your help, And promptly end the sacrifice-this have they gained.

verses.sanskrit_deva: य॒ज्ञेभि॑र्य॒ज्ञवा॑हसं॒ सोमे॑भिः सोम॒पात॑मम् होत्रा॑भि॒रिन्द्रं॑ वावृधु॒र्व्या॑नशुः
verses.transliteration: yajñébhir yajñávāhasaṃ  sómebhiḥ somapā́tamam  hótrābhir índraṃ vāvr̥dhur  vy ā̀naśuḥ

translation.text: With worship, him whom men adore, with Soma, him who drinks it most, Indra with lauds have they increasedthis have they gained.

verses.sanskrit_deva: म॒हीर॑स्य॒ प्रणी॑तयः पू॒र्वीरु॒त प्रश॑स्तयः विश्वा॒ वसू॑नि दा॒शुषे॒ व्या॑नशुः
verses.transliteration: mahī́r asya práṇītayaḥ  pūrvī́r utá práśastayaḥ  víśvā vásūni dāśúṣe  vy ā̀naśuḥ

translation.text: His leadings are with power and might and his instructions manifold: He gives the worshipper all wealth: this have they gained.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्रं॑ वृ॒त्राय॒ हन्त॑वे दे॒वासो॑ दधिरे पु॒रः इन्द्रं॒ वाणी॑रनूषता॒ समोज॑से
verses.transliteration: índraṃ vr̥trā́ya hántave  devā́so dadhire puráḥ  índraṃ vā́ṇīr anūṣatā  sám ójase

translation.text: For slaying Vr̥itra have the Gods set Indra in the foremost place. Indra the choral bands have sung, for vigorous strength.

verses.sanskrit_deva: म॒हान्तं॑ महि॒ना व॒यं स्तोमे॑भिर्हवन॒श्रुत॑म् अ॒र्कैर॒भि प्र णो॑नुमः॒ समोज॑से
verses.transliteration: mahā́ntam mahinā́ vayáṃ  stómebhir havanaśrútam  arkaír abhí prá ṇonumaḥ  sám ójase

translation.text: We to the Mighty with our might, with lauds to him who hears our call, With holy hymns have sung aloud, for vigorous strength.

verses.sanskrit_deva: न यं वि॑वि॒क्तो रोद॑सी॒ नान्तरि॑क्षाणि व॒ज्रिण॑म् अमा॒दिद॑स्य तित्विषे॒ समोज॑सः
verses.transliteration: ná yáṃ viviktó ródasī  nā́ntárikṣāṇi vajríṇam  ámād íd asya titviṣe  sám ójasaḥ

translation.text: Not earth, nor heaven, nor firmaments contain the Thunder-wielding God: They shake before his violent rush and vigorous strength.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यदि॑न्द्र पृत॒नाज्ये॑ दे॒वास्त्वा॑ दधि॒रे पु॒रः आदित्ते॑ हर्य॒ता हरी॑ ववक्षतुः
verses.transliteration: yád indra pr̥tanā́jye  devā́s tvā dadhiré puráḥ  ā́d ít te haryatā́ hárī  vavakṣatuḥ

translation.text: What time the Gods, O Indra, get thee foremost in the furious fight, Then thy two beautiful Bay Steeds carried thee on.

verses.sanskrit_deva: य॒दा वृ॒त्रं न॑दी॒वृतं॒ शव॑सा वज्रि॒न्नव॑धीः आदित्ते॑ हर्य॒ता हरी॑ ववक्षतुः
verses.transliteration: yadā́ vr̥tráṃ nadīvŕ̥taṃ  śávasā vajrinn ávadhīḥ  ā́d ít te haryatā́ hárī  vavakṣatuḥ

translation.text: When Vr̥itra, stayer of the floods, thou slewest, Thunderer with might, Then thy two beautiful Bay Steeds carried thee on.

verses.sanskrit_deva: य॒दा ते॒ विष्णु॒रोज॑सा॒ त्रीणि॑ प॒दा वि॑चक्र॒मे आदित्ते॑ हर्य॒ता हरी॑ ववक्षतुः
verses.transliteration: yadā́ te víṣṇur ójasā  trī́ṇi padā́ vicakramé  ā́d ít te haryatā́ hárī  vavakṣatuḥ

translation.text: When Vishṇu, through thine energy, strode wide those three great steps of his, Then thy two beautiful Bay Steeds carried thee on.

verses.sanskrit_deva: य॒दा ते॑ हर्य॒ता हरी॑ वावृ॒धाते॑ दि॒वेदि॑वे आदित्ते॒ विश्वा॒ भुव॑नानि येमिरे
verses.transliteration: yadā́ te haryatā́ hárī  vāvr̥dhā́te divé-dive  ā́d ít te víśvā bhúvanāni yemire

translation.text: When thy two beautiful Bay Steeds grew great and greater day by day, Even then all creatures that had life bowed down to thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: य॒दा ते॒ मारु॑ती॒र्विश॒स्तुभ्य॑मिन्द्र नियेमि॒रे आदित्ते॒ विश्वा॒ भुव॑नानि येमिरे
verses.transliteration: yadā́ te mā́rutīr víśas  túbhyam indra niyemiré  ā́d ít te víśvā bhúvanāni yemire

translation.text: When, Indra, all the Marut folk humbly submitted them to thee, Even then all creatures that had life bowed down to thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: य॒दा सूर्य॑म॒मुं दि॒वि शु॒क्रं ज्योति॒रधा॑रयः आदित्ते॒ विश्वा॒ भुव॑नानि येमिरे
verses.transliteration: yadā́ sū́ryam amúṃ diví  śukráṃ jyótir ádhārayaḥ  ā́d ít te víśvā bhúvanāni yemire

translation.text: When yonder Sun, that brilliant light, thou settest in the heaven above, Even then all creatures that had life bowed down to thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒मां त॑ इन्द्र सुष्टु॒तिं विप्र॑ इयर्ति धी॒तिभिः॑ जा॒मिं प॒देव॒ पिप्र॑तीं॒ प्राध्व॒रे
verses.transliteration: imā́ṃ ta indra suṣṭutíṃ  vípra iyarti dhītíbhiḥ  jāmím padéva pípratīm  prā́dhvaré

translation.text: To thee, O Indra, with this thought the sage lifts up this eulogy, Akin and leading as on foot to sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यद॑स्य॒ धाम॑नि प्रि॒ये स॑मीची॒नासो॒ अस्व॑रन् नाभा॑ य॒ज्ञस्य॑ दो॒हना॒ प्राध्व॒रे
verses.transliteration: yád asya dhā́mani priyé  samīcīnā́so ásvaran  nā́bhā yajñásya dohánā  prā́dhvaré

translation.text: When in thine own dear dwelling all gathered have lifted up the voice Milk-streams at worship's central spot, for sacrifice,

verses.sanskrit_deva: सु॒वीर्यं॒ स्वश्व्यं॑ सु॒गव्य॑मिन्द्र दद्धि नः होते॑व पू॒र्वचि॑त्तये॒ प्राध्व॒रे
verses.transliteration: suvī́ryaṃ sváśvyaṃ  sugávyam indra daddhi naḥ  hóteva pūrvácittaye  prā́dhvaré

translation.text: As Priest, O Indra, give us wealth in brave men and good steeds ana kine That we may first remember thee for sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्रः॑ सु॒तेषु॒ सोमे॑षु॒ क्रतुं॑ पुनीत उ॒क्थ्य॑म् वि॒दे वृ॒धस्य॒ दक्ष॑सो म॒हान्हि षः
verses.transliteration: índraḥ sutéṣu sómeṣu  krátum punīta ukthyàm  vidé vr̥dhásya dákṣaso  mahā́n hí ṣáḥ

translation.text: INDRA, when Soma juices flow, makes his mind pure and meet for lauds. He gains the power that brings success, for great is he.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स प्र॑थ॒मे व्यो॑मनि दे॒वानां॒ सद॑ने वृ॒धः सु॒पा॒रः सु॒श्रव॑स्तमः॒ सम॑प्सु॒जित्
verses.transliteration: sá prathamé vyòmani  devā́nāṃ sádane vr̥dháḥ  supāráḥ suśrávastamaḥ  sám apsujít

translation.text: In heaven's first region, in the seat of Gods, is he who brings success, Most glorious, prompt to save, who wins the water-floods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तम॑ह्वे॒ वाज॑सातय॒ इन्द्रं॒ भरा॑य शु॒ष्मिण॑म् भवा॑ नः सु॒म्ने अन्त॑मः॒ सखा॑ वृ॒धे
verses.transliteration: tám ahve vā́jasātaye-  índram bhárāya śuṣmíṇam  bhávā naḥ sumné ántamaḥ  sákhā vr̥dhé

translation.text: Him, to win strength, have I invoked, even Indra mighty for the fray. Be thou most near to us for bliss, a Friend to aid.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒यं त॑ इन्द्र गिर्वणो रा॒तिः क्ष॑रति सुन्व॒तः म॒न्दा॒नो अ॒स्य ब॒र्हिषो॒ वि रा॑जसि
verses.transliteration: iyáṃ ta indra girvaṇo  rātíḥ kṣarati sunvatáḥ  mandānó asyá barhíṣo  ví rājasi

translation.text: Indra, Song -lover, here for thee the worshipper's libation flows. Rejoicing in this sacred grass thou shinest forth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: नू॒नं तदि॑न्द्र दद्धि नो॒ यत्त्वा॑ सु॒न्वन्त॒ ईम॑हे र॒यिं न॑श्चि॒त्रमा भ॑रा स्व॒र्विद॑म्
verses.transliteration: nūnáṃ tád indra daddhi no  yát tvā sunvánta ī́mahe  rayíṃ naś citrám ā́ bharā  svarvídam

translation.text: Even now, O Indra, give us that which, pressing juice, we crave of thee. Bring us wealth manifold which finds the light of heaven.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स्तो॒ता यत्ते॒ विच॑र्षणिरतिप्रश॒र्धय॒द्गिरः॑ व॒या इ॒वानु॑ रोहते जु॒षन्त॒ यत्
verses.transliteration: stotā́ yát te vícarṣaṇir  atipraśardháyad gíraḥ  vayā́ ivā́nu rohate  juṣánta yát

translation.text: What time the zealous worshipper hath boldly sung his songs to thee, Like branches of a tree up-grows what they desire.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र॒त्न॒वज्ज॑नया॒ गिरः॑ शृणु॒धी ज॑रि॒तुर्हव॑म् मदे॑मदे ववक्षिथा सु॒कृत्व॑ने
verses.transliteration: pratnaváj janayā gíraḥ  śr̥ṇudhī́ jaritúr hávam  máde-made vavakṣithā  sukŕ̥tvane

translation.text: Generate songs even as of old, give car unto the singer's call. Thou for the pious hast grown great at each carouse.

verses.sanskrit_deva: क्रीळ॑न्त्यस्य सू॒नृता॒ आपो॒ न प्र॒वता॑ य॒तीः अ॒या धि॒या य उ॒च्यते॒ पति॑र्दि॒वः
verses.transliteration: krī́ḷanty asya sūnŕ̥tāḥ-  -ā́po ná pravátā yatī́ḥ  ayā́ dhiyā́ yá ucyáte  pátir diváḥ

translation.text: Sweet strains that glorify him play like waters speeding down a slope, Yea, him who in this song is called the Lord of Heaven;

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒तो पति॒र्य उ॒च्यते॑ कृष्टी॒नामेक॒ इद्व॒शी न॒मो॒वृ॒धैर॑व॒स्युभिः॑ सु॒ते र॑ण
verses.transliteration: utó pátir yá ucyáte  kr̥ṣṭīnā́m éka íd vaśī́  namovr̥dhaír avasyúbhiḥ  suté raṇa

translation.text: Yea, who alone is called the Lord, the single Ruler of the folk, By worshippers seeking aid: may he joy in the draught.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स्तु॒हि श्रु॒तं वि॑प॒श्चितं॒ हरी॒ यस्य॑ प्रस॒क्षिणा॑ गन्ता॑रा दा॒शुषो॑ गृ॒हं न॑म॒स्विनः॑
verses.transliteration: stuhí śrutáṃ vipaścítaṃ  hárī yásya prasakṣíṇā  gántārā dāśúṣo gr̥hám  namasvínaḥ

translation.text: Praise him, the Glorious, skilled in song, Lord of the two victorious Bays: They seek the worshipper's abode who bows in prayer.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तू॒तु॒जा॒नो म॑हेम॒तेऽश्वे॑भिः प्रुषि॒तप्सु॑भिः आ या॑हि य॒ज्ञमा॒शुभिः॒ शमिद्धि ते॑
verses.transliteration: tūtujānó mahemate-  -áśvebhiḥ pruṣitápsubhiḥ  ā́ yāhi yajñám āśúbhiḥ  śám íd dhí te

translation.text: Put forth thy strength: with dappled Steeds come, thou of mighty intellect, With swift Steeds to the sacrifice, for 'tis thy joy.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्र॑ शविष्ठ सत्पते र॒यिं गृ॒णत्सु॑ धारय श्रवः॑ सू॒रिभ्यो॑ अ॒मृतं॑ वसुत्व॒नम्
verses.transliteration: índra śaviṣṭha satpate  rayíṃ gr̥ṇátsu dhāraya  śrávaḥ sūríbhyo amŕ̥taṃ vasutvanám

translation.text: Grant wealth to those who praise thee, Lord of Heroes, Mightiest Indra: give Our princes everlasting fame and opulence.

verses.sanskrit_deva: हवे॑ त्वा॒ सूर॒ उदि॑ते॒ हवे॑ म॒ध्यंदि॑ने दि॒वः जु॒षा॒ण इ॑न्द्र॒ सप्ति॑भिर्न॒ आ ग॑हि
verses.transliteration: háve tvā sū́ra údite  háve madhyáṃdine diváḥ  juṣāṇá indra sáptibhir na ā́ gahi

translation.text: I call thee when the Sun is risen, I call thee at the noon of day: With thy car-horses, Indra, come wellpleased to us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ तू ग॑हि॒ प्र तु द्र॑व॒ मत्स्वा॑ सु॒तस्य॒ गोम॑तः तन्तुं॑ तनुष्व पू॒र्व्यं यथा॑ वि॒दे
verses.transliteration: ā́ tū́ gahi prá tú drava  mátsvā sutásya gómataḥ  tántuṃ tanuṣva pūrvyáṃ  yáthā vidé

translation.text: Speed forward hither, come to us, rejoice thee in the milky draught: Spin out the thread of ancient time, as well is known.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यच्छ॒क्रासि॑ परा॒वति॒ यद॑र्वा॒वति॑ वृत्रहन् यद्वा॑ समु॒द्रे अन्ध॑सोऽवि॒तेद॑सि
verses.transliteration: yác chakrā́si parāváti  yád arvāváti vr̥trahan  yád vā samudré ándhaso 'vitéd asi

translation.text: If, Ṣakra, Vr̥itra-slayer, thou be far away or near to us. Or in the sea, thou art the guard of Soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्रं॑ वर्धन्तु नो॒ गिर॒ इन्द्रं॑ सु॒तास॒ इन्द॑वः इन्द्रे॑ ह॒विष्म॑ती॒र्विशो॑ अराणिषुः
verses.transliteration: índraṃ vardhantu no gíraḥ-  índraṃ sutā́sa índavaḥ  índre havíṣmatīr víśo  arāṇiṣuḥ

translation.text: Let songs we sing and Soma-drops expressed by us make Indra strong: The tribes who bring oblations find delight in him.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तमिद्विप्रा॑ अव॒स्यवः॑ प्र॒वत्व॑तीभिरू॒तिभिः॑ इन्द्रं॑ क्षो॒णीर॑वर्धयन्व॒या इ॑व
verses.transliteration: tám íd víprā avasyávaḥ  pravátvatībhir ūtíbhiḥ  índraṃ kṣoṇī́r avardhayan  vayā́ iva

translation.text: Him sages longing for his aid, with offerings brought in eager haste, Him. even as branches, all mankind have made to grow.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्रिक॑द्रुकेषु॒ चेत॑नं दे॒वासो॑ य॒ज्ञम॑त्नत तमिद्व॑र्धन्तु नो॒ गिरः॑ स॒दावृ॑धम्
verses.transliteration: tríkadrukeṣu cétanaṃ  devā́so yajñám atnata  tám íd vardhantu no gíraḥ  sadā́vr̥dham

translation.text: At the Trkadrukas the Gods span sacrifice that stirred the mind: May our songs strengthen him who still hath strengthened us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स्तो॒ता यत्ते॒ अनु॑व्रत उ॒क्थान्यृ॑तु॒था द॒धे शुचिः॑ पाव॒क उ॑च्यते॒ सो अद्भु॑तः
verses.transliteration: stotā́ yát te ánuvrataḥ-  ukthā́ny r̥tuthā́ dadhé  śúciḥ pāvaká ucyate  só ádbhutaḥ

translation.text: When, true to duty, at due times the worshipper offers lauds to thee, They call him Purifier, Pure, and Wonderful.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तदिद्रु॒द्रस्य॑ चेतति य॒ह्वं प्र॒त्नेषु॒ धाम॑सु मनो॒ यत्रा॒ वि तद्द॒धुर्विचे॑तसः
verses.transliteration: tád íd rudrásya cetati  yahvám pratnéṣu dhā́masu  máno yátrā ví tád dadhúr  vícetasaḥ

translation.text: That mind of Rudra, fresh and strong, moves conscious in the ancient ways, With reference whereto the wise have ordered this.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यदि॑ मे स॒ख्यमा॒वर॑ इ॒मस्य॑ पा॒ह्यन्ध॑सः येन॒ विश्वा॒ अति॒ द्विषो॒ अता॑रिम
verses.transliteration: yádi me sakhyám āváraḥ-  imásya pāhy ándhasaḥ  yéna víśvā áti dvíṣo  átārima

translation.text: If thou elect to be my Friend drink of this sacrificial juice, By help whereof we may subdue all enemies.

verses.sanskrit_deva: क॒दा त॑ इन्द्र गिर्वणः स्तो॒ता भ॑वाति॒ शंत॑मः क॒दा नो॒ गव्ये॒ अश्व्ये॒ वसौ॑ दधः
verses.transliteration: kadā́ ta indra girvaṇaḥ-  stotā́ bhavāti śáṃtamaḥ  kadā́ no gávye áśvye  vásau dadhaḥ

translation.text: O Indra, Lover of the song, when shall thy praiser be most blest? When wilt thou grant us wealth in herds of kine and steeds?

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒त ते॒ सुष्टु॑ता॒ हरी॒ वृष॑णा वहतो॒ रथ॑म् अ॒जु॒र्यस्य॑ म॒दिन्त॑मं॒ यमीम॑हे
verses.transliteration: utá te súṣṭutā hárī  vŕ̥ṣaṇā vahato rátham  ajuryásya madíntamaṃ  yám ī́mahe

translation.text: And thy two highIy-lauded Bays, strong stallions, draw thy car who art Untouched by age, most gladdening car for which we pray.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तमी॑महे पुरुष्टु॒तं य॒ह्वं प्र॒त्नाभि॑रू॒तिभिः॑ नि ब॒र्हिषि॑ प्रि॒ये स॑द॒दध॑ द्वि॒ता
verses.transliteration: tám īmahe puruṣṭutáṃ  yahvám pratnā́bhir ūtíbhiḥ  ní barhíṣi priyé sadad  ádha dvitā́

translation.text: With ancient offerings we implore the Young and Strong whom many praise. He from of old hath sat upon dear sacred grass.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वर्ध॑स्वा॒ सु पु॑रुष्टुत॒ ऋषि॑ष्टुताभिरू॒तिभिः॑ धु॒क्षस्व॑ पि॒प्युषी॒मिष॒मवा॑ च नः
verses.transliteration: várdhasvā sú puruṣṭuta  ŕ̥ṣiṣṭutābhir ūtíbhiḥ  dhukṣásva pipyúṣīm íṣam  ávā ca naḥ

translation.text: Wax miglity, thou whom many laud for aids which R̥ishis have extolled. Pour down for us abundant food and guard us well.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्र॒ त्वम॑वि॒तेद॑सी॒त्था स्तु॑व॒तो अ॑द्रिवः ऋ॒तादि॑यर्मि ते॒ धियं॑ मनो॒युज॑म्
verses.transliteration: índra tvám avitéd asi-  -itthā́ stuvató adrivaḥ  r̥tā́d iyarmi te dhíyam  manoyújam

translation.text: O Indra, Caster of the Stone, thou helpest him who praises thee: From sacrifice I send to thee a mindyoked hymn.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒ह त्या स॑ध॒माद्या॑ युजा॒नः सोम॑पीतये हरी॑ इन्द्र प्र॒तद्व॑सू अ॒भि स्व॑र
verses.transliteration: ihá tyā́ sadhamā́dyā  yujānáḥ sómapītaye  hárī indra pratádvasū  abhí svara

translation.text: Here, yoking for the Soma-draught these Horses, sharers of thy feast, Thy Bay Steeds, Indra, fraught with wealth, consent to come.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भि स्व॑रन्तु॒ ये तव॑ रु॒द्रासः॑ सक्षत॒ श्रिय॑म् उ॒तो म॒रुत्व॑ती॒र्विशो॑ अ॒भि प्रयः॑
verses.transliteration: abhí svarantu yé táva  rudrā́saḥ sakṣata śríyam  utó marútvatīr víśo  abhí práyaḥ

translation.text: Attendants on thy glory, let the Rudras roar assent to thee, And all the Marut companies come tothe feast.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒मा अ॑स्य॒ प्रतू॑र्तयः प॒दं जु॑षन्त॒ यद्दि॒वि नाभा॑ य॒ज्ञस्य॒ सं द॑धु॒र्यथा॑ वि॒दे
verses.transliteration: imā́ asya prátūrtayaḥ  padáṃ juṣanta yád diví  nā́bhā yajñásya sáṃ dadhur  yáthā vidé

translation.text: These his victorious followers bold in the heavens the place they love, Leagued in the heart of sacrifice, as well we know.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒यं दी॒र्घाय॒ चक्ष॑से॒ प्राचि॑ प्रय॒त्य॑ध्व॒रे मिमी॑ते य॒ज्ञमा॑नु॒षग्वि॒चक्ष्य॑
verses.transliteration: ayáṃ dīrghā́ya cákṣase  prā́ci prayaty àdhvaré  mímīte yajñám ānuṣág  vicákṣya

translation.text: That we may long behold the light, what time the ordered rite proceeds, He duly measures, as he views, the sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वृषा॒यमि॑न्द्र ते॒ रथ॑ उ॒तो ते॒ वृष॑णा॒ हरी॑ वृषा॒ त्वं श॑तक्रतो॒ वृषा॒ हवः॑
verses.transliteration: vŕ̥ṣāyám indra te ráthaḥ-  utó te vŕ̥ṣaṇā hárī  vŕ̥ṣā tváṃ śatakrato  vŕ̥ṣā hávaḥ

translation.text: O Indra, strong is this thy car, and strong are these Bay Steeds of thine: O Ṣatakratu, thou art strong, strong is our call.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वृषा॒ ग्रावा॒ वृषा॒ मदो॒ वृषा॒ सोमो॑ अ॒यं सु॒तः वृषा॑ य॒ज्ञो यमिन्व॑सि॒ वृषा॒ हवः॑
verses.transliteration: vŕ̥ṣā grā́vā vŕ̥ṣā mádo  vŕ̥ṣā sómo ayáṃ sutáḥ  vŕ̥ṣā yajñó yám ínvasi  vŕ̥ṣā hávaḥ

translation.text: Strong is the press-stone, strong thy joy, strong is the flowing Soma juice: Strong is the rite thou furtherest, strong is our call.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वृषा॑ त्वा॒ वृष॑णं हुवे॒ वज्रि॑ञ्चि॒त्राभि॑रू॒तिभिः॑ वा॒वन्थ॒ हि प्रति॑ष्टुतिं॒ वृषा॒ हवः॑
verses.transliteration: vŕ̥ṣā tvā vŕ̥ṣaṇaṃ huve  vájriñ citrā́bhir ūtíbhiḥ  vāvántha hí prátiṣṭutiṃ  vŕ̥ṣā hávaḥ

translation.text: As strong I call on thee the Strong, O Thunderer with thy thousand aids: For thou hast won the hymn of praise. Strong is our call.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यदि॑न्द्रा॒हं यथा॒ त्वमीशी॑य॒ वस्व॒ एक॒ इत् स्तो॒ता मे॒ गोष॑खा स्यात्
verses.transliteration: yád indrāháṃ yáthā tvám  ī́śīya vásva éka ít  stotā́ me góṣakhā syāt

translation.text: IF I, O Indra, were, like thee, the single Sovran of all wealth, My worshipper should be rich in kine.

verses.sanskrit_deva: शिक्षे॑यमस्मै॒ दित्से॑यं॒ शची॑पते मनी॒षिणे॑ यद॒हं गोप॑तिः॒ स्याम्
verses.transliteration: śíkṣeyam asmai dítseyaṃ  śácīpate manīṣíṇe  yád aháṃ gópatiḥ syā́m

translation.text: I should be fain, O Lord of Power, to strengthen and enrich the sage, Were I the Lord of herds of kine.

verses.sanskrit_deva: धे॒नुष्ट॑ इन्द्र सू॒नृता॒ यज॑मानाय सुन्व॒ते गामश्वं॑ पि॒प्युषी॑ दुहे
verses.transliteration: dhenúṣ ṭa indra sūnŕ̥tā  yájamānāya sunvaté-  gā́m áśvam pipyúṣī duhe

translation.text: To worshippers who press the juice thy goodness, Indra, is a cow Yielding in plenty kine and steeds.

verses.sanskrit_deva: न ते॑ व॒र्तास्ति॒ राध॑स॒ इन्द्र॑ दे॒वो न मर्त्यः॑ यद्दित्स॑सि स्तु॒तो म॒घम्
verses.transliteration: ná te vartā́sti rā́dhasaḥ-  índra devó ná mártyaḥ  yád dítsasi stutó maghám

translation.text: None is there, Indra, God or man, to hinder thy munificence, The wealth which, lauded, thou wilt give.

verses.sanskrit_deva: य॒ज्ञ इन्द्र॑मवर्धय॒द्यद्भूमिं॒ व्यव॑र्तयत् च॒क्रा॒ण ओ॑प॒शं दि॒वि
verses.transliteration: yajñá índram avardhayad  yád bhū́miṃ vy ávartayat  cakrāṇá opaśáṃ diví

translation.text: The sacrifice made Indra strong when he unrolled the earth, and made Himself a diadem in heaven.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वा॒वृ॒धा॒नस्य॑ ते व॒यं विश्वा॒ धना॑नि जि॒ग्युषः॑ ऊ॒तिमि॒न्द्रा वृ॑णीमहे
verses.transliteration: vāvr̥dhānásya te vayáṃ  víśvā dhánāni jigyúṣaḥ  ūtím indrā́ vr̥ṇīmahe

translation.text: Thine aid we claim, O Indra, thine who after thou hast waxen great Hast won all treasures for thine own.

verses.sanskrit_deva: व्य१॒॑न्तरि॑क्षमतिर॒न्मदे॒ सोम॑स्य रोच॒ना इन्द्रो॒ यदभि॑नद्व॒लम्
verses.transliteration: vy àntárikṣam atirat-  máde sómasya rocanā́  índro yád ábhinad valám

translation.text: In Soma's ecstasy Indra spread the firmament and realms of light, When he cleft Vala limb from limb.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उद्गा आ॑ज॒दङ्गि॑रोभ्य आ॒विष्कृ॒ण्वन्गुहा॑ स॒तीः अ॒र्वाञ्चं॑ नुनुदे व॒लम्
verses.transliteration: úd gā́ ājad áṅgirobhyaḥ-  āvíṣ kr̥ṇván gúhā satī́ḥ  arvā́ñcaṃ nunude valám

translation.text: Showing the hidden he drave forth the cows for the Angirases, And Vala he cast headlong down.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्रे॑ण रोच॒ना दि॒वो दृ॒ळ्हानि॑ दृंहि॒तानि॑ च स्थि॒राणि॒ न प॑रा॒णुदे॑
verses.transliteration: índreṇa rocanā́ divó  dr̥ḷhā́ni dr̥ṃhitā́ni ca  sthirā́ṇi ná parāṇúde

translation.text: By Indra were the lumirious realms of heaven established and secured, Firm and immovable from their place.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒पामू॒र्मिर्मद॑न्निव॒ स्तोम॑ इन्द्राजिरायते वि ते॒ मदा॑ अराजिषुः
verses.transliteration: apā́m ūrmír mádann iva  stóma indrājirāyate  ví te mádā arājiṣuḥ

translation.text: Indra, thy laud moves quickly like a joyous wave of water-floods: Bright shine the drops that gladden thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं हि स्तो॑म॒वर्ध॑न॒ इन्द्रास्यु॑क्थ॒वर्ध॑नः स्तो॒तॄ॒णामु॒त भ॑द्र॒कृत्
verses.transliteration: tváṃ hí stomavárdhanaḥ-  índrā́sy ukthavárdhanaḥ  stotr̥̄ṇā́m utá bhadrakŕ̥t

translation.text: For thou, O Indra, art the God whom hymns and praises magnify: Thou blessest those who worship thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्र॒मित्के॒शिना॒ हरी॑ सोम॒पेया॑य वक्षतः उप॑ य॒ज्ञं सु॒राध॑सम्
verses.transliteration: índram ít keśínā hárī  somapéyāya vakṣataḥ  úpa yajñáṃ surā́dhasam

translation.text: Let the two long-maned Bay Steeds bring Indra to drink the Soma juice, The Bountiful to our sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒पां फेने॑न॒ नमु॑चेः॒ शिर॑ इ॒न्द्रोद॑वर्तयः विश्वा॒ यदज॑यः॒ स्पृधः॑
verses.transliteration: apā́m phénena námuceḥ  śíra indród avartayaḥ  víśvā yád ájaya spŕ̥dhaḥ

translation.text: With waters' foam thou torest off, Indra, the head of Namuci, Subduing all contending hosts.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मा॒याभि॑रु॒त्सिसृ॑प्सत॒ इन्द्र॒ द्यामा॒रुरु॑क्षतः अव॒ दस्यूँ॑रधूनुथाः
verses.transliteration: māyā́bhir utsísr̥psataḥ-  índra dyā́m ārúrukṣataḥ  áva dásyūm̐r adhūnuthāḥ

translation.text: The Dasyus, when they fain would climb by magic arts and mount to heaven, Thou, Indra, castest down to earth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒सु॒न्वामि॑न्द्र सं॒सदं॒ विषू॑चीं॒ व्य॑नाशयः सो॒म॒पा उत्त॑रो॒ भव॑न्
verses.transliteration: asunvā́m indra saṃsádaṃ  víṣūcīṃ vy ànāśayaḥ  somapā́ úttaro bhávan

translation.text: As Soma-drinker conquering all, thou scatteredst to every side Their settlement who poured no gifts.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तम्व॒भि प्र गा॑यत पुरुहू॒तं पु॑रुष्टु॒तम् इन्द्रं॑ गी॒र्भिस्त॑वि॒षमा वि॑वासत
verses.transliteration: tám v abhí prá gāyata  puruhūtám puruṣṭutám  índraṃ gīrbhís taviṣám ā́ vivāsata

translation.text: SING forth to him whom many men invoke, to him whom many laud. Invite the powerful Indra with your songs of praise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यस्य॑ द्वि॒बर्ह॑सो बृ॒हत्सहो॑ दा॒धार॒ रोद॑सी गि॒रीँरज्राँ॑ अ॒पः स्व॑र्वृषत्व॒ना
verses.transliteration: yásya dvibárhaso br̥hát  sáho dādhā́ra ródasī  girī́m̐r ájrām̐ apáḥ svàr vr̥ṣatvanā́

translation.text: Whose lofty might-for doubly strong is he-supports the heavens and earth, And hills and plains and floods and light with manly power.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स रा॑जसि पुरुष्टुतँ॒ एको॑ वृ॒त्राणि॑ जिघ्नसे इन्द्र॒ जैत्रा॑ श्रव॒स्या॑ च॒ यन्त॑वे
verses.transliteration: sá rājasi puruṣṭutam̐  éko vr̥trā́ṇi jighnase  índra jaítrā śravasyā̀ ca yántave

translation.text: Such, Praised by many! thou art King alone thou smitest Vr̥itras dead, To gain, O Indra, spoils of war and high renown.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तं ते॒ मदं॑ गृणीमसि॒ वृष॑णं पृ॒त्सु सा॑स॒हिम् उ॒ लो॒क॒कृ॒त्नुम॑द्रिवो हरि॒श्रिय॑म्
verses.transliteration: táṃ te mádaṃ gr̥ṇīmasi  vŕ̥ṣaṇam pr̥tsú sāsahím  ulokakr̥tnúm adrivo hariśríyam

translation.text: We sing this strong and wild delight of thine which conquers in the fray, Which, Caster of the Stone! gives room and shines like gold.

verses.sanskrit_deva: येन॒ ज्योतीं॑ष्या॒यवे॒ मन॑वे च वि॒वेदि॑थ म॒न्दा॒नो अ॒स्य ब॒र्हिषो॒ वि रा॑जसि
verses.transliteration: yéna jyótīṃṣy āyáve  mánave ca vivéditha  mandānó asyá barhíṣo ví rājasi

translation.text: Wherewith thou also foundest lights for Âyu and for Manu's sake: Now joying in this sacred grass thou beamest forth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तद॒द्या चि॑त्त उ॒क्थिनोऽनु॑ ष्टुवन्ति पू॒र्वथा॑ वृष॑पत्नीर॒पो ज॑या दि॒वेदि॑वे
verses.transliteration: tád adyā́ cit ta ukthínaḥ-  -ánu ṣṭuvanti pūrváthā  vŕ̥ṣapatnīr apó jayā divé-dive

translation.text: This day too singers of the hymn praise, as of old, this might of thine: Win thou the waters day by day, thralls of the strong.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तव॒ त्यदि॑न्द्रि॒यं बृ॒हत्तव॒ शुष्म॑मु॒त क्रतु॑म् वज्रं॑ शिशाति धि॒षणा॒ वरे॑ण्यम्
verses.transliteration: táva tyád indriyám br̥hát  táva śúṣmam utá krátum  vájraṃ śiśāti dhiṣáṇā váreṇyam

translation.text: That lofty Indra-power of thine, thy strength and thine intelligence, Thy thunderbolt for which we long, the wish makes keen.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तव॒ द्यौरि॑न्द्र॒ पौंस्यं॑ पृथि॒वी व॑र्धति॒ श्रवः॑ त्वामापः॒ पर्व॑तासश्च हिन्विरे
verses.transliteration: táva dyaúr indra paúṃsyam  pr̥thivī́ vardhati śrávaḥ  tvā́m ā́paḥ párvatāsaś ca hinvire

translation.text: O Indra, Heaven and Earth augment thy manly power and thy renown; The waters and thy mountains stir and urge thee on.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वां विष्णु॑र्बृ॒हन्क्षयो॑ मि॒त्रो गृ॑णाति॒ वरु॑णः त्वां शर्धो॑ मद॒त्यनु॒ मारु॑तम्
verses.transliteration: tvā́ṃ víṣṇur br̥hán kṣáyo  mitró gr̥ṇāti váruṇaḥ  tvā́ṃ śárdho madaty ánu mā́rutam

translation.text: Vishṇu the lofty ruling Power, Varuṇa, Mitra sing thy praise: In thee the Marut3' company have great delight.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं वृषा॒ जना॑नां॒ मंहि॑ष्ठ इन्द्र जज्ञिषे स॒त्रा विश्वा॑ स्वप॒त्यानि॑ दधिषे
verses.transliteration: tváṃ vŕ̥ṣā jánānām  máṃhiṣṭha indra jajñiṣe  satrā́ víśvā svapatyā́ni dadhiṣe

translation.text: O Indra, thou wast born the Lord of men, most liberal of thy gifts: Excellent deeds for evermore are all thine own.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स॒त्रा त्वं पु॑रुष्टुतँ॒ एको॑ वृ॒त्राणि॑ तोशसे नान्य इन्द्रा॒त्कर॑णं॒ भूय॑ इन्वति
verses.transliteration: satrā́ tvám puruṣṭutam̐  éko vr̥trā́ṇi tośase  nā́nyá índrāt káraṇam bhū́ya invati

translation.text: Ever, alone, O highly-praised, thou sendest Vr̥itras to their rest: None else than Indra executes the mighty deed.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यदि॑न्द्र मन्म॒शस्त्वा॒ नाना॒ हव॑न्त ऊ॒तये॑ अ॒स्माके॑भि॒र्नृभि॒रत्रा॒ स्व॑र्जय
verses.transliteration: yád indra manmaśás tvā  nā́nā hávanta ūtáye  asmā́kebhir nŕ̥bhir átrā svàr jaya

translation.text: Though here and there, in varied hymns, Indra, men call on thee for aid, Still with our heroes fight and win the light of heaven.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अरं॒ क्षया॑य नो म॒हे विश्वा॑ रू॒पाण्या॑वि॒शन् इन्द्रं॒ जैत्रा॑य हर्षया॒ शची॒पति॑म्
verses.transliteration: áraṃ kṣáyāya no mahé  víśvā rūpā́ṇy āviśán  índraṃ jaítrāya harṣayā śácīpátim

translation.text: Already have all forms of him entered our spacious dwelling-place: For victory stir thou Indra, up, the Lord of Might.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र स॒म्राजं॑ चर्षणी॒नामिन्द्रं॑ स्तोता॒ नव्यं॑ गी॒र्भिः नरं॑ नृ॒षाहं॒ मंहि॑ष्ठम्
verses.transliteration: prá samrā́jaṃ carṣaṇīnā́m  índraṃ stotā návyaṃ gīrbhíḥ  náraṃ nr̥ṣā́ham máṃhiṣṭham

translation.text: PRAISE Indra whom our songs must laud, sole Sovran of mankind, the Chief Most liberal who controlleth men.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यस्मि॑न्नु॒क्थानि॒ रण्य॑न्ति॒ विश्वा॑नि च श्रव॒स्या॑ अ॒पामवो॒ न स॑मु॒द्रे
verses.transliteration: yásminn ukthā́ni ráṇyanti  víśvāni ca śravasyā̀  apā́m ávo ná samudré

translation.text: In whom the hymns of praise delight, and all the glory-giving songs. Like the floods' longing for the sea.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तं सु॑ष्टु॒त्या वि॑वासे ज्येष्ठ॒राजं॒ भरे॑ कृ॒त्नुम् म॒हो वा॒जिनं॑ स॒निभ्यः॑
verses.transliteration: táṃ suṣṭutyā́ vivāse  jyeṣṭharā́jam bháre kr̥tnúm  mahó vājínaṃ saníbhyaḥ

translation.text: Him I invite with eulogy, best King, effective in the fight, Strong for the gain of mighty spoil.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यस्यानू॑ना गभी॒रा मदा॑ उ॒रव॒स्तरु॑त्राः ह॒र्षु॒मन्तः॒ शूर॑सातौ
verses.transliteration: yásyā́nūnā gabhīrā́ḥ-  mádā urávas tárutrāḥ  harṣumántaḥ śū́rasātau

translation.text: Whose perfect ecstasies are wide, profound, victorious, and give joy in the field where heroes win.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तमिद्धने॑षु हि॒तेष्व॑धिवा॒काय॑ हवन्ते येषा॒मिन्द्र॒स्ते ज॑यन्ति
verses.transliteration: tám íd dháneṣu hitéṣu-  adhivākā́ya havante  yéṣām índras té jayanti

translation.text: Him, when the spoils of war are staked, men call to be their advocate: They who have Indra win the day.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तमिच्च्यौ॒त्नैरार्य॑न्ति॒ तं कृ॒तेभि॑श्चर्ष॒णयः॑ ए॒ष इन्द्रो॑ वरिव॒स्कृत्
verses.transliteration: tám íc cyautnaír ā́ryanti  táṃ kr̥tébhiś carṣaṇáyaḥ  eṣá índro varivaskŕ̥t

translation.text: Men honour him with stirring songs and magnify with solemn rites: Indra is he who giveth case.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्रो॑ ब्र॒ह्मेन्द्र॒ ऋषि॒रिन्द्रः॑ पु॒रू पु॑रुहू॒तः म॒हान्म॒हीभिः॒ शची॑भिः
verses.transliteration: índro brahméndra ŕ̥ṣir  -índraḥ purū́ puruhūtáḥ  mahā́n mahī́bhiḥ śácībhiḥ

translation.text: Indra is priest and R̥ishi, he is much invoked by many men, And mighty by his mighty powers.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स स्तोम्यः॒ स हव्यः॑ स॒त्यः सत्वा॑ तुविकू॒र्मिः एक॑श्चि॒त्सन्न॒भिभू॑तिः
verses.transliteration: sá stómyaḥ sá hávyaḥ  satyáḥ sátvā tuvikūrmíḥ  ékaś cit sánn abhíbhūtiḥ

translation.text: Meet to be lauded and invoked, true Hero with his deeds of might, Victorious even when alone.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तम॒र्केभि॒स्तं साम॑भि॒स्तं गा॑य॒त्रैश्च॑र्ष॒णयः॑ इन्द्रं॑ वर्धन्ति क्षि॒तयः॑
verses.transliteration: tám arkébhis táṃ sā́mabhis  táṃ gāyatraíś carṣaṇáyaḥ  índraṃ vardhanti kṣitáyaḥ

translation.text: The men, the people magnify that Indra with their Slina. songs, With hymns and sacred eulogies

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र॒णे॒तारं॒ वस्यो॒ अच्छा॒ कर्ता॑रं॒ ज्योतिः॑ स॒मत्सु॑ सा॒स॒ह्वांसं॑ यु॒धामित्रा॑न्
verses.transliteration: praṇetā́raṃ vásyo áchā  kártāraṃ jyótiḥ samátsu  sāsahvā́ṃsaṃ yudhā́mítrān

translation.text: Him who advances them to wealth, sends light to lead them in the war, And quells their foemen in the fray.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स नः॒ पप्रिः॑ पारयाति स्व॒स्ति ना॒वा पु॑रुहू॒तः इन्द्रो॒ विश्वा॒ अति॒ द्विषः॑
verses.transliteration: sá naḥ pápriḥ pārayāti  svastí nāvā́ puruhūtáḥ  índro víśvā áti dvíṣaḥ

translation.text: May he, the saviour much-invoked, may Indra bear us in a ship Safely beyond all enemies.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स त्वं न॑ इन्द्र॒ वाजे॑भिर्दश॒स्या च॑ गातु॒या च॑ अच्छा॑ च नः सु॒म्नं ने॑षि
verses.transliteration: sá tváṃ na indra vā́jebhir  daśasyā́ ca gātuyā́ ca  áchā ca naḥ sumnáṃ neṣi

translation.text: As such, O Indra, honour us with gifts of booty, further us, And lead us to felicity.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ या॑हि सुषु॒मा हि त॒ इन्द्र॒ सोमं॒ पिबा॑ इ॒मम् एदं ब॒र्हिः स॑दो॒ मम॑
verses.transliteration: ā́ yāhi suṣumā́ hí te-  índra sómam píbā imám  édám barhíḥ sado máma

translation.text: COME, we have pressed the juice for thee; O Indra, drink this Soma here Sit thou on this my sacred grass.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ त्वा॑ ब्रह्म॒युजा॒ हरी॒ वह॑तामिन्द्र के॒शिना॑ उप॒ ब्रह्मा॑णि नः शृणु
verses.transliteration: ā́ tvā brahmayújā hárī  váhatām indra keśínā  úpa bráhmāṇi naḥ śr̥ṇu

translation.text: O Indra, let thy long-maned Bays, yoked by prayer, bring thee hitherward Give car and listen to our prayers.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ब्र॒ह्माण॑स्त्वा व॒यं यु॒जा सो॑म॒पामि॑न्द्र सो॒मिनः॑ सु॒ताव॑न्तो हवामहे
verses.transliteration: brahmā́ṇas tvā vayáṃ yujā́  somapā́m indra somínaḥ  sutā́vanto havāmahe

translation.text: We Soma-bearing Brahmans call thee Soma-drinker with thy friend, We, Indra, bringing Soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ नो॑ याहि सु॒ताव॑तो॒ऽस्माकं॑ सुष्टु॒तीरुप॑ पिबा॒ सु शि॑प्रि॒न्नन्ध॑सः
verses.transliteration: ā́ no yāhi sutā́vato  -asmā́kaṃ suṣṭutī́r úpa  píbā sú śiprinn ándhasaḥ

translation.text: Come unto us who bring the juice, come unto this our eulogy, Fair-visored! drink thou of the juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ ते॑ सिञ्चामि कु॒क्ष्योरनु॒ गात्रा॒ वि धा॑वतु गृ॒भा॒य जि॒ह्वया॒ मधु॑
verses.transliteration: ā́ te siñcāmi kukṣyór  ánu gā́trā ví dhāvatu  gr̥bhāyá jihváyā mádhu

translation.text: I pour it down within thee, so through all thy members let it spread: Take with. thy tongue the pleasant drink.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स्वा॒दुष्टे॑ अस्तु सं॒सुदे॒ मधु॑मान्त॒न्वे॒३॒॑ तव॑ सोमः॒ शम॑स्तु ते हृ॒दे
verses.transliteration: svādúṣ ṭe astu saṃsúde  mádhumān tanvè táva  sómaḥ śám astu te hr̥dé

translation.text: Sweet to thy body let it be, delicious be the savoury juice: Sweet be the Soma to thine heart.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒यमु॑ त्वा विचर्षणे॒ जनी॑रिवा॒भि संवृ॑तः प्र सोम॑ इन्द्र सर्पतु
verses.transliteration: ayám u tvā vicarṣaṇe  jánīr ivābhí sáṃvr̥taḥ  prá sóma indra sarpatu

translation.text: Like women, let this Soma-draught, invested with its robe, approach, O active Indra, close to thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तु॒वि॒ग्रीवो॑ व॒पोद॑रः सुबा॒हुरन्ध॑सो॒ मदे॑ इन्द्रो॑ वृ॒त्राणि॑ जिघ्नते
verses.transliteration: tuvigrī́vo vapódaraḥ  subāhúr ándhaso máde  índro vr̥trā́ṇi jighnate

translation.text: Indra, transported with the juice, vast in his bulk, strong in his neck And stout arms, smites the Vr̥itras down.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्र॒ प्रेहि॑ पु॒रस्त्वं विश्व॒स्येशा॑न॒ ओज॑सा वृ॒त्राणि॑ वृत्रहञ्जहि
verses.transliteration: índra préhi purás tváṃ  víśvasyéśāna ójasā  vr̥trā́ṇi vr̥trahañ jahi

translation.text: O Indra, go thou forward, thou who rulest over all by might: Thou Vr̥itra-slayer slay the fiends,

verses.sanskrit_deva: दी॒र्घस्ते॑ अस्त्वङ्कु॒शो येना॒ वसु॑ प्र॒यच्छ॑सि यज॑मानाय सुन्व॒ते
verses.transliteration: dīrghás te astv aṅkuśó  yénā vásu prayáchasi  yájamānāya sunvaté-

translation.text: Long be thy grasping-hook wherewith thou givest ample wealth to him Who sheds the juice and worships thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒यं त॑ इन्द्र॒ सोमो॒ निपू॑तो॒ अधि॑ ब॒र्हिषि॑ एही॑म॒स्य द्रवा॒ पिब॑
verses.transliteration: ayáṃ ta indra sómo  nípūto ádhi barhíṣi  éhīm asyá drávā píba

translation.text: Here, Indra, is thy Soma-draught, made pure upon the sacred grass: Run hither, come and drink thereof.

verses.sanskrit_deva: शाचि॑गो॒ शाचि॑पूजना॒यं रणा॑य ते सु॒तः आख॑ण्डल॒ प्र हू॑यसे
verses.transliteration: śā́cigo śā́cipūjana-  -ayáṃ ráṇāya te sutáḥ  ā́khaṇḍala prá hūyase

translation.text: Famed for thy radiance, worshipped well this juice is shed for thy delight Thou art invoked, Âkhaṇḍala!

verses.sanskrit_deva: यस्ते॑ शृङ्गवृषो नपा॒त्प्रण॑पात्कुण्ड॒पाय्यः॑ न्य॑स्मिन्दध्र॒ आ मनः॑
verses.transliteration: yás te śr̥ṅgavr̥ṣo napāt  práṇapāt kuṇḍapā́yyaḥ  ny àsmin dadhra ā́ mánaḥ

translation.text: To Kuṇḍapâyya, grandson's son, grandson of Ṣringavr̥ish! to thee, To him have I addressed my thought.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वास्तो॑ष्पते ध्रु॒वा स्थूणांस॑त्रं सो॒म्याना॑म् द्र॒प्सो भे॒त्ता पु॒रां शश्व॑तीना॒मिन्द्रो॒ मुनी॑नां॒ सखा॑
verses.transliteration: vā́stoṣ pate dhruvā́ sthū́ṇā-  -áṃsatraṃ somyā́nām  drapsó bhettā́ purā́ṃ śáśvatīnām  índro múnīnāṃ sákhā

translation.text: Strong pillar thou, Lord of the home armour of Soma-offerers: The drop of Soma breaketh all the strongholds down, and Indra is the R̥ishis' Friend.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पृदा॑कुसानुर्यज॒तो ग॒वेष॑ण॒ एकः॒ सन्न॒भि भूय॑सः भूर्णि॒मश्वं॑ नयत्तु॒जा पु॒रो गृ॒भेन्द्रं॒ सोम॑स्य पी॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: pŕ̥dākusānur yajató gavéṣaṇaḥ-  ékaḥ sánn abhí bhū́yasaḥ  bhū́rṇim áśvaṃ nayat tujā́ puró gr̥bhā́-  índraṃ sómasya pītáye

translation.text: Holy Pr̥idâkusânu, winner of the spoil, one eminent o'er many men, Lead on the wild horse Indra with his vigorous grasp forward to drink the Soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒दं ह॑ नू॒नमे॑षां सु॒म्नं भि॑क्षेत॒ मर्त्यः॑ आ॒दि॒त्याना॒मपू॑र्व्यं॒ सवी॑मनि
verses.transliteration: idáṃ ha nūnám eṣāṃ  sumnám bhikṣeta mártyaḥ  ādityā́nām ápūrvyaṃ  sávīmani

translation.text: Now let the mortal offer prayer to win the unexampled grace Of these Âdityas and their aid to cherish life.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒न॒र्वाणो॒ ह्ये॑षां॒ पन्था॑ आदि॒त्याना॑म् अद॑ब्धाः॒ सन्ति॑ पा॒यवः॑ सुगे॒वृधः॑
verses.transliteration: anarvā́ṇo hy èṣām  pánthā ādityā́nām  ádabdhāḥ sánti pāyávaḥ  sugevŕ̥dhaḥ

translation.text: For not an enemy molests the paths which these Âdityas tread: Infallible guards, they strengthen us in happiness.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तत्सु नः॑ सवि॒ता भगो॒ वरु॑णो मि॒त्रो अ॑र्य॒मा शर्म॑ यच्छन्तु स॒प्रथो॒ यदीम॑हे
verses.transliteration: tát sú naḥ savitā́ bhágo  váruṇo mitró aryamā́  śárma yachantu saprátho  yád ī́mahe

translation.text: Now soon may Bhaga, Savitar, Varuṇa, Mitra, Aryaman Give us the shelter widely spread which we implore.

verses.sanskrit_deva: दे॒वेभि॑र्देव्यदि॒तेऽरि॑ष्टभर्म॒न्ना ग॑हि स्मत्सू॒रिभिः॑ पुरुप्रिये सु॒शर्म॑भिः
verses.transliteration: devébhir devy adite-  -áriṣṭabharmann ā́ gahi  smát sūríbhiḥ purupriye  suśármabhiḥ

translation.text: With Gods come thou whose fostering care none checks, O Goddesss Aditi: Come, dear to many, with the Lords who guard us well.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ते हि पु॒त्रासो॒ अदि॑तेर्वि॒दुर्द्वेषां॑सि॒ योत॑वे अं॒होश्चि॑दुरु॒चक्र॑योऽने॒हसः॑
verses.transliteration: té hí putrā́so áditer  vidúr dvéṣāṃsi yótave  -aṃhóś cid urucákrayaḥ  -anehásaḥ

translation.text: For well these Sons of Aditi know to keep enmities aloof, Unrivalled, giving ample room, they save from woe.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अदि॑तिर्नो॒ दिवा॑ प॒शुमदि॑ति॒र्नक्त॒मद्व॑याः अदि॑तिः पा॒त्वंह॑सः स॒दावृ॑धा
verses.transliteration: áditir no dívā paśúm  áditir náktam ádvayāḥ  áditiḥ pātv áṃhasaḥ  sadā́vr̥dhā

translation.text: Aditi guard our herd by day, Aditi, free from guile, by night, Aditi, ever strengthening, save us from grief!

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒त स्या नो॒ दिवा॑ म॒तिरदि॑तिरू॒त्या ग॑मत् सा शंता॑ति॒ मय॑स्कर॒दप॒ स्रिधः॑
verses.transliteration: utá syā́ no dívā matír  áditir ūtyā́ gamat  sā́ śáṃtāti máyas karad  ápa srídhaḥ

translation.text: And in the day our hymn is this: May Aditi come nigh to help, With loving-kindness bring us weal and chase our foes.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒त त्या दैव्या॑ भि॒षजा॒ शं नः॑ करतो अ॒श्विना॑ यु॒यु॒याता॑मि॒तो रपो॒ अप॒ स्रिधः॑
verses.transliteration: utá tyā́ daívyā bhiṣájā  śáṃ naḥ karato aśvínā  yuyuyā́tām itó rápo  ápa srídhaḥ

translation.text: And may the Aṣvins, the divine Pair of Physicians, send us health: May they remove iniquity and chase our foes.

verses.sanskrit_deva: शम॒ग्निर॒ग्निभिः॑ कर॒च्छं न॑स्तपतु॒ सूर्यः॑ शं वातो॑ वात्वर॒पा अप॒ स्रिधः॑
verses.transliteration: śám agnír agníbhiḥ karac  -śáṃ nas tapatu sū́ryaḥ  śáṃ vā́to vātv arapā́ḥ-  ápa srídhaḥ

translation.text: May Agni bless us with his fires, and Sûrya warm us pleasantly: May the pure Wind breathe sweet on us, and chase our foes.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अपामी॑वा॒मप॒ स्रिध॒मप॑ सेधत दुर्म॒तिम् आदि॑त्यासो यु॒योत॑ना नो॒ अंह॑सः
verses.transliteration: ápā́mīvām ápa srídham  ápa sedhata durmatím  ā́dityāso yuyótanā no áṃhasaḥ

translation.text: Drive ye disease and strife away, drive ye away malignity: Âdityas, keep us ever far from sore distress.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यु॒योता॒ शरु॑म॒स्मदाँ आदि॑त्यास उ॒ताम॑तिम् ऋध॒ग्द्वेषः॑ कृणुत विश्ववेदसः
verses.transliteration: yuyótā śárum asmád ā́m̐  ā́dityāsa utā́matim  ŕ̥dhag dvéṣaḥ kr̥ṇuta viśvavedasaḥ

translation.text: Remove from us the arrow, keep famine, Âdityas! far away: Keep enmities afar from us, Lords of all wealth!

verses.sanskrit_deva: तत्सु नः॒ शर्म॑ यच्छ॒तादि॑त्या॒ यन्मुमो॑चति एन॑स्वन्तं चि॒देन॑सः सुदानवः
verses.transliteration: tát sú naḥ śárma yachata-  -ā́dityā yán múmocati  énasvantaṃ cid énasaḥ sudānavaḥ

translation.text: Now, O Âdityas, grant to us the shelter that lets man go free, Yea, even the sinner from his sin, ye Bounteous Gods!

verses.sanskrit_deva: यो नः॒ कश्चि॒द्रिरि॑क्षति रक्ष॒स्त्वेन॒ मर्त्यः॑ स्वैः ष एवै॑ रिरिषीष्ट॒ युर्जनः॑
verses.transliteration: yó naḥ káś cid rírikṣati  rakṣastvéna mártyaḥ  svaíḥ ṣá évai ririṣīṣṭa yúr jánaḥ

translation.text: Whatever mortal with the powe r of demons fain would injure us, May he, impetuous, suffer harm by his own deeds.

verses.sanskrit_deva: समित्तम॒घम॑श्नवद्दुः॒शंसं॒ मर्त्यं॑ रि॒पुम् यो अ॑स्म॒त्रा दु॒र्हणा॑वाँ॒ उप॑ द्व॒युः
verses.transliteration: sám ít tám aghám aśnavad  duḥśáṃsam mártyaṃ ripúm  yó asmatrā́ durháṇāvām̐ úpa dvayúḥ

translation.text: May sin o'ertake our human foe, the man who speaketh evil thing, Him who would cause our misery, whose heart is false.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पा॒क॒त्रा स्थ॑न देवा हृ॒त्सु जा॑नीथ॒ मर्त्य॑म् उप॑ द्व॒युं चाद्व॑युं च वसवः
verses.transliteration: pākatrā́ sthana devāḥ-  hr̥tsú jānītha mártyam  úpa dvayúṃ cā́dvayuṃ ca vasavaḥ

translation.text: Gods, ye are with the simple ones, ye know each mortal in your hearts; Ye, Vasus, well discriminate the false and true.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ शर्म॒ पर्व॑ताना॒मोतापां वृ॑णीमहे द्यावा॑क्षामा॒रे अ॒स्मद्रप॑स्कृतम्
verses.transliteration: ā́ śárma párvatānām  ótā́pā́ṃ vr̥ṇīmahe  dyā́vākṣāmāré asmád rápas kr̥tam

translation.text: Fain would we have the sheltering aid of mountains and of water-floods: Keep far from us iniquity, O Heaven and Earth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ते नो॑ भ॒द्रेण॒ शर्म॑णा यु॒ष्माकं॑ ना॒वा व॑सवः अति॒ विश्वा॑नि दुरि॒ता पि॑पर्तन
verses.transliteration: té no bhadréṇa śármaṇā  yuṣmā́kaṃ nāvā́ vasavaḥ  áti víśvāni duritā́ pipartana

translation.text: So with auspicious sheltering aid do ye, O Vasus, carry us Beyond all trouble and distress, borne in your ship.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तु॒चे तना॑य॒ तत्सु नो॒ द्राघी॑य॒ आयु॑र्जी॒वसे॑ आदि॑त्यासः सुमहसः कृ॒णोत॑न
verses.transliteration: tucé tánāya tát sú no  drā́ghīya ā́yur jīváse  ā́dityāsaḥ sumahasaḥ kr̥ṇótana

translation.text: Âdityas, ye Most Mighty Ones, grant to our children and their seed Extended term of life that they may live long days.

verses.sanskrit_deva: य॒ज्ञो ही॒ळो वो॒ अन्त॑र॒ आदि॑त्या॒ अस्ति॑ मृ॒ळत॑ यु॒ष्मे इद्वो॒ अपि॑ ष्मसि सजा॒त्ये॑
verses.transliteration: yajñó hīḷó vo ántaraḥ-  ā́dityā ásti mr̥ḷáta  yuṣmé íd vo ápi ṣmasi sajātyè

translation.text: Sacrifice, O Âdityas, is your inward monitor: be kind, For in the bond of kindred we are bound to you.

verses.sanskrit_deva: बृ॒हद्वरू॑थं म॒रुतां॑ दे॒वं त्रा॒तार॑म॒श्विना॑ मि॒त्रमी॑महे॒ वरु॑णं स्व॒स्तये॑
verses.transliteration: br̥hád várūtham marútāṃ  deváṃ trātā́ram aśvínā  mitrám īmahe váruṇaṃ svastáye

translation.text: The Maruts' high protecting aid, the Aṣvins, and the God who saves, Mitra and Varuṇa for weal we supplicate.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ने॒हो मि॑त्रार्यमन्नृ॒वद्व॑रुण॒ शंस्य॑म् त्रि॒वरू॑थं मरुतो यन्त नश्छ॒र्दिः
verses.transliteration: anehó mitrāryaman  nr̥vád varuṇa śáṃsyam  trivárūtham maruto yanta naś chardíḥ

translation.text: Grant us a home with triple guard, Aryaman, Mitra, Varuṇa! Unthreatened, Maruts! meet for praise, and filled with men.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ये चि॒द्धि मृ॒त्युब॑न्धव॒ आदि॑त्या॒ मन॑वः॒ स्मसि॑ प्र सू न॒ आयु॑र्जी॒वसे॑ तिरेतन
verses.transliteration: yé cid dhí mr̥tyúbandhavaḥ-  ā́dityā mánavaḥ smási  prá sū́ na ā́yur jīváse tiretana

translation.text: And as we human beings, O Âdityas, are akin to death, Graciously lengthen ye our lives that we may live.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तं गू॑र्धया॒ स्व॑र्णरं दे॒वासो॑ दे॒वम॑र॒तिं द॑धन्विरे दे॒व॒त्रा ह॒व्यमोहि॑रे
verses.transliteration: táṃ gūrdhayā svàrṇaraṃ  devā́so devám aratíṃ dadhanvire  devatrā́ havyám óhire

translation.text: SING praise to hiin, the Lord of Light. The Gods have made the God to be their messenger, And sent oblation to Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: विभू॑तरातिं विप्र चि॒त्रशो॑चिषम॒ग्निमी॑ळिष्व य॒न्तुर॑म् अ॒स्य मेध॑स्य सो॒म्यस्य॑ सोभरे॒ प्रेम॑ध्व॒राय॒ पूर्व्य॑म्
verses.transliteration: víbhūtarātiṃ vipra citráśociṣam  agním īḷiṣva yantúram  asyá médhasya somyásya sobhare  prém adhvarā́ya pū́rvyam

translation.text: Agni, the Bounteous Giver, bright with varied flames, laud thou, O singer Sobhari- Him who controls this sacred food with Soma blent, who hath first claim to sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यजि॑ष्ठं त्वा ववृमहे दे॒वं दे॑व॒त्रा होता॑र॒मम॑र्त्यम् अ॒स्य य॒ज्ञस्य॑ सु॒क्रतु॑म्
verses.transliteration: yájiṣṭhaṃ tvā vavr̥mahe  deváṃ devatrā́ hótāram ámartyam  asyá yajñásya sukrátum

translation.text: Thee have we chosen skilftillest in sacrifice, Immortal Priest among the Gods, Wise finisher of this holy rite:

verses.sanskrit_deva: ऊ॒र्जो नपा॑तं सु॒भगं॑ सु॒दीदि॑तिम॒ग्निं श्रेष्ठ॑शोचिषम् स नो॑ मि॒त्रस्य॒ वरु॑णस्य॒ सो अ॒पामा सु॒म्नं य॑क्षते दि॒वि
verses.transliteration: ūrjó nápātaṃ subhágaṃ sudī́ditim  agníṃ śréṣṭhaśociṣam  sá no mitrásya váruṇasya só apā́m  ā́ sumnáṃ yakṣate diví

translation.text: The Son of Strength, the blessed, brightly shining One, Agni whose light is excellent. May be by sacrifice win us in heaven the grace of Mitra, Varuṇa, and the Floods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यः स॒मिधा॒ य आहु॑ती॒ यो वेदे॑न द॒दाश॒ मर्तो॑ अ॒ग्नये॑ यो नम॑सा स्वध्व॒रः
verses.transliteration: yáḥ samídhā yá ā́hutī  yó védena dadā́śa márto agnáye  yó námasā svadhvaráḥ

translation.text: The mortal who hath ministered to Agni with oblation, fuel, ritual lore, And reverence, skilled in sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तस्येदर्व॑न्तो रंहयन्त आ॒शव॒स्तस्य॑ द्यु॒म्नित॑मं॒ यशः॑ न तमंहो॑ दे॒वकृ॑तं॒ कुत॑श्च॒न न मर्त्य॑कृतं नशत्
verses.transliteration: tásyéd árvanto raṃhayanta āśávas  tásya dyumnítamaṃ yáśaḥ  ná tám áṃho devákr̥taṃ kútaś caná  ná mártyakr̥taṃ naśat

translation.text: Verily swift to run are his fleet-footed steeds, and most resplendent fame is his. No trouble caused by Gods or wrought by mortal man from any side o'ertaketh him.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स्व॒ग्नयो॑ वो अ॒ग्निभिः॒ स्याम॑ सूनो सहस ऊर्जां पते सु॒वीर॒स्त्वम॑स्म॒युः
verses.transliteration: svagnáyo vo agníbhiḥ  syā́ma sūno sahasa ūrjām pate  suvī́ras tvám asmayúḥ

translation.text: May we by thine own fires be well supplied with fire, O Son of Strength, O Lord of Might: Thou as our Friend hast worthy men.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र॒शंस॑मानो॒ अति॑थि॒र्न मि॒त्रियो॒ऽग्नी रथो॒ न वेद्यः॑ त्वे क्षेमा॑सो॒ अपि॑ सन्ति सा॒धव॒स्त्वं राजा॑ रयी॒णाम्
verses.transliteration: praśáṃsamāno átithir ná mitríyo  -agnī́ rátho ná védyaḥ  tvé kṣémāso ápi santi sādhávas  tváṃ rā́jā rayīṇā́m

translation.text: Agni, who praises like a guest of friendly mind, is as a car that brings us gear. Also in thee is found perfect security thou art the Sovran Lord of wealth.
