verses.transliteration: prá vaḥ śaṃsāmy adruhaḥ  saṃsthá úpastutīnām  ná táṃ dhūrtír varuṇa mitra mártyaṃ  yó vo dhā́mabhyó 'vidhat

translation.text: I laud you, O ye Guileless Gods, here where we meet to render praise. None, Varuṇa and Mitra, harins the mortal, man who honours and obeys your laws.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र स क्षयं॑ तिरते॒ वि म॒हीरिषो॒ यो वो॒ वरा॑य॒ दाश॑ति प्र प्र॒जाभि॑र्जायते॒ धर्म॑ण॒स्पर्यरि॑ष्टः॒ सर्व॑ एधते
verses.transliteration: prá sá kṣáyaṃ tirate ví mahī́r íṣo  yó vo várāya dā́śati  prá prajā́bhir jāyate dhármaṇas pári  áriṣṭaḥ sárva edhate

translation.text: He makes his house endure, he gathers plenteous food who pays obedience to your will. Born in his sons anew he spreads as Law commands, and prospers every way unharmed.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ऋ॒ते स वि॑न्दते यु॒धः सु॒गेभि॑र्या॒त्यध्व॑नः अ॒र्य॒मा मि॒त्रो वरु॑णः॒ सरा॑तयो॒ यं त्राय॑न्ते स॒जोष॑सः
verses.transliteration: r̥té sá vindate yudháḥ  sugébhir yāty ádhvanaḥ  aryamā́ mitró váruṇaḥ sárātayo  yáṃ trā́yante sajóṣasaḥ

translation.text: E'en without war he gathers wealth, and goes hisway on pleasant paths, Whom Mitra, Varuṇa and Aryaman protect, sharing the gift,of one accord.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अज्रे॑ चिदस्मै कृणुथा॒ न्यञ्च॑नं दु॒र्गे चि॒दा सु॑सर॒णम् ए॒षा चि॑दस्माद॒शनिः॑ प॒रो नु सास्रे॑धन्ती॒ वि न॑श्यतु
verses.transliteration: ájre cid asmai kr̥ṇuthā nyáñcanaṃ  durgé cid ā́ susaraṇám  eṣā́ cid asmād aśániḥ paró nú sā́-  -ásredhantī ví naśyatu

translation.text: E'en on the plain for him ye make a sloping path, an easy way where road is none: And far away from him the ineffectual shaft must vanish, shot at him in vain.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यद॒द्य सूर्य॑ उद्य॒ति प्रिय॑क्षत्रा ऋ॒तं द॒ध यन्नि॒म्रुचि॑ प्र॒बुधि॑ विश्ववेदसो॒ यद्वा॑ म॒ध्यंदि॑ने दि॒वः
verses.transliteration: yád adyá sū́rya udyatí  príyakṣatrā r̥táṃ dadhá  yán nimrúci prabúdhi viśvavedaso  yád vā madhyáṃdine diváḥ

translation.text: If ye appoint the rite to-day, kind Rulers, when the Sun ascends, Lords of all wealth, at sunset or at wakingtime, or be it at the noon of day,

verses.sanskrit_deva: यद्वा॑भिपि॒त्वे अ॑सुरा ऋ॒तं य॒ते छ॒र्दिर्ये॒म वि दा॒शुषे॑ व॒यं तद्वो॑ वसवो विश्ववेदस॒ उप॑ स्थेयाम॒ मध्य॒ आ
verses.transliteration: yád vābhipitvé asurā r̥táṃ yaté  chardír yemá ví dāśúṣe  vayáṃ tád vo vasavo viśvavedasaḥ-  úpa stheyāma mádhya ā́

translation.text: Or, Asuras, when ye have sheltered the worshipper who goes to sacrifice, at eve may we, O Vasus, ye possessors of all wealth, come then into the midst of You.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यद॒द्य सूर॒ उदि॑ते॒ यन्म॒ध्यंदि॑न आ॒तुचि॑ वा॒मं ध॒त्थ मन॑वे विश्ववेदसो॒ जुह्वा॑नाय॒ प्रचे॑तसे
verses.transliteration: yád adyá sū́ra údite-  yán madhyáṃdina ātúci  vāmáṃ dhatthá mánave viśvavedaso  júhvānāya prácetase

translation.text: If ye to-day at sunrise, or at noon, or in the gloom of eve, Lords of all riches, give fair treasure to the man, the wise man who hath sacrificed,

verses.sanskrit_deva: व॒यं तद्वः॑ सम्राज॒ आ वृ॑णीमहे पु॒त्रो न ब॑हु॒पाय्य॑म् अ॒श्याम॒ तदा॑दित्या॒ जुह्व॑तो ह॒विर्येन॒ वस्यो॒ऽनशा॑महै
verses.transliteration: vayáṃ tád vaḥ samrāja ā́ vr̥ṇīmahe  putró ná bahupā́yyam  aśyā́ma tád ādityā júhvato havír  yéna vásyo (')náśāmahai

translation.text: Then we, imperial Rulers, claim of you this boon, your wide protection, as a son. May we, Âdityas, offering holy gifts, obtain that which shall bring us greater bliss.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ये त्रिं॒शति॒ त्रय॑स्प॒रो दे॒वासो॑ ब॒र्हिरास॑दन् वि॒दन्नह॑ द्वि॒तास॑नन्
verses.transliteration: yé triṃśáti tráyas paró  devā́so barhír ā́sadan  vidánn áha dvitā́sanan

translation.text: THE Thirty Gods and Three besides, whose seat hath been the sacred grass, From time of old have found and gained.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वरु॑णो मि॒त्रो अ॑र्य॒मा स्मद्रा॑तिषाचो अ॒ग्नयः॑ पत्नी॑वन्तो॒ वष॑ट्कृताः
verses.transliteration: váruṇo mitró aryamā́  smádrātiṣāco agnáyaḥ  pátnīvanto váṣaṭkr̥tāḥ

translation.text: Varuṇa, Mitra, Aryaman, Agnis, with Consorts, sending boons, To whom our Vashaṭ! is addressed:

verses.sanskrit_deva: ते नो॑ गो॒पा अ॑पा॒च्यास्त उद॒क्त इ॒त्था न्य॑क् पु॒रस्ता॒त्सर्व॑या वि॒शा
verses.transliteration: té no gopā́ apācyā́s  tá údak tá itthā́ nyàk  purástāt sárvayā viśā́

translation.text: These are our guardians in the west, and northward here, and in the south, And on the cast, with all the tribe.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यथा॒ वश॑न्ति दे॒वास्तथेद॑स॒त्तदे॑षां॒ नकि॒रा मि॑नत् अरा॑वा च॒न मर्त्यः॑
verses.transliteration: yáthā váśanti devā́s táthéd asat  tád eṣāṃ nákir ā́ minat  árāvā caná mártyaḥ

translation.text: Even as the Gods desire so verily shall it be. None minisheth this power of theirs, No demon, and no mortal

verses.sanskrit_deva: स॒प्ता॒नां स॒प्त ऋ॒ष्टयः॑ स॒प्त द्यु॒म्नान्ये॑षाम् स॒प्तो अधि॒ श्रियो॑ धिरे
verses.transliteration: saptānā́ṃ saptá r̥ṣṭáyaḥ  saptá dyumnā́ny eṣām  saptó ádhi śríyo dhire

translation.text: The Seven carry seven spears; seven are the splendours they possess, And seven the glories they assume.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ब॒भ्रुरेको॒ विषु॑णः सू॒नरो॒ युवा॒ञ्ज्य॑ङ्क्ते हिर॒ण्यय॑म्
verses.transliteration: babhrúr éko víṣuṇaḥ sūnáro yúvā-  -añjy àṅkte hiraṇyáyam

translation.text: ONE is a youth brown, active, manifold he decks the golden one with ornament.

verses.sanskrit_deva: योनि॒मेक॒ आ स॑साद॒ द्योत॑नो॒ऽन्तर्दे॒वेषु॒ मेधि॑रः
verses.transliteration: yónim éka ā́ sasāda dyótano  -antár devéṣu médhiraḥ

translation.text: Another, luminous, occupies the place of sacritice, Sage, among the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वाशी॒मेको॑ बिभर्ति॒ हस्त॑ आय॒सीम॒न्तर्दे॒वेषु॒ निध्रु॑विः
verses.transliteration: vā́śīm éko bibharti hásta āyasī́m  antár devéṣu nídhruviḥ

translation.text: One brandishes in his hand an iron knife, firm, in his seat amid the Deities.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वज्र॒मेको॑ बिभर्ति॒ हस्त॒ आहि॑तं॒ तेन॑ वृ॒त्राणि॑ जिघ्नते
verses.transliteration: vájram éko bibharti hásta ā́hitaṃ  téna vr̥trā́ṇi jighnate

translation.text: Another holds the thunderbolt, wherewith he slays the Vr̥itras, resting in his hand.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ति॒ग्ममेको॑ बिभर्ति॒ हस्त॒ आयु॑धं॒ शुचि॑रु॒ग्रो जला॑षभेषजः
verses.transliteration: tigmám éko bibharti hásta ā́yudhaṃ  śúcir ugró jálāṣabheṣajaḥ

translation.text: Another bears a pointed weapon: bright is he, and strong, with healing medicines.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प॒थ एकः॑ पीपाय॒ तस्क॑रो यथाँ ए॒ष वे॑द निधी॒नाम्
verses.transliteration: pathá ékaḥ pīpāya táskaro yathām̐  eṣá veda nidhīnā́m

translation.text: Another, thief-like, watches well the ways, and knows the places where the treasures lie.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्रीण्येक॑ उरुगा॒यो वि च॑क्रमे॒ यत्र॑ दे॒वासो॒ मद॑न्ति
verses.transliteration: trī́ṇy éka urugāyó ví cakrame  yátra devā́so mádanti

translation.text: Another with his mighty stride hath made his three steps thither where the Gods rejoice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: विभि॒र्द्वा च॑रत॒ एक॑या स॒ह प्र प्र॑वा॒सेव॑ वसतः
verses.transliteration: víbhir dvā́ carata ékayā sahá  prá pravāséva vasataḥ

translation.text: Two with one Dame ride on with winged steeds, and journey forth like travellers on their way.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सदो॒ द्वा च॑क्राते उप॒मा दि॒वि स॒म्राजा॑ स॒र्पिरा॑सुती
verses.transliteration: sádo dvā́ cakrāte upamā́ diví  samrā́jā sarpírāsutī

translation.text: Two, highest, in the heavens have set their seat, worshipped with holy oil, imperial Kings.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अर्च॑न्त॒ एके॒ महि॒ साम॑ मन्वत॒ तेन॒ सूर्य॑मरोचयन्
verses.transliteration: árcanta éke máhi sā́ma manvata  téna sū́ryam arocayan

translation.text: Some, singing lauds, conceived the Sâma-hymn, great hymn whereby they caused the Sun to shine.

verses.sanskrit_deva: न॒हि वो॒ अस्त्य॑र्भ॒को देवा॑सो॒ न कु॑मार॒कः विश्वे॑ स॒तोम॑हान्त॒ इत्
verses.transliteration: nahí vo ásty arbhakó  dévāso ná kumārakáḥ  víśve satómahānta ít

translation.text: NOT one of you, ye Gods, is small, none of you is a feeble child: All of you, verily, are great.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इति॑ स्तु॒तासो॑ असथा रिशादसो॒ ये स्थ त्रय॑श्च त्रिं॒शच्च॑ मनो॑र्देवा यज्ञियासः
verses.transliteration: íti stutā́so asathā riśādaso  yé sthá tráyaś ca triṃśác ca  mánor devā yajñiyāsaḥ

translation.text: Thus be ye lauded, ye destroyers of the foe, ye Three-and-Thirty Deities, The Gods of man, the Holy Ones.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ते न॑स्त्राध्वं॒ ते॑ऽवत॒ त उ॑ नो॒ अधि॑ वोचत मा नः॑ प॒थः पित्र्या॑न्मान॒वादधि॑ दू॒रं नै॑ष्ट परा॒वतः॑
verses.transliteration: té nas trādhvaṃ tè 'vata  tá u no ádhi vocata  mā́ naḥ patháḥ pítryān mānavā́d ádhi  dūráṃ naiṣṭa parāvátaḥ

translation.text: As such defend and succour us, with benedictions speak to us: Lead us not from our fathers' and from Manu's path into the distance far away.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ये दे॑वास इ॒ह स्थन॒ विश्वे॑ वैश्वान॒रा उ॒त अ॒स्मभ्यं॒ शर्म॑ स॒प्रथो॒ गवेऽश्वा॑य यच्छत
verses.transliteration: yé devāsa ihá sthána  víśve vaiśvānarā́ utá  asmábhyaṃ śárma saprátho  gávé 'śvāya yachata

translation.text: Ye Deities who stay with us, and all ye Gods of all mankind, Give us your wide protection, give shelter for cattle and for steed.

suktas.deity: Praise of the Sacrificer and His Wife

verses.sanskrit_deva: यो यजा॑ति॒ यजा॑त॒ इत्सु॒नव॑च्च॒ पचा॑ति च ब्र॒ह्मेदिन्द्र॑स्य चाकनत्
verses.transliteration: yó yájāti yájāta ít  sunávac ca pácāti ca  brahméd índrasya cākanat

translation.text: THAT Brahman pleases Indra well, who worships, sacrifices, pours Libation, and prepares the meal.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पु॒रो॒ळाशं॒ यो अ॑स्मै॒ सोमं॒ रर॑त आ॒शिर॑म् पादित्तं श॒क्रो अंह॑सः
verses.transliteration: puroḷā́śaṃ yó asmai  sómaṃ rárata āśíram  pā́d ít táṃ śakró áṃhasaḥ

translation.text: Ṣakra protects from woe the man who gives him sacrificial cake. And offers Soma blent with milk.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तस्य॑ द्यु॒माँ अ॑स॒द्रथो॑ दे॒वजू॑तः॒ स शू॑शुवत् विश्वा॑ व॒न्वन्न॑मि॒त्रिया॑
verses.transliteration: tásya dyumā́m̐ asad rátho  devájūtaḥ sá śūśuvat  víśvā vanvánn amitríyā

translation.text: His chariot shall be glorious, sped by Gods, and mighty shall he be, Subduing all hostilities.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अस्य॑ प्र॒जाव॑ती गृ॒हेऽस॑श्चन्ती दि॒वेदि॑वे इळा॑ धेनु॒मती॑ दुहे
verses.transliteration: ásya prajā́vatī gr̥hé  -ásaścantī divé-dive  íḷā dhenumátī duhe

translation.text: Each day that passes, in his house flows his libation, rich in milk, Exhaustless, bringing progeny.

verses.sanskrit_deva: या दम्प॑ती॒ सम॑नसा सुनु॒त आ च॒ धाव॑तः देवा॑सो॒ नित्य॑या॒शिरा॑
verses.transliteration: yā́ dámpatī sámanasā  sunutá ā́ ca dhā́vataḥ  dévāso nítyayāśírā

translation.text: O Gods, with constant draught of milk, husband and wife with one accord Press out and wash the Soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्रति॑ प्राश॒व्याँ॑ इतः स॒म्यञ्चा॑ ब॒र्हिरा॑शाते न ता वाजे॑षु वायतः
verses.transliteration: práti prāśavyā̀m̐ itaḥ  samyáñcā barhír āśāte  ná tā́ vā́jeṣu vāyataḥ

translation.text: They gain sufficient food: they come united to the sacred grass, And never do they fail in strength.

verses.sanskrit_deva: न दे॒वाना॒मपि॑ ह्नुतः सुम॒तिं न जु॑गुक्षतः श्रवो॑ बृ॒हद्वि॑वासतः
verses.transliteration: ná devā́nām ápi hnutaḥ  sumatíṃ ná jugukṣataḥ  śrávo br̥hád vivāsataḥ

translation.text: Never do they deny or seek to hide the favour of the Gods: They win high glory for themselves.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पु॒त्रिणा॒ ता कु॑मा॒रिणा॒ विश्व॒मायु॒र्व्य॑श्नुतः उ॒भा हिर॑ण्यपेशसा
verses.transliteration: putríṇā tā́ kumāríṇā  víśvam ā́yur vy àśnutaḥ  ubhā́ híraṇyapeśasā

translation.text: With sons and daughters by their side they reach their full extent of life, Both decked with ornaments of gold.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वी॒तिहो॑त्रा कृ॒तद्व॑सू दश॒स्यन्ता॒मृता॑य॒ कम् समूधो॑ रोम॒शं ह॑तो दे॒वेषु॑ कृणुतो॒ दुवः॑
verses.transliteration: vītíhotrā kr̥tádvasū  daśasyántāmŕ̥tāya kám  sám ū́dho romaśáṃ hato  devéṣu kr̥ṇuto dúvaḥ

translation.text: Serving the Immortal One with gifts of sacrificial meal and wealth, They satisfy the claims of love and pay due honour to the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ शर्म॒ पर्व॑तानां वृणी॒महे॑ न॒दीना॑म् आ विष्णोः॑ सचा॒भुवः॑
verses.transliteration: ā́ śárma párvatānām  vr̥ṇīmáhe nadī́nām  ā́ víṣṇoḥ sacābhúvaḥ

translation.text: We claim protection from the Hills, we claim protection of the Floods, Of him who stands by Vishṇu's side.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ऐतु॑ पू॒षा र॒यिर्भगः॑ स्व॒स्ति स॑र्व॒धात॑मः उ॒रुरध्वा॑ स्व॒स्तये॑
verses.transliteration: aítu pūṣā́ rayír bhágaḥ  svastí sarvadhā́tamaḥ  urúr ádhvā svastáye

translation.text: May Pûshan come, and Bhaga, Lord of wealth, All-bounteous, for our weal Broad be the path that leads to bliss:

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒रम॑तिरन॒र्वणो॒ विश्वो॑ दे॒वस्य॒ मन॑सा आ॒दि॒त्याना॑मने॒ह इत्
verses.transliteration: arámatir anarváṇo  víśvo devásya mánasā  ādityā́nām anehá ít

translation.text: Aramati, and, free from foes, Viṣva with spirit of a God, And the Âdityas' peerless might.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यथा॑ नो मि॒त्रो अ॑र्य॒मा वरु॑णः॒ सन्ति॑ गो॒पाः सु॒गा ऋ॒तस्य॒ पन्थाः॑
verses.transliteration: yáthā no mitró aryamā́  váruṇaḥ sánti gopā́ḥ  sugā́ r̥tásya pánthāḥ

translation.text: Seeing that Mitra, Aryaman, and Varuṇa are guarding us, The paths of Law are fair to tread.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निं वः॑ पू॒र्व्यं गि॒रा दे॒वमी॑ळे॒ वसू॑नाम् स॒प॒र्यन्तः॑ पुरुप्रि॒यं मि॒त्रं न क्षे॑त्र॒साध॑सम्
verses.transliteration: agníṃ vaḥ pūrvyáṃ girā́  devám īḷe vásūnām  saparyántaḥ purupriyám  mitráṃ ná kṣetrasā́dhasam

translation.text: I glorify with song, for wealth, Agni the God, the first of you. We honour as a well-loved Friend the God who prospereth our fields.

verses.sanskrit_deva: म॒क्षू दे॒वव॑तो॒ रथः॒ शूरो॑ वा पृ॒त्सु कासु॑ चित् दे॒वानां॒ य इन्मनो॒ यज॑मान॒ इय॑क्षत्य॒भीदय॑ज्वनो भुवत्
verses.transliteration: makṣū́ devávato ráthaḥ  śū́ro vā pr̥tsú kā́su cit  devā́nāṃ yá ín máno  yájamāna íyakṣati-  abhī́d áyajvano bhuvat

translation.text: As in all frays the hero, so swift moves his car whom Gods attend. The man who, sacrificing, strives to win the heart of Deities will conquer those who worship not.

verses.sanskrit_deva: न य॑जमान रिष्यसि॒ न सु॑न्वान॒ न दे॑वयो दे॒वानां॒ य इन्मनो॒ यज॑मान॒ इय॑क्षत्य॒भीदय॑ज्वनो भुवत्
verses.transliteration: ná yajamāna riṣyasi  ná sunvāna ná devayo  devā́nāṃ yá ín máno  yájamāna íyakṣati-  abhī́d áyajvano bhuvat

translation.text: Ne'er are ye injured, worshipper, presser of juice, or pious man. The man who, sacrificing, strives to win the heart of Deities will conquer those who worship not.

verses.sanskrit_deva: नकि॒ष्टं कर्म॑णा नश॒न्न प्र यो॑ष॒न्न यो॑षति दे॒वानां॒ य इन्मनो॒ यज॑मान॒ इय॑क्षत्य॒भीदय॑ज्वनो भुवत्
verses.transliteration: nákiṣ ṭáṃ kármaṇā naśat-  ná prá yoṣan ná yoṣati  devā́nāṃ yá ín máno  yájamāna íyakṣati-  abhī́d áyajvano bhuvat

translation.text: None in his action equals him, none holds him far or keeps him off. The man who, sacrificing, strives to win the heart of Deities will conquer those who worship not.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अस॒दत्र॑ सु॒वीर्य॑मु॒त त्यदा॒श्वश्व्य॑म् दे॒वानां॒ य इन्मनो॒ यज॑मान॒ इय॑क्षत्य॒भीदय॑ज्वनो भुवत्
verses.transliteration: ásad átra suvī́ryam  utá tyád āśváśvyam  devā́nāṃ yá ín máno  yájamāna íyakṣati-  abhī́d áyajvano bhuvat

translation.text: Such strength of heroes shall be his, such mastery of fleet-foot steeds. The man who, sacrificing, strives to win the heart of Deities will conquer those who worship not.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र कृ॒तान्यृ॑जी॒षिणः॒ कण्वा॒ इन्द्र॑स्य॒ गाथ॑या मदे॒ सोम॑स्य वोचत
verses.transliteration: prá kr̥tā́ny r̥jīṣíṇaḥ  káṇvā índrasya gā́thayā  máde sómasya vocata

translation.text: Kaṇvas, tell forth with song the deeds of Indra, the Impetuous, Wrought in the Soma's wild delight.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यः सृबि॑न्द॒मन॑र्शनिं॒ पिप्रुं॑ दा॒सम॑ही॒शुव॑म् वधी॑दु॒ग्रो रि॒णन्न॒पः
verses.transliteration: yáḥ sŕ̥bindam ánarśanim  pípruṃ dāsám ahīśúvam  vádhīd ugró riṇánn apáḥ

translation.text: Strong God, he slew Anarṣani, Sr̥ibinda, Pipru, and the fiend, Ahîṣuva, and loosed the floods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: न्यर्बु॑दस्य वि॒ष्टपं॑ व॒र्ष्माणं॑ बृह॒तस्ति॑र कृ॒षे तदि॑न्द्र॒ पौंस्य॑म्
verses.transliteration: ny árbudasya viṣṭápaṃ  varṣmā́ṇam br̥hatás tira  kr̥ṣé tád indra paúṃsyam

translation.text: Thou broughtest down the dwelling-place, the height of lofty Arbuda. That exploit, Indra, must be famed.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्रति॑ श्रु॒ताय॑ वो धृ॒षत्तूर्णा॑शं॒ न गि॒रेरधि॑ हु॒वे सु॑शि॒प्रमू॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: práti śrutā́ya vo dhr̥ṣát  tū́rṇāśaṃ ná girér ádhi  huvé suśiprám ūtáye

translation.text: Bold, to your famous Soma I call the fair-visored God for aid, Down like a torrent from the hill.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स गोरश्व॑स्य॒ वि व्र॒जं म॑न्दा॒नः सो॒म्येभ्यः॑ पुरं॒ न शू॑र दर्षसि
verses.transliteration: sá gór áśvasya ví vrajám  mandānáḥ somyébhyaḥ  púraṃ ná śūra darṣasi

translation.text: Rejoicing in the Soma-draughts, Hero, burst open, like a fort, The stall of horses and of kine.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यदि॑ मे रा॒रणः॑ सु॒त उ॒क्थे वा॒ दध॑से॒ चनः॑ आ॒रादुप॑ स्व॒धा ग॑हि
verses.transliteration: yádi me rāráṇaḥ suté-  ukthé vā dádhase cánaḥ  ārā́d úpa svadhā́ gahi

translation.text: If my libation gladdens, if thou takest pleasure in my laud, Come with thy Godhead from afar.

verses.sanskrit_deva: व॒यं घा॑ ते॒ अपि॑ ष्मसि स्तो॒तार॑ इन्द्र गिर्वणः त्वं नो॑ जिन्व सोमपाः
verses.transliteration: vayáṃ ghā te ápi ṣmasi  stotā́ra indra girvaṇaḥ  tváṃ no jinva somapāḥ

translation.text: O Indra, Lover of the Song, the singers of thy praise are we: O Soma-drinker, quicken us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒त नः॑ पि॒तुमा भ॑र संररा॒णो अवि॑क्षितम् मघ॑व॒न्भूरि॑ ते॒ वसु॑
verses.transliteration: utá naḥ pitúm ā́ bhara  saṃrarāṇó ávikṣitam  mághavan bhū́ri te vásu

translation.text: And, taking thy delight with us bring us still undiminished food: Great is thy wealth, O Maghavan.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒त नो॒ गोम॑तस्कृधि॒ हिर॑ण्यवतो अ॒श्विनः॑ इळा॑भिः॒ सं र॑भेमहि
verses.transliteration: utá no gómatas kr̥dhi  híraṇyavato aśvínaḥ  íḷābhiḥ sáṃ rabhemahi

translation.text: Make thou us rich in herds of kine, in steeds, in gold: let us exert Our strength in sacrificial gifts.

verses.sanskrit_deva: बृ॒बदु॑क्थं हवामहे सृ॒प्रक॑रस्नमू॒तये॑ साधु॑ कृ॒ण्वन्त॒मव॑से
verses.transliteration: br̥bádukthaṃ havāmahe  sr̥prákarasnam ūtáye  sā́dhu kr̥ṇvántam ávase

translation.text: Let us call him to aid whose hands stretch far, to whom high laud is due. Who worketh well to succour us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यः सं॒स्थे चि॑च्छ॒तक्र॑तु॒रादीं॑ कृ॒णोति॑ वृत्र॒हा ज॒रि॒तृभ्यः॑ पुरू॒वसुः॑
verses.transliteration: yáḥ saṃsthé cic chatákratur  ā́d īṃ kr̥ṇóti vr̥trahā́  jaritŕ̥bhyaḥ purūvásuḥ

translation.text: He, Ṣatakratu, even in fight acts as a Vr̥itra-slayer s,till: He gives his worshippers much wealth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स नः॑ श॒क्रश्चि॒दा श॑क॒द्दान॑वाँ अन्तराभ॒रः इन्द्रो॒ विश्वा॑भिरू॒तिभिः॑
verses.transliteration: sá naḥ śakráś cid ā́ śakad  dā́navām̐ antarābharáḥ  índro víśvābhir ūtíbhiḥ

translation.text: May he, this A;akra, strengthen us, Boon God who satisfies our needs, Indra, with all lhis saving helps.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यो रा॒यो॒३॒॑ऽवनि॑र्म॒हान्त्सु॑पा॒रः सु॑न्व॒तः सखा॑ तमिन्द्र॑म॒भि गा॑यत
verses.transliteration: yó rāyò 'vánir mahā́n  supāráḥ sunvatáḥ sákhā  tám índram abhí gāyata

translation.text: To him, the mighty stream of wealth, the Soma-presser's rescuing Friend, To Indra sing your song of praise;

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ॒य॒न्तारं॒ महि॑ स्थि॒रं पृत॑नासु श्रवो॒जित॑म् भूरे॒रीशा॑न॒मोज॑सा
verses.transliteration: āyantā́ram máhi sthirám  pŕ̥tanāsu śravojítam  bhū́rer ī́śānam ójasā

translation.text: Who bringeth what is great and firm, who winneth glory in his wars, Lord of vast wealth through power and might.

verses.sanskrit_deva: नकि॑रस्य॒ शची॑नां निय॒न्ता सू॒नृता॑नाम् नकि॑र्व॒क्ता न दा॒दिति॑
verses.transliteration: nákir asya śácīnāṃ  niyantā́ sūnŕ̥tānām  nákir vaktā́ ná dād íti

translation.text: There liveth none to cheek or stay his energies and gracious deeds: None who can say, He giveth not.

verses.sanskrit_deva: न नू॒नं ब्र॒ह्मणा॑मृ॒णं प्रा॑शू॒नाम॑स्ति सुन्व॒ताम् न सोमो॑ अप्र॒ता प॑पे
verses.transliteration: ná nūnám brahmáṇām r̥ṇám  prāśūnā́m asti sunvatā́m  ná sómo apratā́ pape

translation.text: No debt is due by Brahmans now, by active men who press the juice: Well hath each Soma-draught been paid.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पन्य॒ इदुप॑ गायत॒ पन्य॑ उ॒क्थानि॑ शंसत ब्रह्मा॑ कृणोत॒ पन्य॒ इत्
verses.transliteration: pánya íd úpa gāyata  pánya ukthā́ni śaṃsata  bráhmā kr̥ṇota pánya ít

translation.text: Sing ye to him who must be praised, say lauds to him who must be praised, Bring prayer to him who must be praised.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पन्य॒ आ द॑र्दिरच्छ॒ता स॒हस्रा॑ वा॒ज्यवृ॑तः इन्द्रो॒ यो यज्व॑नो वृ॒धः
verses.transliteration: pánya ā́ dardirac chatā́  sahásrā vājy ávr̥taḥ  índro yó yájvano vr̥dháḥ

translation.text: May be, unchecked, strong, meet for praise, bring hundreds, thousands forth to light, Indra who aids the worshipper.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वि षू च॑र स्व॒धा अनु॑ कृष्टी॒नामन्वा॒हुवः॑ इन्द्र॒ पिब॑ सु॒ताना॑म्
verses.transliteration: ví ṣū́ cara svadhā́ ánu  kr̥ṣṭīnā́m ánv āhúvaḥ  índra píba sutā́nām

translation.text: Go with thy God-like nature forth, go where the folk are calling thee: Drink, Indra, of the drops we pour.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पिब॒ स्वधै॑नवानामु॒त यस्तुग्र्ये॒ सचा॑ उ॒तायमि॑न्द्र॒ यस्तव॑
verses.transliteration: píba svádhainavānām  utá yás túgrye sácā  utā́yám indra yás táva

translation.text: Drink milky draughts which are thine own, this too which was with Tugrya once, This is it, Indra, that is thine.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अती॑हि मन्युषा॒विणं॑ सुषु॒वांस॑मु॒पार॑णे इ॒मं रा॒तं सु॒तं पि॑ब
verses.transliteration: átīhi manyuṣāvíṇaṃ  suṣuvā́ṃsam upā́raṇe  imáṃ rātáṃ sutám piba

translation.text: Pass him who psours libations out in angry mood or after sin: Here drink the juice we offer thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒हि ति॒स्रः प॑रा॒वत॑ इ॒हि पञ्च॒ जनाँ॒ अति॑ धेना॑ इन्द्राव॒चाक॑शत्
verses.transliteration: ihí tisráḥ parāvátaḥ-  ihí páñca jánām̐ áti  dhénā indrāvacā́kaśat

translation.text: Over the three great distances, past the Five Peoples go thy way, O Indra, noticing our voice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सूर्यो॑ र॒श्मिं यथा॑ सृ॒जा त्वा॑ यच्छन्तु मे॒ गिरः॑ नि॒म्नमापो॒ न स॒ध्र्य॑क्
verses.transliteration: sū́ryo raśmíṃ yáthā sr̥ja-  -ā́ tvā yachantu me gíraḥ  nimnám ā́po ná sadhryàk

translation.text: Send forth thy ray like Sûrya: let my songs attract thee hitherward, Like waters gathering to the vale.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अध्व॑र्य॒वा तु हि षि॒ञ्च सोमं॑ वी॒राय॑ शि॒प्रिणे॑ भरा॑ सु॒तस्य॑ पी॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: ádhvaryav ā́ tú hí ṣiñcá  sómaṃ vīrā́ya śipríṇe  bhárā sutásya pītáye

translation.text: Now to the Hero fair of cheek, Adhvaryu, pour the Soma forth: Bring of the juice that he may drink

verses.sanskrit_deva: य उ॒द्नः फ॑लि॒गं भि॒नन्न्य१॒॑क्सिन्धूँ॑र॒वासृ॑जत् यो गोषु॑ प॒क्वं धा॒रय॑त्
verses.transliteration: yá udnáḥ phaligám bhinát-  nyàk síndhūm̐r avā́sr̥jat  yó góṣu pakváṃ dhāráyat

translation.text: Who cleft the water-cloud in twain, loosed rivers for their downward flow, And set the ripe milk in the kine.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अह॑न्वृ॒त्रमृची॑षम और्णवा॒भम॑ही॒शुव॑म् हि॒मेना॑विध्य॒दर्बु॑दम्
verses.transliteration: áhan vr̥trám ŕ̥cīṣamaḥ-  aurṇavābhám ahīśúvam  himénāvidhyad árbudam

translation.text: He, meet for praise, slew Vr̥itra, slew Ahîṣuva, Ûrṇavâbha's son, And pierced through Arbuda with frost.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र व॑ उ॒ग्राय॑ नि॒ष्टुरेऽषा॑ळ्हाय प्रस॒क्षिणे॑ दे॒वत्तं॒ ब्रह्म॑ गायत
verses.transliteration: prá va ugrā́ya niṣṭúre-  -áṣāḷhāya prasakṣíṇe  deváttam bráhma gāyata

translation.text: To him your matchless Mighty One, unconquerable Conqueror, Sing forth the prayer which Gods have given:

verses.sanskrit_deva: यो विश्वा॑न्य॒भि व्र॒ता सोम॑स्य॒ मदे॒ अन्ध॑सः इन्द्रो॑ दे॒वेषु॒ चेत॑ति
verses.transliteration: yó víśvāny abhí vratā́  sómasya máde ándhasaḥ  índro devéṣu cétati

translation.text: Indra, who in the wild delight of Soma juice considers here All holy Laws among the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒ह त्या स॑ध॒माद्या॒ हरी॒ हिर॑ण्यकेश्या वो॒ळ्हाम॒भि प्रयो॑ हि॒तम्
verses.transliteration: ihá tyā́ sadhamā́dyā  hárī híraṇyakeśyā  voḷhā́m abhí práyo hitám

translation.text: Hither let these thy Bays who share thy banquet, Steeds with golden manes, Convey thee to the feast prepared.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒र्वाञ्चं॑ त्वा पुरुष्टुत प्रि॒यमे॑धस्तुता॒ हरी॑ सो॒म॒पेया॑य वक्षतः
verses.transliteration: arvā́ñcaṃ tvā puruṣṭuta  priyámedhastutā hárī  somapéyāya vakṣataḥ

translation.text: Hither, O thou whom many laud, the Bays whom Priyamedha praised, Shall bring thee to the Soma-draught.

verses.sanskrit_deva: व॒यं घ॑ त्वा सु॒ताव॑न्त॒ आपो॒ न वृ॒क्तब॑र्हिषः प॒वित्र॑स्य प्र॒स्रव॑णेषु वृत्रह॒न्परि॑ स्तो॒तार॑ आसते
verses.transliteration: vayáṃ gha tvā sutā́vantaḥ-  ā́po ná vr̥ktábarhiṣaḥ  pavítrasya prasrávaṇeṣu vr̥trahan  pári stotā́ra āsate

translation.text: WE compass thee like waters, we whose grass is trimmed and Soma pressed. Here where the filter pours its stream, thy worshippers round thee, O Vr̥itra-slayer, sit.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स्वर॑न्ति त्वा सु॒ते नरो॒ वसो॑ निरे॒क उ॒क्थिनः॑ क॒दा सु॒तं तृ॑षा॒ण ओक॒ आ ग॑म॒ इन्द्र॑ स्व॒ब्दीव॒ वंस॑गः
verses.transliteration: sváranti tvā suté náro  váso nireká ukthínaḥ  kadā́ sutáṃ tr̥ṣāṇá óka ā́ gamaḥ-  índra svabdī́va váṃsagaḥ

translation.text: Men, Vasu! by the Soma, with lauds call thee to the foremost place: When comest thou athirst unto the juice as home, O Indra, like a bellowing bull?

verses.sanskrit_deva: कण्वे॑भिर्धृष्ण॒वा धृ॒षद्वाजं॑ दर्षि सह॒स्रिण॑म् पि॒शङ्ग॑रूपं मघवन्विचर्षणे म॒क्षू गोम॑न्तमीमहे
verses.transliteration: káṇvebhir dhr̥ṣṇav ā́ dhr̥ṣád  vā́jaṃ darṣi sahasríṇam  piśáṅgarūpam maghavan vicarṣaṇe  makṣū́ gómantam īmahe

translation.text: Boldly, Bold Hero, bring us spoil in thousands for the Kaṇvas' sake. O active Maghavan, with eager prayer we crave the yellow-hued with store ol kine.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पा॒हि गायान्ध॑सो॒ मद॒ इन्द्रा॑य मेध्यातिथे यः सम्मि॑श्लो॒ हर्यो॒र्यः सु॒ते सचा॑ व॒ज्री रथो॑ हिर॒ण्ययः॑
verses.transliteration: pāhí gā́yā́ndhaso máde-  índrāya medhyātithe  yáḥ sámmiślo háryor yáḥ suté sácā  vajrī́ rátho hiraṇyáyaḥ

translation.text: Medhyâtithi, to Indra sing, drink of the juice to make thee glad. Close-knit to his Bay Steeds, bolt-armed, beside the juice is he: his chariot is of gold.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यः सु॑ष॒व्यः सु॒दक्षि॑ण इ॒नो यः सु॒क्रतु॑र्गृ॒णे य आ॑क॒रः स॒हस्रा॒ यः श॒ताम॑घ॒ इन्द्रो॒ यः पू॒र्भिदा॑रि॒तः
verses.transliteration: yáḥ suṣavyáḥ sudákṣiṇaḥ-  inó yáḥ sukrátur gr̥ṇé  yá ākaráḥ sahásrā yáḥ śatā́maghaḥ-  índro yáḥ pūrbhíd āritáḥ

translation.text: He Who is praised as strong of hand both right and left, most wise and hold: Indra who, rich in hundreds, gathers thousands up, honoured as breaker-down of forts.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यो धृ॑षि॒तो योऽवृ॑तो॒ यो अस्ति॒ श्मश्रु॑षु श्रि॒तः विभू॑तद्युम्न॒श्च्यव॑नः पुरुष्टु॒तः क्रत्वा॒ गौरि॑व शाकि॒नः
verses.transliteration: yó dhr̥ṣitó yó 'vr̥to  yó ásti śmáśruṣu śritáḥ  víbhūtadyumnaś cyávanaḥ puruṣṭutáḥ  krátvā gaúr iva śākináḥ

translation.text: The bold of heart whom none provokes, who stands in bearded confidence; Much-lauded, very glorious, overthrowing foes, strong Helper, like a bull with might.

verses.sanskrit_deva: क ईं॑ वेद सु॒ते सचा॒ पिब॑न्तं॒ कद्वयो॑ दधे अ॒यं यः पुरो॑ विभि॒नत्त्योज॑सा मन्दा॒नः शि॒प्र्यन्ध॑सः
verses.transliteration: ká īṃ veda suté sácā  píbantaṃ kád váyo dadhe  ayáṃ yáḥ púro vibhinátty ójasā  mandānáḥ śipry ándhasaḥ

translation.text: Who knows what vital ower he wins, drinking beside the flowing juice? This is the fair-checked God who, joying in the draught, breaks down the castles in his strength.

verses.sanskrit_deva: दा॒ना मृ॒गो न वा॑र॒णः पु॑रु॒त्रा च॒रथं॑ दधे नकि॑ष्ट्वा॒ नि य॑म॒दा सु॒ते ग॑मो म॒हाँश्च॑र॒स्योज॑सा
verses.transliteration: dānā́ mr̥gó ná vāraṇáḥ  purutrā́ caráthaṃ dadhe  nákiṣ ṭvā ní yamad ā́ suté gamo  mahā́ṃś carasy ójasā

translation.text: As a wild elephant rushes on this way and that way, mad with heat,' None may compel thee, yet come hither to the draught: thou movest mighty in thy power.

verses.sanskrit_deva: य उ॒ग्रः सन्ननि॑ष्टृतः स्थि॒रो रणा॑य॒ संस्कृ॑तः यदि॑ स्तो॒तुर्म॒घवा॑ शृ॒णव॒द्धवं॒ नेन्द्रो॑ योष॒त्या ग॑मत्
verses.transliteration: yá ugráḥ sánn ániṣṭr̥taḥ-  sthiró ráṇāya sáṃskr̥taḥ  yádi stotúr maghávā śr̥ṇávad dhávaṃ  néndro yoṣaty ā́ gamat

translation.text: When he, the Mighty, ne'er o'erthrown, steadfast, made ready for the fight, When Indra Maghavan lists to his praiser's call, he will not stand aloof, but come.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स॒त्यमि॒त्था वृषेद॑सि॒ वृष॑जूति॒र्नोऽवृ॑तः वृषा॒ ह्यु॑ग्र शृण्वि॒षे प॑रा॒वति॒ वृषो॑ अर्वा॒वति॑ श्रु॒तः
verses.transliteration: satyám itthā́ vŕ̥ṣéd asi  vŕ̥ṣajūtir nó 'vr̥taḥ  vŕ̥ṣā hy ùgra śr̥ṇviṣé parāváti  vŕ̥ṣo arvāváti śrutáḥ

translation.text: Yea, verily, thou art a Bull, with a bull's rush. whom none may stay: Thou Mighty One, art celebrated as a Bull, famed as a Bull both near and far.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वृष॑णस्ते अ॒भीश॑वो॒ वृषा॒ कशा॑ हिर॒ण्ययी॑ वृषा॒ रथो॑ मघव॒न्वृष॑णा॒ हरी॒ वृषा॒ त्वं श॑तक्रतो
verses.transliteration: vŕ̥ṣaṇas te abhī́śavo  vŕ̥ṣā káśā hiraṇyáyī  vŕ̥ṣā rátho maghavan vŕ̥ṣaṇā hárī  vŕ̥ṣā tváṃ śatakrato

translation.text: Thy reins are very bulls in strength, bulls' strength is in thy golden whip. Thy car, O Maghavan, thy Bays are strong as bulls: thou, Ṣatakratu, art a Bull.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वृषा॒ सोता॑ सुनोतु ते॒ वृष॑न्नृजीपि॒न्ना भ॑र वृषा॑ दधन्वे॒ वृष॑णं न॒दीष्वा तुभ्यं॑ स्थातर्हरीणाम्
verses.transliteration: vŕ̥ṣā sótā sunotu te  vŕ̥ṣann r̥jīpinn ā́ bhara  vŕ̥ṣā dadhanve vŕ̥ṣaṇaṃ nadī́ṣv~ā́  túbhyaṃ sthātar harīṇām

translation.text: Let the strong presser press for thee. Bring hither, thou straight-rushing Bull. The mighty makes the mighty run in flowing streams for thee whom thy Bay Horses bear.

verses.sanskrit_deva: एन्द्र॑ याहि पी॒तये॒ मधु॑ शविष्ठ सो॒म्यम् नायमच्छा॑ म॒घवा॑ शृ॒णव॒द्गिरो॒ ब्रह्मो॒क्था च॑ सु॒क्रतुः॑
verses.transliteration: éndra yāhi pītáye  mádhu śaviṣṭha somyám  nā́yám áchā maghávā śr̥ṇávad gíro  bráhmokthā́ ca sukrátuḥ

translation.text: Come, thou most potent Indra, come to drink the savoury Soma juice. Maghavan, very wise, will quickly come to hear the songs, the prayer, the hymns of praise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वह॑न्तु त्वा रथे॒ष्ठामा हर॑यो रथ॒युजः॑ ति॒रश्चि॑द॒र्यं सव॑नानि वृत्रहन्न॒न्येषां॒ या श॑तक्रतो
verses.transliteration: váhantu tvā ratheṣṭhā́m  ā́ hárayo rathayújaḥ  tiráś cid aryáṃ sávanāni vr̥trahann  anyéṣāṃ yā́ śatakrato

translation.text: When thou hast mounted on thy car let thy yoked Bay Steeds carry thee, Past other men's libations, Lord of Hundred Powers, thee, Vr̥itra-slayer, thee our Friend.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒स्माक॑म॒द्यान्त॑मं॒ स्तोमं॑ धिष्व महामह अ॒स्माकं॑ ते॒ सव॑ना सन्तु॒ शंत॑मा॒ मदा॑य द्युक्ष सोमपाः
verses.transliteration: asmā́kam adyā́ntamaṃ  stómaṃ dhiṣva mahāmaha  asmā́kaṃ te sávanā santu śáṃtamā  mádāya dyukṣa somapāḥ

translation.text: O thou Most Lofty One, accept our laud as nearest to thine heart. May our libations be most sweet to make thee glad, O Soma-drinker, Heavenly Lord.

verses.sanskrit_deva: न॒हि षस्तव॒ नो मम॑ शा॒स्त्रे अ॒न्यस्य॒ रण्य॑ति यो अ॒स्मान्वी॒र आन॑यत्
verses.transliteration: nahí ṣás táva nó máma  śāstré anyásya ráṇyati  yó asmā́n vīrá ā́nayat

translation.text: Neither in thy decree nor mine, but in another's he delights,– The man who brought us unto this.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्र॑श्चिद्घा॒ तद॑ब्रवीत्स्त्रि॒या अ॑शा॒स्यं मनः॑ उ॒तो अह॒ क्रतुं॑ र॒घुम्
verses.transliteration: índraś cid ghā tád abravīt  striyā́ aśāsyám mánaḥ  utó áha krátuṃ raghúm

translation.text: Indra himself hath said, The mind of woman brooks not discipline, Her intellect hath little weight.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सप्ती॑ चिद्घा मद॒च्युता॑ मिथु॒ना व॑हतो॒ रथ॑म् ए॒वेद्धूर्वृष्ण॒ उत्त॑रा
verses.transliteration: sáptī cid ghā madacyútā  mithunā́ vahato rátham  evéd dhū́r vŕ̥ṣṇa úttarā

translation.text: His pair of horses, rushing on in their wild transport, draw his car: High-lifted is the stallion's yoke.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒धः प॑श्यस्व॒ मोपरि॑ संत॒रां पा॑द॒कौ ह॑र मा ते॑ कशप्ल॒कौ दृ॑श॒न्त्स्त्री हि ब्र॒ह्मा ब॒भूवि॑थ
verses.transliteration: adháḥ paśyasva mópári  saṃtarā́m pādakaú hara  mā́ te kaśaplakaú dr̥śan  strī́ hí brahmā́ babhū́vitha

translation.text: Cast down thine eyes and look not up. More closely set thy feet. Let none See what thy garment veils, for thou, a Brahman, hast become a dame.

verses.sanskrit_deva: एन्द्र॑ याहि॒ हरि॑भि॒रुप॒ कण्व॑स्य सुष्टु॒तिम् दि॒वो अ॒मुष्य॒ शास॑तो॒ दिवं॑ य॒य दि॑वावसो
verses.transliteration: éndra yāhi háribhir  úpa káṇvasya suṣṭutím  divó amúṣya śā́sato  dívaṃ yayá divāvaso

translation.text: Come hither, Indra, with thy Bays, come thou to Kaṇva's eulogy. Ye by command of yonder Dyaus, God bright by day! have gone to heaven.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ त्वा॒ ग्रावा॒ वद॑न्नि॒ह सो॒मी घोषे॑ण यच्छतु दि॒वो अ॒मुष्य॒ शास॑तो॒ दिवं॑ य॒य दि॑वावसो
verses.transliteration: ā́ tvā grā́vā vádann ihá  somī́ ghóṣeṇa yachatu  divó amúṣya śā́sato  dívaṃ yayá divāvaso

translation.text: May the stone draw thee as it speaks, the Soma-stone with ringing voice. Ye by command of yonder Dyaus, God bright by day! have gone to heaven.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अत्रा॒ वि ने॒मिरे॑षा॒मुरां॒ न धू॑नुते॒ वृकः॑ दि॒वो अ॒मुष्य॒ शास॑तो॒ दिवं॑ य॒य दि॑वावसो
verses.transliteration: átrā ví nemír eṣām  úrāṃ ná dhūnute vŕ̥kaḥ  divó amúṣya śā́sato  dívaṃ yayá divāvaso

translation.text: The stones' rim shakes the Soma here like a wolf worrying a sheep. Ye by command of yonder Dyaus, God bright by day! have gone to heaven.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ त्वा॒ कण्वा॑ इ॒हाव॑से॒ हव॑न्ते॒ वाज॑सातये दि॒वो अ॒मुष्य॒ शास॑तो॒ दिवं॑ य॒य दि॑वावसो
verses.transliteration: ā́ tvā káṇvā ihā́vase  hávante vā́jasātaye  divó amúṣya śā́sato  dívaṃ yayá divāvaso

translation.text: The Kaṇvas call thee hitherward for succour and to win the spoil. Ye by command of yonder Dyaus, God bright by day! have gone to heaven.

verses.sanskrit_deva: दधा॑मि ते सु॒तानां॒ वृष्णे॒ न पू॑र्व॒पाय्य॑म् दि॒वो अ॒मुष्य॒ शास॑तो॒ दिवं॑ य॒य दि॑वावसो
verses.transliteration: dádhāmi te sutā́nāṃ  vŕ̥ṣṇe ná pūrvapā́yyam  divó amúṣya śā́sato  dívaṃ yayá divāvaso

translation.text: I set for thee, as for the Strong, the first draught of the juices shed.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स्मत्पु॑रंधिर्न॒ आ ग॑हि वि॒श्वतो॑धीर्न ऊ॒तये॑ दि॒वो अ॒मुष्य॒ शास॑तो॒ दिवं॑ य॒य दि॑वावसो
verses.transliteration: smátpuraṃdhir na ā́ gahi  viśvátodhīr na ūtáye  divó amúṣya śā́sato  dívaṃ yayá divāvaso

translation.text: Come with abundant blessings, come with perfect care to succour us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ नो॑ याहि महेमते॒ सह॑स्रोते॒ शता॑मघ दि॒वो अ॒मुष्य॒ शास॑तो॒ दिवं॑ य॒य दि॑वावसो
verses.transliteration: ā́ no yāhi mahemate  sáhasrote śátāmagha  divó amúṣya śā́sato  dívaṃ yayá divāvaso

translation.text: Come, Lord of lofty thought, who hast infinite wealth and countless aids.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ त्वा॒ होता॒ मनु॑र्हितो देव॒त्रा व॑क्ष॒दीड्यः॑ दि॒वो अ॒मुष्य॒ शास॑तो॒ दिवं॑ य॒य दि॑वावसो
verses.transliteration: ā́ tvā hótā mánurhito  devatrā́ vakṣad ī́ḍyaḥ  divó amúṣya śā́sato  dívaṃ yayá divāvaso

translation.text: Adorable mid Gods, the Priest good to mankind shall bring thee near.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ त्वा॑ मद॒च्युता॒ हरी॑ श्ये॒नं प॒क्षेव॑ वक्षतः दि॒वो अ॒मुष्य॒ शास॑तो॒ दिवं॑ य॒य दि॑वावसो
verses.transliteration: ā́ tvā madacyútā hárī  śyenám pakṣéva vakṣataḥ  divó amúṣya śā́sato  dívaṃ yayá divāvaso

translation.text: As wings the falcon, so thy Bays rushing in joy shall carry thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ या॑ह्य॒र्य आ परि॒ स्वाहा॒ सोम॑स्य पी॒तये॑ दि॒वो अ॒मुष्य॒ शास॑तो॒ दिवं॑ य॒य दि॑वावसो
verses.transliteration: ā́ yāhy aryá ā́ pári  svā́hā sómasya pītáye  divó amúṣya śā́sato  dívaṃ yayá divāvaso

translation.text: Come from the enemy to us, to Svâhâ and the Soma-draught.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ नो॑ या॒ह्युप॑श्रुत्यु॒क्थेषु॑ रणया इ॒ह दि॒वो अ॒मुष्य॒ शास॑तो॒ दिवं॑ य॒य दि॑वावसो
verses.transliteration: ā́ no yāhy úpaśrutī-  ukthéṣu raṇayā ihá  divó amúṣya śā́sato  dívaṃ yayá divāvaso

translation.text: Come hither with thine car inclined to hear, take pleasure in our lauds.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सरू॑पै॒रा सु नो॑ गहि॒ सम्भृ॑तैः॒ सम्भृ॑ताश्वः दि॒वो अ॒मुष्य॒ शास॑तो॒ दिवं॑ य॒य दि॑वावसो
verses.transliteration: sárūpair ā́ sú no gahi  sámbhr̥taiḥ sámbhr̥tāśvaḥ  divó amúṣya śā́sato  dívaṃ yayá divāvaso

translation.text: Lord of well-nourished Horses, come with well-fed Steeds alike in hue.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ या॑हि॒ पर्व॑तेभ्यः समु॒द्रस्याधि॑ वि॒ष्टपः॑ दि॒वो अ॒मुष्य॒ शास॑तो॒ दिवं॑ य॒य दि॑वावसो
verses.transliteration: ā́ yāhi párvatebhyaḥ  samudrásyā́dhi viṣṭápaḥ  divó amúṣya śā́sato  dívaṃ yayá divāvaso

translation.text: Come hither from the mountains, come from regions of the sea of air.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ नो॒ गव्या॒न्यश्व्या॑ स॒हस्रा॑ शूर दर्दृहि दि॒वो अ॒मुष्य॒ शास॑तो॒ दिवं॑ य॒य दि॑वावसो
verses.transliteration: ā́ no gávyāny áśvyā  sahásrā śūra dardr̥hi  divó amúṣya śā́sato  dívaṃ yayá divāvaso

translation.text: Disclose to us O Hero, wealth in thousands both of kine and steeds.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ नः॑ सहस्र॒शो भ॑रा॒युता॑नि श॒तानि॑ च दि॒वो अ॒मुष्य॒ शास॑तो॒ दिवं॑ य॒य दि॑वावसो
verses.transliteration: ā́ naḥ sahasraśó bhara-  -ayútāni śatā́ni ca  divó amúṣya śā́sato  dívaṃ yayá divāvaso

translation.text: Bring riches hitherward to us in hundreds, thousands, myriads. Ye by command of yonder Dyaus, God bright by day! have gone to heaven.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ यदिन्द्र॑श्च॒ दद्व॑हे स॒हस्रं॒ वसु॑रोचिषः ओजि॑ष्ठ॒मश्व्यं॑ प॒शुम्
verses.transliteration: ā́ yád índraś ca dádvahe  sahásraṃ vásurociṣaḥ  ójiṣṭham áśvyam paśúm

translation.text: The thousand steeds, the mightiest troop, which we and Indra have received From Vasurocis as a gift,

verses.sanskrit_deva: य ऋ॒ज्रा वात॑रंहसोऽरु॒षासो॑ रघु॒ष्यदः॑ भ्राज॑न्ते॒ सूर्या॑ इव
verses.transliteration: yá r̥jrā́ vā́taraṃhaso  -aruṣā́so raghuṣyádaḥ  bhrā́jante sū́ryā iva

translation.text: The brown that match the wind in speed, and bright bay coursers fleet of foot, Like Suns, resplendent are they all.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पारा॑वतस्य रा॒तिषु॑ द्र॒वच्च॑क्रेष्वा॒शुषु॑ तिष्ठं॒ वन॑स्य॒ मध्य॒ आ
verses.transliteration: pā́rāvatasya rātíṣu  draváccakreṣv āśúṣu  tíṣṭhaṃ vánasya mádhya ā́

translation.text: Mid the Pârâvata's rich gifts, swift steeds whose wheels run rapidly, I seemed to stand amid a wood.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निनेन्द्रे॑ण॒ वरु॑णेन॒ विष्णु॑नादि॒त्यै रु॒द्रैर्वसु॑भिः सचा॒भुवा॑ स॒जोष॑सा उ॒षसा॒ सूर्ये॑ण च॒ सोमं॑ पिबतमश्विना
verses.transliteration: agnínéndreṇa váruṇena víṣṇunā-  ādityaí rudraír vásubhiḥ sacābhúvā  sajóṣasā uṣásā sū́ryeṇa ca  sómam pibatam aśvinā

translation.text: WITH Agni and with Indra, Vishṇu. Varuṇa, with the Âdityas, Rudras, Vasus, closely leagued; Accordant, of one mind with Sûrya and with Dawn, O Aṣvins, drink the Soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: विश्वा॑भिर्धी॒भिर्भुव॑नेन वाजिना दि॒वा पृ॑थि॒व्याद्रि॑भिः सचा॒भुवा॑ स॒जोष॑सा उ॒षसा॒ सूर्ये॑ण च॒ सोमं॑ पिबतमश्विना
verses.transliteration: víśvābhir dhībhír bhúvanena vājinā  divā́ pr̥thivyā́dribhiḥ sacābhúvā  sajóṣasā uṣásā sū́ryeṇa ca  sómam pibatam aśvinā

translation.text: With all the Holy Thoughts, all being Mighty Ones! in close alliance wil the Mountains, Heaven, and Earth; Accordant. of one mind with Sûrya and with Dawn, O Aṣvins, drink the Soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: विश्वै॑र्दे॒वैस्त्रि॒भिरे॑काद॒शैरि॒हाद्भिर्म॒रुद्भि॒र्भृगु॑भिः सचा॒भुवा॑ स॒जोष॑सा उ॒षसा॒ सूर्ये॑ण च॒ सोमं॑ पिबतमश्विना
verses.transliteration: víśvair devaís tribhír ekādaśaír ihá-  -adbhír marúdbhir bhŕ̥gubhiḥ sacābhúvā  sajóṣasā uṣásā sū́ryeṇa ca  sómam pibatam aśvinā

translation.text: With all the Deities, three times eleven, here, in close alliance with the Maruts, Bhr̥igus, Floods; Accordant, of one mind with Sûrya and with Dawn, O Aṣvins, drink the Soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: जु॒षेथां॑ य॒ज्ञं बोध॑तं॒ हव॑स्य मे॒ विश्वे॒ह दे॑वौ॒ सव॒नाव॑ गच्छतम् स॒जोष॑सा उ॒षसा॒ सूर्ये॑ण॒ चेषं॑ नो वोळ्हमश्विना
verses.transliteration: juṣéthāṃ yajñám bódhataṃ hávasya me  víśvehá devau sávanā́va gachatam  sajóṣasā uṣásā sū́ryeṇa ca  -íṣaṃ no voḷham aśvinā

translation.text: Accept the sacrifice, attend to this my call: come nigh, O ye Twain Gods, to all libations here. Accordant, of one mind with Sûrya and with Dawn, O Aṣvins, bring us strengthening food.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स्तोमं॑ जुषेथां युव॒शेव॑ क॒न्यनां॒ विश्वे॒ह दे॑वौ॒ सव॒नाव॑ गच्छतम् स॒जोष॑सा उ॒षसा॒ सूर्ये॑ण॒ चेषं॑ नो वोळ्हमश्विना
verses.transliteration: stómaṃ juṣethāṃ yuvaśéva kanyánāṃ  víśvehá devau sávanā́va gachatam  sajóṣasā uṣásā sū́ryeṇa ca  -íṣaṃ no voḷham aśvinā

translation.text: Accept our praise-song as a youth accepts a maid. Come nigh, O ye Twain Gods, to all libations here. Accordant, of one mind with Sarya and with Dawn O Aṣvins, bring us strengthening food.

verses.sanskrit_deva: गिरो॑ जुषेथामध्व॒रं जु॑षेथां॒ विश्वे॒ह दे॑वौ॒ सव॒नाव॑ गच्छतम् स॒जोष॑सा उ॒षसा॒ सूर्ये॑ण॒ चेषं॑ नो वोळ्हमश्विना
verses.transliteration: gíro juṣethām adhvaráṃ juṣethāṃ  víśvehá devau sávanā́va gachatam  sajóṣasā uṣásā sū́ryeṇa ca  -íṣaṃ no voḷham aśvinā

translation.text: Accept the songs we sing, accept the solemn rite. Conie nigh, O ye Twain Gods, to all libations here. Accordant, of one mind with Sûrya and with Dawn, O Aṣvins, bring us strengthening food.

verses.sanskrit_deva: हा॒रि॒द्र॒वेव॑ पतथो॒ वनेदुप॒ सोमं॑ सु॒तं म॑हि॒षेवाव॑ गच्छथः स॒जोष॑सा उ॒षसा॒ सूर्ये॑ण च॒ त्रिर्व॒र्तिर्या॑तमश्विना
verses.transliteration: hāridravéva patatho vánéd úpa  sómaṃ sutám mahiṣévā́va gachathaḥ  sajóṣasā uṣásā sū́ryeṇa ca  trír vartír yātam aśvinā

translation.text: Ye fly as starlings fly unto the forest trees; like buffaloes ye seek the Soma we have shed. Accordant, of one mind with Sûrya and with Dawn, come thrice, O Aṣvins, to our home.

verses.sanskrit_deva: हं॒सावि॑व पतथो अध्व॒गावि॑व॒ सोमं॑ सु॒तं म॑हि॒षेवाव॑ गच्छथः स॒जोष॑सा उ॒षसा॒ सूर्ये॑ण च॒ त्रिर्व॒र्तिर्या॑तमश्विना
verses.transliteration: haṃsā́v iva patatho adhvagā́v iva  sómaṃ sutám mahiṣévā́va gachathaḥ  sajóṣasā uṣásā sū́ryeṇa ca  trír vartír yātam aśvinā

translation.text: Ye fly like swans, like those who travel on their way; like buffaloes ye seek the Soma we have shed. Accordant, of one mind with Sûrya and with Dawn, come thrice, O Aṣvins, to our home.

verses.sanskrit_deva: श्ये॒नावि॑व पतथो ह॒व्यदा॑तये॒ सोमं॑ सु॒तं म॑हि॒षेवाव॑ गच्छथः स॒जोष॑सा उ॒षसा॒ सूर्ये॑ण च॒ त्रिर्व॒र्तिर्या॑तमश्विना
verses.transliteration: śyenā́v iva patatho havyádātaye  sómaṃ sutám mahiṣévā́va gachathaḥ  sajóṣasā uṣásā sū́ryeṇa ca  trír vartír yātam aśvinā

translation.text: Ye fly to our oblation like a pair of hawks; like buffaloes ye seek the Soma we have shed. Accordant, of one mind with Sûrya and with Dawn, come thrice, O Aṣvins, to our home.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पिब॑तं च तृप्णु॒तं चा च॑ गच्छतं प्र॒जां च॑ ध॒त्तं द्रवि॑णं च धत्तम् स॒जोष॑सा उ॒षसा॒ सूर्ये॑ण॒ चोर्जं॑ नो धत्तमश्विना
verses.transliteration: píbataṃ ca tr̥pṇutáṃ cā́ ca gachatam  prajā́ṃ ca dhattáṃ dráviṇaṃ ca dhattam  sajóṣasā uṣásā sū́ryeṇa ca  -ū́rjaṃ no dhattam aśvinā

translation.text: Come hitherward and drink and satisfy yourselves, bestow upon us progeny and affluence. Accordant, of one mind with Sûrya and with Dawn, O Aṣvins, grant us vigorous strength.

verses.sanskrit_deva: जय॑तं च॒ प्र स्तु॑तं च॒ प्र चा॑वतं प्र॒जां च॑ ध॒त्तं द्रवि॑णं च धत्तम् स॒जोष॑सा उ॒षसा॒ सूर्ये॑ण॒ चोर्जं॑ नो धत्तमश्विना
verses.transliteration: jáyataṃ ca prá stutaṃ ca prá cāvatam  prajā́ṃ ca dhattáṃ dráviṇaṃ ca dhattam  sajóṣasā uṣásā sū́ryeṇa ca  -ū́rjaṃ no dhattam aśvinā

translation.text: Conquer your foes, protect us, praise your worshippers; bestow upon us progeny and affluence. Accordant, of one mind with Sûrya and with Dawn, O Aṣvins, grant us vigolms strength.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ह॒तं च॒ शत्रू॒न्यत॑तं च मि॒त्रिणः॑ प्र॒जां च॑ ध॒त्तं द्रवि॑णं च धत्तम् स॒जोष॑सा उ॒षसा॒ सूर्ये॑ण॒ चोर्जं॑ नो धत्तमश्विना
verses.transliteration: hatáṃ ca śátrūn yátataṃ ca mitríṇaḥ  prajā́ṃ ca dhattáṃ dráviṇaṃ ca dhattam  sajóṣasā uṣásā sū́ryeṇa ca  -ū́rjaṃ no dhattam aśvinā

translation.text: Slay enemies, animate men whom ye befriend; bestow upon us progeny and aff luence. Accordant, of one mind with Sûrya and with Dawn, O Aṣvins, grant us vigorous strength.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मि॒त्रावरु॑णवन्ता उ॒त धर्म॑वन्ता म॒रुत्व॑न्ता जरि॒तुर्ग॑च्छथो॒ हव॑म् स॒जोष॑सा उ॒षसा॒ सूर्ये॑ण चादि॒त्यैर्या॑तमश्विना
verses.transliteration: mitrā́váruṇavantā utá dhármavantā  marútvantā jaritúr gachatho hávam  sajóṣasā uṣásā sū́ryeṇa ca  -ādityaír yātam aśvinā

translation.text: With Mitra, Varuṇa, Dharma, and the Maruts in your company approach unto your praiser's call. Accordant, of one mind with Sûrya and with Dawn, and with the Âdityas, Aṣvins! come.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अङ्गि॑रस्वन्ता उ॒त विष्णु॑वन्ता म॒रुत्व॑न्ता जरि॒तुर्ग॑च्छथो॒ हव॑म् स॒जोष॑सा उ॒षसा॒ सूर्ये॑ण चादि॒त्यैर्या॑तमश्विना
verses.transliteration: áṅgirasvantā utá víṣṇuvantā  marútvantā jaritúr gachatho hávam  sajóṣasā uṣásā sū́ryeṇa ca  -ādityaír yātam aśvinā

translation.text: With Vishṇu and the Angirases attending you, and with the Maruts come unto your praiser's call. Accordant, of one mind with Sûrya and with Dawn, and with the Âdityas, Aṣvins! come.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ऋ॒भु॒मन्ता॑ वृषणा॒ वाज॑वन्ता म॒रुत्व॑न्ता जरि॒तुर्ग॑च्छथो॒ हव॑म् स॒जोष॑सा उ॒षसा॒ सूर्ये॑ण चादि॒त्यैर्या॑तमश्विना
verses.transliteration: r̥bhumántā vr̥ṣaṇā vā́javantā  marútvantā jaritúr gachatho hávam  sajóṣasā uṣásā sū́ryeṇa ca  -ādityaír yātam aśvinā

translation.text: With R̥ibhus and With Vâjas. O ye Mighty Ones, leagued with the Maruts come ye to your praiser's call. Accordant, of one mind with Sûrya and with Dawn, and with the Âdityas, Aṣvins! come.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ब्रह्म॑ जिन्वतमु॒त जि॑न्वतं॒ धियो॑ ह॒तं रक्षां॑सि॒ सेध॑त॒ममी॑वाः स॒जोष॑सा उ॒षसा॒ सूर्ये॑ण च॒ सोमं॑ सुन्व॒तो अ॑श्विना
verses.transliteration: bráhma jinvatam utá jinvataṃ dhíyo  hatáṃ rákṣāṃsi sédhatam ámīvāḥ  sajóṣasā uṣásā sū́ryeṇa ca  sómaṃ sunvató aśvinā

translation.text: Give spirit to our prayer and animate our thoughts; slay ye the Raksasas and drive away disease. Accordant, of One mind with Sûrya and with Dawn, -the presser's Soma, Aṣvins drink.

verses.sanskrit_deva: क्ष॒त्रं जि॑न्वतमु॒त जि॑न्वतं॒ नॄन्ह॒तं रक्षां॑सि॒ सेध॑त॒ममी॑वाः स॒जोष॑सा उ॒षसा॒ सूर्ये॑ण च॒ सोमं॑ सुन्व॒तो अ॑श्विना
verses.transliteration: kṣatráṃ jinvatam utá jinvataṃ nr̥̄́n  hatáṃ rákṣāṃsi sédhatam ámīvāḥ  sajóṣasā uṣásā sū́ryeṇa ca  sómaṃ sunvató aśvinā

translation.text: Strengthen the Ruling Power, strengthen the men of war; slay ye the Raksasas and drive away disease. Accordant, of one mind with Sûrya and with Dawn, the presser's Soma, Aṣvins drink.

verses.sanskrit_deva: धे॒नूर्जि॑न्वतमु॒त जि॑न्वतं॒ विशो॑ ह॒तं रक्षां॑सि॒ सेध॑त॒ममी॑वाः स॒जोष॑सा उ॒षसा॒ सूर्ये॑ण च॒ सोमं॑ सुन्व॒तो अ॑श्विना
verses.transliteration: dhenū́r jinvatam utá jinvataṃ víśo  hatáṃ rákṣāṃsi sédhatam ámīvāḥ  sajóṣasā uṣásā sū́ryeṇa ca  sómaṃ sunvató aśvinā

translation.text: Give strength unto the milch-kine, give the people strength, slay ye the Raksasas and drive away disease. Accordant, of one mind with Sûrya and with Dawn, the presser's Soma, Aṣvins drink.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अत्रे॑रिव शृणुतं पू॒र्व्यस्तु॑तिं श्या॒वाश्व॑स्य सुन्व॒तो म॑दच्युता स॒जोष॑सा उ॒षसा॒ सूर्ये॑ण॒ चाश्वि॑ना ति॒रोअ॑ह्न्यम्
verses.transliteration: átrer iva śr̥ṇutam pūrvyástutiṃ  śyāvā́śvasya sunvató madacyutā  sajóṣasā uṣásā sū́ryeṇa ca  -áśvinā tiróahnyam

translation.text: As ye heard Atri's earliest eulogy, so hear Ṣyâvâṣva, Soma-presser, ye who reel in joy. Accordant, of one mind with Sûrya and with Dawn, drink juice, O Aṣvins, three days old.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सर्गाँ॑ इव सृजतं सुष्टु॒तीरुप॑ श्या॒वाश्व॑स्य सुन्व॒तो म॑दच्युता स॒जोष॑सा उ॒षसा॒ सूर्ये॑ण॒ चाश्वि॑ना ति॒रोअ॑ह्न्यम्
verses.transliteration: sárgām̐ iva sr̥jataṃ suṣṭutī́r úpa  śyāvā́śvasya sunvató madacyutā  sajóṣasā uṣásā sū́ryeṇa ca  -áśvinā tiróahnyam

translation.text: Further like running streams Ṣyâvâṣva's eulogies who presses out the Soma, ye who reel in joy. Accordant, of one mind with Sûrya and with Dawn, drink juice, O Aṣvins, three days old.

verses.sanskrit_deva: र॒श्मीँरि॑व यच्छतमध्व॒राँ उप॑ श्या॒वाश्व॑स्य सुन्व॒तो म॑दच्युता स॒जोष॑सा उ॒षसा॒ सूर्ये॑ण॒ चाश्वि॑ना ति॒रोअ॑ह्न्यम्
verses.transliteration: raśmī́m̐r iva yachatam adhvarā́m̐ úpa  śyāvā́śvasya sunvató madacyutā  sajóṣasā uṣásā sū́ryeṇa ca  -áśvinā tiróahnyam

translation.text: Seize, as ye grasp the reins, Ṣyâvâṣva's solemn rites who presses out the Soma, ye who reel in joy. Accordant, of one mind with Sûrya and with Dawn, drink juice, O Aṣvins, three days old.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒र्वाग्रथं॒ नि य॑च्छतं॒ पिब॑तं सो॒म्यं मधु॑ आ या॑तमश्वि॒ना ग॑तमव॒स्युर्वा॑म॒हं हु॑वे ध॒त्तं रत्ना॑नि दा॒शुषे॑
verses.transliteration: arvā́g ráthaṃ ní yachatam  píbataṃ somyám mádhu  ā́ yātam aśvinā́ gatam  avasyúr vām aháṃ huve  dhattáṃ rátnāni dāśúṣe

translation.text: Drive down your chariot hitherward drink ye the Soma's savoury juice. Approach, ye Aṣvins, come to us: I call you, eager for your aid. Grant treasures to the worshipper.

verses.sanskrit_deva: न॒मो॒वा॒के प्रस्थि॑ते अध्व॒रे न॑रा वि॒वक्ष॑णस्य पी॒तये॑ आ या॑तमश्वि॒ना ग॑तमव॒स्युर्वा॑म॒हं हु॑वे ध॒त्तं रत्ना॑नि दा॒शुषे॑
verses.transliteration: namovāké prásthite adhvaré narā  vivákṣaṇasya pītáye  ā́ yātam aśvinā́ gatam  avasyúr vām aháṃ huve  dhattáṃ rátnāni dāśúṣe

translation.text: When sacrifice which tells our reverence hath begun. Heroes! to drink the gushing juice, Approach, ye Aṣvins, come to us: I call you, eager for your aid. Grant treasures to the worshipper.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स्वाहा॑कृतस्य तृम्पतं सु॒तस्य॑ देवा॒वन्ध॑सः आ या॑तमश्वि॒ना ग॑तमव॒स्युर्वा॑म॒हं हु॑वे ध॒त्तं रत्ना॑नि दा॒शुषे॑
verses.transliteration: svā́hākr̥tasya tr̥mpataṃ  sutásya devāv ándhasaḥ  ā́ yātam aśvinā́ gatam  avasyúr vām aháṃ huve  dhattáṃ rátnāni dāśúṣe

translation.text: Sate you with consecrated drink, with juice effused, ye Deities. Approach, ye Aṣvins, come to us: I call you, eager for your aid. Grant treasures to the worshipper.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒वि॒तासि॑ सुन्व॒तो वृ॒क्तब॑र्हिषः॒ पिबा॒ सोमं॒ मदा॑य॒ कं श॑तक्रतो यं ते॑ भा॒गमधा॑रय॒न्विश्वाः॑ सेहा॒नः पृत॑ना उ॒रु ज्रयः॒ सम॑प्सु॒जिन्म॒रुत्वाँ॑ इन्द्र सत्पते
verses.transliteration: avitā́si sunvató vr̥ktábarhiṣaḥ  píbā sómam mádāya káṃ  śatakrato  yáṃ te bhāgám ádhārayan  víśvāḥ sehānáḥ pŕ̥tanā urú jráyaḥ  sám apsujít  marútvām̐ indra satpate

translation.text: THOU helpest him whose grass is trimmed, who sheds the juice, O Ṣatakratu, drink Soma to make thee glad. The share which they have fixed for thee, thou, Indra, Victor o'er all hosts and space, begirt with Maruts, Lord of Heroes, winner of the floods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्राव॑ स्तो॒तारं॑ मघव॒न्नव॒ त्वां पिबा॒ सोमं॒ मदा॑य॒ कं श॑तक्रतो यं ते॑ भा॒गमधा॑रय॒न्विश्वाः॑ सेहा॒नः पृत॑ना उ॒रु ज्रयः॒ सम॑प्सु॒जिन्म॒रुत्वाँ॑ इन्द्र सत्पते
verses.transliteration: prā́va stotā́ram maghavann áva tvā́m  píbā sómam mádāya káṃ  śatakrato  yáṃ te bhāgám ádhārayan  víśvāḥ sehānáḥ pŕ̥tanā urú jráyaḥ  sám apsujít  marútvām̐ indra satpate

translation.text: Maghavan, help thy worshipper: let him help thee. O Ṣatakratu, drink Soma to make thee glad. The share which they have fixed for thee, etc.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ऊ॒र्जा दे॒वाँ अव॒स्योज॑सा॒ त्वां पिबा॒ सोमं॒ मदा॑य॒ कं श॑तक्रतो यं ते॑ भा॒गमधा॑रय॒न्विश्वाः॑ सेहा॒नः पृत॑ना उ॒रु ज्रयः॒ सम॑प्सु॒जिन्म॒रुत्वाँ॑ इन्द्र सत्पते
verses.transliteration: ūrjā́ devā́m̐ ávasy ójasā tvā́m  píbā sómam mádāya káṃ  śatakrato  yáṃ te bhāgám ádhārayan  víśvāḥ sehānáḥ pŕ̥tanā urú jráyaḥ  sám apsujít  marútvām̐ indra satpate

translation.text: Thou aidest Gods with food, and that with might aidg thee, O Ṣatakratu, drink Soma to make thee glad.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ज॒नि॒ता दि॒वो ज॑नि॒ता पृ॑थि॒व्याः पिबा॒ सोमं॒ मदा॑य॒ कं श॑तक्रतो यं ते॑ भा॒गमधा॑रय॒न्विश्वाः॑ सेहा॒नः पृत॑ना उ॒रु ज्रयः॒ सम॑प्सु॒जिन्म॒रुत्वाँ॑ इन्द्र सत्पते
verses.transliteration: janitā́ divó janitā́ pr̥thivyā́ḥ  píbā sómam mádāya káṃ  śatakrato  yáṃ te bhāgám ádhārayan  víśvāḥ sehānáḥ pŕ̥tanā urú jráyaḥ  sám apsujít  marútvām̐ indra satpate

translation.text: Creator of the heaven, creator of the earth, O Ṣatakratu, drink Soma to make thee glad.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ज॒नि॒ताश्वा॑नां जनि॒ता गवा॑मसि॒ पिबा॒ सोमं॒ मदा॑य॒ कं श॑तक्रतो यं ते॑ भा॒गमधा॑रय॒न्विश्वाः॑ सेहा॒नः पृत॑ना उ॒रु ज्रयः॒ सम॑प्सु॒जिन्म॒रुत्वाँ॑ इन्द्र सत्पते
verses.transliteration: janitā́śvānāṃ janitā́ gávām asi  píbā sómam mádāya káṃ  śatakrato  yáṃ te bhāgám ádhārayan  víśvāḥ sehānáḥ pŕ̥tanā urú jráyaḥ  sám apsujít  marútvām̐ indra satpate

translation.text: Father of cattle, father of all steeds art thou. O Ṣatakratu, drink Soma to make thee glad.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अत्री॑णां॒ स्तोम॑मद्रिवो म॒हस्कृ॑धि॒ पिबा॒ सोमं॒ मदा॑य॒ कं श॑तक्रतो यं ते॑ भा॒गमधा॑रय॒न्विश्वाः॑ सेहा॒नः पृत॑ना उ॒रु ज्रयः॒ सम॑प्सु॒जिन्म॒रुत्वाँ॑ इन्द्र सत्पते
verses.transliteration: átrīṇāṃ stómam adrivo mahás kr̥dhi  píbā sómam mádāya káṃ  śatakrato  yáṃ te bhāgám ádhārayan  víśvāḥ sehānáḥ pŕ̥tanā urú jráyaḥ  sám apsujít  marútvām̐ indra satpate

translation.text: Stone-hurler, glorify the Atris' hymn of praise. O Ṣatakratu, drink Soma to make thee glad.

verses.sanskrit_deva: श्या॒वाश्व॑स्य सुन्व॒तस्तथा॑ शृणु॒ यथाशृ॑णो॒रत्रेः॒ कर्मा॑णि कृण्व॒तः प्र त्र॒सद॑स्युमाविथ॒ त्वमेक॒ इन्नृ॒षाह्य॒ इन्द्र॒ ब्रह्मा॑णि व॒र्धय॑न्
verses.transliteration: śyāvā́śvasya sunvatás táthā śr̥ṇu  yáthā́śr̥ṇor átreḥ kármāṇi kr̥ṇvatáḥ  prá trasádasyum āvitha tvám éka ít-  nr̥ṣā́hye-  índra bráhmāṇi vardháyan

translation.text: Hear thou Ṣyâvâṣva while he pours to thee, as erst thou heardest Atri when he wrought his holy rites. Indra, thou only gavest Trasadasyu aid in the fierce fight with heroes, strengthening his prayers.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्रेदं ब्रह्म॑ वृत्र॒तूर्ये॑ष्वाविथ॒ प्र सु॑न्व॒तः श॑चीपत॒ इन्द्र॒ विश्वा॑भिरू॒तिभिः॑ माध्यं॑दिनस्य॒ सव॑नस्य वृत्रहन्ननेद्य॒ पिबा॒ सोम॑स्य वज्रिवः
verses.transliteration: prédám bráhma vr̥tratū́ryeṣv āvitha  prá sunvatáḥ  śacīpate-  índra víśvābhir ūtíbhir  mā́dhyaṃdinasya sávanasya vr̥trahann  anedya  píbā sómasya vajrivaḥ

translation.text: THIS prayer, and those who shed the juice, in wars with Vr̥itra thou holpest, Indra, Lord of Strength, with all thy succours. O Vr̥itra-slayer, from libation poured at noon, drink of the Soma juice, thou blameless Thunderer.

verses.sanskrit_deva: से॒हा॒न उ॑ग्र॒ पृत॑ना अ॒भि द्रुहः॑ शचीपत॒ इन्द्र॒ विश्वा॑भिरू॒तिभिः॑ माध्यं॑दिनस्य॒ सव॑नस्य वृत्रहन्ननेद्य॒ पिबा॒ सोम॑स्य वज्रिवः
verses.transliteration: sehāná ugra pŕ̥tanā abhí drúhaḥ  śacīpate-  índra víśvābhir ūtíbhir  mā́dhyaṃdinasya sávanasya vr̥trahann  anedya  píbā sómasya vajrivaḥ

translation.text: Thou mighty Conqueror of hostile armaments, O Indra, Lord of Strength, with all thy saving help.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒क॒राळ॒स्य भुव॑नस्य राजसि शचीपत॒ इन्द्र॒ विश्वा॑भिरू॒तिभिः॑ माध्यं॑दिनस्य॒ सव॑नस्य वृत्रहन्ननेद्य॒ पिबा॒ सोम॑स्य वज्रिवः
verses.transliteration: ekarā́ḷ asyá bhúvanasya rājasi  śacīpate-  índra víśvābhir ūtíbhir  mā́dhyaṃdinasya sávanasya vr̥trahann  anedya  píbā sómasya vajrivaḥ

translation.text: Sole Ruler, thou art Sovran of this world of life, O Indra, Lord of Strength, with all thy saving help.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स॒स्थावा॑ना यवयसि॒ त्वमेक॒ इच्छ॑चीपत॒ इन्द्र॒ विश्वा॑भिरू॒तिभिः॑ माध्यं॑दिनस्य॒ सव॑नस्य वृत्रहन्ननेद्य॒ पिबा॒ सोम॑स्य वज्रिवः
verses.transliteration: sasthā́vānā yavayasi tvám éka íc  śacīpate-  índra víśvābhir ūtíbhir  mā́dhyaṃdinasya sávanasya vr̥trahann  anedya  píbā sómasya vajrivaḥ

translation.text: Thou only sunderest these two consistent worlds, O Indra, Lord of Strength, with all thy saving help.

verses.sanskrit_deva: क्षेम॑स्य च प्र॒युज॑श्च॒ त्वमी॑शिषे शचीपत॒ इन्द्र॒ विश्वा॑भिरू॒तिभिः॑ माध्यं॑दिनस्य॒ सव॑नस्य वृत्रहन्ननेद्य॒ पिबा॒ सोम॑स्य वज्रिवः
verses.transliteration: kṣémasya ca prayújaś ca tvám īśiṣe  śacīpate-  índra víśvābhir ūtíbhir  mā́dhyaṃdinasya sávanasya vr̥trahann  anedya  píbā sómasya vajrivaḥ

translation.text: Thou art the Lord supreme o'er rest and energy, O Indra, Lord of Strength, with all thy saving help.

verses.sanskrit_deva: क्ष॒त्राय॑ त्व॒मव॑सि॒ न त्व॑माविथ शचीपत॒ इन्द्र॒ विश्वा॑भिरू॒तिभिः॑ माध्यं॑दिनस्य॒ सव॑नस्य वृत्रहन्ननेद्य॒ पिबा॒ सोम॑स्य वज्रिवः
verses.transliteration: kṣatrā́ya tvam ávasi ná tvam āvitha  śacīpate-  índra víśvābhir ūtíbhir  mā́dhyaṃdinasya sávanasya vr̥trahann  anedya  píbā sómasya vajrivaḥ

translation.text: Thou helpest one to power, and one thou hast not helped, O Indra, Lord of Strength, with all thy saving aid.

verses.sanskrit_deva: श्या॒वाश्व॑स्य॒ रेभ॑त॒स्तथा॑ शृणु॒ यथाशृ॑णो॒रत्रेः॒ कर्मा॑णि कृण्व॒तः प्र त्र॒सद॑स्युमाविथ॒ त्वमेक॒ इन्नृ॒षाह्य॒ इन्द्र॑ क्ष॒त्राणि॑ व॒र्धय॑न्
verses.transliteration: śyāvā́śvasya rébhatas táthā śr̥ṇu  yáthā́śr̥ṇor átreḥ kármāṇi kr̥ṇvatáḥ  prá trasádasyum āvitha tvám éka ít-  nr̥ṣā́hye-  índra kṣatrā́ṇi vardháyan

translation.text: Hear thou Ṣyâvâṣva while he sings to thee, as erst thou heardest Atri when he wrought his holy rites. Indra, thou only gavest Trasadasyu aid in the fierce fight with heroes, strengthening his powers.

verses.sanskrit_deva: य॒ज्ञस्य॒ हि स्थ ऋ॒त्विजा॒ सस्नी॒ वाजे॑षु॒ कर्म॑सु इन्द्रा॑ग्नी॒ तस्य॑ बोधतम्
verses.transliteration: yajñásya hí sthá r̥tvíjā  sásnī vā́jeṣu kármasu  índrāgnī tásya bodhatam

translation.text: YE Twain are Priests of sacrifice, wmners in war and holy works: Indra and Agni, mark this well.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तो॒शासा॑ रथ॒यावा॑ना वृत्र॒हणाप॑राजिता इन्द्रा॑ग्नी॒ तस्य॑ बोधतम्
verses.transliteration: tośā́sā rathayā́vānā  vr̥traháṇā́parājitā  índrāgnī tásya bodhatam

translation.text: Ye bounteous riders on the car, ye Vr̥itra-slayers unsubdued: Indra and Agni, mark this well.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒दं वां॑ मदि॒रं मध्वधु॑क्ष॒न्नद्रि॑भि॒र्नरः॑ इन्द्रा॑ग्नी॒ तस्य॑ बोधतम्
verses.transliteration: idáṃ vām madirám mádhu-  ádhukṣann ádribhir náraḥ  índrāgnī tásya bodhatam

translation.text: The men with pressing-stones have pressed this meath of yours which gives delight: Indra, and Agni, mark this well.

verses.sanskrit_deva: जु॒षेथां॑ य॒ज्ञमि॒ष्टये॑ सु॒तं सोमं॑ सधस्तुती इन्द्रा॑ग्नी॒ आ ग॑तं नरा
verses.transliteration: juṣéthāṃ yajñám iṣṭáye  sutáṃ sómaṃ sadhastutī  índrāgnī ā́ gataṃ narā

translation.text: Accept our sacrifice for weal, sharers of praise! the Soma shed: Indra and Agni, Heroes, come.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒मा जु॑षेथां॒ सव॑ना॒ येभि॑र्ह॒व्यान्यू॒हथुः॑ इन्द्रा॑ग्नी॒ आ ग॑तं नरा
verses.transliteration: imā́ juṣethāṃ sávanā  yébhir havyā́ny ūháthuḥ  índrāgnī ā́ gataṃ narā

translation.text: Be pleased with these libations which attract you to our sacred gifts Indra and Agni, Heroes, come.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒मां गा॑य॒त्रव॑र्तनिं जु॒षेथां॑ सुष्टु॒तिं मम॑ इन्द्रा॑ग्नी॒ आ ग॑तं नरा
verses.transliteration: imā́ṃ gāyatrávartaniṃ  juṣéthāṃ suṣṭutím máma  índrāgnī ā́ gataṃ narā

translation.text: Accept this eulogy of mine whose model is the Gâyatrî: Indra and Agni, Heroes, Come.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्रा॒त॒र्याव॑भि॒रा ग॑तं दे॒वेभि॑र्जेन्यावसू इन्द्रा॑ग्नी॒ सोम॑पीतये
verses.transliteration: prātaryā́vabhir ā́ gataṃ  devébhir jenyāvasū  índrāgnī sómapītaye

translation.text: Come with the early-faring Gods, ye who are Lords of genuine wealth: Indra-Agni, to the Soma-draught

verses.sanskrit_deva: श्या॒वाश्व॑स्य सुन्व॒तोऽत्री॑णां शृणुतं॒ हव॑म् इन्द्रा॑ग्नी॒ सोम॑पीतये
verses.transliteration: śyāvā́śvasya sunvató  -átrīṇāṃ śr̥ṇutaṃ hávam  índrāgnī sómapītaye

translation.text: Hear ye the call of Atris, hear Ṣyâvâṣva as he sheds the juice: Indra-Agni to the Soma-draught

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒वा वा॑मह्व ऊ॒तये॒ यथाहु॑वन्त॒ मेधि॑राः इन्द्रा॑ग्नी॒ सोम॑पीतये
verses.transliteration: evā́ vām ahva ūtáye  yáthā́huvanta médhirāḥ  índrāgnī sómapītaye

translation.text: Thus have I called you to our aid as sages called on you of old: Indra-Agni to the Soma draught!

verses.sanskrit_deva: आहं सर॑स्वतीवतोरिन्द्रा॒ग्न्योरवो॑ वृणे याभ्यां॑ गाय॒त्रमृ॒च्यते॑
verses.transliteration: ā́háṃ sárasvatīvator  indrāgnyór ávo vr̥ṇe  yā́bhyāṃ gāyatrám r̥cyáte

translation.text: Indra's and Agni's grace I claim, Sarasvatî's associates To whom this psalm of praise is sung.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निम॑स्तोष्यृ॒ग्मिय॑म॒ग्निमी॒ळा य॒जध्यै॑ अ॒ग्निर्दे॒वाँ अ॑नक्तु न उ॒भे हि वि॒दथे॑ क॒विर॒न्तश्चर॑ति दू॒त्यं१॒॑ नभ॑न्तामन्य॒के स॑मे
verses.transliteration: agním astoṣy r̥gmíyam  agním īḷā́ yajádhyai  agnír devā́m̐ anaktu naḥ-  ubhé hí vidáthe kavír  antáś cárati dūtyàṃ  nábhantām anyaké same

translation.text: THE glorious Agni have I praised, and worshipped with. the sacred food. May Agni deck the Gods for us. Between both gathering-places he goes on his embassy, the Sage. May all the others die away.

verses.sanskrit_deva: न्य॑ग्ने॒ नव्य॑सा॒ वच॑स्त॒नूषु॒ शंस॑मेषाम् न्यरा॑ती॒ ररा॑व्णां॒ विश्वा॑ अ॒र्यो अरा॑तीरि॒तो यु॑च्छन्त्वा॒मुरो॒ नभ॑न्तामन्य॒के स॑मे
verses.transliteration: ny àgne návyasā vácas  tanū́ṣu śáṃsam eṣām  ny árātīr árāvṇāṃ  víśvā aryó árātīr  itó yuchantv āmúro  nábhantām anyaké same

translation.text: Agni, burn down the word within their bodies through our newest speech, All hatreds of the godless, all the wicked man's malignities. Away let the destroyers go. May all the others die away.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अग्ने॒ मन्मा॑नि॒ तुभ्यं॒ कं घृ॒तं न जु॑ह्व आ॒सनि॑ स दे॒वेषु॒ प्र चि॑किद्धि॒ त्वं ह्यसि॑ पू॒र्व्यः शि॒वो दू॒तो वि॒वस्व॑तो॒ नभ॑न्तामन्य॒के स॑मे
verses.transliteration: ágne mánmāni túbhyaṃ káṃ  ghr̥táṃ ná juhva āsáni  sá devéṣu prá cikiddhi  tváṃ hy ási pūrvyáḥ  śivó dūtó vivásvato  nábhantām anyaké same

translation.text: Agni, I offer hymns to thee, like holy oil within thy moutlh. Acknowledge them. among the Gods, for thou art the rmost excellent, the worshipper's blissful messenger. Let all the others die away.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तत्त॑द॒ग्निर्वयो॑ दधे॒ यथा॑यथा कृप॒ण्यति॑ ऊ॒र्जाहु॑ति॒र्वसू॑नां॒ शं च॒ योश्च॒ मयो॑ दधे॒ विश्व॑स्यै दे॒वहू॑त्यै॒ नभ॑न्तामन्य॒के स॑मे
verses.transliteration: tát-tad agnír váyo dadhe  yáthā-yathā kr̥paṇyáti  ūrjā́hutir vásūnāṃ  śáṃ ca yóś ca máyo dadhe  víśvasyai deváhūtyai  nábhantām anyaké same

translation.text: Agni bestows all vital power even as each man supplicates. He brings the Vasus strengthening gifts, and grants deliglht, in rest and stir, for every calling on the Gods. Let all the others die away.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स चि॑केत॒ सही॑यसा॒ग्निश्चि॒त्रेण॒ कर्म॑णा स होता॒ शश्व॑तीनां॒ दक्षि॑णाभिर॒भीवृ॑त इ॒नोति॑ च प्रती॒व्यं१॒॑ नभ॑न्तामन्य॒के स॑मे
verses.transliteration: sá ciketa sáhīyasā-  -agníś citréṇa kármaṇā  sá hótā śáśvatīnāṃ  dákṣiṇābhir abhī́vr̥taḥ-  inóti ca pratīvyàṃ  nábhantām anyaké same

translation.text: Agni hath made himself renowned by wonderful victorious act. He is the Priest of all the tribes, chosen with sacrificial meeds. He urges Deities to receive. Let all the others die away.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निर्जा॒ता दे॒वाना॑म॒ग्निर्वे॑द॒ मर्ता॑नामपी॒च्य॑म् अ॒ग्निः स द्र॑विणो॒दा अ॒ग्निर्द्वारा॒ व्यू॑र्णुते॒ स्वा॑हुतो॒ नवी॑यसा॒ नभ॑न्तामन्य॒के स॑मे
verses.transliteration: agnír jātā́ devā́nām  agnír veda mártānām  apīcyàm  agníḥ sá draviṇodā́ḥ-  agnír dvā́rā vy ū̀rṇute  svā̀huto návīyasā  nábhantām anyaké same

translation.text: Agni knows all that springs from Gods, he knows the mystery of men. Giver of wealth is Agni, he uncloses both the doors to us when worshipped with our newest gift. Let all the others die away.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निर्दे॒वेषु॒ संव॑सुः॒ स वि॒क्षु य॒ज्ञिया॒स्वा स मु॒दा काव्या॑ पु॒रु विश्वं॒ भूमे॑व पुष्यति दे॒वो दे॒वेषु॑ य॒ज्ञियो॒ नभ॑न्तामन्य॒के स॑मे
verses.transliteration: agnír devéṣu sáṃvasuḥ  sá vikṣú yajñíyāsv ā́  sá mudā́ kā́vyā purú  víśvam bhū́meva puṣyati  devó devéṣu yajñíyaḥ  nábhantām anyaké same

translation.text: Agni inhabiteth with Gods and men who offer sacrifice. He cherisheth with great delight much wisdom, as all things that be, God among Gods adorable. May all the others die away.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यो अ॒ग्निः स॒प्तमा॑नुषः श्रि॒तो विश्वे॑षु॒ सिन्धु॑षु तमाग॑न्म त्रिप॒स्त्यं म॑न्धा॒तुर्द॑स्यु॒हन्त॑मम॒ग्निं य॒ज्ञेषु॑ पू॒र्व्यं नभ॑न्तामन्य॒के स॑मे
verses.transliteration: yó agníḥ saptámānuṣaḥ  śritó víśveṣu síndhuṣu  tám ā́ganma tripastyám  mandhātúr dasyuhántamam  agníṃ yajñéṣu pūrvyám  nábhantām anyaké same

translation.text: Agni who liveth in all streams, Lord of the Sevenfold Race of men, Him dweller in three homes we seek, best slayer of the Dasytis for Mandhâtar, first in sacrifice. Let all the others die away.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निस्त्रीणि॑ त्रि॒धातू॒न्या क्षे॑ति वि॒दथा॑ क॒विः स त्रीँरे॑काद॒शाँ इ॒ह यक्ष॑च्च पि॒प्रय॑च्च नो॒ विप्रो॑ दू॒तः परि॑ष्कृतो॒ नभ॑न्तामन्य॒के स॑मे
verses.transliteration: agnís trī́ṇi tridhā́tūni-  ā́ kṣeti vidáthā kavíḥ  sá trī́m̐r ekādaśā́m̐ ihá  yákṣac ca pipráyac ca no  vípro dūtáḥ páriṣkr̥to  nábhantām anyaké same

translation.text: Agni the Wise inhabiteth three gathering-places, triply formed. Decked as our envoy let the Sage bring hither and conciliate the Thrice Eleven Deities. Let all the others die away.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं नो॑ अग्न आ॒युषु॒ त्वं दे॒वेषु॑ पूर्व्य॒ वस्व॒ एक॑ इरज्यसि त्वामापः॑ परि॒स्रुतः॒ परि॑ यन्ति॒ स्वसे॑तवो॒ नभ॑न्तामन्य॒के स॑मे
verses.transliteration: tváṃ no agna āyúṣu  tváṃ devéṣu pūrvya  vásva éka irajyasi  tvā́m ā́paḥ parisrútaḥ  pári yanti svásetavo  nábhantām anyaké same

translation.text: Our Agni, thou art first among the Gods, and first mid living men. Thou only rulest over wealth. Round about thee, as natural dams, circumfluous the waters run. Let all the others die away.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्रा॑ग्नी यु॒वं सु नः॒ सह॑न्ता॒ दास॑थो र॒यिम् येन॑ दृ॒ळ्हा स॒मत्स्वा वी॒ळु चि॑त्साहिषी॒मह्य॒ग्निर्वने॑व॒ वात॒ इन्नभ॑न्तामन्य॒के स॑मे
verses.transliteration: índrāgnī yuváṃ sú naḥ  sáhantā dā́satho rayím  yéna dr̥ḷhā́ samátsv~ā́  vīḷú cit sāhiṣīmáhi-  agnír váneva vā́ta ít-  nábhantām anyaké same

translation.text: INDRA and Agni, surely ye as Conquerors will give us wealth, Whereby in fight we may o'ercome that which is strong and firmly fixed, as Agni burns the woods with wind. Let all the others die away.

verses.sanskrit_deva: न॒हि वां॑ व॒व्रया॑म॒हेऽथेन्द्र॒मिद्य॑जामहे॒ शवि॑ष्ठं नृ॒णां नर॑म् स नः॑ क॒दा चि॒दर्व॑ता॒ गम॒दा वाज॑सातये॒ गम॒दा मे॒धसा॑तये॒ नभ॑न्तामन्य॒के स॑मे
verses.transliteration: nahí vāṃ vavráyāmahe-  -áthéndram íd yajāmahe  śáviṣṭhaṃ nr̥ṇā́ṃ náram  sá naḥ kadā́ cid árvatā  gámad ā́ vā́jasātaye  gámad ā́ medhásātaye  nábhantām anyaké same

translation.text: We set no snares to tangle you; Indra we worship and adore, Hero of heroes mightiest. Once may he come unto us with his Steed, come unto us to win us strength, and to complete the sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ता हि मध्यं॒ भरा॑णामिन्द्रा॒ग्नी अ॑धिक्षि॒तः ता उ॑ कवित्व॒ना क॒वी पृ॒च्छ्यमा॑ना सखीय॒ते सं धी॒तम॑श्नुतं नरा॒ नभ॑न्तामन्य॒के स॑मे
verses.transliteration: tā́ hí mádhyam bhárāṇām  indrāgnī́ adhikṣitáḥ  tā́ u kavitvanā́ kavī́  pr̥chyámānā sakhīyaté  sáṃ dhītám aśnutaṃ narā  nábhantām anyaké same

translation.text: For, famous Indra-Agni, ye are dwellers in the midst of frays. Sages in wisdom, ye are knit to him who seeketh you as friends. Heroes, bestow on him his wish.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भ्य॑र्च नभाक॒वदि॑न्द्रा॒ग्नी य॒जसा॑ गि॒रा ययो॒र्विश्व॑मि॒दं जग॑दि॒यं द्यौः पृ॑थि॒वी म॒ह्यु१॒॑पस्थे॑ बिभृ॒तो वसु॒ नभ॑न्तामन्य॒के स॑मे
verses.transliteration: abhy àrca nabhākavád  indrāgnī́ yajásā girā́  yáyor víśvam idáṃ jágad  iyáṃ dyaúḥ pr̥thivī́ mahī́-  -upásthe bibhr̥tó vásu  nábhantām anyaké same

translation.text: Nabhâka-like, with sacred song Indra's and Agni's praise I sing, Theirs to whom all this world belongs, this heaven and this mighty earth which bear rich treasure in their lap.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र ब्रह्मा॑णि नभाक॒वदि॑न्द्रा॒ग्निभ्या॑मिरज्यत या स॒प्तबु॑ध्नमर्ण॒वं जि॒ह्मबा॑रमपोर्णु॒त इन्द्र॒ ईशा॑न॒ ओज॑सा॒ नभ॑न्तामन्य॒के स॑मे
verses.transliteration: prá bráhmāṇi nabhākavád  indrāgníbhyām irajyata  yā́ saptábudhnam arṇaváṃ  jihmábāram aporṇutáḥ-  índra ī́śāna ójasā  nábhantām anyaké same

translation.text: To Indra and to Agni send your prayers, as was Nabhâka's wont,– Who oped with sideway opening the sea with its foundations seven-Indra all powerful in his might.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अपि॑ वृश्च पुराण॒वद्व्र॒तते॑रिव गुष्पि॒तमोजो॑ दा॒सस्य॑ दम्भय व॒यं तद॑स्य॒ सम्भृ॑तं॒ वस्विन्द्रे॑ण॒ वि भ॑जेमहि॒ नभ॑न्तामन्य॒के स॑मे
verses.transliteration: ápi vr̥śca purāṇavád  vratáter iva guṣpitám  ójo dāsásya dambhaya  vayáṃ tád asya sámbhr̥taṃ vásu-  índreṇa ví bhajemahi  nábhantām anyaké same

translation.text: Tear thou asunder, as of old, like tangles of a creeping plant, Demolish thou the Dâsa's might. May we with Indra's help divide the treasure he hath gathered up.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यदि॑न्द्रा॒ग्नी जना॑ इ॒मे वि॒ह्वय॑न्ते॒ तना॑ गि॒रा अ॒स्माके॑भि॒र्नृभि॑र्व॒यं सा॑स॒ह्याम॑ पृतन्य॒तो व॑नु॒याम॑ वनुष्य॒तो नभ॑न्तामन्य॒के स॑मे
verses.transliteration: yád indrāgnī́ jánā imé  vihváyante tánā girā́  asmā́kebhir nŕ̥bhir vayáṃ  sāsahyā́ma pr̥tanyatáḥ  vanuyā́ma vanuṣyatáḥ  nábhantām anyaké same

translation.text: What time with this same song these men call Indra-Agni sundry ways, May we with our own heroes quell those who provoke us to the fight, and conquer those who strive with us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: या नु श्वे॒ताव॒वो दि॒व उ॒च्चरा॑त॒ उप॒ द्युभिः॑ इ॒न्द्रा॒ग्न्योरनु॑ व्र॒तमुहा॑ना यन्ति॒ सिन्ध॑वो॒ यान्त्सीं॑ ब॒न्धादमु॑ञ्चतां॒ नभ॑न्तामन्य॒के स॑मे
verses.transliteration: yā́ nú śvetā́v avó diváḥ-  uccárāta úpa dyúbhiḥ  indrāgnyór ánu vratám  úhānā yanti síndhavo  yā́n sīm bandhā́d ámuñcatāṃ  nábhantām anyaké same

translation.text: The Two refulgent with their beams rise and come downward from the sky. By Indra's and by Agni's hest, flowing away, the rivers, run which they released from their restraint.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पू॒र्वीष्ट॑ इ॒न्द्रोप॑मातयः पू॒र्वीरु॒त प्रश॑स्तयः॒ सूनो॑ हि॒न्वस्य॑ हरिवः वस्वो॑ वी॒रस्या॒पृचो॒ या नु साध॑न्त नो॒ धियो॒ नभ॑न्तामन्य॒के स॑मे
verses.transliteration: pūrvī́ṣ ṭa indrópamātayaḥ  pūrvī́r utá práśastayaḥ  sū́no hinvásya harivaḥ  vásvo vīrásyāpŕ̥co  yā́ nú sā́dhanta no dhíyo  nábhantām anyaké same

translation.text: O Indra, many are thine aids, many thy ways of guiding us, Lord of the Bay Steeds, Hinva's Son. To a Good Hero come our prayers, which soon shall have accomplishment.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तं शि॑शीता सुवृ॒क्तिभि॑स्त्वे॒षं सत्वा॑नमृ॒ग्मिय॑म् उ॒तो नु चि॒द्य ओज॑सा॒ शुष्ण॑स्या॒ण्डानि॒ भेद॑ति॒ जेष॒त्स्व॑र्वतीर॒पो नभ॑न्तामन्य॒के स॑मे
verses.transliteration: táṃ śiśītā suvr̥ktíbhis  tveṣáṃ sátvānam r̥gmíyam  utó nú cid yá ójasā  śúṣṇasyāṇḍā́ni bhédati  jéṣat svàrvatīr apó  nábhantām anyaké same

translation.text: Inspire him with your holy hymns, the Hero bright and glorious, Him who with might demolisbeth even the brood of Ṣushṇa, and winneth for us the heavenly streams.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तं शि॑शीता स्वध्व॒रं स॒त्यं सत्वा॑नमृ॒त्विय॑म् उ॒तो नु चि॒द्य ओह॑त आ॒ण्डा शुष्ण॑स्य॒ भेद॒त्यजैः॒ स्व॑र्वतीर॒पो नभ॑न्तामन्य॒के स॑मे
verses.transliteration: táṃ śiśītā svadhvaráṃ  satyáṃ sátvānam r̥tvíyam  utó nú cid yá óhate-  āṇḍā́ śúṣṇasya bhédati-  ájaiḥ svàrvatīr apó  nábhantām anyaké same

translation.text: Inspire him worshipped with fair rites, the glorious Hero truly brave. He brake in pieces Ṣushṇa's brood who still expected not the stroke, and won for us the heavenly streams. Let all the others die away.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒वेन्द्रा॒ग्निभ्यां॑ पितृ॒वन्नवी॑यो मन्धातृ॒वद॑ङ्गिर॒स्वद॑वाचि त्रि॒धातु॑ना॒ शर्म॑णा पातम॒स्मान्व॒यं स्या॑म॒ पत॑यो रयी॒णाम्
verses.transliteration: evéndrāgníbhyām pitr̥ván návīyo  mandhātr̥vád aṅgirasvád avāci  tridhā́tunā śármaṇā pātam asmā́n  vayáṃ syāma pátayo rayīṇā́m

translation.text: Thus have we sung anew to Indra-Agni, as sang our sires, Angirases, and Mandhâtar. Guard us with triple shelter and preserve us: may we be masters of a store of riches.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒स्मा ऊ॒ षु प्रभू॑तये॒ वरु॑णाय म॒रुद्भ्योऽर्चा॑ वि॒दुष्ट॑रेभ्यः यो धी॒ता मानु॑षाणां प॒श्वो गा इ॑व॒ रक्ष॑ति॒ नभ॑न्तामन्य॒के स॑मे
verses.transliteration: asmā́ ū ṣú prábhūtaye  váruṇāya marúdbhyaḥ-  -árcā vidúṣṭarebhyaḥ  yó dhītā́ mā́nuṣāṇām  paśvó gā́ iva rákṣati  nábhantām anyaké same

translation.text: To make this Varuṇa come forth sing thou a song unto the band of Maruts wiser than thyself,– This Varuṇa who guardeth well the thoughts of men like herds of kine. Let all the others die away.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तमू॒ षु स॑म॒ना गि॒रा पि॑तॄ॒णां च॒ मन्म॑भिः ना॒भा॒कस्य॒ प्रश॑स्तिभि॒र्यः सिन्धू॑ना॒मुपो॑द॒ये स॒प्तस्व॑सा॒ स म॑ध्य॒मो नभ॑न्तामन्य॒के स॑मे
verses.transliteration: tám ū ṣú samanā́ girā́  pitr̥̄ṇā́ṃ ca mánmabhiḥ  nābhākásya práśastibhir  yáḥ síndhūnām úpodayé  saptásvasā sá madhyamó  nábhantām anyaké same

translation.text: Him altogether praise I with the song and hymns our fathers sang, and with Nâbhâka's eulogies,– Him dwelling at the rivers' source, surrounded by his Sisters Seven.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स क्षपः॒ परि॑ षस्वजे॒ न्यु१॒॑स्रो मा॒यया॑ दधे॒ स विश्वं॒ परि॑ दर्श॒तः तस्य॒ वेनी॒रनु॑ व्र॒तमु॒षस्ति॒स्रो अ॑वर्धय॒न्नभ॑न्तामन्य॒के स॑मे
verses.transliteration: sá kṣápaḥ pári ṣasvaje  ny ùsró māyáyā dadhe  sá víśvam pári darśatáḥ  tásya vénīr ánu vratám  uṣás tisró avardhayan  nábhantām anyaké same

translation.text: The nights he hath encompassed, and stablished the morns with magic art visible over all is he. His dear Ones, following his Law, have prospered the Three Dawns for him.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यः क॒कुभो॑ निधार॒यः पृ॑थि॒व्यामधि॑ दर्श॒तः स माता॑ पू॒र्व्यं प॒दं तद्वरु॑णस्य॒ सप्त्यं॒ स हि गो॒पा इ॒वेर्यो॒ नभ॑न्तामन्य॒के स॑मे
verses.transliteration: yáḥ kakúbho nidhārayáḥ  pr̥thivyā́m ádhi darśatáḥ  sá mā́tā pūrvyám padáṃ  tád váruṇasya sáptyaṃ  sá hí gopā́ ivéryo  nábhantām anyaké same

translation.text: He, visible o'er all the earth, stablished the quarters of the sky: He measured out the eastern place, that is the fold of Varuṇa: like a strong herdsman is the God.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यो ध॒र्ता भुव॑नानां॒ य उ॒स्राणा॑मपी॒च्या॒३॒॑ वेद॒ नामा॑नि॒ गुह्या॑ स क॒विः काव्या॑ पु॒रु रू॒पं द्यौरि॑व पुष्यति॒ नभ॑न्तामन्य॒के स॑मे
verses.transliteration: yó dhartā́ bhúvanānāṃ  yá usrā́ṇām apīcyā̀  véda nā́māni gúhyā  sá kavíḥ kā́vyā purú  rūpáṃ dyaúr iva puṣyati  nábhantām anyaké same

translation.text: He who supports the worlds of life, he who well knows the hidden names mysterious of the morning beams, He cherishes much wisdom, Sage, as heaven brings forth each varied form.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यस्मि॒न्विश्वा॑नि॒ काव्या॑ च॒क्रे नाभि॑रिव श्रि॒ता त्रि॒तं जू॒ती स॑पर्यत व्र॒जे गावो॒ न सं॒युजे॑ यु॒जे अश्वाँ॑ अयुक्षत॒ नभ॑न्तामन्य॒के स॑मे
verses.transliteration: yásmin víśvāni kā́vyā  cakré nā́bhir iva śritā́  tritáṃ jūtī́ saparyata  vrajé gā́vo ná saṃyúje  yujé áśvām̐ ayukṣata  nábhantām anyaké same

translation.text: In whom all wisdom centres, as the nave is set within the wheel. Haste ye to honour Trita, as kine haste to gather in the fold, even as they muster steeds to yoke.

verses.sanskrit_deva: य आ॒स्वत्क॑ आ॒शये॒ विश्वा॑ जा॒तान्ये॑षाम् परि॒ धामा॑नि॒ मर्मृ॑श॒द्वरु॑णस्य पु॒रो गये॒ विश्वे॑ दे॒वा अनु॑ व्र॒तं नभ॑न्तामन्य॒के स॑मे
verses.transliteration: yá āsv átka āśáye  víśvā jātā́ny eṣām  pári dhā́māni mármr̥śad  váruṇasya puró gáye  víśve devā́ ánu vratáṃ  nábhantām anyaké same

translation.text: He wraps these regions as a robe; he contemplates the tribes of Gods and all the works of mortal men. Before the home of Varuṇa all the Gods follow his decree.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स स॑मु॒द्रो अ॑पी॒च्य॑स्तु॒रो द्यामि॑व रोहति॒ नि यदा॑सु॒ यजु॑र्द॒धे स मा॒या अ॒र्चिना॑ प॒दास्तृ॑णा॒न्नाक॒मारु॑ह॒न्नभ॑न्तामन्य॒के स॑मे
verses.transliteration: sá samudró apīcyàs  turó dyā́m iva rohati  ní yád āsu yájur dadhé  sá māyā́ arcínā padā́-  -ástr̥ṇān nā́kam ā́ruhat-  nábhantām anyaké same

translation.text: He is an Ocean far-removed, yet through the heaven to him ascends the worship which these realms possess. With his bright foot he overthrew their magic, and went up to heaven.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यस्य॑ श्वे॒ता वि॑चक्ष॒णा ति॒स्रो भूमी॑रधिक्षि॒तः त्रिरुत्त॑राणि प॒प्रतु॒र्वरु॑णस्य ध्रु॒वं सदः॒ स स॑प्ता॒नामि॑रज्यति॒ नभ॑न्तामन्य॒के स॑मे
verses.transliteration: yásya śvetā́ vicakṣaṇā́  tisró bhū́mīr adhikṣitáḥ  trír úttarāṇi paprátur  váruṇasya dhruváṃ sádaḥ  sá saptānā́m irajyati  nábhantām anyaké same

translation.text: Ruler, whose bright far-seeing rays, pervading all three earths, have filled the three superior realms of heaven. Firm is the seat of Varuṇa: over the Seven he rules as King.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यः श्वे॒ताँ अधि॑निर्णिजश्च॒क्रे कृ॒ष्णाँ अनु॑ व्र॒ता स धाम॑ पू॒र्व्यं म॑मे॒ यः स्क॒म्भेन॒ वि रोद॑सी अ॒जो न द्यामधा॑रय॒न्नभ॑न्तामन्य॒के स॑मे
verses.transliteration: yáḥ śvetā́m̐ ádhinirṇijaś  cakré kr̥ṣṇā́m̐ ánu vratā́  sá dhā́ma pūrvyám mame  yá skambhéna ví ródasī  ajó ná dyā́m ádhārayat-  nábhantām anyaké same

translation.text: Who, after his decree, o'erspread the Dark Ones with a robe of light; Who measured out the ancient seat, who pillared both the worlds apart as the Unborn supported heaven. Let all the others die away.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अस्त॑भ्ना॒द्द्यामसु॑रो वि॒श्ववे॑दा॒ अमि॑मीत वरि॒माणं॑ पृथि॒व्याः आसी॑द॒द्विश्वा॒ भुव॑नानि स॒म्राड्विश्वेत्तानि॒ वरु॑णस्य व्र॒तानि॑
verses.transliteration: ástabhnād dyā́m ásuro viśvávedāḥ-  ámimīta varimā́ṇam pr̥thivyā́ḥ  ā́sīdad víśvā bhúvanāni samrā́ḍ  víśvét tā́ni váruṇasya vratā́ni

translation.text: LORD of all wealth, the Asura propped the heavens, and measured out the broad earth's wide expanses. He, King supreme, approached all living creatures. All these are Varuṇa's holy operations.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒वा व॑न्दस्व॒ वरु॑णं बृ॒हन्तं॑ नम॒स्या धीर॑म॒मृत॑स्य गो॒पाम् स नः॒ शर्म॑ त्रि॒वरू॑थं॒ वि यं॑सत्पा॒तं नो॑ द्यावापृथिवी उ॒पस्थे॑
verses.transliteration: evā́ vandasva váruṇam br̥hántaṃ  namasyā́ dhī́ram amŕ̥tasya gopā́m  sá naḥ śárma trivárūthaṃ ví yaṃsat  pātáṃ no dyāvāpr̥thivī upásthe

translation.text: So humbly worship Varuṇa the Mighty revere the wise Guard of World Immortal. May he vouchsafe us triply-barred protection. O Earth and Heaven, within your lap preserve us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒मां धियं॒ शिक्ष॑माणस्य देव॒ क्रतुं॒ दक्षं॑ वरुण॒ सं शि॑शाधि ययाति॒ विश्वा॑ दुरि॒ता तरे॑म सु॒तर्मा॑ण॒मधि॒ नावं॑ रुहेम
verses.transliteration: imā́ṃ dhíyaṃ śíkṣamāṇasya deva  krátuṃ dákṣaṃ varuṇa sáṃ śiśādhi  yáyā́ti víśvā duritā́ tárema  sutármāṇam ádhi nā́vaṃ ruhema

translation.text: Sharpen this song of him who strives his utmost, sharpen, God Varuṇa, his strength and insight; May we ascend the ship that bears us safely, whereby we may pass over all misfortune.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ वां॒ ग्रावा॑णो अश्विना धी॒भिर्विप्रा॑ अचुच्यवुः नास॑त्या॒ सोम॑पीतये॒ नभ॑न्तामन्य॒के स॑मे
verses.transliteration: ā́ vāṃ grā́vāṇo aśvinā  dhībhír víprā acucyavuḥ  nā́satyā sómapītaye  nábhantām anyaké same

translation.text: Aṣvins, with songs the singer stones have made you hasten hitherward, Nâsatyas, to the Soma-draught. Let all the others die away.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यथा॑ वा॒मत्रि॑रश्विना गी॒र्भिर्विप्रो॒ अजो॑हवीत् नास॑त्या॒ सोम॑पीतये॒ नभ॑न्तामन्य॒के स॑मे
verses.transliteration: yáthā vām átrir aśvinā  gīrbhír vípro ájohavīt  nā́satyā sómapītaye  nábhantām anyaké same

translation.text: As the sage Atri with his hymns, O Aṣvins, called you eagerly, Nâsatyas, to the Soma-draught. Let all the others die away.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒वा वा॑मह्व ऊ॒तये॒ यथाहु॑वन्त॒ मेधि॑राः नास॑त्या॒ सोम॑पीतये॒ नभ॑न्तामन्य॒के स॑मे
verses.transliteration: evā́ vām ahva ūtáye  yáthā́huvanta médhirāḥ  nā́satyā sómapītaye  nábhantām anyaké same

translation.text: So have I called you to our aid, even as the wise have called of old, Nâsatyas, to the Soma-draught. Let all the others die away.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒मे विप्र॑स्य वे॒धसो॒ऽग्नेरस्तृ॑तयज्वनः गिरः॒ स्तोमा॑स ईरते
verses.transliteration: imé víprasya vedháso  -agnér ástr̥tayajvanaḥ  gíra stómāsa īrate

translation.text: THESE songs of mine go forth as lauds of Agni, the disposing Sage, Whose worshipper is ne'er o'erthrawn.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अस्मै॑ ते प्रति॒हर्य॑ते॒ जात॑वेदो॒ विच॑र्षणे अग्ने॒ जना॑मि सुष्टु॒तिम्
verses.transliteration: ásmai te pratiháryate  jā́tavedo vícarṣaṇe  ágne jánāmi suṣṭutím

translation.text: Wise Agni Jâtavedas, I beget a song of praise for thee. Who willingly receivest it.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ॒रो॒का इ॑व॒ घेदह॑ ति॒ग्मा अ॑ग्ने॒ तव॒ त्विषः॑ द॒द्भिर्वना॑नि बप्सति
verses.transliteration: ārokā́ iva ghéd áha  tigmā́ agne táva tvíṣaḥ  dadbhír vánāni bapsati

translation.text: Thy sharpened flames, O Agni, like the gleams of light that glitter through, Devour the forests with their teeth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: हर॑यो धू॒मके॑तवो॒ वात॑जूता॒ उप॒ द्यवि॑ यत॑न्ते॒ वृथ॑ग॒ग्नयः॑
