verses.transliteration: hárayo dhūmáketavo  vā́tajūtā úpa dyávi  yátante vŕ̥thag agnáyaḥ

translation.text: Gold-coloured, bannered with the smoke, urged by the wind, aloft to heaven Rise, lightly borne, the flames of fire.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ते त्ये वृथ॑ग॒ग्नय॑ इ॒द्धासः॒ सम॑दृक्षत उ॒षसा॑मिव के॒तवः॑
verses.transliteration: eté tyé vŕ̥thag agnáyaḥ-  iddhā́saḥ sám adr̥kṣata  uṣásām iva ketávaḥ

translation.text: These lightly kindled fiery flames are all around made visible, Even as the glearaings of the Dawns.

verses.sanskrit_deva: कृ॒ष्णा रजां॑सि पत्सु॒तः प्र॒याणे॑ जा॒तवे॑दसः अ॒ग्निर्यद्रोध॑ति॒ क्षमि॑
verses.transliteration: kr̥ṣṇā́ rájāṃsi patsutáḥ  prayā́ṇe jātávedasaḥ  agnír yád ródhati kṣámi

translation.text: As Jâtavedas speeds along, the dust is black beneath his feet, When Agni spreads upon the earth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: धा॒सिं कृ॑ण्वा॒न ओष॑धी॒र्बप्स॑द॒ग्निर्न वा॑यति पुन॒र्यन्तरु॑णी॒रपि॑
verses.transliteration: dhāsíṃ kr̥ṇvāná óṣadhīr  bápsad agnír ná vāyati  púnar yán táruṇīr ápi

translation.text: Making the plants his nourishment, Agni devours and wearies not, Seeking the tender shrubs again.

verses.sanskrit_deva: जि॒ह्वाभि॒रह॒ नन्न॑मद॒र्चिषा॑ जञ्जणा॒भव॑न् अ॒ग्निर्वने॑षु रोचते
verses.transliteration: jihvā́bhir áha nánnamad  arcíṣā jañjaṇābhávan  agnír váneṣu rocate

translation.text: Bending him down with all his tongues, he flickers with his fiery glow Splendid is Agni in the woods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒प्स्व॑ग्ने॒ सधि॒ष्टव॒ सौष॑धी॒रनु॑ रुध्यसे गर्भे॒ सञ्जा॑यसे॒ पुनः॑
verses.transliteration: apsv àgne sádhiṣ ṭáva  saúṣadhīr ánu rudhyase  gárbhe sáñ jāyase púnaḥ

translation.text: Agni, thine home is in the floods: into the plants thou forcest way, And as their Child art born anew.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उद॑ग्ने॒ तव॒ तद्घृ॒ताद॒र्ची रो॑चत॒ आहु॑तम् निंसा॑नं जु॒ह्वो॒३॒॑ मुखे॑
verses.transliteration: úd agne táva tád ghr̥tā́d  arcī́ rocata ā́hutam  níṃsānaṃ juhvò múkhe

translation.text: Worshipped with offerings shines thy flame, O Agni, from the sacred oil, With kisses on the ladle's mouth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒क्षान्ना॑य व॒शान्ना॑य॒ सोम॑पृष्ठाय वे॒धसे॑ स्तोमै॑र्विधेमा॒ग्नये॑
verses.transliteration: ukṣā́nnāya vaśā́nnāya  sómapr̥ṣṭhāya vedháse  stómair vidhemāgnáye

translation.text: Let us serve Agni with our hymns, Disposer, fed on ox and cow, Who bears the Soma on his back.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒त त्वा॒ नम॑सा व॒यं होत॒र्वरे॑ण्यक्रतो अग्ने॑ स॒मिद्भि॑रीमहे
verses.transliteration: utá tvā námasā vayáṃ  hótar váreṇyakrato  ágne samídbhir īmahe

translation.text: Yea, thee, O Agni, do we seek with homage and with fuel, Priest Whose wisdom is most excellent.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒त त्वा॑ भृगु॒वच्छु॑चे मनु॒ष्वद॑ग्न आहुत अ॒ङ्गि॒र॒स्वद्ध॑वामहे
verses.transliteration: utá tvā bhr̥guvác chuce  manuṣvád agna āhuta  aṅgirasvád dhavāmahe

translation.text: O worshipped with oblations, pure Agni, we call on thee as erst, Did Bhr̥igu, Manus, Angiras.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं ह्य॑ग्ने अ॒ग्निना॒ विप्रो॒ विप्रे॑ण॒ सन्त्स॒ता सखा॒ सख्या॑ समि॒ध्यसे॑
verses.transliteration: tváṃ hy àgne agnínā  vípro vípreṇa sán satā́  sákhā sákhyā samidhyáse

translation.text: For thou, O Agni, by the fire, Sage by the Sage, Good by the Good, Friend by the Friend, art lighted up.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स त्वं विप्रा॑य दा॒शुषे॑ र॒यिं दे॑हि सह॒स्रिण॑म् अग्ने॑ वी॒रव॑ती॒मिष॑म्
verses.transliteration: sá tváṃ víprāya dāśúṣe  rayíṃ dehi sahasríṇam  ágne vīrávatīm íṣam

translation.text: So wealth in thousands, food with store of heroes give thou to the sage, O Agni, to the worshipper.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अग्ने॒ भ्रातः॒ सह॑स्कृत॒ रोहि॑दश्व॒ शुचि॑व्रत इ॒मं स्तोमं॑ जुषस्व मे
verses.transliteration: ágne bhrā́taḥ sáhaskr̥ta  róhidaśva śúcivrata  imáṃ stómaṃ juṣasva me

translation.text: O Agni, Brother, made by strength, Lord of red steeds and brilliant sway, Take pleasure in this laud of mine.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒त त्वा॑ग्ने॒ मम॒ स्तुतो॑ वा॒श्राय॑ प्रति॒हर्य॑ते गो॒ष्ठं गाव॑ इवाशत
verses.transliteration: utá tvāgne máma stúto  vāśrā́ya pratiháryate  goṣṭháṃ gā́va ivāśata

translation.text: My praises, Agni, go to thee, as the cows seek the stall to meet, The lowing calf that longs for milk.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तुभ्यं॒ ता अ॑ङ्गिरस्तम॒ विश्वाः॑ सुक्षि॒तयः॒ पृथ॑क् अग्ने॒ कामा॑य येमिरे
verses.transliteration: túbhyaṃ tā́ aṅgirastama  víśvāḥ sukṣitáyaḥ pŕ̥thak  ágne kā́māya yemire

translation.text: Agni, best Angiras, to thee all people who have pleasant homes, Apart, have turned as to their wish.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निं धी॒भिर्म॑नी॒षिणो॒ मेधि॑रासो विप॒श्चितः॑ अ॒द्म॒सद्या॑य हिन्विरे
verses.transliteration: agníṃ dhībhír manīṣíṇo  médhirāso vipaścítaḥ  admasádyāya hinvire

translation.text: The sages skilled in holy song and thin. kers with their thoughts have urged Agni to share the sacred feast.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तं त्वामज्मे॑षु वा॒जिनं॑ तन्वा॒ना अ॑ग्ने अध्व॒रम् वह्निं॒ होता॑रमीळते
verses.transliteration: táṃ tvā́m ájmeṣu vājínaṃ  tanvānā́ agne adhvarám  váhniṃ hótāram īḷate

translation.text: So, Agni, unto thee the Priest, Invoker, strong in forays, pray 'nose who spin out the sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पु॒रु॒त्रा हि स॒दृङ्ङसि॒ विशो॒ विश्वा॒ अनु॑ प्र॒भुः स॒मत्सु॑ त्वा हवामहे
verses.transliteration: purutrā́ hí sadŕ̥ṅṅ ási  víśo víśvā ánu prabhúḥ  samátsu tvā havāmahe

translation.text: In many a place, the same in look art thou, a Prince o'er all the tribes In battles we invoke thine aid.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तमी॑ळिष्व॒ य आहु॑तो॒ऽग्निर्वि॒भ्राज॑ते घृ॒तैः इ॒मं नः॑ शृणव॒द्धव॑म्
verses.transliteration: tám īḷiṣva yá ā́huto  -agnír vibhrā́jate ghr̥taíḥ  imáṃ naḥ śr̥ṇavad dhávam

translation.text: Pray thou to Agni, pray to him who blazes served with sacred oil: Let him give ear to this our call.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तं त्वा॑ व॒यं ह॑वामहे शृ॒ण्वन्तं॑ जा॒तवे॑दसम् अग्ने॒ घ्नन्त॒मप॒ द्विषः॑
verses.transliteration: táṃ tvā vayáṃ havāmahe  śr̥ṇvántaṃ jātávedasam  ágne ghnántam ápa dvíṣaḥ

translation.text: We call on thee as such, as one who hears, as Jâtavedas, one, Agni! who beats away our foes.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वि॒शां राजा॑न॒मद्भु॑त॒मध्य॑क्षं॒ धर्म॑णामि॒मम् अ॒ग्निमी॑ळे॒ स उ॑ श्रवत्
verses.transliteration: viśā́ṃ rā́jānam ádbhutam  ádhyakṣaṃ dhármaṇām imám  agním īḷe sá u śravat

translation.text: I pray to Agni, King of men, the Wonderful, the President Of holy Laws: may he give ear.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निं वि॒श्वायु॑वेपसं॒ मर्यं॒ न वा॒जिनं॑ हि॒तम् सप्तिं॒ न वा॑जयामसि
verses.transliteration: agníṃ viśvā́yuvepasam  máryaṃ ná vājínaṃ hitám  sáptiṃ ná vājayāmasi

translation.text: Him like a bridegroom, him who stirs all people, like a noble horse, Like a fleet steed, we instigate.

verses.sanskrit_deva: घ्नन्मृ॒ध्राण्यप॒ द्विषो॒ दह॒न्रक्षां॑सि वि॒श्वहा॑ अग्ने॑ ति॒ग्मेन॑ दीदिहि
verses.transliteration: ghnán mr̥dhrā́ṇy ápa dvíṣo  dáhan rákṣāṃsi viśváhā  ágne tigména dīdihi

translation.text: Slaying things deadly, burning up foes, Riksasas, on every side, Shine, Agni, with thy sharpened flame.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यं त्वा॒ जना॑स इन्ध॒ते म॑नु॒ष्वद॑ङ्गिरस्तम अग्ने॒ स बो॑धि मे॒ वचः॑
verses.transliteration: yáṃ tvā jánāsa indhaté  manuṣvád aṅgirastama  ágne sá bodhi me vácaḥ

translation.text: Thou whom the people kindle even as Manus did, best Angiras! O Agni, mark thou this my speech.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यद॑ग्ने दिवि॒जा अस्य॑प्सु॒जा वा॑ सहस्कृत तं त्वा॑ गी॒र्भिर्ह॑वामहे
verses.transliteration: yád agne divijā́ ási-  apsujā́ vā sahaskr̥ta  táṃ tvā gīrbhír havāmahe

translation.text: O Agni, made by strength! be thou born in the heavens or born in floods, As such we call on thee with songs.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तुभ्यं॒ घेत्ते जना॑ इ॒मे विश्वाः॑ सुक्षि॒तयः॒ पृथ॑क् धा॒सिं हि॑न्व॒न्त्यत्त॑वे
verses.transliteration: túbhyaṃ ghét té jánā imé  víśvāḥ sukṣitáyaḥ pŕ̥thak  dhāsíṃ hinvanty áttave

translation.text: Yea, all the people, all the folk who have good dwellings, each apart, Send food for thee to eat thereof.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ते घेद॑ग्ने स्वा॒ध्योऽहा॒ विश्वा॑ नृ॒चक्ष॑सः तर॑न्तः स्याम दु॒र्गहा॑
verses.transliteration: té ghéd agne svādhyò  -áhā víśvā nr̥cákṣasaḥ  tárantaḥ syāma durgáhā

translation.text: O Agni, so may we, devout, gazed at by men, throughout our days, Pass lightly over all distress.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निं म॒न्द्रं पु॑रुप्रि॒यं शी॒रं पा॑व॒कशो॑चिषम् हृ॒द्भिर्म॒न्द्रेभि॑रीमहे
verses.transliteration: agním mandrám purupriyáṃ  śīrám pāvakáśociṣam  hr̥dbhír mandrébhir īmahe

translation.text: We venerate with cheerful hearts the cheerful Agni, dear to all, Burning, with purifying flame.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स त्वम॑ग्ने वि॒भाव॑सुः सृ॒जन्त्सूर्यो॒ न र॒श्मिभिः॑ शर्ध॒न्तमां॑सि जिघ्नसे
verses.transliteration: sá tvám agne vibhā́vasuḥ  sr̥ján sū́ryo ná raśmíbhiḥ  śárdhan támāṃsi jighnase

translation.text: So thou, O Agni rich in light, beaming like Sûrya with thy rays Boldly demolishest the gloom,

verses.sanskrit_deva: तत्ते॑ सहस्व ईमहे दा॒त्रं यन्नोप॒दस्य॑ति त्वद॑ग्ने॒ वार्यं॒ वसु॑
verses.transliteration: tát te sahasva īmahe  dātráṃ yán nópadásyati  tvád agne vā́ryaṃ vásu

translation.text: We pray to thee for this thy gift, Victor the gift that faileth not, O Agni, choicest wealth from thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स॒मिधा॒ग्निं दु॑वस्यत घृ॒तैर्बो॑धय॒ताति॑थिम् आस्मि॑न्ह॒व्या जु॑होतन
verses.transliteration: samídhāgníṃ duvasyata  ghr̥taír bodhayatā́tithim  ā́smin havyā́ juhotana

translation.text: PAY service unto Agni with your fuel, rouse your Guest with oil: In him present your offerings.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अग्ने॒ स्तोमं॑ जुषस्व मे॒ वर्ध॑स्वा॒नेन॒ मन्म॑ना प्रति॑ सू॒क्तानि॑ हर्य नः
verses.transliteration: ágne stómaṃ juṣasva me  várdhasvānéna mánmanā  práti sūktā́ni harya naḥ

translation.text: Agni, do thou accept my laud, be magnified by this my song: Welcome my sweedy-spoken words.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निं दू॒तं पु॒रो द॑धे हव्य॒वाह॒मुप॑ ब्रुवे दे॒वाँ आ सा॑दयादि॒ह
verses.transliteration: agníṃ dūtám puró dadhe  havyavā́ham úpa bruve  devā́m̐ ā́ sādayād ihá

translation.text: Agni, envoy, I place in front; the oblation-bearer I address: Here let him seat the Deities.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उत्ते॑ बृ॒हन्तो॑ अ॒र्चयः॑ समिधा॒नस्य॑ दीदिवः अग्ने॑ शु॒क्रास॑ ईरते
verses.transliteration: út te br̥hánto arcáyaḥ  samidhānásya dīdivaḥ  ágne śukrā́sa īrate

translation.text: Agni, the lofty flames of' thee enkindled have gone up on high, Thy bright flames, thou Refulgent One.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उप॑ त्वा जु॒ह्वो॒३॒॑ मम॑ घृ॒ताची॑र्यन्तु हर्यत अग्ने॑ ह॒व्या जु॑षस्व नः
verses.transliteration: úpa tvā juhvò máma  ghr̥tā́cīr yantu haryata  ágne havyā́ juṣasva naḥ

translation.text: Beloved! let my ladles full of sacred oil come near to thee: Agni, accept our offerings.

verses.sanskrit_deva: म॒न्द्रं होता॑रमृ॒त्विजं॑ चि॒त्रभा॑नुं वि॒भाव॑सुम् अ॒ग्निमी॑ळे॒ स उ॑ श्रवत्
verses.transliteration: mandráṃ hótāram r̥tvíjaṃ  citrábhānuṃ vibhā́vasum  agním īḷe sá u śravat

translation.text: I worship Agni-may he hear!-the cheerful, the Invoker, Priest, Of varied splendour, rich in light.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र॒त्नं होता॑र॒मीड्यं॒ जुष्ट॑म॒ग्निं क॒विक्र॑तुम् अ॒ध्व॒राणा॑मभि॒श्रिय॑म्
verses.transliteration: pratnáṃ hótāram ī́ḍyaṃ  júṣṭam agníṃ kavíkratum  adhvarā́ṇām abhiśríyam

translation.text: Ancient Invoker, meet for praise, beloved Agni, wise and strong, The visitant of solemn rites.

verses.sanskrit_deva: जु॒षा॒णो अ॑ङ्गिरस्तमे॒मा ह॒व्यान्या॑नु॒षक् अग्ने॑ य॒ज्ञं न॑य ऋतु॒था
verses.transliteration: juṣāṇó aṅgirastama-  -imā́ havyā́ny ānuṣák  ágne yajñáṃ naya r̥tuthā́

translation.text: Agni, best Angiras, accept straightway these offerings, and guide The seasonable sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स॒मि॒धा॒न उ॑ सन्त्य॒ शुक्र॑शोच इ॒हा व॑ह चि॒कि॒त्वान्दैव्यं॒ जन॑म्
verses.transliteration: samidhāná u santya  śúkraśoca ihā́ vaha  cikitvā́n daívyaṃ jánam

translation.text: Excellent God, with brilliant flames, enkindled bring thou hitherward, Knowing the way, the Heavenly Host.

verses.sanskrit_deva: विप्रं॒ होता॑रम॒द्रुहं॑ धू॒मके॑तुं वि॒भाव॑सुम् य॒ज्ञानां॑ के॒तुमी॑महे
verses.transliteration: vípraṃ hótāram adrúhaṃ  dhūmáketuṃ vibhā́vasum  yajñā́nāṃ ketúm īmahe

translation.text: Him, Sage and Herald, void of guile, ensign of sacrifices, him Smoke-bannered, rich in light, we seek.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अग्ने॒ नि पा॑हि न॒स्त्वं प्रति॑ ष्म देव॒ रीष॑तः भि॒न्धि द्वेषः॑ सहस्कृत
verses.transliteration: ágne ní pāhi nas tvám  práti ṣma deva rī́ṣataḥ  bhindhí dvéṣaḥ sahaskr̥ta

translation.text: O Agni, be our Guardian thou, God, against those who injure us: Destroy our foes, thou Son of Strength.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निः प्र॒त्नेन॒ मन्म॑ना॒ शुम्भा॑नस्त॒न्वं१॒॑ स्वाम् क॒विर्विप्रे॑ण वावृधे
verses.transliteration: agníḥ pratnéna mánmanā  śúmbhānas tanvàṃ svā́m  kavír vípreṇa vāvr̥dhe

translation.text: Making his body beautiful, Agni the Sage hath waxen by The singer and his ancient hymn.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ऊ॒र्जो नपा॑त॒मा हु॑वे॒ऽग्निं पा॑व॒कशो॑चिषम् अ॒स्मिन्य॒ज्ञे स्व॑ध्व॒रे
verses.transliteration: -ūrjó nápātam ā́ huve  -agním pāvakáśociṣam  asmín yajñé svadhvaré

translation.text: I invocate the Child of Strength, Agni with purifying flame, At this well-ordered sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स नो॑ मित्रमह॒स्त्वमग्ने॑ शु॒क्रेण॑ शो॒चिषा॑ दे॒वैरा स॑त्सि ब॒र्हिषि॑
verses.transliteration: sá no mitramahas tvám  ágne śukréṇa śocíṣā  devaír ā́ satsi barhíṣi

translation.text: So Agni, rich in many friends, with fiery splendour, seat thyself With Gods upon our sacred grass.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यो अ॒ग्निं त॒न्वो॒३॒॑ दमे॑ दे॒वं मर्तः॑ सप॒र्यति॑ तस्मा॒ इद्दी॑दय॒द्वसु॑
verses.transliteration: yó agníṃ tanvò dáme  devám mártaḥ saparyáti  tásmā íd dīdayad vásu

translation.text: The mortal man who serves the God Agni within his own abode, For him he causes wealth to shine.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निर्मू॒र्धा दि॒वः क॒कुत्पतिः॑ पृथि॒व्या अ॒यम् अ॒पां रेतां॑सि जिन्वति
verses.transliteration: agnír mūrdhā́ diváḥ kakút  pátiḥ pr̥thivyā́ ayám  apā́ṃ rétāṃsi jinvati

translation.text: Agni is head and height of heaven, the Master of the earth is he: He quickeneth the watere seed.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उद॑ग्ने॒ शुच॑य॒स्तव॑ शु॒क्रा भ्राज॑न्त ईरते तव॒ ज्योतीं॑ष्य॒र्चयः॑
verses.transliteration: úd agne śúcayas táva  śukrā́ bhrā́janta īrate  táva jyótīṃṣy arcáyaḥ

translation.text: Upward, O Agni, rise thy flames, pure and resplendent, blazing high, Thy lustres, fair effulgences.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ईशि॑षे॒ वार्य॑स्य॒ हि दा॒त्रस्या॑ग्ने॒ स्व॑र्पतिः स्तो॒ता स्यां॒ तव॒ शर्म॑णि
verses.transliteration: ī́śiṣe vā́ryasya hí  dātrásyāgne svàrpatiḥ  stotā́ syāṃ táva śármaṇi

translation.text: For, Agni, thou as Lord of Light rulest o'er choicest gifts: may I, Thy singer, find defence in thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वाम॑ग्ने मनी॒षिण॒स्त्वां हि॑न्वन्ति॒ चित्ति॑भिः त्वां व॑र्धन्तु नो॒ गिरः॑
verses.transliteration: tvā́m agne manīṣíṇaḥ  tvā́ṃ hinvanti cíttibhiḥ  tvā́ṃ vardhantu no gíraḥ

translation.text: O Agni, they who understand stir thee to action with their thoughts: So let our songs enhance thy might.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अद॑ब्धस्य स्व॒धाव॑तो दू॒तस्य॒ रेभ॑तः॒ सदा॑ अ॒ग्नेः स॒ख्यं वृ॑णीमहे
verses.transliteration: ádabdhasya svadhā́vato  dūtásya rébhataḥ sádā  agnéḥ sakhyáṃ vr̥ṇīmahe

translation.text: We ever claim the friendship of Agni, the singing messenger, Of God-like nature, void of guile.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निः शुचि॑व्रततमः॒ शुचि॒र्विप्रः॒ शुचिः॑ क॒विः शुची॑ रोचत॒ आहु॑तः
verses.transliteration: agníḥ śúcivratatamaḥ  śúcir vípraḥ śúciḥ kavíḥ  śúcī rocata ā́hutaḥ

translation.text: Agni who bears most holy sway, the holy Singer, holy Sage, Shines holy when we worship him.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒त त्वा॑ धी॒तयो॒ मम॒ गिरो॑ वर्धन्तु वि॒श्वहा॑ अग्ने॑ स॒ख्यस्य॑ बोधि नः
verses.transliteration: utá tvā dhītáyo máma  gíro vardhantu viśváhā  ágne sakhyásya bodhi naḥ

translation.text: Yea, let my meditations, let my songs exalt thee evermore. Think, Agni, of our friendly bond,

verses.sanskrit_deva: यद॑ग्ने॒ स्याम॒हं त्वं त्वं वा॑ घा॒ स्या अ॒हम् स्युष्टे॑ स॒त्या इ॒हाशिषः॑
verses.transliteration: yád agne syā́m aháṃ tváṃ  tváṃ vā ghā syā́ ahám  syúṣ ṭe satyā́ ihā́śíṣaḥ

translation.text: If I were thou and thou wert I, O Agni, every prayer of thine Should have its due fulfilment here.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वसु॒र्वसु॑पति॒र्हि क॒मस्य॑ग्ने वि॒भाव॑सुः स्याम॑ ते सुम॒तावपि॑
verses.transliteration: vásur vásupatir hí kam  ásy agne vibhā́vasuḥ  syā́ma te sumatā́v ápi

translation.text: For Excellent and Lord of wealth. art thou O Agni, rich in light: May we enjoy thy favouring grace.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अग्ने॑ धृ॒तव्र॑ताय ते समु॒द्राये॑व॒ सिन्ध॑वः गिरो॑ वा॒श्रास॑ ईरते
verses.transliteration: ágne dhr̥távratāya te  samudrā́yeva síndhavaḥ  gíro vāśrā́sa īrate

translation.text: Agni, to thee whose laws stand fast our resonant songs of praise speed forth, As rivers hasten to the sea.

verses.sanskrit_deva: युवा॑नं वि॒श्पतिं॑ क॒विं वि॒श्वादं॑ पुरु॒वेप॑सम् अ॒ग्निं शु॑म्भामि॒ मन्म॑भिः
verses.transliteration: yúvānaṃ viśpátiṃ kavíṃ  viśvā́dam puruvépasam  agníṃ śumbhāmi mánmabhiḥ

translation.text: Agni, the Youthful Lord of men, who stirreth much and eateth all, The Sage, I glorify with hymns.

verses.sanskrit_deva: य॒ज्ञानां॑ र॒थ्ये॑ व॒यं ति॒ग्मज॑म्भाय वी॒ळवे॑ स्तोमै॑रिषेमा॒ग्नये॑
verses.transliteration: yajñā́nāṃ rathyè vayáṃ  tigmájambhāya vīḷáve  stómair iṣemāgnáye

translation.text: To Agni let us haste with lauds, the Guide of sacrificial rites, Armed with sharp teeth, the Mighty One.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒यम॑ग्ने॒ त्वे अपि॑ जरि॒ता भू॑तु सन्त्य तस्मै॑ पावक मृळय
verses.transliteration: ayám agne tvé ápi  jaritā́ bhūtu santya  tásmai pāvaka mr̥ḷaya

translation.text: And let this man, good Agni, be with thee the singer of thy praise: Be gracious, Holy One, to him.

verses.sanskrit_deva: धीरो॒ ह्यस्य॑द्म॒सद्विप्रो॒ न जागृ॑विः॒ सदा॑ अग्ने॑ दी॒दय॑सि॒ द्यवि॑
verses.transliteration: dhī́ro hy ásy admasád  vípro ná jā́gr̥viḥ sádā  ágne dīdáyasi dyávi

translation.text: For thou art sharer of our feast, wise, ever watchful as a Sage: Agni, thou shinest in the sky.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पु॒राग्ने॑ दुरि॒तेभ्यः॑ पु॒रा मृ॒ध्रेभ्यः॑ कवे प्र ण॒ आयु॑र्वसो तिर
verses.transliteration: purā́gne duritébhyaḥ  purā́ mr̥dhrébhyaḥ kave  prá ṇa ā́yur vaso tira

translation.text: O Agni, Sage, before our foes, before misfortunes fall on us, Excellent Lord, prolong our lives.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ घा॒ ये अ॒ग्निमि॑न्ध॒ते स्तृ॒णन्ति॑ ब॒र्हिरा॑नु॒षक् येषा॒मिन्द्रो॒ युवा॒ सखा॑
verses.transliteration: ā́ ghā yé agním indhaté  str̥ṇánti barhír ānuṣák  yéṣām índro yúvā sákhā

translation.text: HITHERWARD! they who light flame and straightway trim the sacred grass. Whose Friend is Indra ever young.

verses.sanskrit_deva: बृ॒हन्निदि॒ध्म ए॑षां॒ भूरि॑ श॒स्तं पृ॒थुः स्वरुः॑ येषा॒मिन्द्रो॒ युवा॒ सखा॑
verses.transliteration: br̥hánn íd idhmá eṣām  bhū́ri śastám pr̥thúḥ sváruḥ  yéṣām índro yúvā sákhā

translation.text: High is their fuel, great their laud, wide is their splinter from the stake, Whose Friend is Indra ever young.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अयु॑द्ध॒ इद्यु॒धा वृतं॒ शूर॒ आज॑ति॒ सत्व॑भिः येषा॒मिन्द्रो॒ युवा॒ सखा॑
verses.transliteration: áyuddha íd yudhā́ vŕ̥taṃ  śū́ra ā́jati sátvabhiḥ  yéṣām índro yúvā sákhā

translation.text: Unequelled in fight the hero leads his army with the warrior chiefs. Whose Friend is Indra ever young.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ बु॒न्दं वृ॑त्र॒हा द॑दे जा॒तः पृ॑च्छ॒द्वि मा॒तर॑म् क उ॒ग्राः के ह॑ शृण्विरे
verses.transliteration: ā́ bundáṃ vr̥trahā́ dade  jātáḥ pr̥chad ví mātáram  ká ugrā́ḥ ké ha śr̥ṇvire

translation.text: The new-born Vr̥itra-slayer asked his Mother, as he seized his shaft, Who are the fierce? Who are renowned?

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्रति॑ त्वा शव॒सी व॑दद्गि॒रावप्सो॒ न यो॑धिषत् यस्ते॑ शत्रु॒त्वमा॑च॒के
verses.transliteration: práti tvā śavasī́ vadad  girā́v ápso ná yodhiṣat  yás te śatrutvám ācaké

translation.text: Ṣavasî answered, He who seeks thine enmity will battle like A stately elephant on a hill.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒त त्वं म॑घवञ्छृणु॒ यस्ते॒ वष्टि॑ व॒वक्षि॒ तत् यद्वी॒ळया॑सि वी॒ळु तत्
verses.transliteration: utá tvám maghavañ chr̥ṇu  yás te váṣṭi vavákṣi tát  yád vīḷáyāsi vīḷú tát

translation.text: And hear, O Maghavan; to him who craves of thee thou grantest all Whate'er thou makest firm is firm.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यदा॒जिं यात्या॑जि॒कृदिन्द्रः॑ स्वश्व॒युरुप॑ र॒थीत॑मो र॒थीना॑म्
verses.transliteration: yád ājíṃ yā́ty ājikŕ̥d  índraḥ svaśvayúr úpa  rathī́tamo rathī́nām

translation.text: What time the Warrior Indra goes to battle, borne by noble steeds, Best of all charioteers is he.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वि षु विश्वा॑ अभि॒युजो॒ वज्रि॒न्विष्व॒ग्यथा॑ वृह भवा॑ नः सु॒श्रव॑स्तमः
verses.transliteration: ví ṣú víśvā abhiyújo  vájrin víṣvag yáthā vr̥ha  bhávā naḥ suśrávastamaḥ

translation.text: Repel, O Thunder-armed, in all directions all attacks on us: And be our own most glorious God.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒स्माकं॒ सु रथं॑ पु॒र इन्द्रः॑ कृणोतु सा॒तये॑ न यं धूर्व॑न्ति धू॒र्तयः॑
verses.transliteration: asmā́kaṃ sú rátham puráḥ-  índraḥ kr̥ṇotu sātáye  ná yáṃ dhū́rvanti dhūrtáyaḥ

translation.text: May Indra set our car in front, in foremost Place to win the spoil, He whom the wicked injure not.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वृ॒ज्याम॑ ते॒ परि॒ द्विषोऽरं॑ ते शक्र दा॒वने॑ ग॒मेमेदि॑न्द्र॒ गोम॑तः
verses.transliteration: vr̥jyā́ma te pári dvíṣaḥ-  -áraṃ te śakra dāváne  gaméméd indra gómataḥ

translation.text: Thine enmity may we escape, and, gakra, for thy bounty, rich In kine, may we come near to thee

verses.sanskrit_deva: शनै॑श्चि॒द्यन्तो॑ अद्रि॒वोऽश्वा॑वन्तः शत॒ग्विनः॑ वि॒वक्ष॑णा अने॒हसः॑
verses.transliteration: śánaiś cid yánto adrivaḥ-  -áśvāvantaḥ śatagvínaḥ  vivákṣaṇā anehásaḥ

translation.text: Softly approaching, Thunder-armed wealthy by hundreds, rich in steeds, Unrivalled, readywith our gifts.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ऊ॒र्ध्वा हि ते॑ दि॒वेदि॑वे स॒हस्रा॑ सू॒नृता॑ श॒ता ज॒रि॒तृभ्यो॑ वि॒मंह॑ते
verses.transliteration: ūrdhvā́ hí te divé-dive  sahásrā sūnŕ̥tā śatā́  jaritŕ̥bhyo vimáṃhate

translation.text: For thine exalted excellence gives to thy worshippers each day Hundreds and thousands of thy boons.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वि॒द्मा हि त्वा॑ धनंज॒यमिन्द्र॑ दृ॒ळ्हा चि॑दारु॒जम् आ॒दा॒रिणं॒ यथा॒ गय॑म्
verses.transliteration: vidmā́ hí tvā dhanaṃjayáṃ  índra dr̥ḷhā́ cid ārujám  ādāríṇaṃ yáthā gáyam

translation.text: Indra, we know thee breaker-down even of trong forts, winner of spoil, A:one who conquers wealth for us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: क॒कु॒हं चि॑त्त्वा कवे॒ मन्द॑न्तु धृष्ण॒विन्द॑वः आ त्वा॑ प॒णिं यदीम॑हे
verses.transliteration: kakuháṃ cit tvā kave  mándantu dhr̥ṣṇav índavaḥ  ā́ tvā paṇíṃ yád ī́mahe

translation.text: Though thou art highest, Sage and Bold let the drops cheer thee when we come To thee as to a trafficker.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यस्ते॑ रे॒वाँ अदा॑शुरिः प्रम॒मर्ष॑ म॒घत्त॑ये तस्य॑ नो॒ वेद॒ आ भ॑र
verses.transliteration: yás te revā́m̐ ádāśuriḥ  pramamárṣa magháttaye  tásya no véda ā́ bhara

translation.text: Bring unto us the treasure of the opulent man who, loth to give, Hath slighted thee for gain of wealth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒म उ॑ त्वा॒ वि च॑क्षते॒ सखा॑य इन्द्र सो॒मिनः॑ पु॒ष्टाव॑न्तो॒ यथा॑ प॒शुम्
verses.transliteration: imá u tvā ví cakṣate  sákhāya indra somínaḥ  puṣṭā́vanto yáthā paśúm

translation.text: Indra, these friends of ours, supplied with Soma, wait and look to thee, As men with fodder to the herd.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒त त्वाब॑धिरं व॒यं श्रुत्क॑र्णं॒ सन्त॑मू॒तये॑ दू॒रादि॒ह ह॑वामहे
verses.transliteration: utá tvā́badhiraṃ vayáṃ  śrútkarṇaṃ sántam ūtáye  dūrā́d ihá havāmahe

translation.text: And thee who art not deaf, whose cars are quick to listen, for our aid, We call to us from far away.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यच्छु॑श्रू॒या इ॒मं हवं॑ दु॒र्मर्षं॑ चक्रिया उ॒त भवे॑रा॒पिर्नो॒ अन्त॑मः
verses.transliteration: yác chuśrūyā́ imáṃ hávaṃ  durmárṣaṃ cakriyā utá  bháver āpír no ántamaḥ

translation.text: When thou hast listened, make our call one which thou never wilt forget, And be our very nearest Friend.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यच्चि॒द्धि ते॒ अपि॒ व्यथि॑र्जग॒न्वांसो॒ अम॑न्महि गो॒दा इदि॑न्द्र बोधि नः
verses.transliteration: yác cid dhí te ápi vyáthir  jaganvā́ṃso ámanmahi  godā́ íd indra bodhi naḥ

translation.text: When even now, when we have been in trouble, we have thought of thee, O Indra, give us gifts of kine.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ त्वा॑ र॒म्भं न जिव्र॑यो रर॒भ्मा श॑वसस्पते उ॒श्मसि॑ त्वा स॒धस्थ॒ आ
verses.transliteration: ā́ tvā rambháṃ ná jívrayo  rarabhmā́ śavasas pate  uśmási tvā sadhástha ā́

translation.text: O Lord of Strength, we rest on thee, as old men rest upon a staff: We long to have. thee dwell with us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स्तो॒त्रमिन्द्रा॑य गायत पुरुनृ॒म्णाय॒ सत्व॑ने नकि॒र्यं वृ॑ण्व॒ते यु॒धि
verses.transliteration: stotrám índrāya gāyata  purunr̥mṇā́ya sátvane  nákir yáṃ vr̥ṇvaté yudhí

translation.text: To Indra sing a song of praise, Hero of mighty valour, him Whom no one challenges to war.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भि त्वा॑ वृषभा सु॒ते सु॒तं सृ॑जामि पी॒तये॑ तृ॒म्पा व्य॑श्नुही॒ मद॑म्
verses.transliteration: abhí tvā vr̥ṣabhā suté  sutáṃ sr̥jāmi pītáye  tr̥mpā́ vy àśnuhī mádam

translation.text: Hero, the Soma being shed, I pour the juice for thee to drink: Sate thee and finish thy carouse.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मा त्वा॑ मू॒रा अ॑वि॒ष्यवो॒ मोप॒हस्वा॑न॒ आ द॑भन् माकीं॑ ब्रह्म॒द्विषो॑ वनः
verses.transliteration: mā́ tvā mūrā́ aviṣyávo  mópahásvāna ā́ dabhan  mā́kīm brahmadvíṣo vanaḥ

translation.text: Let not the fools, or those who mock beguile thee when they seek thine aid Love not the enemies of prayer.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒ह त्वा॒ गोप॑रीणसा म॒हे म॑न्दन्तु॒ राध॑से सरो॑ गौ॒रो यथा॑ पिब
verses.transliteration: ihá tvā góparīṇasā  mahé mandantu rā́dhase  sáro gauró yáthā piba

translation.text: Here let them with rich milky draught cheer thee to great munificence: Drink as the wild-bull drinks the lake.

verses.sanskrit_deva: या वृ॑त्र॒हा प॑रा॒वति॒ सना॒ नवा॑ च चुच्यु॒वे ता सं॒सत्सु॒ प्र वो॑चत
verses.transliteration: yā́ vr̥trahā́ parāváti  sánā návā ca cucyuvé  tā́ saṃsátsu prá vocata

translation.text: Proclaim in our assemblies what deeds, new and ancient, far away, The Vr̥itra-slayer hath achieved.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अपि॑बत्क॒द्रुवः॑ सु॒तमिन्द्रः॑ स॒हस्र॑बाह्वे अत्रा॑देदिष्ट॒ पौंस्य॑म्
verses.transliteration: ápibat kadrúvaḥ sutám  índraḥ sahásrabāhve  átrādediṣṭa paúṃsyam

translation.text: In battle of a thousand arms Indra drank Kadrû's Soma juice: There he displayed his manly might.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स॒त्यं तत्तु॒र्वशे॒ यदौ॒ विदा॑नो अह्नवा॒य्यम् व्या॑नट् तु॒र्वणे॒ शमि॑
verses.transliteration: satyáṃ tát turváśe yádau  vídāno ahnavāyyám  vy ā̀naṭ turváṇe śámi

translation.text: True undeniabIc strength he found in Yadu and in Turvaṣa, And conquered through the sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त॒रणिं॑ वो॒ जना॑नां त्र॒दं वाज॑स्य॒ गोम॑तः स॒मा॒नमु॒ प्र शं॑सिषम्
verses.transliteration: taráṇiṃ vo jánānāṃ  tradáṃ vā́jasya gómataḥ  samānám u prá śaṃsiṣam

translation.text: Him have I magnified, our Lord in, common, Guardian of your folk, Discloser of great wealth in kine;

verses.sanskrit_deva: ऋ॒भु॒क्षणं॒ न वर्त॑व उ॒क्थेषु॑ तुग्र्या॒वृध॑म् इन्द्रं॒ सोमे॒ सचा॑ सु॒ते
verses.transliteration: r̥bhukṣáṇaṃ ná vártave-  ukthéṣu tugryāvŕ̥dham  índraṃ sóme sácā suté

translation.text: R̥ibhukshan, not to be restrained, who strengthened Tugra's son in lauds, Indra beside the flowingjuice;

verses.sanskrit_deva: यः कृ॒न्तदिद्वि यो॒न्यं त्रि॒शोका॑य गि॒रिं पृ॒थुम् गोभ्यो॑ गा॒तुं निरे॑तवे
verses.transliteration: yáḥ kr̥ntád íd ví yonyáṃ  triśókāya girím pr̥thúm  góbhyo gātúṃ níretave

translation.text: Who for Triṣoka clave the hill that formed a wide receptacle, So that the cows might issue forth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यद्द॑धि॒षे म॑न॒स्यसि॑ मन्दा॒नः प्रेदिय॑क्षसि मा तत्क॑रिन्द्र मृ॒ळय॑
verses.transliteration: yád dadhiṣé manasyási  mandānáḥ préd íyakṣasi  mā́ tát kar indra mr̥ḷáya

translation.text: Whate'er thy plan or purpose be, whate'er, in transport, thou wouldst do, Do it not, Indra, but be kind.

verses.sanskrit_deva: द॒भ्रं चि॒द्धि त्वाव॑तः कृ॒तं शृ॒ण्वे अधि॒ क्षमि॑ जिगा॑त्विन्द्र ते॒ मनः॑
verses.transliteration: dabhráṃ cid dhí tvā́vataḥ  kr̥táṃ śr̥ṇvé ádhi kṣámi  jígātv indra te mánaḥ

translation.text: But little hath been heard of done upon the earth by one like thee i Let thine heart, Indra, turn to us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तवेदु॒ ताः सु॑की॒र्तयोऽस॑न्नु॒त प्रश॑स्तयः यदि॑न्द्र मृ॒ळया॑सि नः
verses.transliteration: távéd u tā́ḥ sukīrtáyaḥ-  -ásann utá práśastayaḥ  yád indra mr̥ḷáyāsi naḥ

translation.text: Thine then shall be this high renown, thine shall these lofty praises be, When, Indra, thou art kind to us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मा न॒ एक॑स्मि॒न्नाग॑सि॒ मा द्वयो॑रु॒त त्रि॒षु वधी॒र्मा शू॑र॒ भूरि॑षु
verses.transliteration: mā́ na ékasminn ā́gasi  mā́ dváyor utá triṣú  vádhīr mā́ śūra bhū́riṣu

translation.text: Not for one trespass, not for two, O Hero, slay us, nor for three, Nor yet for many trespasses.

verses.sanskrit_deva: बि॒भया॒ हि त्वाव॑त उ॒ग्राद॑भिप्रभ॒ङ्गिणः॑ द॒स्माद॒हमृ॑ती॒षहः॑
verses.transliteration: bibháyā hí tvā́vataḥ-  ugrā́d abhiprabhaṅgíṇaḥ  dasmā́d ahám r̥tīṣáhaḥ

translation.text: I fear one powerful like thee, the crusherdown of enemies, Mighty, repelling all attacks.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मा सख्युः॒ शून॒मा वि॑दे॒ मा पु॒त्रस्य॑ प्रभूवसो आ॒वृत्व॑द्भूतु ते॒ मनः॑
verses.transliteration: mā́ sákhyuḥ śū́nam ā́ vide  mā́ putrásya prabhūvaso  āvŕ̥tvad bhūtu te mánaḥ

translation.text: O wealthy God, ne'er may I live to see my friend or son in need: Hitherward let thy heart be turned.

verses.sanskrit_deva: को नु म॑र्या॒ अमि॑थितः॒ सखा॒ सखा॑यमब्रवीत् ज॒हा को अ॒स्मदी॑षते
verses.transliteration: kó nú maryā ámithitaḥ  sákhā sákhāyam abravīt  jahā́ kó asmád īṣate

translation.text: What friend, O people, unprovoked, hath ever said unto a friend, He turns and leaves us in distress?

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒वारे॑ वृषभा सु॒तेऽसि॑न्व॒न्भूर्या॑वयः श्व॒घ्नीव॑ नि॒वता॒ चर॑न्
verses.transliteration: evā́re vr̥ṣabhā suté  -ásinvan bhū́ry āvayaḥ  śvaghnī́va nivátā cáran

translation.text: Hero, insatiate enjoy this Soma juice so near to thee, Even as a hunter rushing down.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ त॑ ए॒ता व॑चो॒युजा॒ हरी॑ गृभ्णे सु॒मद्र॑था यदीं॑ ब्र॒ह्मभ्य॒ इद्ददः॑
verses.transliteration: ā́ ta etā́ vacoyújā  hárī gr̥bhṇe sumádrathā  yád īm brahmábhya íd dádaḥ

translation.text: Hither I draw those Bays of thine yoked by our hymn, with splendid car, That thou mayst give unto the priests.

verses.sanskrit_deva: भि॒न्धि विश्वा॒ अप॒ द्विषः॒ परि॒ बाधो॑ ज॒ही मृधः॑ वसु॑ स्पा॒र्हं तदा भ॑र
verses.transliteration: bhindhí víśvā ápa dvíṣaḥ  pári bā́dho jahī́ mŕ̥dhaḥ  vásu spārháṃ tád ā́ bhara

translation.text: Drive all our enemies away, smite down the foes who press around, And bring the wealth for which we long:

verses.sanskrit_deva: यद्वी॒ळावि॑न्द्र॒ यत्स्थि॒रे यत्पर्शा॑ने॒ परा॑भृतम् वसु॑ स्पा॒र्हं तदा भ॑र
verses.transliteration: yád vīḷā́v indra yát sthiré  yát párśāne párābhr̥tam  vásu spārháṃ tád ā́ bhara

translation.text: O Tndra, that which is concealed in strong firm place precipitous: Bring us the wealth for which we long

verses.sanskrit_deva: यस्य॑ ते वि॒श्वमा॑नुषो॒ भूरे॑र्द॒त्तस्य॒ वेद॑ति वसु॑ स्पा॒र्हं तदा भ॑र
verses.transliteration: yásya te viśvámānuṣo  bhū́rer dattásya védati  vásu spārháṃ tád ā́ bhara

translation.text: Great riches which the world of men shall recognize as sent by thbe: Bring us the wealth for which we long.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वाव॑तः पुरूवसो व॒यमि॑न्द्र प्रणेतः स्मसि॑ स्थातर्हरीणाम्
verses.transliteration: tvā́vataḥ purūvaso  vayám indra praṇetaḥ  smási sthātar harīṇām

translation.text: WE, Indra, Lord of ample wealth, our Guide, depend on one like thee, Thou driver of the Tawny Steeds.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वां हि स॒त्यम॑द्रिवो वि॒द्म दा॒तार॑मि॒षाम् वि॒द्म दा॒तारं॑ रयी॒णाम्
verses.transliteration: tvā́ṃ hí satyám adrivo  vidmá dātā́ram iṣā́m  vidmá dātā́raṃ rayīṇā́m

translation.text: For, Hurler of the Bolt, we know thee true, the giver of our food, We know the giver of our wealth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ यस्य॑ ते महि॒मानं॒ शत॑मूते॒ शत॑क्रतो गी॒र्भिर्गृ॒णन्ति॑ का॒रवः॑
verses.transliteration: ā́ yásya te mahimā́naṃ  śátamūte śátakrato  gīrbhír gr̥ṇánti kārávaḥ

translation.text: O thou whose majesty the bards celebrate with their songs, thou Lord, Of hundred powers and hundred aids.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सु॒नी॒थो घा॒ स मर्त्यो॒ यं म॒रुतो॒ यम॑र्य॒मा मि॒त्रः पान्त्य॒द्रुहः॑
verses.transliteration: sunīthó ghā sá mártyo  yám marúto yám aryamā́  mitráḥ pā́nty adrúhaḥ

translation.text: Fair guidance hath the mortal man whom Aryaman, the Marut host, And Mitra, void of guile, protect.

verses.sanskrit_deva: दधा॑नो॒ गोम॒दश्व॑वत्सु॒वीर्य॑मादि॒त्यजू॑त एधते सदा॑ रा॒या पु॑रु॒स्पृहा॑
verses.transliteration: dádhāno gómad áśvavat suvī́ryam  ādityájūta edhate  sádā rāyā́ puruspŕ̥hā

translation.text: Kine, steeds, and hero strength he gains, and prospers, by the Âdityas sped, Ever in wealth which all desire.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तमिन्द्रं॒ दान॑मीमहे शवसा॒नमभी॑र्वम् ईशा॑नं रा॒य ई॑महे
verses.transliteration: tám índraṃ dā́nam īmahe  śavasānám ábhīrvam  ī́śānaṃ rāyá īmahe

translation.text: We pray to Indra for his gift, to him the Fearless and the Strong, We pray to him the Lord of wealth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तस्मि॒न्हि सन्त्यू॒तयो॒ विश्वा॒ अभी॑रवः॒ सचा॑ तमा व॑हन्तु॒ सप्त॑यः पुरू॒वसुं॒ मदा॑य॒ हर॑यः सु॒तम्
verses.transliteration: tásmin hí sánty ūtáyo  víśvā ábhīravaḥ sácā  tám ā́ vahantu sáptayaḥ purūvásum  mádāya hárayaḥ sutám

translation.text: For verily combined in him are all the fearless powers of aid. Him, rich in wealth, let swift Steeds bring to us, his Bays, to Soma juice for his carouse:

verses.sanskrit_deva: यस्ते॒ मदो॒ वरे॑ण्यो॒ य इ॑न्द्र वृत्र॒हन्त॑मः य आ॑द॒दिः स्व१॒॑र्नृभि॒र्यः पृत॑नासु दु॒ष्टरः॑
verses.transliteration: yás te mádo váreṇyo  yá indra vr̥trahántamaḥ  yá ādadíḥ svàr nŕ̥bhir  yáḥ pŕ̥tanāsu duṣṭáraḥ

translation.text: Yea, that most excellent carouse, Indra, which slays most enemies, With Heroes wins the light of heaven, and is invincible in war:

verses.sanskrit_deva: यो दु॒ष्टरो॑ विश्ववार श्र॒वाय्यो॒ वाजे॒ष्वस्ति॑ तरु॒ता स नः॑ शविष्ठ॒ सव॒ना व॑सो गहि ग॒मेम॒ गोम॑ति व्र॒जे
verses.transliteration: yó duṣṭáro viśvavāra śravā́yyo  vā́jeṣv ásti tarutā́  sá naḥ śaviṣṭha sávanā́ vaso gahi  gaméma gómati vrajé

translation.text: Which merits fame, all-bountiful! and, unsubdued, hath victory in deeds of might. So come to our libations, Strongest! Excellent! May we obtain a stall of kine.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ग॒व्यो षु णो॒ यथा॑ पु॒राश्व॒योत र॑थ॒या व॒रि॒व॒स्य म॑हामह
verses.transliteration: gavyó ṣú ṇo yáthā purā́-  -aśvayótá rathayā́  varivasyá mahāmaha

translation.text: Responding to our wish for cows, for steeds, and chariots, as of old, Be gracious, Greatest of the Great

verses.sanskrit_deva: न॒हि ते॑ शूर॒ राध॒सोऽन्तं॑ वि॒न्दामि॑ स॒त्रा द॒श॒स्या नो॑ मघव॒न्नू चि॑दद्रिवो॒ धियो॒ वाजे॑भिराविथ
verses.transliteration: nahí te śūra rā́dhasaḥ-  -ántaṃ vindā́mi satrā́  daśasyā́ no maghavan nū́ cid adrivo  dhíyo vā́jebhir āvitha

translation.text: For, Hero, nowhere can I find the bounds of thy munificence. Still do thou favour us, O Bolt-armed Maghavan: with strength hast thou rewarded hymns.

verses.sanskrit_deva: य ऋ॒ष्वः श्रा॑व॒यत्स॑खा॒ विश्वेत्स वे॑द॒ जनि॑मा पुरुष्टु॒तः तं विश्वे॒ मानु॑षा यु॒गेन्द्रं॑ हवन्ते तवि॒षं य॒तस्रु॑चः
verses.transliteration: yá r̥ṣváḥ śrāvayátsakhā  víśvét sá veda jánimā puruṣṭutáḥ  táṃ víśve mā́nuṣā yugā́-  -índraṃ havante taviṣáṃ yatásrucaḥ

translation.text: High, glorifier of his friend, he knows all generations, he whom many praise. All races of mankind with ladies lifted up invoke that Mighty Indra's aid.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स नो॒ वाजे॑ष्ववि॒ता पु॑रू॒वसुः॑ पुरःस्था॒ता म॒घवा॑ वृत्र॒हा भु॑वत्
verses.transliteration: sá no vā́jeṣv avitā́ purūvásuḥ  purasthātā́ maghávā vr̥trahā́ bhuvat

translation.text: Be he our Champion and Protector in great deeds, rich in all wealth, the Vr̥itra-slayer, Maghavan.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भि वो॑ वी॒रमन्ध॑सो॒ मदे॑षु गाय गि॒रा म॒हा विचे॑तसम् इन्द्रं॒ नाम॒ श्रुत्यं॑ शा॒किनं॒ वचो॒ यथा॑
verses.transliteration: abhí vo vīrám ándhaso  mádeṣu gāya  girā́ mahā́ vícetasam  índraṃ nā́ma śrútyaṃ śākínaṃ váco yáthā

translation.text: In the wild raptures of the juice sing to your Hero with high laud, to him the Wise, To Indra, glorious in his name, the Mighty One, even as the hymn alloweth it.

verses.sanskrit_deva: द॒दी रेक्ण॑स्त॒न्वे॑ द॒दिर्वसु॑ द॒दिर्वाजे॑षु पुरुहूत वा॒जिन॑म् नू॒नमथ॑
verses.transliteration: dadī́ rékṇas tanvè dadír vásu  dadír vā́jeṣu puruhūta vājínam  nūnám átha

translation.text: Thou givest wealth to me myself, thou givest treasure, Excellent! and the strong steed, O Much-invoked, in deeds of might, yea, even now.

verses.sanskrit_deva: विश्वे॑षामिर॒ज्यन्तं॒ वसू॑नां सास॒ह्वांसं॑ चिद॒स्य वर्प॑सः कृ॒प॒य॒तो नू॒नमत्यथ॑
verses.transliteration: víśveṣām irajyántaṃ vásūnāṃ  sāsahvā́ṃsaṃ cid asyá várpasaḥ  kr̥payató nūnám áty átha

translation.text: Him, Sovran Ruler of all precious things, who even hath power o'er this fair form of his, As now it taketh shape, and afterward,

verses.sanskrit_deva: म॒हः सु वो॒ अर॑मिषे॒ स्तवा॑महे मी॒ळ्हुषे॑ अरंग॒माय॒ जग्म॑ये य॒ज्ञेभि॑र्गी॒र्भिर्वि॒श्वम॑नुषां म॒रुता॑मियक्षसि॒ गाये॑ त्वा॒ नम॑सा गि॒रा
verses.transliteration: maháḥ sú vo áramiṣe  stávāmahe  mīḷhúṣe araṃgamā́ya jágmaye  yajñébhir gīrbhír  viśvámanuṣām marútām iyakṣasi  gā́ye tvā námasā girā́

translation.text: We praise, so that the Mighty One may speed to you, Pourer of boun ies, Traveller, prepared to go. Thou favourest the Maruts known to all, by song and sacrifice. With song and praise I sing to thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ये पा॒तय॑न्ते॒ अज्म॑भिर्गिरी॒णां स्नुभि॑रेषाम् य॒ज्ञं म॑हि॒ष्वणी॑नां सु॒म्नं तु॑वि॒ष्वणी॑नां॒ प्राध्व॒रे
verses.transliteration: yé pātáyante ájmabhir  girīṇā́ṃ snúbhir eṣām  yajñám mahiṣváṇīnāṃ  sumnáṃ tuviṣváṇīnām  prā́dhvaré

translation.text: We in the sacrifice perform their will whose voice is lifted high, The worship of those Thundering Ories who o'er the ridges of these mountains fly in troops.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र॒भ॒ङ्गं दु॑र्मती॒नामिन्द्र॑ शवि॒ष्ठा भ॑र र॒यिम॒स्मभ्यं॒ युज्यं॑ चोदयन्मते॒ ज्येष्ठं॑ चोदयन्मते
verses.transliteration: prabhaṅgáṃ durmatīnā́m  índra śaviṣṭhā́ bhara  rayím asmábhyaṃ yújyaṃ codayanmate  jyéṣṭhaṃ codayanmate

translation.text: O Indra, Mightiest, bring us that which crushes men of evil minds, Wealth suited to our needs, O Stirrer of the thought, best wealth, O thou who stirrest thought.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सनि॑तः॒ सुस॑नित॒रुग्र॒ चित्र॒ चेति॑ष्ठ॒ सूनृ॑त प्रा॒सहा॑ सम्रा॒ट् सहु॑रिं॒ सह॑न्तं भु॒ज्युं वाजे॑षु॒ पूर्व्य॑म्
verses.transliteration: sánitaḥ súsanitar úgra  cítra cétiṣṭha sū́nr̥ta  prāsáhā samrāṭ sáhuriṃ sáhantam  bhujyúṃ vā́jeṣu pū́rvyam

translation.text: O Winner, noble winner, strong, wondrous, most splendid, excellent, Sole Lord of victory, bring all-ovcrpowering wealth, joy-giving, chief in deeds of might.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ स ए॑तु॒ य ईव॒दाँ अदे॑वः पू॒र्तमा॑द॒दे यथा॑ चि॒द्वशो॑ अ॒श्व्यः पृ॑थु॒श्रव॑सि कानी॒ते॒३॒॑ऽस्या व्युष्या॑द॒दे
verses.transliteration: ā́ sá etu yá ī́vad ā́m̐  ádevaḥ pūrtám ādadé  yáthā cid váśo aśvyáḥ  pr̥thuśrávasi kānīté-  -asyā́ vyúṣy ādadé

translation.text: Now let the godless man approach who hath received reward so great As Vaṣa Aṣvya, when this light of morning dawned, received from Pr̥ithuṣravas, from Kanîta's son.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ष॒ष्टिं स॒हस्राश्व्य॑स्या॒युता॑सन॒मुष्ट्रा॑नां विंश॒तिं श॒ता दश॒ श्यावी॑नां श॒ता दश॒ त्र्य॑रुषीणां॒ दश॒ गवां॑ स॒हस्रा॑
verses.transliteration: ṣaṣṭíṃ sahásrā́śvyasyāyútāsanam  úṣṭrānāṃ viṃśatíṃ śatā́  dáśa śyā́vīnāṃ śatā́  dáśa tryàruṣīṇāṃ  dáśa gávāṃ sahásrā

translation.text: Steeds sixty thousand and ten thousand kine, and twenty hundred camels I obtained; Ten hundred brown in hue, and other ten red in three spots: in all, ten thousand kine.

verses.sanskrit_deva: दश॑ श्या॒वा ऋ॒धद्र॑यो वी॒तवा॑रास आ॒शवः॑ म॒थ्रा ने॒मिं नि वा॑वृतुः
verses.transliteration: dáśa śyāvā́ r̥dhádrayo  vītávārāsa āśávaḥ  mathrā́ nemíṃ ní vāvr̥tuḥ

translation.text: Ten browns that make my wealth increase, fleet steeds whose tails are long and fair, Turn with swift whirl my chariot wheel;

verses.sanskrit_deva: दाना॑सः पृथु॒श्रव॑सः कानी॒तस्य॑ सु॒राध॑सः रथं॑ हिर॒ण्ययं॒ दद॒न्मंहि॑ष्ठः सू॒रिर॑भू॒द्वर्षि॑ष्ठमकृत॒ श्रवः॑
verses.transliteration: dā́nāsaḥ pr̥thuśrávasaḥ  kānītásya surā́dhasaḥ  ráthaṃ hiraṇyáyaṃ dádat-  máṃhiṣṭhaḥ sūrír abhūd  várṣiṣṭham akr̥ta śrávaḥ

translation.text: The gifts which Pr̥ithuṣravas gave, Kanîta's son munificent. He gave a chariot wrought of gold: the prince was passing bountiful, and won himself most lofty fame.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ नो॑ वायो म॒हे तने॑ या॒हि म॒खाय॒ पाज॑से व॒यं हि ते॑ चकृ॒मा भूरि॑ दा॒वने॑ स॒द्यश्चि॒न्महि॑ दा॒वने॑
verses.transliteration: ā́ no vāyo mahé táne  yāhí makhā́ya pā́jase  vayáṃ hí te cakr̥mā́ bhū́ri dāváne  sadyáś cin máhi dāváne

translation.text: Come thou to this great rite of ours, Vâyu! to give us vigorous light. We have served thee that thou mightest give much to us, yea, mightest quickly give great wealth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यो अश्वे॑भि॒र्वह॑ते॒ वस्त॑ उ॒स्रास्त्रिः स॒प्त स॑प्तती॒नाम् ए॒भिः सोमे॑भिः सोम॒सुद्भिः॑ सोमपा दा॒नाय॑ शुक्रपूतपाः
verses.transliteration: yó áśvebhir váhate vásta usrā́s  tríḥ saptá saptatīnā́m  ebhíḥ sómebhiḥ somasúdbhiḥ somapāḥ-  dānā́ya śukrapūtapāḥ

translation.text: Who with thrice seven times seventy horses comes to us, invested with the rays of morn, Through these our Soma-draughts and those who press, to give, drinker of pure bright Soma Juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यो म॑ इ॒मं चि॑दु॒ त्मनाम॑न्दच्चि॒त्रं दा॒वने॑ अ॒र॒ट्वे अक्षे॒ नहु॑षे सु॒कृत्व॑नि सु॒कृत्त॑राय सु॒क्रतुः॑
verses.transliteration: yó ma imáṃ cid u tmánā-  -ámandac citráṃ dāváne  araṭvé ákṣe náhuṣe sukŕ̥tvani  sukŕ̥ttarāya sukrátuḥ

translation.text: Who hath inclined this glorious one, buunteous himself, to give me gifts. Borne on firm chariot with the prosperous Nahup, wise, to a man yet more devout.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒च॒थ्ये॒३॒॑ वपु॑षि॒ यः स्व॒राळु॒त वा॑यो घृत॒स्नाः अश्वे॑षितं॒ रजे॑षितं॒ शुने॑षितं॒ प्राज्म॒ तदि॒दं नु तत्
verses.transliteration: ucathyè vápuṣi yáḥ svarā́ḷ  utá vāyo ghr̥tasnā́ḥ  áśveṣitaṃ rájeṣitaṃ śúneṣitam  prā́jma tád idáṃ nú tát

translation.text: Sole Lord in beauty meet for praise, O Vâyu, dropping fatness down, Hurried along by steeds, by camels, and by hounds, spreads forth thy train: even this it is.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अध॑ प्रि॒यमि॑षि॒राय॑ ष॒ष्टिं स॒हस्रा॑सनम् अश्वा॑ना॒मिन्न वृष्णा॑म्
verses.transliteration: ádha priyám iṣirā́ya  ṣaṣṭíṃ sahásrāsanam  áśvānām ín ná vŕ̥ṣṇām

translation.text: So, as a prize dear to the strong, the sixty thousand have I gained, Bulls that resemble vigorous steeds.

verses.sanskrit_deva: गावो॒ न यू॒थमुप॑ यन्ति॒ वध्र॑य॒ उप॒ मा य॑न्ति॒ वध्र॑यः
verses.transliteration: gā́vo ná yūthám úpa yanti vádhrayaḥ-  úpa mā́ yanti vádhrayaḥ

translation.text: To me come oxen like a herd, yea, unto me the oxen come.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अध॒ यच्चार॑थे ग॒णे श॒तमुष्ट्राँ॒ अचि॑क्रदत् अध॒ श्वित्ने॑षु विंश॒तिं श॒ता
verses.transliteration: ádha yác cā́rathe gaṇé  śatám úṣṭrām̐ ácikradat  ádha śvítneṣu viṃśatíṃ śatā́

translation.text: And in the grazing herd he made a hundred camels bleat for me, And twenty hundred mid the white.

verses.sanskrit_deva: श॒तं दा॒से ब॑ल्बू॒थे विप्र॒स्तरु॑क्ष॒ आ द॑दे ते ते॑ वायवि॒मे जना॒ मद॒न्तीन्द्र॑गोपा॒ मद॑न्ति दे॒वगो॑पाः
verses.transliteration: śatáṃ dāsé balbūthé  vípras tárukṣa ā́ dade  té te vāyav imé jánāḥ-  mádantī́ndragopāḥ-  mádanti devágopāḥ

translation.text: A hundred has the sage received, Dâsa Balbûtha's and Taruksha's gifts. These are thy people, Vâyu, who rejoice with Indra for their guard, rejoice with Gods for guards.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अध॒ स्या योष॑णा म॒ही प्र॑ती॒ची वश॑म॒श्व्यम् अधि॑रुक्मा॒ वि नी॑यते
verses.transliteration: ádha syā́ yóṣaṇā mahī́  pratīcī́ váśam aśvyám  ádhirukmā ví nīyate

translation.text: And now to Vaṣa Aṣvya here this stately woman is led forth, Adorned with ornaments of gold.

verses.sanskrit_deva: महि॑ वो मह॒तामवो॒ वरु॑ण॒ मित्र॑ दा॒शुषे॑ यमा॑दित्या अ॒भि द्रु॒हो रक्ष॑था॒ नेम॒घं न॑शदने॒हसो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑ सुऊ॒तयो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑
verses.transliteration: máhi vo mahatā́m ávo  váruṇa mítra dāśúṣe  yám ādityā abhí druhó  rákṣathā ném agháṃ naśad  aneháso va ūtáyaḥ  suūtáyo va ūtáyaḥ

translation.text: GREAT help ye give the worshipper, Varuṇa, Mitra, Mighty Ones! No sorrow ever reaches him whom ye, Âdityas, keep from harm. Yours are incomparable aids, and good the succour they afford.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वि॒दा दे॑वा अ॒घाना॒मादि॑त्यासो अ॒पाकृ॑तिम् प॒क्षा वयो॒ यथो॒परि॒ व्य१॒॑स्मे शर्म॑ यच्छताने॒हसो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑ सुऊ॒तयो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑
verses.transliteration: vidā́ devā aghā́nām  ā́dityāso apā́kr̥tim  pakṣā́ váyo yáthopári  vy àsmé śárma yachata-  aneháso va ūtáyaḥ  suūtáyo va ūtáyaḥ

translation.text: O Gods, Âdityas, well ye know the way to keep all woes afar. As the birds spread their sheltering wings, spread your protection over us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: व्य१॒॑स्मे अधि॒ शर्म॒ तत्प॒क्षा वयो॒ न य॑न्तन विश्वा॑नि विश्ववेदसो वरू॒थ्या॑ मनामहेऽने॒हसो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑ सुऊ॒तयो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑
verses.transliteration: vy àsmé ádhi śárma tát  pakṣā́ váyo ná yantana  víśvāni viśvavedaso  varūthyā̀ manāmahe  aneháso va ūtáyaḥ  suūtáyo va ūtáyaḥ

translation.text: As the birds spread their sheltering wings let your protection cover us. We mean all shelter and defence, ye who have all things for your own.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यस्मा॒ अरा॑सत॒ क्षयं॑ जी॒वातुं॑ च॒ प्रचे॑तसः मनो॒र्विश्व॑स्य॒ घेदि॒म आ॑दि॒त्या रा॒य ई॑शतेऽने॒हसो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑ सुऊ॒तयो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑
verses.transliteration: yásmā árāsata kṣáyaṃ  jīvā́tuṃ ca prácetasaḥ  mánor víśvasya ghéd imé-  ādityā́ rāyá īśate  aneháso va ūtáyaḥ  suūtáyo va ūtáyaḥ

translation.text: To whomsoever they, Most Wise, have given a home and means of life, O'er the whole riches of this man they, the Âdityas, have control.

verses.sanskrit_deva: परि॑ णो वृणजन्न॒घा दु॒र्गाणि॑ र॒थ्यो॑ यथा स्यामेदिन्द्र॑स्य॒ शर्म॑ण्यादि॒त्याना॑मु॒ताव॑स्यने॒हसो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑ सुऊ॒तयो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑
verses.transliteration: pári ṇo vr̥ṇajann aghā́  durgā́ṇi rathyò yathā  syā́méd índrasya śármaṇi  ādityā́nām utā́vasi-  aneháso va ūtáyaḥ  suūtáyo va ūtáyaḥ

translation.text: As drivers of the car avoid ill roads, let sorrows pass us by. May we be under Indra's guard, in the Âdityas' favouring grace.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प॒रि॒ह्वृ॒तेद॒ना जनो॑ यु॒ष्माद॑त्तस्य वायति देवा॒ अद॑भ्रमाश वो॒ यमा॑दित्या॒ अहे॑तनाने॒हसो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑ सुऊ॒तयो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑
verses.transliteration: parihvr̥téd anā́ jáno  yuṣmā́dattasya vāyati  dévā ádabhram āśa vo  yám ādityā áhetana-  aneháso va ūtáyaḥ  suūtáyo va ūtáyaḥ

translation.text: For verily men sink and faint through loss of wealth which ye have given. Much hath he gained from you, O Gods, whom ye, Âdityas, have approached.

verses.sanskrit_deva: न तं ति॒ग्मं च॒न त्यजो॒ न द्रा॑सद॒भि तं गु॒रु यस्मा॑ उ॒ शर्म॑ स॒प्रथ॒ आदि॑त्यासो॒ अरा॑ध्वमने॒हसो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑ सुऊ॒तयो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑
verses.transliteration: ná táṃ tigmáṃ caná tyájo  ná drāsad abhí táṃ gurú  yásmā u śárma sapráthaḥ-  ā́dityāso árādhvam  aneháso va ūtáyaḥ  suūtáyo va ūtáyaḥ

translation.text: On him shall no fierce anger fall, no sore distress shall visit him, To whom, Âdityas, ye have lent your shelter that extendeth far.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यु॒ष्मे दे॑वा॒ अपि॑ ष्मसि॒ युध्य॑न्त इव॒ वर्म॑सु यू॒यं म॒हो न॒ एन॑सो यू॒यमर्भा॑दुरुष्यताने॒हसो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑ सुऊ॒तयो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑
verses.transliteration: yuṣmé devā ápi ṣmasi  yúdhyanta iva vármasu  yūyám mahó na énaso  yūyám árbhād uruṣyata-  aneháso va ūtáyaḥ  suūtáyo va ūtáyaḥ

translation.text: Resting in you, O Gods, we are like men who fight in coats of mail. Ye guard us from each great offence, ye guard us from each lighter fault.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अदि॑तिर्न उरुष्य॒त्वदि॑तिः॒ शर्म॑ यच्छतु मा॒ता मि॒त्रस्य॑ रे॒वतो॑ऽर्य॒म्णो वरु॑णस्य चाने॒हसो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑ सुऊ॒तयो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑
verses.transliteration: áditir na uruṣyatu-  -áditiḥ śárma yachatu  mātā́ mitrásya reváto  aryamṇó váruṇasya ca  aneháso va ūtáyaḥ  suūtáyo va ūtáyaḥ

translation.text: May Aditi defend us, may Aditi guard and shelter us, Mother of wealthy Mitra and of Aryaman and Varuṇa.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यद्दे॑वाः॒ शर्म॑ शर॒णं यद्भ॒द्रं यद॑नातु॒रम् त्रि॒धातु॒ यद्व॑रू॒थ्यं१॒॑ तद॒स्मासु॒ वि य॑न्तनाने॒हसो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑ सुऊ॒तयो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑
verses.transliteration: yád devāḥ śárma śaraṇáṃ  yád bhadráṃ yád anāturám  tridhā́tu yád varūthyàṃ  tád asmā́su ví yantana-  aneháso va ūtáyaḥ  suūtáyo va ūtáyaḥ

translation.text: The shelter, Gods, that is secure, auspicious, free from malady, A sure protection, triply strong, even that do ye extend to us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आदि॑त्या॒ अव॒ हि ख्यताधि॒ कूला॑दिव॒ स्पशः॑ सु॒ती॒र्थमर्व॑तो य॒थानु॑ नो नेषथा सु॒गम॑ने॒हसो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑ सुऊ॒तयो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑
verses.transliteration: ā́dityā áva hí khyáta-  -ádhi kū́lād iva spáśaḥ  sutīrthám árvato yathā-  -ánu no neṣathā sugám  aneháso va ūtáyaḥ  suūtáyo va ūtáyaḥ

translation.text: Look down on us, Âdityas, as a guide exploring from the bank. Lead us to pleasant ways as men lead horses to an easy ford.

verses.sanskrit_deva: नेह भ॒द्रं र॑क्ष॒स्विने॒ नाव॒यै नोप॒या उ॒त गवे॑ च भ॒द्रं धे॒नवे॑ वी॒राय॑ च श्रवस्य॒ते॑ऽने॒हसो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑ सुऊ॒तयो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑
verses.transliteration: néhá bhadráṃ rakṣasvíne  nā́vayaí nópayā́ utá  gáve ca bhadráṃ dhenáve  vīrā́ya ca śravasyaté-  aneháso va ūtáyaḥ  suūtáyo va ūtáyaḥ

translation.text: Ill be it for the demons' friend to find us or come near to us. But for the milch-cow be it well, and for the man who strives for fame.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यदा॒विर्यद॑पी॒च्यं१॒॑ देवा॑सो॒ अस्ति॑ दुष्कृ॒तम् त्रि॒ते तद्विश्व॑मा॒प्त्य आ॒रे अ॒स्मद्द॑धातनाने॒हसो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑ सुऊ॒तयो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑
verses.transliteration: yád āvír yád apīcyàṃ  dévāso ásti duṣkr̥tám  trité tád víśvam āptyé-  āré asmád dadhātana-  aneháso va ūtáyaḥ  suūtáyo va ūtáyaḥ

translation.text: Each evil deed made manifest, and that which is concealed, O Gods, The whole thereof remove from us to Trita Âptya far away.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यच्च॒ गोषु॑ दु॒ष्ष्वप्न्यं॒ यच्चा॒स्मे दु॑हितर्दिवः त्रि॒ताय॒ तद्वि॑भावर्या॒प्त्याय॒ परा॑ वहाने॒हसो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑ सुऊ॒तयो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑
verses.transliteration: yác ca góṣu duṣvápnyaṃ  yác cāsmé duhitar divaḥ  tritā́ya tád vibhāvari-  āptyā́ya párā vaha-  aneháso va ūtáyaḥ  suūtáyo va ūtáyaḥ

translation.text: Daughter of Heaven, the dream that bodes evil to us or to our kine, Remove, O Lady of the Light, to Trita Âptya far away.

verses.sanskrit_deva: नि॒ष्कं वा॑ घा कृ॒णव॑ते॒ स्रजं॑ वा दुहितर्दिवः त्रि॒ते दु॒ष्ष्वप्न्यं॒ सर्व॑मा॒प्त्ये परि॑ दद्मस्यने॒हसो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑ सुऊ॒तयो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑
verses.transliteration: niṣkáṃ vā ghā kr̥ṇávate  srájaṃ vā duhitar divaḥ  trité duṣvápnyaṃ sárvam  āptyé pári dadmasi-  aneháso va ūtáyaḥ  suūtáyo va ūtáyaḥ

translation.text: Even if, O Child of Heaven, it make a garland or a chain of gold, The whole bad dream, whate'cr it be, to Trita Âptya we consign.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तद॑न्नाय॒ तद॑पसे॒ तं भा॒गमु॑पसे॒दुषे॑ त्रि॒ताय॑ च द्वि॒ताय॒ चोषो॑ दु॒ष्ष्वप्न्यं॑ वहाने॒हसो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑ सुऊ॒तयो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑
verses.transliteration: tádannāya tádapase  tám bhāgám upasedúṣe  tritā́ya ca dvitā́ya ca-  -úṣo duṣvápnyaṃ vaha-  aneháso va ūtáyaḥ  suūtáyo va ūtáyaḥ

translation.text: To him whose food and work is this, who comes to take his share therein, To Trita, and to Dvita, Dawn! bear thou the evil dream away.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यथा॑ क॒लां यथा॑ श॒फं यथ॑ ऋ॒णं सं॒नया॑मसि ए॒वा दु॒ष्ष्वप्न्यं॒ सर्व॑मा॒प्त्ये सं न॑यामस्यने॒हसो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑ सुऊ॒तयो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑
verses.transliteration: yáthā kalā́ṃ yáthā śapháṃ  yátha r̥ṇáṃ saṃnáyāmasi  evā́ duṣvápnyaṃ sárvam  āptyé sáṃ nayāmasi-  aneháso va ūtáyaḥ  suūtáyo va ūtáyaḥ

translation.text: As we collect the utmost debt, even the eighth and sixteenth part, So unto Âptya we transfer together all the evil dream.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अजै॑ष्मा॒द्यास॑नाम॒ चाभू॒माना॑गसो व॒यम् उषो॒ यस्मा॑द्दु॒ष्ष्वप्न्या॒दभै॒ष्माप॒ तदु॑च्छत्वने॒हसो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑ सुऊ॒तयो॑ व ऊ॒तयः॑
verses.transliteration: ájaiṣmādyā́sanāma ca-  -ábhūmā́nāgaso vayám  úṣo yásmād duṣvápnyād  ábhaiṣmā́pa tád uchatu-  aneháso va ūtáyaḥ  suūtáyo va ūtáyaḥ

translation.text: Now have we conquered and obtained, and from our trespasses are free. Shine thou away the evil dream, O Dawn, whereof we are afraid. Yours are incomparable aids, and good the succour they afford.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स्वा॒दोर॑भक्षि॒ वय॑सः सुमे॒धाः स्वा॒ध्यो॑ वरिवो॒वित्त॑रस्य विश्वे॒ यं दे॒वा उ॒त मर्त्या॑सो॒ मधु॑ ब्रु॒वन्तो॑ अ॒भि सं॒चर॑न्ति
verses.transliteration: svādór abhakṣi váyasaḥ sumedhā́ḥ  svādhyò varivovíttarasya  víśve yáṃ devā́ utá mártyāso  mádhu bruvánto abhí saṃcáranti

translation.text: WISELY have I enjoyed the savoury viand, religious-thoughted, best to find out treasure, The food to which all Deities and mortals, calling it meath, gather themselves together.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒न्तश्च॒ प्रागा॒ अदि॑तिर्भवास्यवया॒ता हर॑सो॒ दैव्य॑स्य इन्द॒विन्द्र॑स्य स॒ख्यं जु॑षा॒णः श्रौष्टी॑व॒ धुर॒मनु॑ रा॒य ऋ॑ध्याः
verses.transliteration: antáś ca prā́gā áditir bhavāsi-  avayātā́ háraso daívyasya  índav índrasya sakhyáṃ juṣāṇáḥ  śraúṣṭīva dhúram ánu rāyá r̥dhyāḥ

translation.text: Tlou shalt be Aditi as thou hast entered within, appeaser of celestial anger. Indu, enjoying Indra's friendship, bring us – as a swift steed the car – forward to riches.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अपा॑म॒ सोम॑म॒मृता॑ अभू॒माग॑न्म॒ ज्योति॒रवि॑दाम दे॒वान् किं नू॒नम॒स्मान्कृ॑णव॒दरा॑तिः॒ किमु॑ धू॒र्तिर॑मृत॒ मर्त्य॑स्य
verses.transliteration: ápāma sómam amŕ̥tā abhūma-  -áganma jyótir ávidāma devā́n  kíṃ nūnám asmā́n kr̥ṇavad árātiḥ  kím u dhūrtír amr̥ta mártyasya

translation.text: We have drunk Soma and become immortal; we have attained the light, the Gods discovered. Now what may foeman's malice do to harm us? What, O Immortal, mortal man's deception?

verses.sanskrit_deva: शं नो॑ भव हृ॒द आ पी॒त इ॑न्दो पि॒तेव॑ सोम सू॒नवे॑ सु॒शेवः॑ सखे॑व॒ सख्य॑ उरुशंस॒ धीरः॒ प्र ण॒ आयु॑र्जी॒वसे॑ सोम तारीः
verses.transliteration: śáṃ no bhava hr̥dá ā́ pītá indo  pitéva soma sūnáve suśévaḥ  sákheva sákhya uruśaṃsa dhī́raḥ  prá ṇa ā́yur jīváse soma tārīḥ

translation.text: Absorbed into the heart, be sweet, O Indu, as a kind father to his son, O Soma, As a wise Friend to friend: do thou, wide-ruler, O Soma, lengthen out our days for living.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒मे मा॑ पी॒ता य॒शस॑ उरु॒ष्यवो॒ रथं॒ न गावः॒ सम॑नाह॒ पर्व॑सु ते मा॑ रक्षन्तु वि॒स्रस॑श्च॒रित्रा॑दु॒त मा॒ स्रामा॑द्यवय॒न्त्विन्द॑वः
verses.transliteration: imé mā pītā́ yaśása uruṣyávo  ráthaṃ ná gā́vaḥ sám anāha párvasu  té mā rakṣantu visrásaś carítrād  utá mā srā́mād yavayantv índavaḥ

translation.text: These glorious drops that give me freedom have I drunk. Closely they knit my joints as straps secure a car. Let them protect my foot from slipping on the way: yea, let the drops I drink preserve me from disease.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निं न मा॑ मथि॒तं सं दि॑दीपः॒ प्र च॑क्षय कृणु॒हि वस्य॑सो नः अथा॒ हि ते॒ मद॒ आ सो॑म॒ मन्ये॑ रे॒वाँ इ॑व॒ प्र च॑रा पु॒ष्टिमच्छ॑
verses.transliteration: agníṃ ná mā mathitáṃ sáṃ didīpaḥ  prá cakṣaya kr̥ṇuhí vásyaso naḥ  áthā hí te máda ā́ soma mánye  revā́m̐ iva prá carā puṣṭím ácha

translation.text: Make me shine bright like fire produced by friction: give us a clearer sight and make us better. For in carouse I think of thee, O Soma, Shall I, as a rich man, attain to comfort?

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒षि॒रेण॑ ते॒ मन॑सा सु॒तस्य॑ भक्षी॒महि॒ पित्र्य॑स्येव रा॒यः सोम॑ राज॒न्प्र ण॒ आयूं॑षि तारी॒रहा॑नीव॒ सूर्यो॑ वास॒राणि॑
verses.transliteration: iṣiréṇa te mánasā sutásya  bhakṣīmáhi pítryasyeva rāyáḥ  sóma rājan prá ṇa ā́yūṃṣi tārīr  áhānīva sū́ryo vāsarā́ṇi

translation.text: May we enjoy with an enlivened spirit the juice thou givest, like ancestral riches. O Soma, King, prolong thou our existence as Sûrya makes the shining days grow longer.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सोम॑ राजन्मृ॒ळया॑ नः स्व॒स्ति तव॑ स्मसि व्र॒त्या॒३॒॑स्तस्य॑ विद्धि अल॑र्ति॒ दक्ष॑ उ॒त म॒न्युरि॑न्दो॒ मा नो॑ अ॒र्यो अ॑नुका॒मं परा॑ दाः
verses.transliteration: sóma rājan mr̥ḷáyā naḥ svastí  táva smasi vratyā̀s tásya viddhi  álarti dákṣa utá manyúr indo  mā́ no aryó anukāmám párā dāḥ

translation.text: King Soma, favour us and make us prosper: we are thy devotees; of this be mindful. Spirit and power are fresh in us, O Indu give us not up unto our foeman's pleasure.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं हि न॑स्त॒न्वः॑ सोम गो॒पा गात्रे॑गात्रे निष॒सत्था॑ नृ॒चक्षाः॑ यत्ते॑ व॒यं प्र॑मि॒नाम॑ व्र॒तानि॒ स नो॑ मृळ सुष॒खा दे॑व॒ वस्यः॑
verses.transliteration: tváṃ hí nas tanvàḥ soma gopā́ḥ-  gā́tre-gātre niṣasátthā nr̥cákṣāḥ  yát te vayám praminā́ma vratā́ni  sá no mr̥ḷa suṣakhā́ deva vásyaḥ

translation.text: For thou hast settled in each joint, O Soma, aim of men's eyes and guardian of our bodies. When we offend against thine holy statutes, as a kind Friend, God, best of all, be gracious.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ऋ॒दू॒दरे॑ण॒ सख्या॑ सचेय॒ यो मा॒ न रिष्ये॑द्धर्यश्व पी॒तः अ॒यं यः सोमो॒ न्यधा॑य्य॒स्मे तस्मा॒ इन्द्रं॑ प्र॒तिर॑मे॒म्यायुः॑
verses.transliteration: r̥dūdáreṇa sákhyā saceya  yó mā ná ríṣyed dharyaśva pītáḥ  ayáṃ yáḥ sómo ny ádhāyy asmé  tásmā índram pratíram emy ā́yuḥ

translation.text: May I be with the Friend whose heart is tender, who, Lord of Bays! when quaffed will never harm me- This Soma now deposited within me. For this, I pray for longer life to Indra.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अप॒ त्या अ॑स्थु॒रनि॑रा॒ अमी॑वा॒ निर॑त्रस॒न्तमि॑षीची॒रभै॑षुः आ सोमो॑ अ॒स्माँ अ॑रुह॒द्विहा॑या॒ अग॑न्म॒ यत्र॑ प्रति॒रन्त॒ आयुः॑
verses.transliteration: ápa tyā́ asthur ánirā ámīvāḥ-  nír atrasan támiṣīcīr ábhaiṣuḥ  ā́ sómo asmā́m̐ aruhad víhāyāḥ-  -áganma yátra pratiránta ā́yuḥ

translation.text: Our maladies have lost their strength and vanished: they feared, and passed away into the darkness. Soma hath risen in us, exceeding mighty, and we are come where men prolong existence.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यो न॒ इन्दुः॑ पितरो हृ॒त्सु पी॒तोऽम॑र्त्यो॒ मर्त्याँ॑ आवि॒वेश॑ तस्मै॒ सोमा॑य ह॒विषा॑ विधेम मृळी॒के अ॑स्य सुम॒तौ स्या॑म
verses.transliteration: yó na índuḥ pitaro hr̥tsú pītó  -ámartyo mártyām̐ āvivéśa  tásmai sómāya havíṣā vidhema  mr̥ḷīké asya sumataú syāma

translation.text: , Fathers, that Indu which our hearts have drunken, Immortal in himself, hath entered mortals. So let us serve this Soma with oblation, and rest securely in his grace and favour.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं सो॑म पि॒तृभिः॑ संविदा॒नोऽनु॒ द्यावा॑पृथि॒वी आ त॑तन्थ तस्मै॑ त इन्दो ह॒विषा॑ विधेम व॒यं स्या॑म॒ पत॑यो रयी॒णाम्
verses.transliteration: tváṃ soma pitŕ̥bhiḥ saṃvidānó  -ánu dyā́vāpr̥thivī́ ā́ tatantha  tásmai ta indo havíṣā vidhema  vayáṃ syāma pátayo rayīṇā́m

translation.text: Associate with the Fathers thou, O Soma, hast spread thyself abroad through earth and heaven. So with oblation let us serve thee, Indu, and so let us become the lords of riches,

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्राता॑रो देवा॒ अधि॑ वोचता नो॒ मा नो॑ नि॒द्रा ई॑शत॒ मोत जल्पिः॑ व॒यं सोम॑स्य वि॒श्वह॑ प्रि॒यासः॑ सु॒वीरा॑सो वि॒दथ॒मा व॑देम
verses.transliteration: trā́tāro devā ádhi vocatā no  mā́ no nidrā́ īśata mótá jálpiḥ  vayáṃ sómasya viśváha priyā́saḥ  suvī́rāso vidátham ā́ vadema

translation.text: Give us your blessing, O ye Gods' preservers. Never may sleep or idle talk control us. But evermore may we, as friends of Soma, speak to the synod with brave sons around us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं नः॑ सोम वि॒श्वतो॑ वयो॒धास्त्वं स्व॒र्विदा वि॑शा नृ॒चक्षाः॑ त्वं न॑ इन्द ऊ॒तिभिः॑ स॒जोषाः॑ पा॒हि प॒श्चाता॑दु॒त वा॑ पु॒रस्ता॑त्
verses.transliteration: tváṃ naḥ soma viśváto vayodhā́s  tváṃ svarvíd ā́ viśā nr̥cákṣāḥ  tváṃ na inda ūtíbhiḥ sajóṣāḥ  pāhí paścā́tād utá vā purástāt

translation.text: On all sides,. Soma, thou art our life-giver: aim of all eyes, light-finder, come within us. Indu, of one accord with thy protections both from behind and from before preserve us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भि प्र वः॑ सु॒राध॑स॒मिन्द्र॑मर्च॒ यथा॑ वि॒दे यो ज॑रि॒तृभ्यो॑ म॒घवा॑ पुरू॒वसुः॑ स॒हस्रे॑णेव॒ शिक्ष॑ति
verses.transliteration: abhí prá vaḥ surā́dhasam  índram arca yáthā vidé  yó jaritŕ̥bhyo maghávā purūvásuḥ  sahásreṇeva śíkṣati

translation.text: TO you will I sing Indra's praise who gives good gifts as well we know; The praise of Maghavan who, rich in treasure, aids his singers with wealth thousandfold.

verses.sanskrit_deva: श॒तानी॑केव॒ प्र जि॑गाति धृष्णु॒या हन्ति॑ वृ॒त्राणि॑ दा॒शुषे॑ गि॒रेरि॑व॒ प्र रसा॑ अस्य पिन्विरे॒ दत्रा॑णि पुरु॒भोज॑सः
verses.transliteration: śatā́nīkeva prá jigāti dhr̥ṣṇuyā́  hánti vr̥trā́ṇi dāśúṣe  girér iva prá rásā asya pinvire  dátrāṇi purubhójasaḥ

translation.text: As with a hundred hosts, he rushes boldly on, and for the offerer slays his foes. As from a mountain flow the water-brooks, thus flow his gifts who feedeth many a one.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ त्वा॑ सु॒तास॒ इन्द॑वो॒ मदा॒ य इ॑न्द्र गिर्वणः आपो॒ न व॑ज्रि॒न्नन्वो॒क्यं१॒॑ सरः॑ पृ॒णन्ति॑ शूर॒ राध॑से
verses.transliteration: ā́ tvā sutā́sa índavo  mádā yá indra girvaṇaḥ  ā́po ná vajrinn ánv okyàṃ sáraḥ  pr̥ṇánti śūra rā́dhase

translation.text: The drops effused, the gladdening draughts, O Indra, Lover of the Son As waters seek the lake where they are wont to rest, fill thee, for bounty, Thunderer.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ने॒हसं॑ प्र॒तर॑णं वि॒वक्ष॑णं॒ मध्वः॒ स्वादि॑ष्ठमीं पिब आ यथा॑ मन्दसा॒नः कि॒रासि॑ नः॒ प्र क्षु॒द्रेव॒ त्मना॑ धृ॒षत्
verses.transliteration: anehásam pratáraṇaṃ vivákṣaṇam  mádhvaḥ svā́diṣṭham īm piba  ā́ yáthā mandasānáḥ kirā́si naḥ  prá kṣudréva tmánā dhr̥ṣát

translation.text: The matchless draught that strengthens and gives eloquence, the sweetest of the meath drink thou, That in thy joy thou mayst scatter thy gifts o'er us, plenteously, even as the dust.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ नः॒ स्तोम॒मुप॑ द्र॒वद्धि॑या॒नो अश्वो॒ न सोतृ॑भिः यं ते॑ स्वधावन्त्स्व॒दय॑न्ति धे॒नव॒ इन्द्र॒ कण्वे॑षु रा॒तयः॑
verses.transliteration: ā́ na stómam úpa dravát  -hiyānó áśvo ná sótr̥bhiḥ  yáṃ te svadhāvan svadáyanti dhenávaḥ-  índra káṇveṣu rātáyaḥ

translation.text: Come quickly to our laud, urged on by Soma-pressers like a horse- Laud, Godlike Indra, which milch-kine make sweet for thee: with Kaṇva's sons are gifts for thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒ग्रं न वी॒रं नम॒सोप॑ सेदिम॒ विभू॑ति॒मक्षि॑तावसुम् उ॒द्रीव॑ वज्रिन्नव॒तो न सि॑ञ्च॒ते क्षर॑न्तीन्द्र धी॒तयः॑
verses.transliteration: ugráṃ ná vīráṃ námasópa sedima  víbhūtim ákṣitāvasum  udrī́va vajrinn avató ná siñcaté  kṣárantīndra dhītáyaḥ

translation.text: With homage have we sought thee as a Hero, strong, preeminent, with unfailing wealth. O Thunderer, as a plenteous spring pours forth its stream, so, Indra, flow our songs to thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यद्ध॑ नू॒नं यद्वा॑ य॒ज्ञे यद्वा॑ पृथि॒व्यामधि॑ अतो॑ नो य॒ज्ञमा॒शुभि॑र्महेमत उ॒ग्र उ॒ग्रेभि॒रा ग॑हि
verses.transliteration: yád dha nūnáṃ yád vā yajñé  yád vā pr̥thivyā́m ádhi  áto no yajñám āśúbhir mahemate-  ugrá ugrébhir ā́ gahi

translation.text: If now thou art at sacrifice, or if thou art upon the earth, Come thence, high-thoughted! to our sacrifice with the Swift, come, Mighty with the Mighty Ones.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒जि॒रासो॒ हर॑यो॒ ये त॑ आ॒शवो॒ वाता॑ इव प्रस॒क्षिणः॑ येभि॒रप॑त्यं॒ मनु॑षः प॒रीय॑से॒ येभि॒र्विश्वं॒ स्व॑र्दृ॒शे
verses.transliteration: ajirā́so hárayo yé ta āśávo  vā́tā iva prasakṣíṇaḥ  yébhir ápatyam mánuṣaḥ parī́yase  yébhir víśvaṃ svàr dr̥śé

translation.text: The active, fleet-foot, tawny Coursers that are thine are swift to victory, like the Wind, Wherewith thou goest round to visit Manus' seed, wherewith all heaven is visible.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ताव॑तस्त ईमह॒ इन्द्र॑ सु॒म्नस्य॒ गोम॑तः यथा॒ प्रावो॑ मघव॒न्मेध्या॑तिथिं॒ यथा॒ नीपा॑तिथिं॒ धने॑
verses.transliteration: etā́vatas ta īmahe-  índra sumnásya gómataḥ  yáthā prā́vo maghavan médhyātithiṃ  yáthā nī́pātithiṃ dháne

translation.text: Indra, from thee so great we crave prosperity in wealth of kine, As, Maghavan, thou favouredst Medhyâtithi, and, in the fight, Nîpâtithi.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यथा॒ कण्वे॑ मघवन्त्र॒सद॑स्यवि॒ यथा॑ प॒क्थे दश॑व्रजे यथा॒ गोश॑र्ये॒ अस॑नोर्ऋ॒जिश्व॒नीन्द्र॒ गोम॒द्धिर॑ण्यवत्
verses.transliteration: yáthā káṇve maghavan trasádasyavi  yáthā pakthé dáśavraje  yáthā góśarye ásanor r̥jíśvani-  -índra gómad dhíraṇyavat

translation.text: As, Maghavan, to Kaṇva, Trasadasyu, and to Paktha and Daṣavraja; As, Indra, to Goṣarya and R̥ijiṣvan, thou vouchsafedst wealth in kine and gold.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र सु श्रु॒तं सु॒राध॑स॒मर्चा॑ श॒क्रम॒भिष्ट॑ये यः सु॑न्व॒ते स्तु॑व॒ते काम्यं॒ वसु॑ स॒हस्रे॑णेव॒ मंह॑ते
verses.transliteration: prá sú śrutáṃ surā́dhasam  árcā śakrám abhíṣṭaye  yáḥ sunvaté stuvaté kā́myaṃ vásu  sahásreṇeva máṃhate

translation.text: Ṣakra I praise, to win his aid, far-famed, exceeding bountiful, Who gives, as 'twere in thousands, precious wealth to him who sheds the juice and worships him.

verses.sanskrit_deva: श॒तानी॑का हे॒तयो॑ अस्य दु॒ष्टरा॒ इन्द्र॑स्य स॒मिषो॑ म॒हीः गि॒रिर्न भु॒ज्मा म॒घव॑त्सु पिन्वते॒ यदीं॑ सु॒ता अम॑न्दिषुः
verses.transliteration: śatā́nīkā hetáyo asya duṣṭárāḥ-  índrasya samíṣo mahī́ḥ  girír ná bhujmā́ maghávatsu pinvate  yád īṃ sutā́ ámandiṣuḥ

translation.text: Arrows with hundred points, unconquerable, are this Indra's n-dghty arms in war. He streams on liberal worshippers like a hill with springs, when juices poured have gladdened him.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यदीं॑ सु॒तास॒ इन्द॑वो॒ऽभि प्रि॒यमम॑न्दिषुः आपो॒ न धा॑यि॒ सव॑नं म॒ आ व॑सो॒ दुघा॑ इ॒वोप॑ दा॒शुषे॑
verses.transliteration: yád īṃ sutā́sa índavo  -abhí priyám ámandiṣuḥ  ā́po ná dhāyi sávanam ma ā́ vaso  dúghā ivópa dāśúṣe

translation.text: What time the flowing Soma-drops have gladdened with their taste the Friend, Like water, gracious Lord! were my libations made, like milch-kine to the worshipper.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ने॒हसं॑ वो॒ हव॑मानमू॒तये॒ मध्वः॑ क्षरन्ति धी॒तयः॑ आ त्वा॑ वसो॒ हव॑मानास॒ इन्द॑व॒ उप॑ स्तो॒त्रेषु॑ दधिरे
verses.transliteration: anehásaṃ vo hávamānam ūtáye  mádhvaḥ kṣaranti dhītáyaḥ  ā́ tvā vaso hávamānāsa índavaḥ-  úpa stotréṣu dadhire

translation.text: To him the peerless, who is calling you to give you aid, forth flow the drops of pleasant meath. The Soloa-drops which call on thee, O gracious Lord, have brought thee to our hymn of praise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ नः॒ सोमे॑ स्वध्व॒र इ॑या॒नो अत्यो॒ न तो॑शते यं ते॑ स्वदाव॒न्त्स्वद॑न्ति गू॒र्तयः॑ पौ॒रे छ॑न्दयसे॒ हव॑म्
verses.transliteration: ā́ naḥ sóme svadhvaré-  iyānó átyo ná tośate  yáṃ te svadāvan svádanti gūrtáyaḥ  pauré chandayase hávam

translation.text: He rushes hurrying like a steed to Soma that adorns our rite, Which hymns make sweet to thee, lover of pleasant food. The call to Paura thou dost love.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र वी॒रमु॒ग्रं विवि॑चिं धन॒स्पृतं॒ विभू॑तिं॒ राध॑सो म॒हः उ॒द्रीव॑ वज्रिन्नव॒तो व॑सुत्व॒ना सदा॑ पीपेथ दा॒शुषे॑
verses.transliteration: prá vīrám ugráṃ víviciṃ dhanaspŕ̥taṃ  víbhūtiṃ rā́dhaso maháḥ  udrī́va vajrinn avató vasutvanā́  sádā pīpetha dāśúṣe

translation.text: Praise the strong, grasping Hero, winner of the spoil, ruling supreme oer mighty wealth. Like a full spring, O Thunderer, from thy store hast thou poured on the worshipper evermore.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यद्ध॑ नू॒नं प॑रा॒वति॒ यद्वा॑ पृथि॒व्यां दि॒वि यु॒जा॒न इ॑न्द्र॒ हरि॑भिर्महेमत ऋ॒ष्व ऋ॒ष्वेभि॒रा ग॑हि
verses.transliteration: yád dha nūnám parāváti  yád vā pr̥thivyā́ṃ diví  yujāná indra háribhir mahemate-  r̥ṣvá r̥ṣvébhir ā́ gahi

translation.text: Now whether thou be far away, or in the heavens, or on the earth, O Indra, mighty- thoughted, harnessing thy Bays, come Lofty with the Lofty Ones.

verses.sanskrit_deva: र॒थि॒रासो॒ हर॑यो॒ ये ते॑ अ॒स्रिध॒ ओजो॒ वात॑स्य॒ पिप्र॑ति येभि॒र्नि दस्युं॒ मनु॑षो नि॒घोष॑यो॒ येभिः॒ स्वः॑ प॒रीय॑से
verses.transliteration: rathirā́so hárayo yé te asrídhaḥ-  ójo vā́tasya píprati  yébhir ní dásyum mánuṣo nighóṣayo  yébhiḥ svàḥ parī́yase

translation.text: The Bays who draw thy chariot, Steeds who injure none, surpass the wind's impetuous strength- With whom thou silencest the enemy of man, with whon; thou goest round the sky.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ताव॑तस्ते वसो वि॒द्याम॑ शूर॒ नव्य॑सः यथा॒ प्राव॒ एत॑शं॒ कृत्व्ये॒ धने॒ यथा॒ वशं॒ दश॑व्रजे
verses.transliteration: etā́vatas te vaso  vidyā́ma śūra návyasaḥ  yáthā prā́va étaśaṃ kŕ̥tvye dháne  yáthā váśaṃ dáśavraje

translation.text: O gracious Hero, may we learn anew to know thee as thou art: As in decisive fight thou holpest Etaṣa, or Vaṣa 'gainst Daṣavraja,

verses.sanskrit_deva: यथा॒ कण्वे॑ मघव॒न्मेधे॑ अध्व॒रे दी॒र्घनी॑थे॒ दमू॑नसि यथा॒ गोश॑र्ये॒ असि॑षासो अद्रिवो॒ मयि॑ गो॒त्रं ह॑रि॒श्रिय॑म्
verses.transliteration: yáthā káṇve maghavan médhe adhvaré  dīrghánīthe dámūnasi  yáthā góśarye ásiṣāso adrivo  máyi gotráṃ hariśríyam

translation.text: As, Maghavan, to Kaṇva at the sacred feast, to Dîrghanîtha thine home-friend, As to Goṣarya thou, Stone-darter, gavest wealth, give me a gold-bright stall of kine.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यथा॒ मनौ॒ सांव॑रणौ॒ सोम॑मि॒न्द्रापि॑बः सु॒तम् नीपा॑तिथौ मघव॒न्मेध्या॑तिथौ॒ पुष्टि॑गौ॒ श्रुष्टि॑गौ॒ सचा॑
verses.transliteration: yáthā mánau sā́ṃvaraṇau  sómam indrā́pibaḥ sutám  nī́pātithau maghavan médhyātithau  púṣṭigau śrúṣṭigau sácā

translation.text: As with Manu Sâmvaraṇi, Indra, thou drankest Soma juice, And, Maghavan, with Nîpâtithi, Medbyatithi, with Pushṭigu and Ṣrushṭigu,–

verses.sanskrit_deva: पा॒र्ष॒द्वा॒णः प्रस्क॑ण्वं॒ सम॑सादय॒च्छया॑नं॒ जिव्रि॒मुद्धि॑तम् स॒हस्रा॑ण्यसिषास॒द्गवा॒मृषि॒स्त्वोतो॒ दस्य॑वे॒ वृकः॑
verses.transliteration: pārṣadvāṇáḥ práskaṇvaṃ sám asādayac  -śáyānaṃ jívrim úddhitam  sahásrāṇy asiṣāsad gávām ŕ̥ṣis  tvóto dásyave vŕ̥kaḥ

translation.text: The son of Pr̥ishadvâna was Praskaṇva's host, who lay decrepit and forlorn. Aided by thee the R̥ishi Dasyave-vr̥ika strove to obtain thousands of kine.

verses.sanskrit_deva: य उ॒क्थेभि॒र्न वि॒न्धते॑ चि॒किद्य ऋ॑षि॒चोद॑नः इन्द्रं॒ तमच्छा॑ वद॒ नव्य॑स्या म॒त्यरि॑ष्यन्तं॒ न भोज॑से
verses.transliteration: yá ukthébhir ná vindháte  cikíd yá r̥ṣicódanaḥ  índraṃ tám áchā vada návyasyā matī́-  áriṣyantaṃ ná bhójase

translation.text: Lord of swift bounty, he will win e'en with a steed of worthless sort. This, Indra, must be told of thee who wilt perform heroic deeds.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यस्मा॑ अ॒र्कं स॒प्तशी॑र्षाणमानृ॒चुस्त्रि॒धातु॑मुत्त॒मे प॒दे स त्वि१॒॑मा विश्वा॒ भुव॑नानि चिक्रद॒दादिज्ज॑निष्ट॒ पौंस्य॑म्
verses.transliteration: yásmā arkáṃ saptáśīrṣāṇam ānr̥cús  tridhā́tum uttamé padé  sá tv ìmā́ víśvā bhúvanāni cikradad  ā́d íj janiṣṭa paúṃsyam

translation.text: He unto whom they sang the seven-headed hymn, three-parted, in the loftiest place, He sent his thunder down on all these living things, and so displayed heroic might.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यो नो॑ दा॒ता वसू॑ना॒मिन्द्रं॒ तं हू॑महे व॒यम् वि॒द्मा ह्य॑स्य सुम॒तिं नवी॑यसीं ग॒मेम॒ गोम॑ति व्र॒जे
verses.transliteration: yó no dātā́ vásūnām  índraṃ táṃ hūmahe vayám  vidmā́ hy àsya sumatíṃ návīyasīṃ  gaméma gómati vrajé

translation.text: We invocate that Indra who bestoweth precious things on us. Now do we know his newest favour; may we gain a stable that is full of kine.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यस्मै॒ त्वं व॑सो दा॒नाय॒ शिक्ष॑सि॒ स रा॒यस्पोष॑मश्नुते तं त्वा॑ व॒यं म॑घवन्निन्द्र गिर्वणः सु॒ताव॑न्तो हवामहे
verses.transliteration: yásmai tváṃ vaso dānā́ya śíkṣasi  sá rāyás póṣam aśnute  táṃ tvā vayám maghavann indra girvaṇaḥ  sutā́vanto havāmahe

translation.text: He whom thou aidest, gracious Lord, to give again, obtains great wealth to nourish him. We with our Soma ready, Lover of the Song! call, Indra Maghavan, on thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: क॒दा च॒न स्त॒रीर॑सि॒ नेन्द्र॑ सश्चसि दा॒शुषे॑ उपो॒पेन्नु म॑घव॒न्भूय॒ इन्नु ते॒ दानं॑ दे॒वस्य॑ पृच्यते
verses.transliteration: kadā́ caná starī́r asi  néndra saścasi dāśúṣe  úpopén nú maghavan bhū́ya ín nú te  dā́naṃ devásya pr̥cyate

translation.text: Ne'er art thou fruitless, Indra ne'er dost thou desert the worshipper But now, O Maghavan, thy bounty as a God is poured forth ever more and more.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र यो न॑न॒क्षे अ॒भ्योज॑सा॒ क्रिविं॑ व॒धैः शुष्णं॑ निघो॒षय॑न् य॒देदस्त॑म्भीत्प्र॒थय॑न्न॒मूं दिव॒मादिज्ज॑निष्ट॒ पार्थि॑वः
verses.transliteration: prá yó nanakṣé abhy ójasā kríviṃ  vadhaíḥ śúṣṇaṃ nighoṣáyan  yadéd ástambhīt pratháyann amū́ṃ dívam  ā́d íj janiṣṭa pā́rthivaḥ

translation.text: He who hath overtaken Krivi with his might, and silenced Ṣushṇa with deathbolts,– When he supported yonder heaven and spread it out, then first the son of earth was born.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यस्या॒यं विश्व॒ आर्यो॒ दासः॑ शेवधि॒पा अ॒रिः ति॒रश्चि॑द॒र्ये रुश॑मे॒ परी॑रवि॒ तुभ्येत्सो अ॑ज्यते र॒यिः
verses.transliteration: yásyāyáṃ víśva ā́ryo  dā́saḥ śevadhipā́ aríḥ  tiráś cid aryé rúśame pávīravi  túbhyét só ajyate rayíḥ

translation.text: Good Lord of wealth is he to whom all Aryas, Dâsas here belong. Directly unto thee, the pious Ruṣama Pavîru, is that wealth brought nigh.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तु॒र॒ण्यवो॒ मधु॑मन्तं घृत॒श्चुतं॒ विप्रा॑सो अ॒र्कमा॑नृचुः अ॒स्मे र॒यिः प॑प्रथे॒ वृष्ण्यं॒ शवो॒ऽस्मे सु॑वा॒नास॒ इन्द॑वः
verses.transliteration: turaṇyávo mádhumantaṃ ghr̥taścútaṃ  víprāso arkám ānr̥cuḥ  asmé rayíḥ paprathe vŕ̥ṣṇyaṃ śávo  -asmé suvānā́sa índavaḥ

translation.text: In zealous haste the singers have sung forth a song distilling oil and rich in sweets. Riches have spread among us and heroic strength, with us are flowing Soma-drops.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यथा॒ मनौ॒ विव॑स्वति॒ सोमं॑ श॒क्रापि॑बः सु॒तम् यथा॑ त्रि॒ते छन्द॑ इन्द्र॒ जुजो॑षस्या॒यौ मा॑दयसे॒ सचा॑
verses.transliteration: yáthā mánau vívasvati  sómaṃ śakrā́pibaḥ sutám  yáthā trité chánda indra jújoṣasi-  āyaú mādayase sácā

translation.text: As, Ṣakra, thou with Manu called Vivasvan drankest Soma juice, As, Indra, thou didst love the hymn by Trita's side, so dost thou joy with Âyu now.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पृष॑ध्रे॒ मेध्ये॑ मात॒रिश्व॒नीन्द्र॑ सुवा॒ने अम॑न्दथाः यथा॒ सोमं॒ दश॑शिप्रे॒ दशो॑ण्ये॒ स्यूम॑रश्मा॒वृजू॑नसि
verses.transliteration: pŕ̥ṣadhre médhye mātaríśvani-  -índra suvāné ámandathāḥ  yáthā sómaṃ dáśaśipre dáśoṇye  syū́maraśmāv ŕ̥jūnasi

translation.text: As thou with Mâtariṣvan, Medhya, Pr̥ishadhra, hast cheered thee Indra, with pressed juice, Drunk Soma with R̥ijûnas, Syûmaraṣmi, by Daṣoṇya's Daṣaṣipra's side.

verses.sanskrit_deva: य उ॒क्था केव॑ला द॒धे यः सोमं॑ धृषि॒तापि॑बत् यस्मै॒ विष्णु॒स्त्रीणि॑ प॒दा वि॑चक्र॒म उप॑ मि॒त्रस्य॒ धर्म॑भिः
verses.transliteration: yá ukthā́ kévalā dadhé  yáḥ sómaṃ dhr̥ṣatā́pibat*  yásmai víṣṇus trī́ṇi padā́ vicakramé-  úpa mitrásya dhármabhiḥ

translation.text: Tis he who made the lauds his own and boldly drank the Soma juice, He to whom Vishṇu came striding his three wide steps, as Mitra's statutes ordered it.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यस्य॒ त्वमि॑न्द्र॒ स्तोमे॑षु चा॒कनो॒ वाजे॑ वाजिञ्छतक्रतो तं त्वा॑ व॒यं सु॒दुघा॑मिव गो॒दुहो॑ जुहू॒मसि॑ श्रव॒स्यवः॑
verses.transliteration: yásya tvám indra stómeṣu cākáno  vā́je vājiñ chatakrato  táṃ tvā vayáṃ sudúghām iva godúho  juhūmási śravasyávaḥ

translation.text: In whose laud thou didst joy, Indra, at the great deed, O Ṣatakratu, Mighty One! Seeking renown we call thee as the milkers call the cow who yields abundant milk.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यो नो॑ दा॒ता स नः॑ पि॒ता म॒हाँ उ॒ग्र ई॑शान॒कृत् अया॑मन्नु॒ग्रो म॒घवा॑ पुरू॒वसु॒र्गोरश्व॑स्य॒ प्र दा॑तु नः
verses.transliteration: yó no dātā́ sá naḥ pitā́  mahā́m̐ ugrá īśānakŕ̥t  áyāmann ugró maghávā purūvásur  gór áśvasya prá dātu naḥ

translation.text: He is our Sire who gives to us, Great, Mighty, ruling as he wills. Unsought, may he the Strong, Rich, Lord of ample wealth, give us of horses and of kine.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यस्मै॒ त्वं व॑सो दा॒नाय॒ मंह॑से॒ स रा॒यस्पोष॑मिन्वति व॒सू॒यवो॒ वसु॑पतिं श॒तक्र॑तुं॒ स्तोमै॒रिन्द्रं॑ हवामहे
verses.transliteration: yásmai tváṃ vaso dānā́ya máṃhase  sá rāyás póṣam invati  vasūyávo vásupatiṃ śatákratuṃ  stómair índraṃ havāmahe

translation.text: He to whom thou, Good Lord, givest that he may give increases wealth that nourishes. Eager for wealth we call on Indra, Lord of wealth, on Ṣatakratu with our lauds.

verses.sanskrit_deva: क॒दा च॒न प्र यु॑च्छस्यु॒भे नि पा॑सि॒ जन्म॑नी तुरी॑यादित्य॒ हव॑नं त इन्द्रि॒यमा त॑स्थाव॒मृतं॑ दि॒वि
verses.transliteration: kadā́ caná prá yuchasi-  ubhé ní pāsi jánmanī  túrīyāditya hávanaṃ ta indriyám  ā́ tasthāv amŕ̥taṃ diví

translation.text: Never art thou neglectful: thou guardest both races with thy care. The call on Indra, fourth Âditya! is thine own. Amrit is stablished in the heavens.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यस्मै॒ त्वं म॑घवन्निन्द्र गिर्वणः॒ शिक्षो॒ शिक्ष॑सि दा॒शुषे॑ अ॒स्माकं॒ गिर॑ उ॒त सु॑ष्टु॒तिं व॑सो कण्व॒वच्छृ॑णुधी॒ हव॑म्
verses.transliteration: yásmai tvám maghavann indra girvaṇaḥ  śíkṣo śíkṣasi dāśúṣe  asmā́kaṃ gíra utá suṣṭutíṃ vaso  kaṇvavác chr̥ṇudhī hávam

translation.text: The offerer whom thou, Indra, Lover of the Song, liberal Maghavan, favourest,– As at the call of Kaṇva so, O gracious Lord, hear, thou our songs and eulogy.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अस्ता॑वि॒ मन्म॑ पू॒र्व्यं ब्रह्मेन्द्रा॑य वोचत पू॒र्वीर्ऋ॒तस्य॑ बृह॒तीर॑नूषत स्तो॒तुर्मे॒धा अ॑सृक्षत
verses.transliteration: ástāvi mánma pūrvyám  bráhméndrāya vocata  pūrvī́r r̥tásya br̥hatī́r anūṣata  stotúr medhā́ asr̥kṣata

translation.text: Sung is the song of ancient time: to Indra have ye said the prayer. They have sung many a Br̥ihatî of sacrifice, poured forth the worshipper's many thoughts.

verses.sanskrit_deva: समिन्द्रो॒ रायो॑ बृह॒तीर॑धूनुत॒ सं क्षो॒णी समु॒ सूर्य॑म् सं शु॒क्रासः॒ शुच॑यः॒ सं गवा॑शिरः॒ सोमा॒ इन्द्र॑ममन्दिषुः
verses.transliteration: sám índro rā́yo br̥hatī́r adhūnuta  sáṃ kṣoṇī́ sám u sū́ryam  sáṃ śukrā́saḥ śúcayaḥ sáṃ gávāśiraḥ  sómā índram amandiṣuḥ

translation.text: Indra hath tossed together mighty stores of wealth, and both the worlds, yea, and the Sun. Pure, brightly-shining, mingled with the milk, the draughts of Soma have made Indra glad.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒प॒मं त्वा॑ म॒घोनां॒ ज्येष्ठं॑ च वृष॒भाणा॑म् पू॒र्भित्त॑मं मघवन्निन्द्र गो॒विद॒मीशा॑नं रा॒य ई॑महे
verses.transliteration: upamáṃ tvā maghónāṃ  jyéṣṭhaṃ ca vr̥ṣabhā́ṇām  pūrbhíttamam maghavann indra govídam  ī́śānaṃ rāyá īmahe

translation.text: As highest of the Maghavans, preeminent among the Bulls, Best breaker-down of forts, kine-winner, Lord of wealth, we seek thee, Indra Maghavan.

verses.sanskrit_deva: य आ॒युं कुत्स॑मतिथि॒ग्वमर्द॑यो वावृधा॒नो दि॒वेदि॑वे तं त्वा॑ व॒यं हर्य॑श्वं श॒तक्र॑तुं वाज॒यन्तो॑ हवामहे
verses.transliteration: yá āyúṃ kútsam atithigvám árdayo  vāvr̥dhānó divé-dive  táṃ tvā vayáṃ háryaśvaṃ śatákratuṃ  vājayánto havāmahe

translation.text: Thou who subduedst Âyu, Kutsa, Âtithigva, waxing daily in thy might, As such, rousing thy power, we invocate thee now, thee Ṣatakratu, Lord of Bays.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ नो॒ विश्वे॑षां॒ रसं॒ मध्वः॑ सिञ्च॒न्त्वद्र॑यः ये प॑रा॒वति॑ सुन्वि॒रे जने॒ष्वा ये अ॑र्वा॒वतीन्द॑वः
verses.transliteration: ā́ no víśveṣāṃ rásam  mádhvaḥ siñcantv ádrayaḥ  yé parāváti sunviré jáneṣv~ā́  yé arvāvátī́ndavaḥ

translation.text: The pressing-stones shall pour for us the essence of the meath of all, Drops that have been pressed out afar among the folk, and those that have been pressed near us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: विश्वा॒ द्वेषां॑सि ज॒हि चाव॒ चा कृ॑धि॒ विश्वे॑ सन्व॒न्त्वा वसु॑ शीष्टे॑षु चित्ते मदि॒रासो॑ अं॒शवो॒ यत्रा॒ सोम॑स्य तृ॒म्पसि॑
verses.transliteration: víśvā dvéṣāṃsi jahí cā́va cā́ kr̥dhi  víśve sanvantv ā́ vásu  śī́ṣṭeṣu cit te madirā́so aṃśávo  yátrā sómasya tr̥mpási

translation.text: Repel all enmities and keep them far away: let all win treasure for their own. Even among Ṣishṭas are the stalks that make thee glad, where thou with Soma satest thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्र॒ नेदी॑य॒ एदि॑हि मि॒तमे॑धाभिरू॒तिभिः॑ आ शं॑तम॒ शंत॑माभिर॒भिष्टि॑भि॒रा स्वा॑पे स्वा॒पिभिः॑
verses.transliteration: índra nédīya éd ihi  mitámedhābhir ūtíbhiḥ  ā́ śaṃtama śáṃtamābhir abhíṣṭibhir  ā́ svāpe svāpíbhiḥ

translation.text: Come, Indra, very near to us with aids of firmly-based resolve; Come, most auspicious, with thy most auspicious help, good Kinsman, with good kinsmen, come!

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ॒जि॒तुरं॒ सत्प॑तिं वि॒श्वच॑र्षणिं कृ॒धि प्र॒जास्वाभ॑गम् प्र सू ति॑रा॒ शची॑भि॒र्ये त॑ उ॒क्थिनः॒ क्रतुं॑ पुन॒त आ॑नु॒षक्
verses.transliteration: ājitúraṃ sátpatiṃ viśvácarṣaṇiṃ  kr̥dhí prajā́sv ā́bhagam  prá sū́ tirā śácībhir yé ta ukthínaḥ  krátum punatá ānuṣák

translation.text: Bless thou with progeny the chief of men, the lord of heroes, victor in the fray. Aid with thy powers the men who sing thee lauds and keep their spirits ever pure and bright.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यस्ते॒ साधि॒ष्ठोऽव॑से॒ ते स्या॑म॒ भरे॑षु ते व॒यं होत्रा॑भिरु॒त दे॒वहू॑तिभिः सस॒वांसो॑ मनामहे
