translation.text: O my companions, wish for power. How may we perfect Saras praise, The liberal princely patron, never to be harmed?

verses.sanskrit_deva: भूरि॑भिः समह॒ ऋषि॑भिर्ब॒र्हिष्म॑द्भिः स्तविष्यसे यदि॒त्थमेक॑मेक॒मिच्छर॑ व॒त्सान्प॑रा॒ददः॑
verses.transliteration: bhū́ribhiḥ samaha ŕ̥ṣibhir  barhíṣmadbhi staviṣyase  yád itthám ékam-ekam íc  -śára vatsā́n parādádaḥ

translation.text: By many a sage whose grass is trimmed thou art continually praised, That thou, O Ṣara, hast bestowed here one and here another calf.

verses.sanskrit_deva: क॒र्ण॒गृह्या॑ म॒घवा॑ शौरदे॒व्यो व॒त्सं न॑स्त्रि॒भ्य आन॑यत् अ॒जां सू॒रिर्न धात॑वे
verses.transliteration: karṇagŕ̥hyā maghávā śauradevyó  vatsáṃ nas tribhyá ā́nayat  ajā́ṃ sūrír ná dhā́tave

translation.text: The noble, Ṣûradeva’s son, hath brought a calf, led by the ear, to three of us, As a chief brings a goat to milk.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं नो॑ अग्ने॒ महो॑भिः पा॒हि विश्व॑स्या॒ अरा॑तेः उ॒त द्वि॒षो मर्त्य॑स्य
verses.transliteration: tváṃ no agne máhobhiḥ  pāhí víśvasyā árāteḥ  utá dviṣó mártyasya

translation.text: O AGNI, with thy mighty wealth guard us from all malignity, Yea, from all hate of mortal man.

verses.sanskrit_deva: न॒हि म॒न्युः पौरु॑षेय॒ ईशे॒ हि वः॑ प्रियजात त्वमिद॑सि॒ क्षपा॑वान्
verses.transliteration: nahí manyúḥ paúruṣeyaḥ-  ī́śe hí vaḥ priyajāta  tvám íd asi kṣápāvān

translation.text: For over thee, O Friend from birth, the wrath of man hath no control: Nay, Guardian of the earth art thou.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स नो॒ विश्वे॑भिर्दे॒वेभि॒रूर्जो॑ नपा॒द्भद्र॑शोचे र॒यिं दे॑हि वि॒श्ववा॑रम्
verses.transliteration: sá no víśvebhir devébhir  ū́rjo napād bhádraśoce  rayíṃ dehi viśvávāram

translation.text: As such, with all the Gods, O Son of Strength, auspicious in thy flame. Give us wealth bringing all things good.

verses.sanskrit_deva: न तम॑ग्ने॒ अरा॑तयो॒ मर्तं॑ युवन्त रा॒यः यं त्राय॑से दा॒श्वांस॑म्
verses.transliteration: ná tám agne árātayo  mártaṃ yuvanta rāyáḥ  yáṃ trā́yase dāśvā́ṃsam

translation.text: Malignities stay not from wealth the mortal man whom, Agni, thou Protectest while he offers gifts.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यं त्वं वि॑प्र मे॒धसा॑ता॒वग्ने॑ हि॒नोषि॒ धना॑य स तवो॒ती गोषु॒ गन्ता॑
verses.transliteration: yáṃ tváṃ vipra medhásātāv  ágne hinóṣi dhánāya  sá távotī́ góṣu gántā

translation.text: Sage Agni, be whom thou dost urge, in worship of the Gods, to wealth, With thine assistance winneth kine.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं र॒यिं पु॑रु॒वीर॒मग्ने॑ दा॒शुषे॒ मर्ता॑य प्र णो॑ नय॒ वस्यो॒ अच्छ॑
verses.transliteration: tváṃ rayím puruvī́ram  ágne dāśúṣe mártāya  prá ṇo naya vásyo ácha

translation.text: Riches with many heroes thou hast for the man who offers gifts: Lead thou us on to higher bliss.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒रु॒ष्या णो॒ मा परा॑ दा अघाय॒ते जा॑तवेदः दु॒रा॒ध्ये॒३॒॑ मर्ता॑य
verses.transliteration: uruṣyā́ ṇo mā́ párā dāḥ-  aghāyaté jātavedaḥ  durādhyè mártāya

translation.text: Save us, O Jâtavedas, nor abandon us to him who sins, Unto the evil-hearted man.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अग्ने॒ माकि॑ष्टे दे॒वस्य॑ रा॒तिमदे॑वो युयोत त्वमी॑शिषे॒ वसू॑नाम्
verses.transliteration: ágne mā́kiṣ ṭe devásya  rātím ádevo yuyota  tvám īśiṣe vásūnām

translation.text: O Agni, let no godless man avert thy bounty as a God: Over all treasures thou art Lord.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स नो॒ वस्व॒ उप॑ मा॒स्यूर्जो॑ नपा॒न्माहि॑नस्य सखे॑ वसो जरि॒तृभ्यः॑
verses.transliteration: sá no vásva úpa māsi-  ū́rjo napān mā́hinasya  sákhe vaso jaritŕ̥bhyaḥ

translation.text: So, Son of Strength, thou aidest us to what is great and excellent. Those, Vasu! Friend! who sing thy praise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अच्छा॑ नः शी॒रशो॑चिषं॒ गिरो॑ यन्तु दर्श॒तम् अच्छा॑ य॒ज्ञासो॒ नम॑सा पुरू॒वसुं॑ पुरुप्रश॒स्तमू॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: áchā naḥ śīráśociṣaṃ  gíro yantu darśatám  áchā yajñā́so námasā purūvásum  purupraśastám ūtáye-

translation.text: Let our songs come anear to him beauteous and bright with piercing flame Our offerings, with our homage, to the Lord of wealth, to him whom many praise, for help:

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निं सू॒नुं सह॑सो जा॒तवे॑दसं दा॒नाय॒ वार्या॑णाम् द्वि॒ता यो भूद॒मृतो॒ मर्त्ये॒ष्वा होता॑ म॒न्द्रत॑मो वि॒शि
verses.transliteration: agníṃ sūnúṃ sáhaso jātávedasaṃ  dānā́ya vā́ryāṇām  dvitā́ yó bhū́d amŕ̥to mártyeṣv~ā́  hótā mandrátamo viśí

translation.text: To Agni Jâtavedas, to the Son of Strength, that he may give us precious gifts, Immortal, from of old Priest among mortal men, the most delightful in the house.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निं वो॑ देवय॒ज्यया॒ग्निं प्र॑य॒त्य॑ध्व॒रे अ॒ग्निं धी॒षु प्र॑थ॒मम॒ग्निमर्व॑त्य॒ग्निं क्षैत्रा॑य॒ साध॑से
verses.transliteration: agníṃ vo devayajyáyā-  -agním prayaty àdhvaré  agníṃ dhīṣú prathamám agním árvati-  agníṃ kṣaítrāya sā́dhase

translation.text: Agni, made yours by sacrifice, Agni, while holy rites advance; Agni, the first in songs, first with the warrior steed; Agril to win the land for us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निरि॒षां स॒ख्ये द॑दातु न॒ ईशे॒ यो वार्या॑णाम् अ॒ग्निं तो॒के तन॑ये॒ शश्व॑दीमहे॒ वसुं॒ सन्तं॑ तनू॒पाम्
verses.transliteration: agnír iṣā́ṃ sakhyé dadātu naḥ-  ī́śe yó vā́ryāṇām  agníṃ toké tánaye śáśvad īmahe  vásuṃ sántaṃ tanūpā́m

translation.text: May Agni who is Lord of wealth vouchsafe us food for friendship sake. Agni we ever seek for seed and progeny, the Vasu who protects our lives.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निमी॑ळि॒ष्वाव॑से॒ गाथा॑भिः शी॒रशो॑चिषम् अ॒ग्निं रा॒ये पु॑रुमीळ्ह श्रु॒तं नरो॒ऽग्निं सु॑दी॒तये॑ छ॒र्दिः
verses.transliteration: agním īḷiṣvā́vase  gā́thābhiḥ śīráśociṣam  agníṃ rāyé purumīḷha śrutáṃ náro  -agníṃ sudītáye chardíḥ

translation.text: Solicit with your chants, for help, Agni the God with piercing flame, For riches famous Agni, Purumîḷha and ye men! Agni to light our dwelling well.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निं द्वेषो॒ योत॒वै नो॑ गृणीमस्य॒ग्निं शं योश्च॒ दात॑वे विश्वा॑सु वि॒क्ष्व॑वि॒तेव॒ हव्यो॒ भुव॒द्वस्तु॑र्ऋषू॒णाम्
verses.transliteration: agníṃ dvéṣo yótavaí no gr̥ṇīmasi-  agníṃ śáṃ yóś ca dā́tave  víśvāsu vikṣv àvitéva hávyo  bhúvad vástur r̥ṣūṇā́m

translation.text: Agni we laud that he may keep our foes afar, Agni to give us health and strength. Let him as Guardian be invoked in all the tribes, the lighter-up of glowing brands.

suktas.rsi: Gopavana and Other Sons of Atri
suktas.deity: Agni or Praise of the Oblations

verses.sanskrit_deva: ह॒विष्कृ॑णुध्व॒मा ग॑मदध्व॒र्युर्व॑नते॒ पुनः॑ वि॒द्वाँ अ॑स्य प्र॒शास॑नम्
verses.transliteration: havíṣ kr̥ṇudhvam ā́ gamad  adhvaryúr vanate púnaḥ  vidvā́m̐ asya praśā́sanam

translation.text: PREPARE oblation: let him come; and let the minister serve again Who knows the ordering thereof,

verses.sanskrit_deva: नि ति॒ग्मम॒भ्यं१॒॑शुं सीद॒द्धोता॑ म॒नावधि॑ जु॒षा॒णो अ॑स्य स॒ख्यम्
verses.transliteration: ní tigmám abhy àṃśúṃ  sī́dad dhótā manā́v ádhi  juṣāṇó asya sakhyám

translation.text: Rejoicing in his friendship, let the priest be seated over man, Beside the shoot of active power.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒न्तरि॑च्छन्ति॒ तं जने॑ रु॒द्रं प॒रो म॑नी॒षया॑ गृ॒भ्णन्ति॑ जि॒ह्वया॑ स॒सम्
verses.transliteration: antár ichanti táṃ jáne  rudrám paró manīṣáyā  gr̥bhṇánti jihváyā sasám

translation.text: Him, glowing bright beyond all thought, they seek among the race of man; With him for tougue they seize the food.

verses.sanskrit_deva: जा॒म्य॑तीतपे॒ धनु॑र्वयो॒धा अ॑रुह॒द्वन॑म् दृ॒षदं॑ जि॒ह्वयाव॑धीत्
verses.transliteration: jāmy àtītape dhánur  vayodhā́ aruhad vánam  dr̥ṣádaṃ jihváyā́vadhīt

translation.text: He hath inflamed the twofold plain: lifegiving, he hath climbed the wood, And with his tongue hath struck the rock.

verses.sanskrit_deva: चर॑न्व॒त्सो रुश॑न्नि॒ह नि॑दा॒तारं॒ न वि॑न्दते वेति॒ स्तोत॑व अ॒म्ब्य॑म्
verses.transliteration: cáran vatsó rúśann ihá  nidātā́raṃ ná vindate  véti stótava ambyàm

translation.text: Wandering here the radiant Calf finds none to fetter him, and seeks The Mother to declare his praise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒तो न्व॑स्य॒ यन्म॒हदश्वा॑व॒द्योज॑नं बृ॒हद् दा॒मा रथ॑स्य॒ ददृ॑शे
verses.transliteration: utó nv àsya yán mahád  áśvāvad yójanam br̥hád  dāmā́ ráthasya dádr̥śe

translation.text: And now that great and mighty team, the team of horses that are his, And traces of his car, are seen.

verses.sanskrit_deva: दु॒हन्ति॑ स॒प्तैका॒मुप॒ द्वा पञ्च॑ सृजतः ती॒र्थे सिन्धो॒रधि॑ स्व॒रे
verses.transliteration: duhánti saptaíkām  úpa dvā́ páñca sr̥jataḥ  tīrthé síndhor ádhi svaré

translation.text: The seven milk a single cow; the two set other five to work, On the stream's loud-resounding bank.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ द॒शभि॑र्वि॒वस्व॑त॒ इन्द्रः॒ कोश॑मचुच्यवीत् खेद॑या त्रि॒वृता॑ दि॒वः
verses.transliteration: ā́ daśábhir vivásvataḥ-  índraḥ kóśam acucyavīt  khédayā trivŕ̥tā diváḥ

translation.text: Entreated by Vivasvan's ten, Indra cast down the water-jar With threefold hammer from the sky.

verses.sanskrit_deva: परि॑ त्रि॒धातु॑रध्व॒रं जू॒र्णिरे॑ति॒ नवी॑यसी मध्वा॒ होता॑रो अञ्जते
verses.transliteration: pári tridhā́tur adhvaráṃ  jūrṇír eti návīyasī  mádhvā hótāro añjate

translation.text: Three times the newly-kindled flame proceeds around the sacrifice: The priests anoint it with the meath.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सि॒ञ्चन्ति॒ नम॑साव॒तमु॒च्चाच॑क्रं॒ परि॑ज्मानम् नी॒चीन॑बार॒मक्षि॑तम्
verses.transliteration: siñcánti námasāvatám  uccā́cakram párijmānam  nīcī́nabāram ákṣitam

translation.text: With reverence they drain the fount that circles with its wheel above, Exhaustless, with the mouth below.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भ्यार॒मिदद्र॑यो॒ निषि॑क्तं॒ पुष्क॑रे॒ मधु॑ अ॒व॒तस्य॑ वि॒सर्ज॑ने
verses.transliteration: abhyā́ram íd ádrayo  níṣiktam púṣkare mádhu  avatásya visárjane

translation.text: The pressing-stones are set at work: the meath is poured into the tank, At the out-shedding of the fount.

verses.sanskrit_deva: गाव॒ उपा॑वताव॒तं म॒ही य॒ज्ञस्य॑ र॒प्सुदा॑ उ॒भा कर्णा॑ हिर॒ण्यया॑
verses.transliteration: gā́va úpāvatāvatám  mahī́ yajñásya rapsúdā  ubhā́ kárṇā hiraṇyáyā

translation.text: Ye cows, protect the fount: the two Mighty Ones bless the sacrifice. The handles twain are wrought of gold.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ सु॒ते सि॑ञ्चत॒ श्रियं॒ रोद॑स्योरभि॒श्रिय॑म् र॒सा द॑धीत वृष॒भम्
verses.transliteration: ā́ suté siñcata śríyaṃ  ródasyor abhiśríyam  rasā́ dadhīta vr̥ṣabhám

translation.text: Pour on the juice the ornament which reaches both the heaven and earth Supply the liquid to the Bull.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ते जा॑नत॒ स्वमो॒क्यं१॒॑ सं व॒त्सासो॒ न मा॒तृभिः॑ मि॒थो न॑सन्त जा॒मिभिः॑
verses.transliteration: té jānata svám okyàṃ  sáṃ vatsā́so ná mātŕ̥bhiḥ  mithó nasanta jāmíbhiḥ

translation.text: These know their own abiding-place: like calves beside the mother cows They meet together with their kin.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उप॒ स्रक्वे॑षु॒ बप्स॑तः कृण्व॒ते ध॒रुणं॑ दि॒वि इन्द्रे॑ अ॒ग्ना नमः॒ स्वः॑
verses.transliteration: úpa srákveṣu bápsato  kr̥ṇvaté dharúṇaṃ diví  índre agnā́ námaḥ svàḥ

translation.text: Devouring in their greedy jaws, they make sustaining food in heaven, To Indra, Agni light and prayer.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अधु॑क्षत्पि॒प्युषी॒मिष॒मूर्जं॑ स॒प्तप॑दीम॒रिः सूर्य॑स्य स॒प्त र॒श्मिभिः॑
verses.transliteration: ádhukṣat pipyúṣīm íṣam  ū́rjaṃ saptápadīm aríḥ  sū́ryasya saptá raśmíbhiḥ

translation.text: The Pious One milked out rich food, sustenance dealt in portions seven, Together with the Sun's seven rays.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सोम॑स्य मित्रावरु॒णोदि॑ता॒ सूर॒ आ द॑दे तदातु॑रस्य भेष॒जम्
verses.transliteration: sómasya mitrāvaruṇā-  -úditā sū́ra ā́ dade  tád ā́turasya bheṣajám

translation.text: I took some Soma when the Sun rose up, O Mitra, Varuṇa. That is the sick man's medicine.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒तो न्व॑स्य॒ यत्प॒दं ह॑र्य॒तस्य॑ निधा॒न्य॑म् परि॒ द्यां जि॒ह्वया॑तनत्
verses.transliteration: utó nv àsya yát padáṃ  haryatásya nidhānyàm  pári dyā́ṃ jihváyātanat

translation.text: From where oblations must be laid, which is the Well-beloved's home, He with his tongue hath compassed heaven.

suktas.rsi: Gopavana and Other Sons of Atri

verses.sanskrit_deva: उदी॑राथामृताय॒ते यु॒ञ्जाथा॑मश्विना॒ रथ॑म् अन्ति॒ षद्भू॑तु वा॒मवः॑
verses.transliteration: úd īrāthām r̥tāyaté  yuñjā́thām aśvinā rátham  ánti ṣád bhūtu vām ávaḥ

translation.text: ROUSE ye for him who keeps the Law, yoke your steeds, Aṣvins, to your car Let your protecting help be near.

verses.sanskrit_deva: नि॒मिष॑श्चि॒ज्जवी॑यसा॒ रथे॒ना या॑तमश्विना अन्ति॒ षद्भू॑तु वा॒मवः॑
verses.transliteration: nimíṣaś cij jávīyasā  ráthenā́ yātam aśvinā  ánti ṣád bhūtu vām ávaḥ

translation.text: Come, Aṣvins, with your car more swift than is the twinkling of an eye Let your protecting help be near.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उप॑ स्तृणीत॒मत्र॑ये हि॒मेन॑ घ॒र्मम॑श्विना अन्ति॒ षद्भू॑तु वा॒मवः॑
verses.transliteration: úpa str̥ṇītam átraye  hiména gharmám aśvinā  ánti ṣád bhūtu vām ávaḥ

translation.text: Aṣvins, ye overlaid with cold the fiery pit for Atri's sake: Let your protecting help be near.

verses.sanskrit_deva: कुह॑ स्थः॒ कुह॑ जग्मथुः॒ कुह॑ श्ये॒नेव॑ पेतथुः अन्ति॒ षद्भू॑तु वा॒मवः॑
verses.transliteration: kúha sthaḥ kúha jagmathuḥ  kúha śyenéva petathuḥ  ánti ṣád bhūtu vām ávaḥ

translation.text: Where are ye? whither are ye gone? whither, like falcons, have ye flown? Let your protecting help be near.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यद॒द्य कर्हि॒ कर्हि॑ चिच्छुश्रू॒यात॑मि॒मं हव॑म् अन्ति॒ षद्भू॑तु वा॒मवः॑
verses.transliteration: yád adyá kárhi kárhi cic  -śuśrūyā́tam imáṃ hávam  ánti ṣád bhūtu vām ávaḥ

translation.text: If ye at any time this day are listening to this my call, Let your protecting help be near.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒श्विना॑ याम॒हूत॑मा॒ नेदि॑ष्ठं या॒म्याप्य॑म् अन्ति॒ षद्भू॑तु वा॒मवः॑
verses.transliteration: aśvínā yāmahū́tamā  nédiṣṭhaṃ yāmy ā́pyam  ánti ṣád bhūtu vām ávaḥ

translation.text: The Aṣvins, fust to hear our prayer, for closest kinship I approach: Let your protecting help be near.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अव॑न्त॒मत्र॑ये गृ॒हं कृ॑णु॒तं यु॒वम॑श्विना अन्ति॒ षद्भू॑तु वा॒मवः॑
verses.transliteration: ávantam átraye gr̥háṃ  kr̥ṇutáṃ yuvám aśvinā  ánti ṣád bhūtu vām ávaḥ

translation.text: For Atri ye, O Aṣvins, made a dwellingplace to shield him well, Let your protecting help be near.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वरे॑थे अ॒ग्निमा॒तपो॒ वद॑ते व॒ल्ग्वत्र॑ये अन्ति॒ षद्भू॑तु वा॒मवः॑
verses.transliteration: várethe agním ātápo  vádate valgv átraye  ánti ṣád bhūtu vām ávaḥ

translation.text: Ye warded off the fervent heat for Atri when he sweetly spake: Let your protecting help be near.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र स॒प्तव॑ध्रिरा॒शसा॒ धारा॑म॒ग्नेर॑शायत अन्ति॒ षद्भू॑तु वा॒मवः॑
verses.transliteration: prá saptávadhrir āśásā  dhā́rām agnér aśāyata  ánti ṣád bhūtu vām ávaḥ

translation.text: Erst Saptavadbri by his prayer obtained the trenchant edge of fire: Let your protecting help be near.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒हा ग॑तं वृषण्वसू शृणु॒तं म॑ इ॒मं हव॑म् अन्ति॒ षद्भू॑तु वा॒मवः॑
verses.transliteration: ihā́ gataṃ vr̥ṣaṇvasū  śr̥ṇutám ma imáṃ hávam  ánti ṣád bhūtu vām ávaḥ

translation.text: Come hither, O ye Lords of wealth, and listen to this call of mine: Let your protecting help be near.

verses.sanskrit_deva: किमि॒दं वां॑ पुराण॒वज्जर॑तोरिव शस्यते अन्ति॒ षद्भू॑तु वा॒मवः॑
verses.transliteration: kím idáṃ vām purāṇaváj  járator iva śasyate  ánti ṣád bhūtu vām ávaḥ

translation.text: What is this praise told forth of you as Elders in the ancient way? Let your protecting help be near.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स॒मा॒नं वां॑ सजा॒त्यं॑ समा॒नो बन्धु॑रश्विना अन्ति॒ षद्भू॑तु वा॒मवः॑
verses.transliteration: samānáṃ vāṃ sajātyàṃ  samānó bándhur aśvinā  ánti ṣád bhūtu vām ávaḥ

translation.text: One common brotherhood is yours, Aṣvins your kindred is the same: Let your protecting help be near.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यो वां॒ रजां॑स्यश्विना॒ रथो॑ वि॒याति॒ रोद॑सी अन्ति॒ षद्भू॑तु वा॒मवः॑
verses.transliteration: yó vāṃ rájāṃsy aśvinā  rátho viyā́ti ródasī  ánti ṣád bhūtu vām ávaḥ

translation.text: This is your chariot, Aṣvins, which speeds through the regions, earth and heaven: Let your protecting aid be near.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ नो॒ गव्ये॑भि॒रश्व्यैः॑ स॒हस्रै॒रुप॑ गच्छतम् अन्ति॒ षद्भू॑तु वा॒मवः॑
verses.transliteration: ā́ no gávyebhir áśvyair  sahásrair úpa gachatam  ánti ṣád bhūtu vām ávaḥ

translation.text: Approach ye hitherward to us with thousands both of steeds and kine : Let your protecting help be near.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मा नो॒ गव्ये॑भि॒रश्व्यैः॑ स॒हस्रे॑भि॒रति॑ ख्यतम् अन्ति॒ षद्भू॑तु वा॒मवः॑
verses.transliteration: mā́ no gávyebhir áśvyaiḥ  sahásrebhir áti khyatam  ánti ṣád bhūtu vām ávaḥ

translation.text: Pass us not by, remember us with thousands both of kine and steeds; Let your protecting help be near.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒रु॒णप्सु॑रु॒षा अ॑भू॒दक॒र्ज्योति॑र्ऋ॒ताव॑री अन्ति॒ षद्भू॑तु वा॒मवः॑
verses.transliteration: aruṇápsur uṣā́ abhūd  ákar jyótir r̥tā́varī  ánti ṣád bhūtu vām ávaḥ

translation.text: The purple tinted Dawn hath risen, and true to Law hath made the light: Let your protecting help be near.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒श्विना॒ सु वि॒चाक॑शद्वृ॒क्षं प॑रशु॒माँ इ॑व अन्ति॒ षद्भू॑तु वा॒मवः॑
verses.transliteration: aśvínā sú vicā́kaśad  vr̥kṣám paraśumā́m̐ iva  ánti ṣád bhūtu vām ávaḥ

translation.text: He looked upon the Aṣvins, as an axe-armed man upon a tree: Let your protecting help be near.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पुरं॒ न धृ॑ष्ण॒वा रु॑ज कृ॒ष्णया॑ बाधि॒तो वि॒शा अन्ति॒ षद्भू॑तु वा॒मवः॑
verses.transliteration: púraṃ ná dhr̥ṣṇav ā́ ruja  kr̥ṣṇáyā bādhitó viśā́  ánti ṣád bhūtu vām ávaḥ

translation.text: By the black band encompassed round, break it down, bold one, like a fort. Let your protecting help be near.

suktas.rsi: Gopavana and Other Sons of Atri

verses.sanskrit_deva: वि॒शोवि॑शो वो॒ अति॑थिं वाज॒यन्तः॑ पुरुप्रि॒यम् अ॒ग्निं वो॒ दुर्यं॒ वचः॑ स्तु॒षे शू॒षस्य॒ मन्म॑भिः
verses.transliteration: viśó-viśo vo átithiṃ  vājayántaḥ purupriyám  agníṃ vo dúryaṃ vácaḥ-  stuṣé śūṣásya mánmabhiḥ

translation.text: EXERTING all our strength with thoughts of power we glorify in speech Agni your dear familiar Friend, the darling Guest in every home.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यं जना॑सो ह॒विष्म॑न्तो मि॒त्रं न स॒र्पिरा॑सुतिम् प्र॒शंस॑न्ति॒ प्रश॑स्तिभिः
verses.transliteration: yáṃ jánāso havíṣmanto  mitráṃ ná sarpírāsutim  praśáṃsanti práśastibhiḥ

translation.text: Whom, served with sacrificial oil like Mitra, men presenting gifts Eulogize with their songs of praise

verses.sanskrit_deva: पन्यां॑सं जा॒तवे॑दसं॒ यो दे॒वता॒त्युद्य॑ता ह॒व्यान्यैर॑यद्दि॒वि
verses.transliteration: pányāṃsaṃ jātávedasaṃ  yó devátāty údyatā  havyā́ny aírayat diví

translation.text: Much-lauded Jâtavedas, him who bears oblations up to heaven Prepared in service of the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आग॑न्म वृत्र॒हन्त॑मं॒ ज्येष्ठ॑म॒ग्निमान॑वम् यस्य॑ श्रु॒तर्वा॑ बृ॒हन्ना॒र्क्षो अनी॑क॒ एध॑ते
verses.transliteration: ā́ganma vr̥trahántamaṃ  jyéṣṭham agním ā́navam  yásya śrutárvā br̥hánn  ārkṣó ánīka édhate

translation.text: To noblest Agni, Friend of man, best Vr̥itra-slayer, are we come, Him in whose presenceR̥iksha's son, mighty Ṣrutarvan, waxes great;

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒मृतं॑ जा॒तवे॑दसं ति॒रस्तमां॑सि दर्श॒तम् घृ॒ताह॑वन॒मीड्य॑म्
verses.transliteration: amŕ̥taṃ jātávedasaṃ  tirás támāṃsi darśatám  ghr̥tā́havanam ī́ḍyam

translation.text: To deathless Jâtavedas, meet for praise, adored, with sacred oil, Visible through the gloom of night

verses.sanskrit_deva: स॒बाधो॒ यं जना॑ इ॒मे॒३॒॑ऽग्निं ह॒व्येभि॒रीळ॑ते जुह्वा॑नासो य॒तस्रु॑चः
verses.transliteration: sabā́dho yáṃ jánā imé-  -agníṃ havyébhir ī́ḷate  júhvānāso yatásrucaḥ

translation.text: Even Agni whom these priestly men worship with sacrificial gifts, With lifted ladles offering them.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒यं ते॒ नव्य॑सी म॒तिरग्ने॒ अधा॑य्य॒स्मदा मन्द्र॒ सुजा॑त॒ सुक्र॒तोऽमू॑र॒ दस्माति॑थे
verses.transliteration: iyáṃ te návyasī matír  ágne ádhāyy asmád ā́  mándra sújāta súkrataḥ-  -ámūra dásmā́tithe

translation.text: O Agni, this our newest hymn hath been addressed from us to thee, O cheerful Guest, well-born, most wise, worker of wonders, ne'er deceived.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सा ते॑ अग्ने॒ शंत॑मा॒ चनि॑ष्ठा भवतु प्रि॒या तया॑ वर्धस्व॒ सुष्टु॑तः
verses.transliteration: sā́ te agne śáṃtamā  cániṣṭhā bhavatu priyā́  táyā vardhasva súṣṭutaḥ

translation.text: Agni, may it be dear to thee, most grateful, and exceeding sweet: Grow mightier, eulogized therewith.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सा द्यु॒म्नैर्द्यु॒म्निनी॑ बृ॒हदुपो॑प॒ श्रव॑सि॒ श्रवः॑ दधी॑त वृत्र॒तूर्ये॑
verses.transliteration: sā́ dyumnaír dyumnínī br̥hád  úpopa śrávasi śrávaḥ  dádhīta vr̥tratū́rye

translation.text: Splendid with splendours may it be, and in the battle with the foe Add loftier glory to thy fame.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अश्व॒मिद्गां र॑थ॒प्रां त्वे॒षमिन्द्रं॒ न सत्प॑तिम् यस्य॒ श्रवां॑सि॒ तूर्व॑थ॒ पन्य॑म्पन्यं च कृ॒ष्टयः॑
verses.transliteration: áśvam íd gā́ṃ rathaprā́ṃ  tveṣám índraṃ ná sátpatim  yásya śrávāṃsi tū́rvatha  pányam-panyaṃ ca kr̥ṣṭáyaḥ

translation.text: Steed, cow, a lord of heroes, bright like Indra, who shall fill the car. Whose high renown ye celebrate, and people praise each glorious deed.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यं त्वा॑ गो॒पव॑नो गि॒रा चनि॑ष्ठदग्ने अङ्गिरः स पा॑वक श्रुधी॒ हव॑म्
verses.transliteration: yáṃ tvā gopávano girā́  cániṣṭhad agne aṅgiraḥ  sá pāvaka śrudhī hávam

translation.text: Thou whom Gopavana made glad with song, O Agni Angiras, Hear this my call, thou Holy One.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यं त्वा॒ जना॑स॒ ईळ॑ते स॒बाधो॒ वाज॑सातये स बो॑धि वृत्र॒तूर्ये॑
verses.transliteration: yáṃ tvā jánāsa ī́ḷate  sabā́dho vā́jasātaye  sá bodhi vr̥tratū́rye

translation.text: Thou whom the priestly folk implore to aid the gathering of the spoil, Such be thou in the fight with foes.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒हं हु॑वा॒न आ॒र्क्षे श्रु॒तर्व॑णि मद॒च्युति॑ शर्धां॑सीव स्तुका॒विनां॑ मृ॒क्षा शी॒र्षा च॑तु॒र्णाम्
verses.transliteration: aháṃ huvāná ārkṣé  śrutárvaṇi madacyúti  śárdhāṃsīva stukāvínām  mr̥kṣā́ śīrṣā́ caturṇā́m

translation.text: I, called to him who reels with joy, Ṣrutarvan, Riksha’s son, shall stroke The heads of four presented steeds, like the long wool of fleecy rams.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मां च॒त्वार॑ आ॒शवः॒ शवि॑ष्ठस्य द्रवि॒त्नवः॑ सु॒रथा॑सो अ॒भि प्रयो॒ वक्ष॒न्वयो॒ न तुग्र्य॑म्
verses.transliteration: mā́ṃ catvā́ra āśávaḥ  śáviṣṭhasya dravitnávaḥ  suráthāso abhí práyo  vákṣan váyo ná túgryam

translation.text: Four coursers with a splendid car, Savistha’s horses, fleet of foot, Shall bring me to the sacred feast, as flying steeds brought Tugra’s son.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स॒त्यमित्त्वा॑ महेनदि॒ परु॒ष्ण्यव॑ देदिशम् नेमा॑पो अश्व॒दात॑रः॒ शवि॑ष्ठादस्ति॒ मर्त्यः॑
verses.transliteration: satyám ít tvā mahenadi  páruṣṇy áva dediśam  ném āpo aśvadā́taraḥ  śáviṣṭhād asti mártyaḥ

translation.text: The very truth do I declare to thee, Parushṇî, mighty flood. Waters! no man is there who gives more horses than Savishtha gives.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यु॒क्ष्वा हि दे॑व॒हूत॑माँ॒ अश्वाँ॑ अग्ने र॒थीरि॑व नि होता॑ पू॒र्व्यः स॑दः
verses.transliteration: yukṣvā́ hí devahū́tamām̐  áśvām̐ agne rathī́r iva  ní hótā pūrvyáḥ sadaḥ

translation.text: YOKE, Agni, as a charioteer, thy steeds who best invite the Gods: As ancient Herald seat thyself.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒त नो॑ देव दे॒वाँ अच्छा॑ वोचो वि॒दुष्ट॑रः श्रद्विश्वा॒ वार्या॑ कृधि
verses.transliteration: utá no deva devā́m̐  áchā voco vidúṣṭaraḥ  śrád víśvā vā́ryā kr̥dhi

translation.text: And, God, as skilfullest of all, call for us hitherward the Gods: Give all our wishes sure effect.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं ह॒ यद्य॑विष्ठ्य॒ सह॑सः सूनवाहुत ऋ॒तावा॑ य॒ज्ञियो॒ भुवः॑
verses.transliteration: tváṃ ha yád yaviṣṭhya  sáhasaḥ sūnav āhuta  r̥tā́vā yajñíyo bhúvaḥ

translation.text: For thou, Most Youthful, Son of Strength, thou to whom sacrifice is paid, Art holy, faithful to the Law.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒यम॒ग्निः स॑ह॒स्रिणो॒ वाज॑स्य श॒तिन॒स्पतिः॑ मू॒र्धा क॒वी र॑यी॒णाम्
verses.transliteration: ayám agníḥ sahasríṇo  vā́jasya śatínas pátiḥ  mūrdhā́ kavī́ rayīṇā́m

translation.text: This Agni, Lord of wealth and spoil hundredfold, thousandfold, is head And chief of riches and a Sage.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तं ने॒मिमृ॒भवो॑ य॒था न॑मस्व॒ सहू॑तिभिः नेदी॑यो य॒ज्ञम॑ङ्गिरः
verses.transliteration: táṃ nemím r̥bhávo yathā-  -ā́ namasva sáhūtibhiḥ  nédīyo yajñám aṅgiraḥ

translation.text: As craftsmen bend the felly, so bend at our general call: come nigh, Angiras, to the sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तस्मै॑ नू॒नम॒भिद्य॑वे वा॒चा वि॑रूप॒ नित्य॑या वृष्णे॑ चोदस्व सुष्टु॒तिम्
verses.transliteration: tásmai nūnám abhídyave  vācā́ virūpa nítyayā  vŕ̥ṣṇe codasva suṣṭutím

translation.text: Now, O Virûpa, rouse for him, Strong God who shines at early morn, Fair praise with voice that ceases not.

verses.sanskrit_deva: कमु॑ ष्विदस्य॒ सेन॑या॒ग्नेरपा॑कचक्षसः प॒णिं गोषु॑ स्तरामहे
verses.transliteration: kám u ṣvid asya sénayā-  -agnér ápākacakṣasaḥ  paṇíṃ góṣu starāmahe

translation.text: With missile of this Agni, his who looks afar, will we lay low The thief in combat for the kine.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मा नो॑ दे॒वानां॒ विशः॑ प्रस्ना॒तीरि॑वो॒स्राः कृ॒शं न हा॑सु॒रघ्न्याः॑
verses.transliteration: mā́ no devā́nāṃ víśaḥ  prasnātī́r ivosrā́ḥ  kr̥śáṃ ná hāsur ághnyāḥ

translation.text: Let not the Companies of Gods fail us, like Dawns that float away, Like cows who leave the niggardly.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मा नः॑ समस्य दू॒ढ्य१॒॑ः परि॑द्वेषसो अंह॒तिः ऊ॒र्मिर्न नाव॒मा व॑धीत्
verses.transliteration: mā́ naḥ samasya dūḍhyàḥ  páridveṣaso aṃhatíḥ  ūrmír ná nā́vam ā́ vadhīt

translation.text: Let not the sinful tyranny of any fiercely hating foe Smite us, as billows smite a ship.

verses.sanskrit_deva: नम॑स्ते अग्न॒ ओज॑से गृ॒णन्ति॑ देव कृ॒ष्टयः॑ अमै॑र॒मित्र॑मर्दय
verses.transliteration: námas te agna ójase  gr̥ṇánti deva kr̥ṣṭáyaḥ  ámair amítram ardaya

translation.text: O Agni, God, the people sing reverent praise to thee for strength: With terrors trouble thou the foe.

verses.sanskrit_deva: कु॒वित्सु नो॒ गवि॑ष्ट॒येऽग्ने॑ सं॒वेषि॑षो र॒यिम् उरु॑कृदु॒रु ण॑स्कृधि
verses.transliteration: kuvít sú no gáviṣṭaye-  -ágne saṃvéṣiṣo rayím  úrukr̥d urú ṇas kr̥dhi

translation.text: Wilt thou not, Agni, lend us aid in winning cattle, winning wealth? Maker of room, make room for us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मा नो॑ अ॒स्मिन्म॑हाध॒ने परा॑ वर्ग्भार॒भृद्य॑था सं॒वर्गं॒ सं र॒यिं ज॑य
verses.transliteration: mā́ no asmín mahādhané  párā varg bhārabhŕ̥d yathā  saṃvárgaṃ sáṃ rayíṃ jaya

translation.text: In this great battle cast us not aside as one who bears a load: Snatch up the wealih and win it all.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒न्यम॒स्मद्भि॒या इ॒यमग्ने॒ सिष॑क्तु दु॒च्छुना॑ वर्धा॑ नो॒ अम॑व॒च्छवः॑
verses.transliteration: anyám asmád bhiyā́ iyám  ágne síṣaktu duchúnā  várdhā no ámavac chávaḥ

translation.text: O Agni, let this plague pursue and fright another and not us: Make our impetuous strength more strong.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यस्याजु॑षन्नम॒स्विनः॒ शमी॒मदु॑र्मखस्य वा तं घेद॒ग्निर्वृ॒धाव॑ति
verses.transliteration: yásyā́juṣan namasvínaḥ  śámīm ádurmakhasya vā  táṃ ghéd agnír vr̥dhā́vati

translation.text: The reverent or unwearied man whose holy labour he accepts, Him Agni favours with success.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पर॑स्या॒ अधि॑ सं॒वतोऽव॑राँ अ॒भ्या त॑र यत्रा॒हमस्मि॒ ताँ अ॑व
verses.transliteration: párasyā ádhi saṃvátaḥ-  -ávarām̐ abhy ā́ tara  yátrāhám ásmi tā́m̐ ava

translation.text: Abandoning the foeman’s host pass hither to this company: Assist the men with whom I stand.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वि॒द्मा हि ते॑ पु॒रा व॒यमग्ने॑ पि॒तुर्यथाव॑सः अधा॑ ते सु॒म्नमी॑महे
verses.transliteration: vidmā́ hí te purā́ vayám  ágne pitúr yáthā́vasaḥ  ádhā te sumnám īmahe

translation.text: As we have known thy gracious help, as of a Father, long agi, So now we pray to thee for bliss.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒मं नु मा॒यिनं॑ हुव॒ इन्द्र॒मीशा॑न॒मोज॑सा म॒रुत्व॑न्तं॒ न वृ॒ञ्जसे॑
verses.transliteration: imáṃ nú māyínaṃ huve-  índram ī́śānam ójasā-  marútvantaṃ ná vr̥ñjáse

translation.text: NOT to forsake me, I invoke this Indra girt by Maruts, Lord Of magic power who rules with might.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒यमिन्द्रो॑ म॒रुत्स॑खा॒ वि वृ॒त्रस्या॑भिन॒च्छिरः॑ वज्रे॑ण श॒तप॑र्वणा
verses.transliteration: ayám índro marútsakhā  ví vr̥trásyābhinac chíraḥ  vájreṇa śatáparvaṇā

translation.text: This Indra with his Marut Friends clave into pieces Vritra's head With hundred-knotted thunderbolt.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वा॒वृ॒धा॒नो म॒रुत्स॒खेन्द्रो॒ वि वृ॒त्रमै॑रयत् सृ॒जन्त्स॑मु॒द्रिया॑ अ॒पः
verses.transliteration: vāvr̥dhānó marútsakhā-  -índro ví vr̥trám airayat  sr̥ján samudríyā apáḥ

translation.text: Indra, with Marut Friends grown strong, hath rent asunder Vritra, and Released the waters of the sea.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒यं ह॒ येन॒ वा इ॒दं स्व॑र्म॒रुत्व॑ता जि॒तम् इन्द्रे॑ण॒ सोम॑पीतये
verses.transliteration: ayáṃ ha yéna vā́ idáṃ  svàr marútvatā jitám  índreṇa sómapītaye

translation.text: This is that Indra who, begirt by Maruts, won the light of heaven That he might drink the Soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: म॒रुत्व॑न्तमृजी॒षिण॒मोज॑स्वन्तं विर॒प्शिन॑म् इन्द्रं॑ गी॒र्भिर्ह॑वामहे
verses.transliteration: marútvantam r̥jīṣíṇam  ójasvantaṃ virapśínam  índraṃ gīrbhír havāmahe

translation.text: Mighty, impetuous, begirt by Maruts, him who loudly roars, Indra we invocate with songs.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्रं॑ प्र॒त्नेन॒ मन्म॑ना म॒रुत्व॑न्तं हवामहे अ॒स्य सोम॑स्य पी॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: índram pratnéna mánmanā  marútvantaṃ havāmahe-  asyá sómasya pītáye

translation.text: Indra begirt by Maruts we invoke after the ancient plan, That he may drink the Soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: म॒रुत्वाँ॑ इन्द्र मीढ्वः॒ पिबा॒ सोमं॑ शतक्रतो अ॒स्मिन्य॒ज्ञे पु॑रुष्टुत
verses.transliteration: marútvām̐ indra mīḍhvaḥ  píbā sómaṃ śatakrato  asmín yajñé puruṣṭuta

translation.text: O liberal Indra, Marut-girt, much-lauded Ṣatakratu, drink The Soma at this sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तुभ्येदि॑न्द्र म॒रुत्व॑ते सु॒ताः सोमा॑सो अद्रिवः हृ॒दा हू॑यन्त उ॒क्थिनः॑
verses.transliteration: túbhyéd indra marútvate  sutā́ḥ sómāso adrivaḥ  hr̥dā́ hūyanta ukthínaḥ

translation.text: To thee, O Indra, Marut-girt, these Soma juices, Thunderer! Are offered from the heart with lauds.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पिबेदि॑न्द्र म॒रुत्स॑खा सु॒तं सोमं॒ दिवि॑ष्टिषु वज्रं॒ शिशा॑न॒ ओज॑सा
verses.transliteration: píbéd indra marútsakhā  sutáṃ sómaṃ díviṣṭiṣu  vájraṃ śíśāna ójasā

translation.text: Drink, Indra, with thy Marut Friends, pressed Soma at the morning rites, Whetting thy thunderbolt with strength.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒त्तिष्ठ॒न्नोज॑सा स॒ह पी॒त्वी शिप्रे॑ अवेपयः सोम॑मिन्द्र च॒मू सु॒तम्
verses.transliteration: uttíṣṭhann ójasā sahá  pītvī́ śípre avepayaḥ  sómam indra camū́ sutám

translation.text: Arising in thy might, thy jaws thou shookest, Indra, having quaffed The Soma which the mortar pressed.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अनु॑ त्वा॒ रोद॑सी उ॒भे क्रक्ष॑माणमकृपेताम् इन्द्र॒ यद्द॑स्यु॒हाभ॑वः
verses.transliteration: ánu tvā ródasī ubhé  krákṣamāṇam akr̥petām  índra yád dasyuhā́bhavaḥ

translation.text: Indra, both worlds complained to thee when uttering thy fearful roar, What time thou smotest Dasyus dead.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वाच॑म॒ष्टाप॑दीम॒हं नव॑स्रक्तिमृत॒स्पृश॑म् इन्द्रा॒त्परि॑ त॒न्वं॑ ममे
verses.transliteration: vā́cam aṣṭā́padīm aháṃ  návasraktim r̥taspŕ̥śam  índrāt pári tanvàm mame

translation.text: From Indra have I measured out a song eight-footed with nine parts, Delicate, faithful to the Law.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ज॒ज्ञा॒नो नु श॒तक्र॑तु॒र्वि पृ॑च्छ॒दिति॑ मा॒तर॑म् क उ॒ग्राः के ह॑ शृण्विरे
verses.transliteration: jajñānó nú śatákratur  ví pr̥chad íti mātáram  ká ugrā́ḥ ké ha śr̥ṇvire

translation.text: SCARCELY was Ṣatakratu, born when of his Mother he inquired, Who are the mighty? Who are famed?

verses.sanskrit_deva: आदीं॑ शव॒स्य॑ब्रवीदौर्णवा॒भम॑ही॒शुव॑म् ते पु॑त्र सन्तु नि॒ष्टुरः॑
verses.transliteration: ā́d īṃ śavasy àbravīd  aurṇavābhám ahīśúvam  té putra santu niṣṭúraḥ

translation.text: Then Ṣavasî declared to him Aurṇavâbha, Ahîṣuva: Son, these be they thou must o'erthrow

verses.sanskrit_deva: समित्तान्वृ॑त्र॒हाखि॑द॒त्खे अ॒राँ इ॑व॒ खेद॑या प्रवृ॑द्धो दस्यु॒हाभ॑वत्
verses.transliteration: sám ít tā́n vr̥trahā́khidat  khé arā́m̐ iva khédayā  právr̥ddho dasyuhā́bhavat

translation.text: The Vritra-slayer smote them all as spokes are hammered into naves: The Dasyu-killer waxed in might.

verses.sanskrit_deva: एक॑या प्रति॒धापि॑बत्सा॒कं सरां॑सि त्रिं॒शत॑म् इन्द्रः॒ सोम॑स्य काणु॒का
verses.transliteration: ékayā pratidhā́pibat  sākáṃ sárāṃsi triṃśátam  índraḥ sómasya kāṇukā́

translation.text: Then Indra at a single draught drank the contents of thirty pails, Pails that were filled with Soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भि ग॑न्ध॒र्वम॑तृणदबु॒ध्नेषु॒ रजः॒स्वा इन्द्रो॑ ब्र॒ह्मभ्य॒ इद्वृ॒धे
verses.transliteration: abhí gandharvám atr̥ṇad  abudhnéṣu rájassv ā́  índro brahmábhya íd vr̥dhé

translation.text: Indra in groundless realms of space pierced the Gandharva through, that he Might make Brahmans' strength increase.

verses.sanskrit_deva: निरा॑विध्यद्गि॒रिभ्य॒ आ धा॒रय॑त्प॒क्वमो॑द॒नम् इन्द्रो॑ बु॒न्दं स्वा॑ततम्
verses.transliteration: nír āvidhyad giríbhya~ā́  dhāráyat pakvám odanám  índro bundáṃ svā̀tatam

translation.text: Down from the mountains Indra shot hither his well-directed shaft: He gained the ready brew of rice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: श॒तब्र॑ध्न॒ इषु॒स्तव॑ स॒हस्र॑पर्ण॒ एक॒ इत् यमि॑न्द्र चकृ॒षे युज॑म्
verses.transliteration: śatábradhna íṣus táva  sahásraparṇa éka ít  yám indra cakr̥ṣé yújam

translation.text: One only is that shaft of thine, with thousand feathers, hundred barbs, Which, Indra, thou hast made thy friend.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तेन॑ स्तो॒तृभ्य॒ आ भ॑र॒ नृभ्यो॒ नारि॑भ्यो॒ अत्त॑वे स॒द्यो जा॒त ऋ॑भुष्ठिर
verses.transliteration: téna stotŕ̥bhya ā́ bhara  nŕ̥bhyo nā́ribhyo áttave  sadyó jātá r̥bhuṣṭhira

translation.text: Strong as the Ribhus at thy birth, therewith to those who praise thee, men, And women, bring thou food to eat.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒ता च्यौ॒त्नानि॑ ते कृ॒ता वर्षि॑ष्ठानि॒ परी॑णसा हृ॒दा वी॒ड्व॑धारयः
verses.transliteration: etā́ cyautnā́ni te kr̥tā́  várṣiṣṭhāni párīṇasā  hr̥dā́ vīḍv àdhārayaḥ

translation.text: By thee these exploits were achieved, the mightiest deeds, abundantly: Firm in thy heart thou settest them.

verses.sanskrit_deva: विश्वेत्ता विष्णु॒राभ॑रदुरुक्र॒मस्त्वेषि॑तः श॒तं म॑हि॒षान्क्षी॑रपा॒कमो॑द॒नं व॑रा॒हमिन्द्र॑ एमु॒षम्
verses.transliteration: víśvét tā́ víṣṇur ā́bharad  urukramás tvéṣitaḥ  śatám mahiṣā́n kṣīrapākám odanáṃ  varāhám índra emuṣám

translation.text: All these things Vishṇu brought, the Lord of ample stride whom thou hadst sent- A hundred buffaloes, a brew of rice and milk: and Indra, slew the ravening boar

verses.sanskrit_deva: तु॒वि॒क्षं ते॒ सुकृ॑तं सू॒मयं॒ धनुः॑ सा॒धुर्बु॒न्दो हि॑र॒ण्ययः॑ उ॒भा ते॑ बा॒हू रण्या॒ सुसं॑स्कृत ऋदू॒पे चि॑दृदू॒वृधा॑
verses.transliteration: tuvikṣáṃ te súkr̥taṃ sūmáyaṃ dhánuḥ  sādhúr bundó hiraṇyáyaḥ  ubhā́ te bāhū́ ráṇyā súsaṃskr̥ta  r̥dūpé cid r̥dūvŕ̥dhā

translation.text: Most deadly is thy bow, successful, fashioned well: good is thine arrow, decked with gold. Warlike and well equipped thine arms are, which increase sweetness for him who drinks the sweet.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पु॒रो॒ळाशं॑ नो॒ अन्ध॑स॒ इन्द्र॑ स॒हस्र॒मा भ॑र श॒ता च॑ शूर॒ गोना॑म्
verses.transliteration: puroḷā́śaṃ no ándhasaḥ-  índra sahásram ā́ bhara  śatā́ ca śūra gónām

translation.text: BRING us a thousand, Indra, as our guerdon for the Soma juice: Hundreds of kine, O Hero, bring.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ नो॑ भर॒ व्यञ्ज॑नं॒ गामश्व॑म॒भ्यञ्ज॑नम् सचा॑ म॒ना हि॑र॒ण्यया॑
verses.transliteration: ā́ no bhara vyáñjanaṃ  gā́m áśvam abhyáñjanam  sácā manā́ hiraṇyáyā

translation.text: Bring cattle, bring us ornament, bring us embellishment and steeds, Give us, besides, two rings of gold.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒त नः॑ कर्ण॒शोभ॑ना पु॒रूणि॑ धृष्ण॒वा भ॑र त्वं हि शृ॑ण्वि॒षे व॑सो
verses.transliteration: utá naḥ karṇaśóbhanā  purū́ṇi dhr̥ṣṇav ā́ bhara  tváṃ hí śr̥ṇviṣé vaso

translation.text: And, Bold One, bring in ample store rich jewels to adorn the ear, For thou, Good Lord, art far renowned.

verses.sanskrit_deva: नकीं॑ वृधी॒क इ॑न्द्र ते॒ न सु॒षा न सु॒दा उ॒त नान्यस्त्वच्छू॑र वा॒घतः॑
verses.transliteration: nákīṃ vr̥dhīká indra te  ná suṣā́ ná sudā́ utá  nā́nyás tvác chūra vāghátaḥ

translation.text: None other is there for the priest, Hero! but thou, to give him gifts, To win much spoil and prosper him.

verses.sanskrit_deva: नकी॒मिन्द्रो॒ निक॑र्तवे॒ न श॒क्रः परि॑शक्तवे विश्वं॑ शृणोति॒ पश्य॑ति
verses.transliteration: nákīm índro níkartave  ná śakráḥ páriśaktave  víśvaṃ śr̥ṇoti páśyati

translation.text: Indra can never be brought low, Ṣakra can never be subdued: He heareth and beholdeth all.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स म॒न्युं मर्त्या॑ना॒मद॑ब्धो॒ नि चि॑कीषते पु॒रा नि॒दश्चि॑कीषते
verses.transliteration: sá manyúm mártyānām  ádabdho ní cikīṣate  purā́ nidáś cikīṣate

translation.text: He spieth out the wrath of man, he who can never be deceived: Ere blame can come he marketh it.

verses.sanskrit_deva: क्रत्व॒ इत्पू॒र्णमु॒दरं॑ तु॒रस्या॑स्ति विध॒तः वृ॒त्र॒घ्नः सो॑म॒पाव्नः॑
verses.transliteration: krátva ít pūrṇám udáraṃ  turásyāsti vidhatáḥ  vr̥traghnáḥ somapā́vnaḥ

translation.text: He hath his stomach full of might, the Vritra-slayer, Conqueror, The Soma-drinker, ordering all.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वे वसू॑नि॒ संग॑ता॒ विश्वा॑ च सोम॒ सौभ॑गा सु॒दात्वप॑रिह्वृता
verses.transliteration: tvé vásūni sáṃgatā  víśvā ca soma saúbhagā  sudā́tv áparihvr̥tā

translation.text: In thee all treasures are combined, Soma all blessed things in thee, Uninjured, easy to bestow.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वामिद्य॑व॒युर्मम॒ कामो॑ ग॒व्युर्हि॑रण्य॒युः त्वाम॑श्व॒युरेष॑ते
verses.transliteration: tvā́m íd yavayúr máma  kā́mo gavyúr hiraṇyayúḥ  tvā́m aśvayúr éṣate

translation.text: To thee speeds forth my hope that craves the gift of corn, and kine and gold, Yea, craving horses, speeds to thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तवेदि॑न्द्रा॒हमा॒शसा॒ हस्ते॒ दात्रं॑ च॒ना द॑दे दि॒नस्य॑ वा मघव॒न्त्सम्भृ॑तस्य वा पू॒र्धि यव॑स्य का॒शिना॑
verses.transliteration: távéd indrāhám āśásā  háste dā́traṃ canā́ dade  dinásya vā maghavan sámbhr̥tasya vā  pūrdhí yávasya kāśínā

translation.text: Indra, through hope in thee alone even this sickle do I grasp. Fill my hand, Maghavan, with all that it can hold of barley cut or gathered up.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒यं कृ॒त्नुरगृ॑भीतो विश्व॒जिदु॒द्भिदित्सोमः॑ ऋषि॒र्विप्रः॒ काव्ये॑न
verses.transliteration: ayáṃ kr̥tnúr ágr̥bhīto  viśvajíd udbhíd ít sómaḥ  ŕ̥ṣir vípraḥ kā́vyena

translation.text: THIS here is Soma, ne'er restrained, active, all-conquering bursting forth, Rishi and Sage by sapience,

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भ्यू॑र्णोति॒ यन्न॒ग्नं भि॒षक्ति॒ विश्वं॒ यत्तु॒रम् प्रेम॒न्धः ख्य॒न्निः श्रो॒णो भू॑त्
verses.transliteration: abhy ū̀rṇoti yán nagnám  bhiṣákti víśvaṃ yát turám  prém andháḥ khyan níḥ śroṇó bhūt

translation.text: All that is bare he covers o'er, all that is sick he medicines; The blind man sees, the cripple walks.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं सो॑म तनू॒कृद्भ्यो॒ द्वेषो॑भ्यो॒ऽन्यकृ॑तेभ्यः उ॒रु य॒न्तासि॒ वरू॑थम्
verses.transliteration: tváṃ soma tanūkŕ̥dbhyo  dvéṣobhyo 'nyákr̥tebhyaḥ  urú yantā́si várūtham

translation.text: Thou, Soma, givest wide defence against the hate of alien men, Hatreds that waste and weaken us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं चि॒त्ती तव॒ दक्षै॑र्दि॒व आ पृ॑थि॒व्या ऋ॑जीषिन् यावी॑र॒घस्य॑ चि॒द्द्वेषः॑
verses.transliteration: tváṃ cittī́ táva dákṣair  divá ā́ pr̥thivyā́ r̥jīṣin  yā́vīr aghásya cid dvéṣaḥ

translation.text: Thou by thine insight and thy skill, Impetuous One, from heaven and earth Drivest the sinner's enmity.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒र्थिनो॒ यन्ति॒ चेदर्थं॒ गच्छा॒निद्द॒दुषो॑ रा॒तिम् व॒वृ॒ज्युस्तृष्य॑तः॒ काम॑म्
verses.transliteration: arthíno yánti céd árthaṃ  gáchān íd dadúṣo rātím  vavr̥jyús tŕ̥ṣyataḥ kā́mam

translation.text: When to their task they come with zeal, may they obtain the Giver's grace, And satisfy his wish who thirsts.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वि॒दद्यत्पू॒र्व्यं न॒ष्टमुदी॑मृता॒युमी॑रयत् प्रेमायु॑स्तारी॒दती॑र्णम्
verses.transliteration: vidád yát pūrvyáṃ naṣṭám  úd īm r̥tāyúm īrayat  prém ā́yus tārīd átīrṇam

translation.text: So may he find what erst was lost, so may be speed the pious man, And lengthen his remaining life.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सु॒शेवो॑ नो मृळ॒याकु॒रदृ॑प्तक्रतुरवा॒तः भवा॑ नः सोम॒ शं हृ॒दे
verses.transliteration: suśévo no mr̥ḷayā́kur  ádr̥ptakratur avātáḥ  bhávā naḥ soma śáṃ hr̥dé

translation.text: Gracious, displaying tender love, unconquered, gentle in thy thoughts, Be sweet, O Soma, to our heart.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मा नः॑ सोम॒ सं वी॑विजो॒ मा वि बी॑भिषथा राजन् मा नो॒ हार्दि॑ त्वि॒षा व॑धीः
verses.transliteration: mā́ naḥ soma sáṃ vīvijo  mā́ ví bībhiṣathā rājan  mā́ no hā́rdi tviṣā́ vadhīḥ

translation.text: O Soma, terrify us not; strike us not with alarm, O King: Wound not our heart with dazzling flame.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अव॒ यत्स्वे स॒धस्थे॑ दे॒वानां॑ दुर्म॒तीरीक्षे॑ राज॒न्नप॒ द्विषः॑ सेध॒ मीढ्वो॒ अप॒ स्रिधः॑ सेध
verses.transliteration: áva yát své sadhásthe  devā́nāṃ durmatī́r ī́kṣe  rā́jann ápa dvíṣaḥ sedha  mī́ḍhvo ápa srídhaḥ sedha

translation.text: When in my dwelling-place I see the wicked enemies of Gods, King, chase their hatred far away, thou Bounteous One, dispel our foes.

verses.sanskrit_deva: न॒ह्य१॒॑न्यं ब॒ळाक॑रं मर्डि॒तारं॑ शतक्रतो त्वं न॑ इन्द्र मृळय
verses.transliteration: nahy ànyám baḷā́karam  marḍitā́raṃ śatakrato  tváṃ na indra mr̥ḷaya

translation.text: O Ṣatakratu! truly I have made none else my Comforter. Indra; be gracious unto us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यो नः॒ शश्व॑त्पु॒रावि॒थामृ॑ध्रो॒ वाज॑सातये स त्वं न॑ इन्द्र मृळय
verses.transliteration: yó naḥ śáśvat purā́vitha-  -ámr̥dhro vā́jasātaye  sá tváṃ na indra mr̥ḷaya

translation.text: Thou who hast ever aided us kindly of old to win the spoil, As such, O Indra, favour us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: किम॒ङ्ग र॑ध्र॒चोद॑नः सुन्वा॒नस्या॑वि॒तेद॑सि कु॒वित्स्वि॑न्द्र णः॒ शकः॑
verses.transliteration: kím aṅgá radhracódanaḥ  sunvānásyāvitéd asi  kuvít sv ìndra ṇaḥ śákaḥ

translation.text: What now? As prompter of the poor thou helpest him who sheds the juice. Wilt thou not, Indra, strengthen us?

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्र॒ प्र णो॒ रथ॑मव प॒श्चाच्चि॒त्सन्त॑मद्रिवः पु॒रस्ता॑देनं मे कृधि
verses.transliteration: índra prá ṇo rátham ava  paścā́c cit sántam adrivaḥ  purástād enam me kr̥dhi

translation.text: O Indra, help our chariot on, yea, Thunderer, though it lag behind: Give this my car the foremost place.

verses.sanskrit_deva: हन्तो॒ नु किमा॑ससे प्रथ॒मं नो॒ रथं॑ कृधि उ॒प॒मं वा॑ज॒यु श्रवः॑
verses.transliteration: hánto nú kím āsase  prathamáṃ no ráthaṃ kr̥dhi  upamáṃ vājayú śrávaḥ

translation.text: Ho there! why sittest thou at case? Make thou my chariot to be first And bring the fame of victory near.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अवा॑ नो वाज॒युं रथं॑ सु॒करं॑ ते॒ किमित्परि॑ अ॒स्मान्त्सु जि॒ग्युष॑स्कृधि
verses.transliteration: ávā no vājayúṃ ráthaṃ  sukáraṃ te kím ít pári  asmā́n sú jigyúṣas kr̥dhi

translation.text: Assist our car that seeks the prize. What can be easier for thee? So make thou us victorious.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्र॒ दृह्य॑स्व॒ पूर॑सि भ॒द्रा त॑ एति निष्कृ॒तम् इ॒यं धीर्ऋ॒त्विया॑वती
verses.transliteration: índra dŕ̥hyasva pū́r asi  bhadrā́ ta eti niṣkr̥tám  iyáṃ dhī́r r̥tvíyāvatī

translation.text: Indra, be firm: a fort art thou. To thine appointed place proceeds The auspicious hymn in season due.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मा सी॑मव॒द्य आ भा॑गु॒र्वी काष्ठा॑ हि॒तं धन॑म् अ॒पावृ॑क्ता अर॒त्नयः॑
verses.transliteration: mā́ sīm avadyá ā́ bhāg  urvī́ kā́ṣṭhā hitáṃ dhánam  apā́vr̥ktā aratnáyaḥ

translation.text: Let not our portion be disgrace. Broad is the course, the prize is set, The barriers are opened wide.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तु॒रीयं॒ नाम॑ य॒ज्ञियं॑ य॒दा कर॒स्तदु॑श्मसि आदित्पति॑र्न ओहसे
verses.transliteration: turī́yaṃ nā́ma yajñíyaṃ  yadā́ káras tád uśmasi  ā́d ít pátir na ohase

translation.text: This thing we wish. that thou mayst take thy fourth, thy sacrificial name. So art thou held to be our Lord.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अवी॑वृधद्वो अमृता॒ अम॑न्दीदेक॒द्यूर्दे॑वा उ॒त याश्च॑ देवीः तस्मा॑ उ॒ राधः॑ कृणुत प्रश॒स्तं प्रा॒तर्म॒क्षू धि॒याव॑सुर्जगम्यात्
verses.transliteration: ávīvr̥dhad vo amr̥tā ámandīd  ekadyū́r devā utá yā́ś ca devīḥ  tásmā u rā́dhaḥ kr̥ṇuta praśastám  prātár makṣū́ dhiyā́vasur jagamyāt

translation.text: Ekadyû hath exalted you, Immortals: both Goddesses and Gods hath he delighted. Bestow upon him bounty meet for praises. May he, enriched with prayer, come soon and early.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ तू न॑ इन्द्र क्षु॒मन्तं॑ चि॒त्रं ग्रा॒भं सं गृ॑भाय म॒हा॒ह॒स्ती दक्षि॑णेन
verses.transliteration: ā́ tū́ na indra kṣumántaṃ  citráṃ grābháṃ sáṃ gr̥bhāya  mahāhastī́ dákṣiṇena

translation.text: INDRA, God of the mighty arm, gather for us with thy right hand Manifold and nutritious spoil.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वि॒द्मा हि त्वा॑ तुविकू॒र्मिं तु॒विदे॑ष्णं तु॒वीम॑घम् तु॒वि॒मा॒त्रमवो॑भिः
verses.transliteration: vidmā́ hí tvā tuvikūrmíṃ  tuvídeṣṇaṃ tuvī́magham  tuvimātrám ávobhiḥ

translation.text: We know thee mighty in thy deeds, of mighty bounty, mighty wealth, Mighty in measure, prompt to aid.

verses.sanskrit_deva: न॒हि त्वा॑ शूर दे॒वा न मर्ता॑सो॒ दित्स॑न्तम् भी॒मं न गां वा॒रय॑न्ते
verses.transliteration: nahí tvā śūra devā́ḥ-  ná mártāso dítsantam  bhīmáṃ ná gā́ṃ vāráyante

translation.text: Hero, when thou art fain to give, neither may Gods nor mortal men Restrain thee like a fearful Bull.

verses.sanskrit_deva: एतो॒ न्विन्द्रं॒ स्तवा॒मेशा॑नं॒ वस्वः॑ स्व॒राज॑म् न राध॑सा मर्धिषन्नः
verses.transliteration: éto nv índraṃ stávāma  -ī́śānaṃ vásvaḥ svarā́jam  ná rā́dhasā mardhiṣan naḥ

translation.text: Come, let us glorify Indra, Lord supreme of wealth, Self-ruling King: In bounty may he harm us not.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र स्तो॑ष॒दुप॑ गासिष॒च्छ्रव॒त्साम॑ गी॒यमा॑नम् अ॒भि राध॑सा जुगुरत्
verses.transliteration: prá stoṣad úpa gāsiṣac  -śrávat sā́ma gīyámānam  abhí rā́dhasā jugurat

translation.text: Let prelude sound and following chant so let him hear the Sâman sung, And with his bounty answer us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ नो॑ भर॒ दक्षि॑णेना॒भि स॒व्येन॒ प्र मृ॑श इन्द्र॒ मा नो॒ वसो॒र्निर्भा॑क्
verses.transliteration: ā́ no bhara dákṣiṇena-  -abhí savyéna prá mr̥śa  índra mā́ no vásor nír bhāk

translation.text: O Indra, with thy right hand bring, and with thy left remember us. Let us not lose our share of wealth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उप॑ क्रम॒स्वा भ॑र धृष॒ता धृ॑ष्णो॒ जना॑नाम् अदा॑शूष्टरस्य॒ वेदः॑
verses.transliteration: úpa kramasvā́ bhara  dhr̥ṣatā́ dhr̥ṣṇo jánānām  ádāśūṣṭarasya védaḥ

translation.text: Come nigh, O Bold One, boldly bring hither the riches of the churl Who giveth least of all the folk.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्र॒ य उ॒ नु ते॒ अस्ति॒ वाजो॒ विप्रे॑भिः॒ सनि॑त्वः अ॒स्माभिः॒ सु तं स॑नुहि
verses.transliteration: índra yá u nú te ásti  vā́jo víprebhiḥ sánitvaḥ  asmā́bhiḥ sú táṃ sanuhi

translation.text: Indra, the booty which thou hast with holy singers to receive, Even that booty win with us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स॒द्यो॒जुव॑स्ते॒ वाजा॑ अ॒स्मभ्यं॑ वि॒श्वश्च॑न्द्राः वशै॑श्च म॒क्षू ज॑रन्ते
verses.transliteration: sadyojúvas te vā́jāḥ-  asmábhyaṃ viśváścandrāḥ  váśaiś ca makṣū́ jarante

translation.text: Indra, thy swiftly-coming spoil, the booty which rejoices all, Sounds quick in concert with our hopes.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ प्र द्र॑व परा॒वतो॑ऽर्वा॒वत॑श्च वृत्रहन् मध्वः॒ प्रति॒ प्रभ॑र्मणि
verses.transliteration: ā́ prá drava parāváto  -arvāvátaś ca vr̥trahan  mádhvaḥ práti prábharmaṇi

translation.text: HASTE forward to us from afar, or, Vritra-slayer, from anear, To meet the offering to the meath.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ती॒व्राः सोमा॑स॒ आ ग॑हि सु॒तासो॑ मादयि॒ष्णवः॑ पिबा॑ द॒धृग्यथो॑चि॒षे
verses.transliteration: tīvrā́ḥ sómāsa ā́ gahi-  sutā́so mādayiṣṇávaḥ  píbā dadhŕ̥g yáthociṣé

translation.text: Strong are the Soma-draughts; come nigh: the juices fill thee with delight: Drink boldly even as thou art wont'.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒षा म॑न्द॒स्वादु॒ तेऽरं॒ वरा॑य म॒न्यवे॑ भुव॑त्त इन्द्र॒ शं हृ॒दे
verses.transliteration: iṣā́ mandasvā́d u te-  -áraṃ várāya manyáve  bhúvat ta indra śáṃ hr̥dé

translation.text: Joy, Indra, in the strengthening food: let it content thy wish and thought, And be delightful to thine heart.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ त्व॑शत्र॒वा ग॑हि॒ न्यु१॒॑क्थानि॑ च हूयसे उ॒प॒मे रो॑च॒ने दि॒वः
verses.transliteration: ā́ tv àśatrav ā́ gahi  ny ùkthā́ni ca hūyase  upamé rocané diváḥ

translation.text: Come to us thou who hast no foe: we call thee down to hymns of praise, In heaven's sublimest realm of light.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तुभ्या॒यमद्रि॑भिः सु॒तो गोभिः॑ श्री॒तो मदा॑य॒ कम् प्र सोम॑ इन्द्र हूयते
verses.transliteration: túbhyāyám ádribhiḥ sutó  góbhiḥ śrītó mádāya kám  prá sóma indra hūyate

translation.text: This Soma here expressed with stones and dressed with milk for thy carouse, Indra, is offered up to thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्र॑ श्रु॒धि सु मे॒ हव॑म॒स्मे सु॒तस्य॒ गोम॑तः वि पी॒तिं तृ॒प्तिम॑श्नुहि
verses.transliteration: índra śrudhí sú me hávam  asmé sutásya gómataḥ  ví pītíṃ tr̥ptím aśnuhi

translation.text: Graciously, Indra, hear my call. Come and obtain the draught, and sate Thyself with juices blent with milk.

verses.sanskrit_deva: य इ॑न्द्र चम॒सेष्वा सोम॑श्च॒मूषु॑ ते सु॒तः पिबेद॑स्य॒ त्वमी॑शिषे
verses.transliteration: yá indra camaséṣv~ā́  sómaś camū́ṣu te sutáḥ  píbéd asya tvám īśiṣe

translation.text: The Soma, Indra, which is shed in chalices and vats for thee, Drink thou, for thou art Lord thereof.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यो अ॒प्सु च॒न्द्रमा॑ इव॒ सोम॑श्च॒मूषु॒ ददृ॑शे पिबेद॑स्य॒ त्वमी॑शिषे
verses.transliteration: yó apsú candrámā iva  sómaś camū́ṣu dádr̥śe  píbéd asya tvám īśiṣe

translation.text: The Soma seen within the vats, as in the flood the Moon is seen, Drink thou, for thou art Lord thereof.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यं ते॑ श्ये॒नः प॒दाभ॑रत्ति॒रो रजां॒स्यस्पृ॑तम् पिबेद॑स्य॒ त्वमी॑शिषे
verses.transliteration: yáṃ te śyenáḥ padā́bharat  tiró rájāṃsy áspr̥tam  píbéd asya tvám īśiṣe

translation.text: That which the Hawk brought in his claw, inviolate, through the air to thee, Drink thou, for thou art Lord thereof.

verses.sanskrit_deva: दे॒वाना॒मिदवो॑ म॒हत्तदा वृ॑णीमहे व॒यम् वृष्णा॑म॒स्मभ्य॑मू॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: devā́nām íd ávo mahát  tád ā́ vr̥ṇīmahe vayám  vŕ̥ṣṇām asmábhyam ūtáye

translation.text: WE choose unto ourselves that high protection of the Mighty Gods That it may help and succour us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ते नः॑ सन्तु॒ युजः॒ सदा॒ वरु॑णो मि॒त्रो अ॑र्य॒मा वृ॒धास॑श्च॒ प्रचे॑तसः
verses.transliteration: té naḥ santu yújaḥ sádā  váruṇo mitró aryamā́  vr̥dhā́saś ca prácetasaḥ

translation.text: May they be ever our allies, Varuṇa, Mitra, Aryaman, Far-seeing Gods who prosper us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अति॑ नो विष्पि॒ता पु॒रु नौ॒भिर॒पो न प॑र्षथ यू॒यमृ॒तस्य॑ रथ्यः
verses.transliteration: áti no viṣpitā́ purú  naubhír apó ná parṣatha  yūyám r̥tásya rathyaḥ

translation.text: Ye furtherers of holy Law, transport us safe o'er many woes, As over water-floods in ships.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वा॒मं नो॑ अस्त्वर्यमन्वा॒मं व॑रुण॒ शंस्य॑म् वा॒मं ह्या॑वृणी॒महे॑
verses.transliteration: vāmáṃ no astv aryaman  vāmáṃ varuṇa śáṃsyam  vāmáṃ hy ā̀vr̥ṇīmáhe

translation.text: Dear wealth be Aryaman to us, Varuṇa dear wealth meet for praise: Dear wealth we choose unto ourselves.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वा॒मस्य॒ हि प्र॑चेतस॒ ईशा॑नाशो रिशादसः नेमा॑दित्या अ॒घस्य॒ यत्
verses.transliteration: vāmásya hí pracetasaḥ-  ī́śānāso riśādasaḥ  ném ādityā aghásya yát

translation.text: For Sovrans of dear wealth are ye, Âdityas, not of sinner's wealth, Ye sapient Gods who slay the foe.

verses.sanskrit_deva: व॒यमिद्वः॑ सुदानवः क्षि॒यन्तो॒ यान्तो॒ अध्व॒न्ना देवा॑ वृ॒धाय॑ हूमहे
verses.transliteration: vayám íd vaḥ sudānavaḥ  kṣiyánto yā́nto ádhvann ā́  dévā vr̥dhā́ya hūmahe

translation.text: We in our homes, ye Bounteous Ones, and while we journey on the road, Invoke you, Gods, to prosper us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अधि॑ न इन्द्रैषां॒ विष्णो॑ सजा॒त्या॑नाम् इ॒ता मरु॑तो॒ अश्वि॑ना
verses.transliteration: ádhi na indraiṣāṃ  víṣṇo sajātyā̀nām  itā́ máruto áśvinā

translation.text: Regard us, Indra, Vishṇu, here, ye Aṣvins and the Marut host, Us who are kith and kin to you.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र भ्रा॑तृ॒त्वं सु॑दान॒वोऽध॑ द्वि॒ता स॑मा॒न्या मा॒तुर्गर्भे॑ भरामहे
verses.transliteration: prá bhrātr̥tváṃ sudānavaḥ-  -ádha dvitā́ samānyā́  mātúr gárbhe bharāmahe

translation.text: Ye Bounteous Ones, from time of old we here set forth our brotherhood, Our kinship in the Mother's womb.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यू॒यं हि ष्ठा सु॑दानव॒ इन्द्र॑ज्येष्ठा अ॒भिद्य॑वः अधा॑ चिद्व उ॒त ब्रु॑वे
verses.transliteration: yūyáṃ hí ṣṭhā́ sudānavaḥ  índrajyeṣṭhā abhídyavaḥ  ádhā cid va utá bruve

translation.text: Then come with Indra for your chief, as early day, ye Bounteous Gods Yea, I address you now for this.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्रेष्ठं॑ वो॒ अति॑थिं स्तु॒षे मि॒त्रमि॑व प्रि॒यम् अ॒ग्निं रथं॒ न वेद्य॑म्
verses.transliteration: préṣṭhaṃ vo átithiṃ  stuṣé mitrám iva priyám  agníṃ ráthaṃ ná védyam

translation.text: AGNI, your dearest Guest, I laud, him who is loving as a friend, Who brings us riches like a car.

verses.sanskrit_deva: क॒विमि॑व॒ प्रचे॑तसं॒ यं दे॒वासो॒ अध॑ द्वि॒ता नि मर्त्ये॑ष्वाद॒धुः
verses.transliteration: kavím iva prácetasaṃ  yáṃ devā́so ádha dvitā́  ní mártyeṣv ādadhúḥ

translation.text: Whom as a far-foreseeing Sage the Gods have, from the olden time, Established among mortal men.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं य॑विष्ठ दा॒शुषो॒ नॄँः पा॑हि शृणु॒धी गिरः॑ रक्षा॑ तो॒कमु॒त त्मना॑
verses.transliteration: tváṃ yaviṣṭha dāśúṣo  nr̥̄́m̐ḥ pāhi śr̥ṇudhī́ gíraḥ  rákṣā tokám utá tmánā

translation.text: Do thou, Most Youthful God, protect the men who offer, hear their songs, And of thyself preserve their seed.

verses.sanskrit_deva: कया॑ ते अग्ने अङ्गिर॒ ऊर्जो॑ नपा॒दुप॑स्तुतिम् वरा॑य देव म॒न्यवे॑
verses.transliteration: káyā te agne aṅgiraḥ-  ū́rjo napād úpastutim  várāya deva manyáve

translation.text: What is the praise wherewith, O God, Afigiras, Agni, Son of Strength, We, after thine own wish and thought,

verses.sanskrit_deva: दाशे॑म॒ कस्य॒ मन॑सा य॒ज्ञस्य॑ सहसो यहो कदु॑ वोच इ॒दं नमः॑
verses.transliteration: dā́śema kásya mánasā  yajñásya sahaso yaho  kád u voca idáṃ námaḥ

translation.text: May serve thee, O thou Child of Power, and with what sacrifice's plan? What prayer shall I now speak to thee?

verses.sanskrit_deva: अधा॒ त्वं हि न॒स्करो॒ विश्वा॑ अ॒स्मभ्यं॑ सुक्षि॒तीः वाज॑द्रविणसो॒ गिरः॑
verses.transliteration: ádhā tváṃ hí nas káro  víśvā asmábhyaṃ sukṣitī́ḥ  vā́jadraviṇaso gíraḥ

translation.text: Our God, make all of us to dwell in happy habitations, and Reward our songs with spoil and wealth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: कस्य॑ नू॒नं परी॑णसो॒ धियो॑ जिन्वसि दम्पते गोषा॑ता॒ यस्य॑ ते॒ गिरः॑
verses.transliteration: kásya nūnám párīṇaso  dhíyo jinvasi dampate  góṣātā yásya te gíraḥ

translation.text: Lord of the house, what plenty fills the songs which thou inspirest now, Thou whose hymn helps to win the kine?

verses.sanskrit_deva: तं म॑र्जयन्त सु॒क्रतुं॑ पुरो॒यावा॑नमा॒जिषु॑ स्वेषु॒ क्षये॑षु वा॒जिन॑म्
verses.transliteration: tám marjayanta sukrátum  puroyā́vānam ājíṣu  svéṣu kṣáyeṣu vājínam

translation.text: Him Wise and Strong they glorify, the foremost Champion in the fray, And mighty in his dwelling-place.

verses.sanskrit_deva: क्षेति॒ क्षेमे॑भिः सा॒धुभि॒र्नकि॒र्यं घ्नन्ति॒ हन्ति॒ यः अग्ने॑ सु॒वीर॑ एधते
verses.transliteration: kṣéti kṣémebhiḥ sādhúbhir  nákir yáṃ ghnánti hánti yáḥ  ágne suvī́ra edhate

translation.text: Agni, he dwells in rest and peace who smites and no one smites again: With hero sons he prospers well

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ मे॒ हवं॑ नास॒त्याश्वि॑ना॒ गच्छ॑तं यु॒वम् मध्वः॒ सोम॑स्य पी॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: ā́ me hávaṃ nāsatyā-  áśvinā gáchataṃ yuvám  mádhvaḥ sómasya pītáye

translation.text: To this mine invocation, O ye Aṣvins, ye Nâsatyas, come, To drink the savoury Soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒मं मे॒ स्तोम॑मश्विने॒मं मे॑ शृणुतं॒ हव॑म् मध्वः॒ सोम॑स्य पी॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: imám me stómam aśvinā-  -imám me śr̥ṇutaṃ hávam  mádhvaḥ sómasya pītáye

translation.text: This laud of mine, ye Aṣvins Twain, and this mine invitation hear, To drink the savoury Soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒यं वां॒ कृष्णो॑ अश्विना॒ हव॑ते वाजिनीवसू मध्वः॒ सोम॑स्य पी॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: ayáṃ vāṃ kŕ̥ṣṇo aśvinā  hávate vājinīvasū  mádhvaḥ sómasya pītáye

translation.text: Here Kr̥ishṇa is invoking you, O Aṣvins, Lords of ample wealth. To drink the savoury Soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: शृ॒णु॒तं ज॑रि॒तुर्हवं॒ कृष्ण॑स्य स्तुव॒तो न॑रा मध्वः॒ सोम॑स्य पी॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: śr̥ṇutáṃ jaritúr hávam  kŕ̥ṣṇasya stuvató narā  mádhvaḥ sómasya pītáye

translation.text: List, Heroes, to the singer's call, the call of Kr̥ishṇa lauding you, To drink the savoury Soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: छ॒र्दिर्य॑न्त॒मदा॑भ्यं॒ विप्रा॑य स्तुव॒ते न॑रा मध्वः॒ सोम॑स्य पी॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: chardír yantam ádābhyam  víprāya stuvaté narā  mádhvaḥ sómasya pītáye

translation.text: Chiefs, to the sage who sings your praise grant an inviolable home, To drink the savoury Soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: गच्छ॑तं दा॒शुषो॑ गृ॒हमि॒त्था स्तु॑व॒तो अ॑श्विना मध्वः॒ सोम॑स्य पी॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: gáchataṃ dāśúṣo gr̥hám  itthā́ stuvató aśvinā  mádhvaḥ sómasya pītáye

translation.text: Come to the worshipper's abode, Aṣvins, who here is lauding you, To drink the savoury Soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यु॒ञ्जाथां॒ रास॑भं॒ रथे॑ वी॒ड्व॑ङ्गे वृषण्वसू मध्वः॒ सोम॑स्य पी॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: yuñjā́thāṃ rā́sabhaṃ ráthe  vīḍvàṅge vr̥ṣaṇvasū  mádhvaḥ sómasya pītáye

translation.text: Yoke to the firmly jointed car the ass which draws you, Lords of wealth. To drink the savoury Soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्रि॒व॒न्धु॒रेण॑ त्रि॒वृता॒ रथे॒ना या॑तमश्विना मध्वः॒ सोम॑स्य पी॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: trivandhuréṇa trivŕ̥tā  ráthenā́ yātam aśvinā  mádhvaḥ sómasya pītáye

translation.text: Come hither, Aṣvins, on your car of triple form with triple seat, To drink the savoury Soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: नू मे॒ गिरो॑ नास॒त्याश्वि॑ना॒ प्राव॑तं यु॒वम् मध्वः॒ सोम॑स्य पी॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: nū́ me gíro nāsatyā-  -áśvinā prā́vataṃ yuvám  mádhvaḥ sómasya pītáye

translation.text: O Aṣvins, O Nâsatyas, now accept with favouring grace my songs, To drink the savoury Soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒भा हि द॒स्रा भि॒षजा॑ मयो॒भुवो॒भा दक्ष॑स्य॒ वच॑सो बभू॒वथुः॑ ता वां॒ विश्व॑को हवते तनूकृ॒थे मा नो॒ वि यौ॑ष्टं स॒ख्या मु॒मोच॑तम्
verses.transliteration: ubhā́ hí dasrā́ bhiṣájā mayobhúvā-  -ubhā́ dákṣasya vácaso babhūváthuḥ  tā́ vāṃ víśvako havate tanūkr̥thé  mā́ no ví yauṣṭaṃ sakhyā́ mumócatam

translation.text: YE Twain are wondrous strong, well-skilled in arts that heal, both bringers of delight, ye both won Daksha's praise. Viṣvaka calls on you as such to save his life. Break ye not off our friendship, come and set me free.

verses.sanskrit_deva: क॒था नू॒नं वां॒ विम॑ना॒ उप॑ स्तवद्यु॒वं धियं॑ ददथु॒र्वस्य॑इष्टये ता वां॒ विश्व॑को हवते तनूकृ॒थे मा नो॒ वि यौ॑ष्टं स॒ख्या मु॒मोच॑तम्
verses.transliteration: kathā́ nūnáṃ vāṃ vímanā úpa stavad  yuváṃ dhíyaṃ dadathur vásya: iṣṭaye  tā́ vāṃ víśvako havate tanūkr̥thé  mā́ no ví yauṣṭaṃ sakhyā́ mumócatam

translation.text: How shall he praise you now who is distraught in mind? Ye Twain give wisdom for the gain of what is good. Viṣvaka calls on you as such to save his life. Break ye not off our friendship, come and set me free.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यु॒वं हि ष्मा॑ पुरुभुजे॒ममे॑ध॒तुं वि॑ष्णा॒प्वे॑ द॒दथु॒र्वस्य॑इष्टये ता वां॒ विश्व॑को हवते तनूकृ॒थे मा नो॒ वि यौ॑ष्टं स॒ख्या मु॒मोच॑तम्
verses.transliteration: yuváṃ hí ṣmā purubhujemám edhatúṃ  viṣṇāpvè dadáthur vásya: iṣṭaye  tā́ vāṃ víśvako havate tanūkr̥thé  mā́ no ví yauṣṭaṃ sakhyā́ mumócatam

translation.text: Already have ye Twain, possessors of great wealth, prospered Vishṇâpû thus for gain of what is good. Viṣvaka calls on you as such to save his life. Break ye not off our friendship, come and set me free.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒त त्यं वी॒रं ध॑न॒सामृ॑जी॒षिणं॑ दू॒रे चि॒त्सन्त॒मव॑से हवामहे यस्य॒ स्वादि॑ष्ठा सुम॒तिः पि॒तुर्य॑था॒ मा नो॒ वि यौ॑ष्टं स॒ख्या मु॒मोच॑तम्
verses.transliteration: utá tyáṃ vīráṃ dhanasā́m r̥jīṣíṇaṃ  dūré cit sántam ávase havāmahe  yásya svā́diṣṭhā sumatíḥ pitúr yathā  mā́ no ví yauṣṭaṃ sakhyā́ mumócatam

translation.text: And that Impetuous Hero, winner of the spoil, though he is far away, we call to succour us, Whose gracious favour, like a father's, is most sweet. Break ye not off our friendship, come and set me free.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ऋ॒तेन॑ दे॒वः स॑वि॒ता श॑मायत ऋ॒तस्य॒ शृङ्ग॑मुर्वि॒या वि प॑प्रथे ऋ॒तं सा॑साह॒ महि॑ चित्पृतन्य॒तो मा नो॒ वि यौ॑ष्टं स॒ख्या मु॒मोच॑तम्
verses.transliteration: r̥téna deváḥ savitā́ śamāyate-  r̥tásya śŕ̥ṅgam urviyā́ ví paprathe  r̥táṃ sāsāha máhi cit pr̥tanyató  mā́ no ví yauṣṭaṃ sakhyā́ mumócatam

translation.text: About the holy Law toils Savitar the God the horn of holy Law hath he spread far and wide. The holy Law hath quelled even mighty men of war. Break ye not off our ftiendship, come and set me free.

verses.sanskrit_deva: द्यु॒म्नी वां॒ स्तोमो॑ अश्विना॒ क्रिवि॒र्न सेक॒ आ ग॑तम् मध्वः॑ सु॒तस्य॒ स दि॒वि प्रि॒यो न॑रा पा॒तं गौ॒रावि॒वेरि॑णे
verses.transliteration: dyumnī́ vāṃ stómo aśvinā  krívir ná séka ā́ gatam  mádhvaḥ sutásya sá diví priyó narā  pātáṃ gaurā́v ivériṇe

translation.text: SPLENDID, O Aṣvins, is your praise. Come fountain-like, to pour the stream. Of the sweet juice effused-dear is it, Chiefs, in heaven-drink like two wild bulls at a pool.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पिब॑तं घ॒र्मं मधु॑मन्तमश्वि॒ना ब॒र्हिः सी॑दतं नरा ता म॑न्दसा॒ना मनु॑षो दुरो॒ण आ नि पा॑तं॒ वेद॑सा॒ वयः॑
verses.transliteration: píbataṃ gharmám mádhumantam aśvinā-  ā́ barhíḥ sīdataṃ narā  tā́ mandasānā́ mánuṣo duroṇá ā́  ní pātaṃ védasā váyaḥ

translation.text: Drink the libation rich in sweets, O Aṣvins Twain: sit. Heroes, on the sacred grass. Do ye with joyful heart in the abode of man preserve his life by means of wealth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ वां॒ विश्वा॑भिरू॒तिभिः॑ प्रि॒यमे॑धा अहूषत ता व॒र्तिर्या॑त॒मुप॑ वृ॒क्तब॑र्हिषो॒ जुष्टं॑ य॒ज्ञं दिवि॑ष्टिषु
verses.transliteration: ā́ vāṃ víśvābhir ūtíbhiḥ  priyámedhā ahūṣata  tā́ vartír yātam úpa vr̥ktábarhiṣo  júṣṭaṃ yajñáṃ díviṣṭiṣu

translation.text: The Priyamedhas bid you come with all the succours that are yours. Come to his house whose holy grass is trimmed, to dear sacrifice at the morning rites.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पिब॑तं॒ सोमं॒ मधु॑मन्तमश्वि॒ना ब॒र्हिः सी॑दतं सु॒मत् ता वा॑वृधा॒ना उप॑ सुष्टु॒तिं दि॒वो ग॒न्तं गौ॒रावि॒वेरि॑णम्
verses.transliteration: píbataṃ sómam mádhumantam aśvinā-  -ā́ barhíḥ sīdataṃ sumát  tā́ vāvr̥dhānā́ úpa suṣṭutíṃ divó  gantáṃ gaurā́v ivériṇam

translation.text: Drink ye the Soma rich in meath, ye Aṣvins Twain: sit gladly on the sacred grass. So, waxen mighty, to our eulogy from heaven come ye as wild-bulls to the pool.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ नू॒नं या॑तमश्वि॒नाश्वे॑भिः प्रुषि॒तप्सु॑भिः दस्रा॒ हिर॑ण्यवर्तनी शुभस्पती पा॒तं सोम॑मृतावृधा
verses.transliteration: ā́ nūnáṃ yātam aśvinā  -áśvebhiḥ pruṣitápsubhiḥ  dásrā híraṇyavartanī śubhas patī  pātáṃ sómam r̥tāvr̥dhā

translation.text: Come to us, O ye Aṣvins, now with steeds of many a varied hue, Ye Lords of splendour, wondrous, borne on paths of gold, drink Soma, ye who strengthen Law.

verses.sanskrit_deva: व॒यं हि वां॒ हवा॑महे विप॒न्यवो॒ विप्रा॑सो॒ वाज॑सातये ता व॒ल्गू द॒स्रा पु॑रु॒दंस॑सा धि॒याश्वि॑ना श्रु॒ष्ट्या ग॑तम्
verses.transliteration: vayáṃ hí vāṃ hávāmahe vipanyávo  víprāso vā́jasātaye  tā́ valgū́ dasrā́ purudáṃsasā dhiyā́-  -áśvinā śruṣṭy ā́ gatam

translation.text: For we the priestly singers, fain tohymn your praise, invoke you for the gain of strength. So, wondrous, fair, and famed for great deeds come to us, through our hymn, Aṣvins, when ye hear.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तं वो॑ द॒स्ममृ॑ती॒षहं॒ वसो॑र्मन्दा॒नमन्ध॑सः अ॒भि व॒त्सं न स्वस॑रेषु धे॒नव॒ इन्द्रं॑ गी॒र्भिर्न॑वामहे
verses.transliteration: táṃ vo dasmám r̥tīṣáhaṃ  vásor mandānám ándhasaḥ  abhí vatsáṃ ná svásareṣu dhenávaḥ-  índraṃ gīrbhír navāmahe

translation.text: As cows low to their calves in stalls, so with our songs we glorify This Indra, even your Wondrous God who checks attack, who joys in the delicious juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: द्यु॒क्षं सु॒दानुं॒ तवि॑षीभि॒रावृ॑तं गि॒रिं न पु॑रु॒भोज॑सम् क्षु॒मन्तं॒ वाजं॑ श॒तिनं॑ सह॒स्रिणं॑ म॒क्षू गोम॑न्तमीमहे
verses.transliteration: dyukṣáṃ sudā́nuṃ táviṣībhir ā́vr̥taṃ  giríṃ ná purubhójasam  kṣumántaṃ vā́jaṃ śatínaṃ sahasríṇam  makṣū́ gómantam īmahe

translation.text: Celestial, bounteous Giver, girt about with might, rich, mountain-like, in precious things, Him swift we seek. for foodful booty rich in kine, brought hundredfold and thousandfold.

verses.sanskrit_deva: न त्वा॑ बृ॒हन्तो॒ अद्र॑यो॒ वर॑न्त इन्द्र वी॒ळवः॑ यद्दित्स॑सि स्तुव॒ते माव॑ते॒ वसु॒ नकि॒ष्टदा मि॑नाति ते
verses.transliteration: ná tvā br̥hánto ádrayo  váranta indra vīḷávaḥ  yád dítsasi stuvaté mā́vate vásu  nákiṣ ṭád ā́ mināti te

translation.text: Indra, the strong and lofty hills are powerless to bar thy way. None stay that act of thine when thou wouldst fain give wealth to one like me who sings thy praise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: योद्धा॑सि॒ क्रत्वा॒ शव॑सो॒त दं॒सना॒ विश्वा॑ जा॒ताभि म॒ज्मना॑ आ त्वा॒यम॒र्क ऊ॒तये॑ ववर्तति॒ यं गोत॑मा॒ अजी॑जनन्
verses.transliteration: yóddhāsi krátvā śávasotá daṃsánā  víśvā jātā́bhí majmánā  ā́ tvāyám arká ūtáye vavartati  yáṃ gótamā ájījanan

translation.text: A Warrior thou by strength, wisdom, and wondrous deed, in might excellest all that is. Hither may this our hymn attract thee to our help, the hymn which Gotamas have made.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र हि रि॑रि॒क्ष ओज॑सा दि॒वो अन्ते॑भ्य॒स्परि॑ न त्वा॑ विव्याच॒ रज॑ इन्द्र॒ पार्थि॑व॒मनु॑ स्व॒धां व॑वक्षिथ
verses.transliteration: prá hí ririkṣá ójasā  divó ántebhyas pári  ná tvā vivyāca rája indra pā́rthivam  ánu svadhā́ṃ vavakṣitha

translation.text: For in thy might thou stretchest out beyond the boundaries of heaven. The earthly region, Indra, comprehends thee not. After thy Godhead hast thou waxed.

verses.sanskrit_deva: नकिः॒ परि॑ष्टिर्मघवन्म॒घस्य॑ ते॒ यद्दा॒शुषे॑ दश॒स्यसि॑ अ॒स्माकं॑ बोध्यु॒चथ॑स्य चोदि॒ता मंहि॑ष्ठो॒ वाज॑सातये
verses.transliteration: nákiḥ páriṣṭir maghavan maghásya te  yád dāśúṣe daśasyási  asmā́kam bodhy ucáthasya coditā́  máṃhiṣṭho vā́jasātaye

translation.text: When, Maghavan, thou honourest the worshipper, no one is there to stay thy wealth. Most liberal Giver thou, do thou inspire our song of praise, that we may win the spoil.

verses.sanskrit_deva: बृ॒हदिन्द्रा॑य गायत॒ मरु॑तो वृत्र॒हंत॑मम् येन॒ ज्योति॒रज॑नयन्नृता॒वृधो॑ दे॒वं दे॒वाय॒ जागृ॑वि
verses.transliteration: br̥hád índrāya gāyata  máruto vr̥trahántamam  yéna jyótir ájanayann r̥tāvŕ̥dho  deváṃ devā́ya jā́gr̥vi

translation.text: To Indra sing the lofty hymn, Maruts that slays the Vr̥itras best. Whereby the Holy Ones created for the God the light divine that ever wakes.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अपा॑धमद॒भिश॑स्तीरशस्ति॒हाथेन्द्रो॑ द्यु॒म्न्याभ॑वत् दे॒वास्त॑ इन्द्र स॒ख्याय॑ येमिरे॒ बृह॑द्भानो॒ मरु॑द्गण
verses.transliteration: ápādhamad abhíśastīr aśastihā́-  -áthéndro dyumny ā́bhavat  devā́s ta indra sakhyā́ya yemire  bŕ̥hadbhāno márudgaṇa

translation.text: Indra who quells the curse blew curses far away, and then in splendour came to us. Indra, refulgent with thy Marut host! the Gods strove eagerly to win thy love.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र व॒ इन्द्रा॑य बृह॒ते मरु॑तो॒ ब्रह्मा॑र्चत वृ॒त्रं ह॑नति वृत्र॒हा श॒तक्र॑तु॒र्वज्रे॑ण श॒तप॑र्वणा
verses.transliteration: prá va índrāya br̥haté  máruto bráhmārcata  vr̥tráṃ hanati vr̥trahā́ śatákratur  vájreṇa śatáparvaṇā

translation.text: Sing to your lofty Indra, sing, Maruts, a holy hymn of praise. Let Ṣatakratu, Vr̥itra-slayer, kill the foe with hundred-knotted thunderbolt.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भि प्र भ॑र धृष॒ता धृ॑षन्मनः॒ श्रव॑श्चित्ते असद्बृ॒हत् अर्ष॒न्त्वापो॒ जव॑सा॒ वि मा॒तरो॒ हनो॑ वृ॒त्रं जया॒ स्वः॑
verses.transliteration: abhí prá bhara dhr̥ṣatā́ dhr̥ṣanmanaḥ  śrávaś cit te asad br̥hát  árṣantv ā́po jávasā ví mātáro  háno vr̥tráṃ jáyā svàḥ

translation.text: Aim and fetch boldly forth, O thou whose heart is bold: great glory will be thine thereby. In rapid torrent let the mother waters spread. Slay Vr̥itra, win the light of heaven.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यज्जाय॑था अपूर्व्य॒ मघ॑वन्वृत्र॒हत्या॑य तत्पृ॑थि॒वीम॑प्रथय॒स्तद॑स्तभ्ना उ॒त द्याम्
verses.transliteration: yáj jā́yathā apūrvya  mághavan vr̥trahátyāya  tát pr̥thivī́m aprathayas  tád astabhnā utá dyā́m

translation.text: When thou, unequalled Maghavan, wast born to smite the Vr̥itras dead, Thou spreadest out the spacious earth and didst support and prop the heavens.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तत्ते॑ य॒ज्ञो अ॑जायत॒ तद॒र्क उ॒त हस्कृ॑तिः तद्विश्व॑मभि॒भूर॑सि॒ यज्जा॒तं यच्च॒ जन्त्व॑म्
verses.transliteration: tát te yajñó ajāyata  tád arká utá háskr̥tiḥ  tád víśvam abhibhū́r asi  yáj jātáṃ yác ca jántvam

translation.text: There was the sacrifice produced for thee, the laud, and song of joy, Thou in thy might surpassest all, all that now is and yet shall be.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ॒मासु॑ प॒क्वमैर॑य॒ आ सूर्यं॑ रोहयो दि॒वि घ॒र्मं न साम॑न्तपता सुवृ॒क्तिभि॒र्जुष्टं॒ गिर्व॑णसे बृ॒हत्
verses.transliteration: āmā́su pakvám aírayaḥ-  ā́ sū́ryaṃ rohayo diví  gharmáṃ ná sā́man tapatā suvr̥ktíbhir  júṣṭaṃ gírvaṇase br̥hát

translation.text: Raw kine thou filledst with ripe milk. Thou madest Sûrya rise to heaven. Heat him as milk is heated with pure Sâma hymns, great joy to him who loves the song.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ नो॒ विश्वा॑सु॒ हव्य॒ इन्द्रः॑ स॒मत्सु॑ भूषतु उप॒ ब्रह्मा॑णि॒ सव॑नानि वृत्र॒हा प॑रम॒ज्या ऋची॑षमः
verses.transliteration: ā́ no víśvāsu hávyaḥ-  índraḥ samátsu bhūṣatu  úpa bráhmāṇi sávanāni vr̥trahā́  paramajyā́ ŕ̥cīṣamaḥ

translation.text: MAY Indra, who in every fight must be invoked, be near to us. May the most mighty Vr̥itra-slayer, meet for praise, come to libations and to hymns.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं दा॒ता प्र॑थ॒मो राध॑साम॒स्यसि॑ स॒त्य ई॑शान॒कृत् तु॒वि॒द्यु॒म्नस्य॒ युज्या वृ॑णीमहे पु॒त्रस्य॒ शव॑सो म॒हः
verses.transliteration: tváṃ dātā́ prathamó rā́dhasām asi-  ási satyá īśānakŕ̥t  tuvidyumnásya yújyā́ vr̥ṇīmahe  putrásya śávaso maháḥ

translation.text: Thou art the best of all in sending bounteous gifts, true art thou, lordly in thine act. We claim alliance with the very Glorious One, yea, with the Mighty Son of Strength.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ब्रह्मा॑ त इन्द्र गिर्वणः क्रि॒यन्ते॒ अन॑तिद्भुता इ॒मा जु॑षस्व हर्यश्व॒ योज॒नेन्द्र॒ या ते॒ अम॑न्महि
verses.transliteration: bráhmā ta indra girvaṇaḥ  kriyánte ánatidbhutā  imā́ juṣasva haryaśva yójanā-  -índra yā́ te ámanmahi

translation.text: Prayers unsurpassed are offered up to thee the Lover of the Song. Indra, Lord of Bay Steeds, accept these fitting hymns, hymns which we have thought out for thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं हि स॒त्यो म॑घव॒न्नना॑नतो वृ॒त्रा भूरि॑ न्यृ॒ञ्जसे॑ स त्वं श॑विष्ठ वज्रहस्त दा॒शुषे॒ऽर्वाञ्चं॑ र॒यिमा कृ॑धि
verses.transliteration: tváṃ hí satyó maghavann ánānato  vr̥trā́ bhū́ri nyr̥ñjáse  sá tváṃ śaviṣṭha vajrahasta dāśúṣe  -arvā́ñcaṃ rayím ā́ kr̥dhi

translation.text: For thou, O Maghavan, art truthful, ne'er subdued and bringest many a Vr̥itra low. As such, O Mightiest Lord, Wielder of Thunder, send wealth hither to the worshipper.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वमि॑न्द्र य॒शा अ॑स्यृजी॒षी श॑वसस्पते त्वं वृ॒त्राणि॑ हंस्यप्र॒तीन्येक॒ इदनु॑त्ता चर्षणी॒धृता॑
verses.transliteration: tvám indra yaśā́ asi-  r̥jīṣī́ śavasas pate  tváṃ vr̥trā́ṇi haṃsy apratī́ny éka íd  ánuttā carṣaṇīdhŕ̥tā

translation.text: O Indra, thou art far-renowned, impetuous, O Lord of Strength. Alone thou slayest with the guardian of mankind resistless never-conquered foes.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तमु॑ त्वा नू॒नम॑सुर॒ प्रचे॑तसं॒ राधो॑ भा॒गमि॑वेमहे म॒हीव॒ कृत्तिः॑ शर॒णा त॑ इन्द्र॒ प्र ते॑ सु॒म्ना नो॑ अश्नवन्
verses.transliteration: tám u tvā nūnám asura prácetasaṃ  rā́dho bhāgám ivemahe  mahī́va kŕ̥ttiḥ śaraṇā́ ta indra  prá te sumnā́ no aśnavan

translation.text: As such we seek thee now, O Asura, thee most wise, craving thy bounty as our share. Thy sheltering defence is like a mighty cloak. So may thy glories reach to us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: क॒न्या॒३॒॑ वार॑वाय॒ती सोम॒मपि॑ स्रु॒तावि॑दत् अस्तं॒ भर॑न्त्यब्रवी॒दिन्द्रा॑य सुनवै त्वा श॒क्राय॑ सुनवै त्वा
verses.transliteration: kanyā̀ vā́r avāyatī́  sómam ápi srutā́vidat  ástam bháranty abravīd  índrāya sunavai tvā  śakrā́ya sunavai tvā

translation.text: DOWN to the stream a maiden came, and found the Soma by the way. Bearing it to her home she said, For Indra will I press thee out, for Ṣakra will I press thee out.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒सौ य एषि॑ वीर॒को गृ॒हंगृ॑हं वि॒चाक॑शद् इ॒मं जम्भ॑सुतं पिब धा॒नाव॑न्तं कर॒म्भिण॑मपू॒पव॑न्तमु॒क्थिन॑म्
verses.transliteration: asaú yá éṣi vīrakó  gr̥háṃ-gr̥haṃ vicā́kaśad  imáṃ jámbhasutam piba  dhānā́vantaṃ karambhíṇam  apūpávantam ukthínam

translation.text: Thou roaming yonder, little man, beholding every house in turn, Drink thou this Soma pressed with teeth, accompanied with grain and curds, with cake of meal and song of praise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ च॒न त्वा॑ चिकित्सा॒मोऽधि॑ च॒न त्वा॒ नेम॑सि शनै॑रिव शन॒कैरि॒वेन्द्रा॑येन्दो॒ परि॑ स्रव
verses.transliteration: ā́ caná tvā cikitsāmaḥ-  -ádhi caná tvā némasi  śánair iva śanakaír iva-  -índrāyendo pári srava

translation.text: Fain would we learn to know thee well, nor yet can we attain to thee. Still slowly and in gradual drops, O Indu, unto Indra flow.

verses.sanskrit_deva: कु॒विच्छक॑त्कु॒वित्कर॑त्कु॒विन्नो॒ वस्य॑स॒स्कर॑त् कु॒वित्प॑ति॒द्विषो॑ य॒तीरिन्द्रे॑ण सं॒गमा॑महै
verses.transliteration: kuvíc chákat kuvít kárat  kuvín no vásyasas kárat  kuvít patidvíṣo yatī́r  índreṇa saṃgámāmahai

translation.text: Will he not help and work for us? Will he not make us wealthier? Shall we not, hostile to our lord, unite ourselves to Indra now?

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒मानि॒ त्रीणि॑ वि॒ष्टपा॒ तानी॑न्द्र॒ वि रो॑हय शिर॑स्त॒तस्यो॒र्वरा॒मादि॒दं म॒ उपो॒दरे॑
verses.transliteration: imā́ni trī́ṇi viṣṭápā  tā́nīndra ví rohaya  śíras tatásyorvárām  ā́d idám ma úpodáre

translation.text: O Indra, cause to sprout again three places, these which I declare,– My father's head, his cultured field, and this the part below my waist.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒सौ च॒ या न॑ उ॒र्वरादि॒मां त॒न्वं१॒॑ मम॑ अथो॑ त॒तस्य॒ यच्छिरः॒ सर्वा॒ ता रो॑म॒शा कृ॑धि
verses.transliteration: asaú ca yā́ na urvárā-  -ā́d imā́ṃ tanvàm máma  átho tatásya yác chíraḥ  sárvā tā́ romaśā́ kr̥dhi

translation.text: Make all of these grow crops of hair, you cultivated field of ours, My body, and my father's head.

verses.sanskrit_deva: खे रथ॑स्य॒ खेऽन॑सः॒ खे यु॒गस्य॑ शतक्रतो अ॒पा॒लामि॑न्द्र॒ त्रिष्पू॒त्व्यकृ॑णोः॒ सूर्य॑त्वचम्
verses.transliteration: khé ráthasya khé 'nasaḥ  khé yugásya śatakrato  apālā́m indra tríṣ pūtvī́-  ákr̥ṇoḥ sū́ryatvacam

translation.text: Cleansing Apâlâ, Indra! thrice, thou gavest sunlike skin to her, Drawn, Ṣatakratu! through the hole of car, of wagon, and of yoke.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पान्त॒मा वो॒ अन्ध॑स॒ इन्द्र॑म॒भि प्र गा॑यत वि॒श्वा॒साहं॑ श॒तक्र॑तुं॒ मंहि॑ष्ठं चर्षणी॒नाम्
verses.transliteration: pā́ntam ā́ vo ándhasaḥ-  -índram abhí prá gāyata  viśvāsā́haṃ śatákratum  máṃhiṣṭhaṃ carṣaṇīnā́m

translation.text: INVITE ye Indra with a song to drink your draught of Soma juice, All-conquering Ṣatakratu, most munificent of all who live.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पु॒रु॒हू॒तं पु॑रुष्टु॒तं गा॑था॒न्यं१॒॑ सन॑श्रुतम् इन्द्र॒ इति॑ ब्रवीतन
verses.transliteration: puruhūtám puruṣṭutám  gāthānyàṃ sánaśrutam  índra íti bravītana

translation.text: Lauded by many, much-invoked, leader of song, renowned of old: His name is Indra, tell it forth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्र॒ इन्नो॑ म॒हानां॑ दा॒ता वाजा॑नां नृ॒तुः म॒हाँ अ॑भि॒ज्ञ्वा य॑मत्
verses.transliteration: índra ín no mahā́nāṃ  dātā́ vā́jānāṃ nr̥túḥ  mahā́m̐ abhijñv ā́ yamat

translation.text: Indra the Dancer be to us the giver of abundant strength: May he, the mighty, bring it near.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अपा॑दु शि॒प्र्यन्ध॑सः सु॒दक्ष॑स्य प्रहो॒षिणः॑ इन्दो॒रिन्द्रो॒ यवा॑शिरः
verses.transliteration: ápād u śipry ándhasaḥ  sudákṣasya prahoṣíṇaḥ  índor índro yávāśiraḥ

translation.text: Indra whose jaws are strong hath drunk of worshipping Sudaksha's draught, The Soma juice with barley mixt.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तम्व॒भि प्रार्च॒तेन्द्रं॒ सोम॑स्य पी॒तये॑ तदिद्ध्य॑स्य॒ वर्ध॑नम्
verses.transliteration: tám v abhí prā́rcata-  índraṃ sómasya pītáye  tád íd dhy àsya várdhanam

translation.text: Call Indra loudly with your songs of praise to drink the Soma juice. For this is what augments his stiength.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒स्य पी॒त्वा मदा॑नां दे॒वो दे॒वस्यौज॑सा विश्वा॒भि भुव॑ना भुवत्
verses.transliteration: asyá pītvā́ mádānāṃ  devó devásyaújasā  víśvābhí bhúvanā bhuvat

translation.text: When he hath drank its gladdening drops, the God with vigour of a God Hath far surpassed all things that are.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्यमु॑ वः सत्रा॒साहं॒ विश्वा॑सु गी॒र्ष्वाय॑तम् आ च्या॑वयस्यू॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: tyám u vaḥ satrāsā́haṃ  víśvāsu gīrṣv ā́yatam  ā́ cyāvayasy ūtáye

translation.text: Thou speedest down to succour us this ever-conquering God of yours, Him who is drawn to all our songs

verses.sanskrit_deva: यु॒ध्मं सन्त॑मन॒र्वाणं॑ सोम॒पामन॑पच्युतम् नर॑मवा॒र्यक्र॑तुम्
verses.transliteration: yudhmáṃ sántam anarvā́ṇaṃ  somapā́m ánapacyutam  náram avāryákratum

translation.text: The Warrior not to be restrained, the Soma-drinker ne'er o'erthrown, The Chieftain of resistless might.

verses.sanskrit_deva: शिक्षा॑ ण इन्द्र रा॒य आ पु॒रु वि॒द्वाँ ऋ॑चीषम अवा॑ नः॒ पार्ये॒ धने॑
verses.transliteration: śíkṣā ṇa indra rāyá~ā́  purú vidvā́m̐ r̥cīṣama  ávā naḥ pā́rye dháne

translation.text: O Indra, send us riches, thou Omniscient, worthy of our praise: Help us in the decisive fray.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अत॑श्चिदिन्द्र ण॒ उपा या॑हि श॒तवा॑जया इ॒षा स॒हस्र॑वाजया
verses.transliteration: átaś cid indra ṇa úpa-  -ā́ yāhi śatávājayā  iṣā́ sahásravājayā

translation.text: Even thence, O Indra, come to us with food that gives a hundred powers, With food that gives a thousand powers.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अया॑म॒ धीव॑तो॒ धियोऽर्व॑द्भिः शक्र गोदरे जये॑म पृ॒त्सु व॑ज्रिवः
verses.transliteration: áyāma dhī́vato dhíyaḥ-  -árvadbhiḥ śakra godare  jáyema pr̥tsú vajrivaḥ

translation.text: We sought the wisdom of the wise. Ṣakra, Kine-giver, Thunder-armed! May we with steeds o’ercome in fight.

verses.sanskrit_deva: व॒यमु॑ त्वा शतक्रतो॒ गावो॒ न यव॑से॒ष्वा उ॒क्थेषु॑ रणयामसि
verses.transliteration: vayám u tvā śatakrato  gā́vo ná yávaseṣv ā́  ukthéṣu raṇayāmasi

translation.text: We make thee, Ṣatakratu, find enjoyment in the songs we sing, Like cattle in the pasture lands.

verses.sanskrit_deva: विश्वा॒ हि म॑र्त्यत्व॒नानु॑का॒मा श॑तक्रतो अग॑न्म वज्रिन्ना॒शसः॑
verses.transliteration: víśvā hí martyatvanā́-  -anukāmā́ śatakrato  áganma vajrinn āśásaḥ

translation.text: For, Ṣatakratu, Thunder-armed, all that we craved, as men are wont, All that we hoped, have we attained.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वे सु पु॑त्र शव॒सोऽवृ॑त्र॒न्काम॑कातयः न त्वामि॒न्द्राति॑ रिच्यते
verses.transliteration: tvé sú putra śavasaḥ-  -ávr̥tran kā́makātayaḥ  ná tvā́m indrā́ti ricyate

translation.text: Those, Son of Strength, are come to thee who cherish wishes in their hearts: O Indra, none excelleth thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स नो॑ वृष॒न्त्सनि॑ष्ठया॒ सं घो॒रया॑ द्रवि॒त्न्वा धि॒यावि॑ड्ढि॒ पुरं॑ध्या
verses.transliteration: sá no vr̥ṣan sániṣṭhayā  sáṃ ghoráyā dravitnvā́  dhiyā́viḍḍhi púraṃdhyā

translation.text: So, Hero, guard us with thy care, with thy most liberal providence, Speedy, and terrible to foes.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यस्ते॑ नू॒नं श॑तक्रत॒विन्द्र॑ द्यु॒म्नित॑मो॒ मदः॑ तेन॑ नू॒नं मदे॑ मदेः
verses.transliteration: yás te nūnáṃ śatakratav  índra dyumnítamo mádaḥ  téna nūnám máde madeḥ

translation.text: O Ṣatakratu Indra, now rejoice with that carouse of thine Which is most splendid of them all;

verses.sanskrit_deva: यस्ते॑ चि॒त्रश्र॑वस्तमो॒ य इ॑न्द्र वृत्र॒हन्त॑मः य ओ॑जो॒दात॑मो॒ मदः॑
verses.transliteration: yás te citráśravastamo  yá indra vr̥trahántamaḥ  yá ojodā́tamo mádaḥ

translation.text: Even, Indra, that carouse which slays the Vritras best, most widely famed, Best giver of thy power and might.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वि॒द्मा हि यस्ते॑ अद्रिव॒स्त्वाद॑त्तः सत्य सोमपाः विश्वा॑सु दस्म कृ॒ष्टिषु॑
verses.transliteration: vidmā́ hí yás te adrivas  tvā́dattaḥ satya somapāḥ  víśvāsu dasma kr̥ṣṭíṣu
