translation.text: For that which is thy gift we know, true Soma-drinker, Thunder-armed, Mighty One, amid all the folk.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्रा॑य॒ मद्व॑ने सु॒तं परि॑ ष्टोभन्तु नो॒ गिरः॑ अ॒र्कम॑र्चन्तु का॒रवः॑
verses.transliteration: índrāya mádvane sutám  pári ṣṭobhantu no gíraḥ  arkám arcantu kārávaḥ

translation.text: For Indra, Lover of Carouse, loud be our songs about the juice: Let poets sing the song of praise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यस्मि॒न्विश्वा॒ अधि॒ श्रियो॒ रण॑न्ति स॒प्त सं॒सदः॑ इन्द्रं॑ सु॒ते ह॑वामहे
verses.transliteration: yásmin víśvā ádhi śríyo  ráṇanti saptá saṃsádaḥ  índraṃ suté havāmahe

translation.text: We summon Indra to the draught, in whom all glories rest, in whom The seven communities rejoice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्रिक॑द्रुकेषु॒ चेत॑नं दे॒वासो॑ य॒ज्ञम॑त्नत तमिद्व॑र्धन्तु नो॒ गिरः॑
verses.transliteration: tríkadrukeṣu cétanaṃ  devā́so yajñám atnata  tám íd vardhantu no gíraḥ

translation.text: At the Trikadrukas the Gods span sacrifice that stirs the mind: Let our songs aid and prosper it.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ त्वा॑ विश॒न्त्विन्द॑वः समु॒द्रमि॑व॒ सिन्ध॑वः न त्वामि॒न्द्राति॑ रिच्यते
verses.transliteration: -ā́ tvā viśantv índavaḥ  samudrám iva síndhavaḥ  ná tvā́m indrā́ti ricyate

translation.text: Let the drops pass within thee as the rivers flow into the sea: O Indra, naught excelleth thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वि॒व्यक्थ॑ महि॒ना वृ॑षन्भ॒क्षं सोम॑स्य जागृवे य इ॑न्द्र ज॒ठरे॑षु ते
verses.transliteration: vivyáktha mahinā́ vr̥ṣan  bhakṣáṃ sómasya jāgr̥ve  yá indra jaṭháreṣu te

translation.text: Thou, wakeful Hero, by thy might hast taken food of Soma juice, Which, Indra, is within thee now.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अरं॑ त इन्द्र कु॒क्षये॒ सोमो॑ भवतु वृत्रहन् अरं॒ धाम॑भ्य॒ इन्द॑वः
verses.transliteration: áraṃ ta indra kukṣáye  sómo bhavatu vr̥trahan  áraṃ dhā́mabhya índavaḥ

translation.text: O Indra, Vritra-slayer, let Soma be ready for thy maw, The drops be ready for thy forms.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अर॒मश्वा॑य गायति श्रु॒तक॑क्षो॒ अरं॒ गवे॑ अर॒मिन्द्र॑स्य॒ धाम्ने॑
verses.transliteration: áram áśvāya gāyati  śrutákakṣo áraṃ gáve  áram índrasya dhā́mne

translation.text: Now Ṣrutakaksha sings his song that cattle and the steed may come, That Indra’s very self may come.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अरं॒ हि ष्म॑ सु॒तेषु॑ णः॒ सोमे॑ष्विन्द्र॒ भूष॑सि अरं॑ ते शक्र दा॒वने॑
verses.transliteration: áraṃ hí ṣma sutéṣu ṇaḥ  sómeṣv indra bhū́ṣasi  -áraṃ te śakra dāváne

translation.text: Here, Indra, thou art ready by our Soma juices shed for thee, Ṣakra, at hand that thou mayst give.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प॒रा॒कात्ता॑च्चिदद्रिव॒स्त्वां न॑क्षन्त नो॒ गिरः॑ अरं॑ गमाम ते व॒यम्
verses.transliteration: parākā́ttāc cid adrivas  tvā́ṃ nakṣanta no gíraḥ  áraṃ gamāma te vayám

translation.text: Even from far away our songs reach thee, O Caster of the Stone: May we come very close to thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒वा ह्यसि॑ वीर॒युरे॒वा शूर॑ उ॒त स्थि॒रः ए॒वा ते॒ राध्यं॒ मनः॑
verses.transliteration: evā́ hy ási vīrayúr  evā́ śū́ra utá sthiráḥ  evā́ te rā́dhyam mánaḥ

translation.text: For so thou art the hero’s Friend, a Hero, too, art thou, and strong: So may thine heart be won to us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ए॒वा रा॒तिस्तु॑वीमघ॒ विश्वे॑भिर्धायि धा॒तृभिः॑ अधा॑ चिदिन्द्र मे॒ सचा॑
verses.transliteration: evā́ rātís tuvīmagha  víśvebhir dhāyi dhātŕ̥bhiḥ  ádhā cid indra me sácā

translation.text: So hath the offering, wealthiest Lord, been paid by all the worshippers: So dwell thou, Indra, even with me.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मो षु ब्र॒ह्मेव॑ तन्द्र॒युर्भुवो॑ वाजानां पते मत्स्वा॑ सु॒तस्य॒ गोम॑तः
verses.transliteration: mó ṣú brahméva tandrayúr  bhúvo vājānām pate  mátsvā sutásya gómataḥ

translation.text: He not thou like a slothful priest, O Lord of spoil and wealth: rejoice In the pressed Soma blent with milk.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मा न॑ इन्द्रा॒भ्या॒३॒॑दिशः॒ सूरो॑ अ॒क्तुष्वा य॑मन् त्वा यु॒जा व॑नेम॒ तत्
verses.transliteration: mā́ na indrābhy ā̀díśaḥ  sū́ro aktúṣv ā́ yaman  tvā́ yujā́ vanema tát

translation.text: O Indra, let not ill designs surround us in the sunbeams' light: This may we gain with thee for Friend.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वयेदि॑न्द्र यु॒जा व॒यं प्रति॑ ब्रुवीमहि॒ स्पृधः॑ त्वम॒स्माकं॒ तव॑ स्मसि
verses.transliteration: tváyéd indra yujā́ vayám  práti bruvīmahi spŕ̥dhaḥ  tvám asmā́kaṃ táva smasi

translation.text: With thee to help us, Indra, let us answer all our enemies: For thou art ours and we are thine.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वामिद्धि त्वा॒यवो॑ऽनु॒नोनु॑वत॒श्चरा॑न् सखा॑य इन्द्र का॒रवः॑
verses.transliteration: tvā́m íd dhí tvāyávo  -anunónuvataś cárān  sákhāya indra kārávaḥ

translation.text: Indra, the poets and thy friends, faithful to thee, shall loudly sing Thy praises as they follow thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उद्घेद॒भि श्रु॒ताम॑घं वृष॒भं नर्या॑पसम् अस्ता॑रमेषि सूर्य
verses.transliteration: úd ghéd abhí śrutā́maghaṃ  vr̥ṣabháṃ náryāpasam  ástāram eṣi sūrya

translation.text: Sûrya, thou mountest up to meet the Hero famous for his wealth, Who hurls the bolt and works for man

verses.sanskrit_deva: नव॒ यो न॑व॒तिं पुरो॑ बि॒भेद॑ बा॒ह्वो॑जसा अहिं॑ च वृत्र॒हाव॑धीत्
verses.transliteration: náva yó navatím púro  bibhéda bāhvòjasā  áhiṃ ca vr̥trahā́vadhīt

translation.text: Him who with might of both his arms brake nine-and-ninety castles down, Slew Vr̥itra and smote Ahi dead.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स न॒ इन्द्रः॑ शि॒वः सखाश्वा॑व॒द्गोम॒द्यव॑मत् उ॒रुधा॑रेव दोहते
verses.transliteration: sá na índraḥ śiváḥ sákhā-  -áśvāvad gómad yávamat  urúdhāreva dohate

translation.text: This Indra is our gracious Friend. He sends us in a full broad stream Riches in horses, kine, and corn.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यद॒द्य कच्च॑ वृत्रहन्नु॒दगा॑ अ॒भि सू॑र्य सर्वं॒ तदि॑न्द्र ते॒ वशे॑
verses.transliteration: yád adyá kác ca vr̥trahann  udágā abhí sūrya  sárvaṃ tád indra te váśe

translation.text: Whatever, Vr̥itra-slayer! thou, Sûrya, hast risen upon to-day, That, Indra, all is in thy power.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यद्वा॑ प्रवृद्ध सत्पते॒ न म॑रा॒ इति॒ मन्य॑से उ॒तो तत्स॒त्यमित्तव॑
verses.transliteration: yád vā pravr̥ddha satpate  ná marā íti mányase  utó tát satyám ít táva

translation.text: When, Mighty One, Lord of the brave, thou thinkest thus, I shall not die, That thought of thine is true indeed.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ये सोमा॑सः परा॒वति॒ ये अ॑र्वा॒वति॑ सुन्वि॒रे सर्वाँ॒स्ताँ इ॑न्द्र गच्छसि
verses.transliteration: yé sómāsaḥ parāváti  yé arvāváti sunviré  sárvāṃs tā́m̐ indra gachasi

translation.text: Thou, Indra, goest unto all Soma libations shed for thee, Both far away and near at hand.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तमिन्द्रं॑ वाजयामसि म॒हे वृ॒त्राय॒ हन्त॑वे स वृषा॑ वृष॒भो भु॑वत्
verses.transliteration: tám índraṃ vājayāmasi  mahé vr̥trā́ya hántave  sá vŕ̥ṣā vr̥ṣabhó bhuvat

translation.text: We make this Indra very strong to strike the mighty Vr̥itra dead: A vigorous Hero shall he be.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्रः॒ स दाम॑ने कृ॒त ओजि॑ष्ठः॒ स मदे॑ हि॒तः द्यु॒म्नी श्लो॒की स सो॒म्यः
verses.transliteration: índraḥ sá dā́mane kr̥táḥ-  ójiṣṭhaḥ sá máde hitáḥ  dyumnī́ ślokī́ sá somyáḥ

translation.text: Indra was made for giving, set, most mighty, o'er the joyous draught. Bright, meet for Soma, famed in song.

verses.sanskrit_deva: गि॒रा वज्रो॒ न सम्भृ॑तः॒ सब॑लो॒ अन॑पच्युतः व॒व॒क्ष ऋ॒ष्वो अस्तृ॑तः
verses.transliteration: girā́ vájro ná sámbhr̥taḥ  sábalo ánapacyutaḥ  vavakṣá r̥ṣvó ástr̥taḥ

translation.text: By song as 'twere, the powerful bolt which none may parry was prepared Lofty, invincible he grew.

verses.sanskrit_deva: दु॒र्गे चि॑न्नः सु॒गं कृ॑धि गृणा॒न इ॑न्द्र गिर्वणः त्वं च॑ मघव॒न्वशः॑
verses.transliteration: durgé cin naḥ sugáṃ kr̥dhi  gr̥ṇāná indra girvaṇaḥ  tváṃ ca maghavan váśaḥ

translation.text: Indra, Song-lover, lauded, make even in the wilds fair ways for us, Whenever, Maghavan, thou wilt.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यस्य॑ ते॒ नू चि॑दा॒दिशं॒ न मि॒नन्ति॑ स्व॒राज्य॑म् न दे॒वो नाध्रि॑गु॒र्जनः॑
verses.transliteration: yásya te nū́ cid ādíśaṃ  ná minánti svarā́jyam  ná devó nā́dhrigur jánaḥ

translation.text: Thou whose commandment and behest of sovran sway none disregards, Neither audacious man nor God.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अधा॑ ते॒ अप्र॑तिष्कुतं दे॒वी शुष्मं॑ सपर्यतः उ॒भे सु॑शिप्र॒ रोद॑सी
verses.transliteration: ádhā te ápratiṣkutaṃ  devī́ śúṣmaṃ saparyataḥ  ubhé suśipra ródasī

translation.text: And both these Goddesses, Earth, Heaven, Lord of the beauteous helm! revere Thy might which no one may resist.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वमे॒तद॑धारयः कृ॒ष्णासु॒ रोहि॑णीषु च परु॑ष्णीषु॒ रुश॒त्पयः॑
verses.transliteration: tvám etád adhārayaḥ  kr̥ṣṇā́su róhiṇīṣu ca  páruṣṇīṣu rúśat páyaḥ

translation.text: Thou in the black cows and the red and in the cows with spotted skin This white milk hast deposited.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वि यदहे॒रध॑ त्वि॒षो विश्वे॑ दे॒वासो॒ अक्र॑मुः वि॒दन्मृ॒गस्य॒ ताँ अमः॑
verses.transliteration: ví yád áher ádha tviṣó  víśve devā́so ákramuḥ  vidán mr̥gásya tā́m̐ ámaḥ

translation.text: When in their terror all the Gods shrank from the Dragon’s furious might, Fear of the monster fell on them.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आदु॑ मे निव॒रो भु॑वद्वृत्र॒हादि॑ष्ट॒ पौंस्य॑म् अजा॑तशत्रु॒रस्तृ॑तः
verses.transliteration: ā́d u me nivaró bhuvad  vr̥trahā́diṣṭa paúṃsyam  ájātaśatrur ástr̥taḥ

translation.text: Then he was my Defender, then, Invincible, whose foe is not, The Vritra-slayer showed his might.

verses.sanskrit_deva: श्रु॒तं वो॑ वृत्र॒हन्त॑मं॒ प्र शर्धं॑ चर्षणी॒नाम् आ शु॑षे॒ राध॑से म॒हे
verses.transliteration: śrutáṃ vo vr̥trahántamam  prá śárdhaṃ carṣaṇīnā́m  ā́ śuṣe rā́dhase mahé

translation.text: Him your best Vritra-slayer, him the famous Champion of mankind I urge to great munificence,

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒या धि॒या च॑ गव्य॒या पुरु॑णाम॒न्पुरु॑ष्टुत यत्सोमे॑सोम॒ आभ॑वः
verses.transliteration: ayā́ dhiyā́ ca gavyayā́  púruṇāman púruṣṭuta  yát sóme-soma ā́bhavaḥ

translation.text: To come, Much-lauded! Many-named! with this same thought that longs for milk, Whene’er the Soma juice is shed.

verses.sanskrit_deva: बो॒धिन्म॑ना॒ इद॑स्तु नो वृत्र॒हा भूर्या॑सुतिः शृ॒णोतु॑ श॒क्र आ॒शिष॑म्
verses.transliteration: bodhínmanā íd astu no  vr̥trahā́ bhū́ryāsutiḥ  śr̥ṇótu śakrá āśíṣam

translation.text: Much-honoured by libations, may the Vritra-slayer wake for us: May Ṣakra listen to our prayers.

verses.sanskrit_deva: कया॒ त्वं न॑ ऊ॒त्याभि प्र म॑न्दसे वृषन् कया॑ स्तो॒तृभ्य॒ आ भ॑र
verses.transliteration: káyā tváṃ na ūtyā́-  -abhí prá mandase vr̥ṣan  káyā stotŕ̥bhya ā́ bhara

translation.text: O Hero, with what aid dost thou delight us, with what succour bring Riches to those who worship thee?

verses.sanskrit_deva: कस्य॒ वृषा॑ सु॒ते सचा॑ नि॒युत्वा॑न्वृष॒भो र॑णत् वृ॒त्र॒हा सोम॑पीतये
verses.transliteration: kásya vŕ̥ṣā suté sácā  niyútvān vr̥ṣabhó raṇat  vr̥trahā́ sómapītaye

translation.text: With whose libation joys the Strong, the Hero with his team who quells The foe, to drink the Soma juice?

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भी षु ण॒स्त्वं र॒यिं म॑न्दसा॒नः स॑ह॒स्रिण॑म् प्र॒य॒न्ता बो॑धि दा॒शुषे॑
verses.transliteration: abhī́ ṣú ṇas tváṃ rayím  mandasānáḥ sahasríṇam  prayantā́ bodhi dāśúṣe

translation.text: Rejoicing in thy spirit bring thousandfold opulence to us: Enrich thy votary with gifts.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पत्नी॑वन्तः सु॒ता इ॒म उ॒शन्तो॑ यन्ति वी॒तये॑ अ॒पां जग्मि॑र्निचुम्पु॒णः
verses.transliteration: pátnīvantaḥ sutā́ imé-  uśánto yanti vītáye  apā́ṃ jágmir nicumpuṇáḥ

translation.text: These juices with their wedded wives flow to enjoyment lovingly: To waters speeds the restless one.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒ष्टा होत्रा॑ असृक्ष॒तेन्द्रं॑ वृ॒धासो॑ अध्व॒रे अच्छा॑वभृ॒थमोज॑सा
verses.transliteration: iṣṭā́ hótrā asr̥kṣata-  -índraṃ vr̥dhā́so adhvaré  áchāvabhr̥thám ójasā

translation.text: Presented strengthening gifts have sent Indra away at sacrifice, With might, unto the cleansing bath.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒ह त्या स॑ध॒माद्या॒ हरी॒ हिर॑ण्यकेश्या वो॒ळ्हाम॒भि प्रयो॑ हि॒तम्
verses.transliteration: ihá tyā́ sadhamā́dyā  hárī híraṇyakeśyā  voḷhā́m abhí práyo hitám

translation.text: These two who share his feast, Bay Steeds with golden manes, shall bring him to The banquet that is laid for him.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तुभ्यं॒ सोमाः॑ सु॒ता इ॒मे स्ती॒र्णं ब॒र्हिर्वि॑भावसो स्तो॒तृभ्य॒ इन्द्र॒मा व॑ह
verses.transliteration: túbhyaṃ sómāḥ sutā́ imé  stīrṇám barhír vibhāvaso  stotŕ̥bhya índram ā́ vaha

translation.text: For thee, O Lord of Light, are shed these Soma-drops, and grass is strewn: Bring Indra to his worshippers.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ ते॒ दक्षं॒ वि रो॑च॒ना दध॒द्रत्ना॒ वि दा॒शुषे॑ स्तो॒तृभ्य॒ इन्द्र॑मर्चत
verses.transliteration: ā́ te dákṣaṃ ví rocanā́  dádhad rátnā ví dāśúṣe  stotŕ̥bhya índram arcata

translation.text: May Indra give thee skill and lights of heaven, wealth to his votary And priests who praise him: laud ye him.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ ते॑ दधामीन्द्रि॒यमु॒क्था विश्वा॑ शतक्रतो स्तो॒तृभ्य॑ इन्द्र मृळय
verses.transliteration: ā́ te dadhāmīndriyám  ukthā́ víśvā śatakrato  stotŕ̥bhya indra mr̥ḷaya

translation.text: O Ṣatakratu, wondrous strength and all our lauds I bring to thee: Be gracious to thy worshippers.

verses.sanskrit_deva: भ॒द्रम्भ॑द्रं न॒ आ भ॒रेष॒मूर्जं॑ शतक्रतो यदि॑न्द्र मृ॒ळया॑सि नः
verses.transliteration: bhadrám-bhadraṃ na ā́ bhara-  -íṣam ū́rjaṃ śatakrato  yád indra mr̥ḷáyāsi naḥ

translation.text: Bring to us all things excellent, O Ṣatakratu, food and strength; For, Indra, thou art kind to us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स नो॒ विश्वा॒न्या भ॑र सुवि॒तानि॑ शतक्रतो यदि॑न्द्र मृ॒ळया॑सि नः
verses.transliteration: sá no víśvāny ā́ bhara  suvitā́ni śatakrato  yád indra mr̥ḷáyāsi naḥ

translation.text: O Ṣatakratu, bring to us all blessings, all felicity: For, Indra, thou art kind to us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वामिद्वृ॑त्रहन्तम सु॒ताव॑न्तो हवामहे यदि॑न्द्र मृ॒ळया॑सि नः
verses.transliteration: tvā́m íd vr̥trahantama  sutā́vanto havāmahe  yád indra mr̥ḷáyāsi naḥ

translation.text: Bearing the Soma juice we call, best Vritra-slayer, unto thee: For, Indra, thou art kind to us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उप॑ नो॒ हरि॑भिः सु॒तं या॒हि म॑दानां पते उप॑ नो॒ हरि॑भिः सु॒तम्
verses.transliteration: úpa no háribhiḥ sutáṃ  yāhí madānām pate  úpa no háribhiḥ sutáṃ

translation.text: Come, Lord of rapturous joys, to our libation with thy Bay Steeds, come To our libation with thy Steeds.

verses.sanskrit_deva: द्वि॒ता यो वृ॑त्र॒हन्त॑मो वि॒द इन्द्रः॑ श॒तक्र॑तुः उप॑ नो॒ हरि॑भिः सु॒तम्
verses.transliteration: dvitā́ yó vr̥trahántamo  vidá índraḥ śatákratuḥ  úpa no háribhiḥ sutáṃ

translation.text: Known as best Vritra-slayer erst, as Indra Ṣatakratu, come With Bay Steeds to the juice we shed.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं हि वृ॑त्रहन्नेषां पा॒ता सोमा॑ना॒मसि॑ उप॑ नो॒ हरि॑भिः सु॒तम्
verses.transliteration: tváṃ hí vr̥trahann eṣām  pātā́ sómānām ási  úpa no háribhiḥ sutáṃ

translation.text: O Vritra-slayer, thou art he who drinks these drops of Soma: come With Bay Steeds to the juice we shed.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्र॑ इ॒षे द॑दातु न ऋभु॒क्षण॑मृ॒भुं र॒यिम् वा॒जी द॑दातु वा॒जिन॑म्
verses.transliteration: índra iṣé dadātu naḥ-  r̥bhukṣáṇam r̥bhúṃ rayím  vājī́ dadātu vājínam

translation.text: May Indra give, to aid us, wealth handy that rules the Skilful Ones: Yea, may the Strong give potent wealth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: गौर्ध॑यति म॒रुतां॑ श्रव॒स्युर्मा॒ता म॒घोना॑म् यु॒क्ता वह्नी॒ रथा॑नाम्
verses.transliteration: gaúr dhayati marútāṃ  śravasyúr mātā́ maghónām  yuktā́ váhnī ráthānām

translation.text: THE Cow, the famous Mother of the wealthy Maruts, pours her milk: Both horses of the cars are yoked,–

verses.sanskrit_deva: यस्या॑ दे॒वा उ॒पस्थे॑ व्र॒ता विश्वे॑ धा॒रय॑न्ते सूर्या॒मासा॑ दृ॒शे कम्
verses.transliteration: yásyā devā́ upásthe  vratā́ víśve dhāráyante  sū́ryāmā́sā dr̥śé kám

translation.text: She in whose bosom all the Gods, and Sun and Moon for men to see, Maintain their everlasting Laws.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तत्सु नो॒ विश्वे॑ अ॒र्य आ सदा॑ गृणन्ति का॒रवः॑ म॒रुतः॒ सोम॑पीतये
verses.transliteration: tát sú no víśve aryá ā́  sádā gr̥ṇanti kārávaḥ  marútaḥ sómapītaye

translation.text: This all the pious sing to us, and sacred poets evermore: The Maruts to the Soma-draught

verses.sanskrit_deva: अस्ति॒ सोमो॑ अ॒यं सु॒तः पिब॑न्त्यस्य म॒रुतः॑ उ॒त स्व॒राजो॑ अ॒श्विना॑
verses.transliteration: ásti sómo ayáṃ sutáḥ  píbanty asya marútaḥ  utá svarā́jo aśvínā

translation.text: Here is the Soma ready pressed of this the Maruts drink, of this Self-luminous the Aṣvins drink.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पिब॑न्ति मि॒त्रो अ॑र्य॒मा तना॑ पू॒तस्य॒ वरु॑णः त्रि॒ष॒ध॒स्थस्य॒ जाव॑तः
verses.transliteration: píbanti mitró aryamā́  tánā pūtásya váruṇaḥ  triṣadhasthásya jā́vataḥ

translation.text: Of this, moreover, purified, set in three places, procreant, Drink Varuṇa, Mitra, Aryaman.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒तो न्व॑स्य॒ जोष॒माँ इन्द्रः॑ सु॒तस्य॒ गोम॑तः प्रा॒तर्होते॑व मत्सति
verses.transliteration: utó nv àsya jóṣam ā́m̐  índraḥ sutásya gómataḥ  prātár hóteva matsati

translation.text: And Indra, like the Herald Priest, desirous of the milky juice, At early morn will quaff thereof.

verses.sanskrit_deva: कद॑त्विषन्त सू॒रय॑स्ति॒र आप॑ इव॒ स्रिधः॑ अर्ष॑न्ति पू॒तद॑क्षसः
verses.transliteration: kád atviṣanta sūráyas  tirá ā́pa iva srídhaḥ  árṣanti pūtádakṣasaḥ

translation.text: When have the Princes gleamed and shone through waters as through troops of foes? When hasten they whose might is pure?

verses.sanskrit_deva: कद्वो॑ अ॒द्य म॒हानां॑ दे॒वाना॒मवो॑ वृणे त्मना॑ च द॒स्मव॑र्चसाम्
verses.transliteration: kád vo adyá mahā́nāṃ  devā́nām ávo vr̥ṇe  tmánā ca dasmávarcasām

translation.text: What favour do I claim this day of you great Deities, you who are Wondrously splendid in yourselves?

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ ये विश्वा॒ पार्थि॑वानि प॒प्रथ॑न्रोच॒ना दि॒वः म॒रुतः॒ सोम॑पीतये
verses.transliteration: ā́ yé víśvā pā́rthivāni  papráthan rocanā́ diváḥ  marútaḥ sómapītaye

translation.text: I call, to drink the Soma, those Maruts who spread all realms of earth And luminous regions of the sky.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्यान्नु पू॒तद॑क्षसो दि॒वो वो॑ मरुतो हुवे अ॒स्य सोम॑स्य पी॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: tyā́n nú pūtádakṣaso  divó vo maruto huve  asyá sómasya pītáye

translation.text: You, even such, pure in your might, you, O ye Maruts, I invoke From heaven to drink this Soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्यान्नु ये वि रोद॑सी तस्त॒भुर्म॒रुतो॑ हुवे अ॒स्य सोम॑स्य पी॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: tyā́n nú yé ví ródasī  tastabhúr marúto huve  asyá sómasya pītáye

translation.text: The Maruts, those who have sustained and propped the heavens and earth apart, I call to drink this Soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्यं नु मारु॑तं ग॒णं गि॑रि॒ष्ठां वृष॑णं हुवे अ॒स्य सोम॑स्य पी॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: tyáṃ nú mā́rutaṃ gaṇáṃ  giriṣṭhā́ṃ vŕ̥ṣaṇaṃ huve  asyá sómasya pītáye

translation.text: That vigorous baud of Maruts that abideth in the mountains, I Invoke to drink this Soma juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ त्वा॒ गिरो॑ र॒थीरि॒वास्थुः॑ सु॒तेषु॑ गिर्वणः अ॒भि त्वा॒ सम॑नूष॒तेन्द्र॑ व॒त्सं न मा॒तरः॑
verses.transliteration: ā́ tvā gíro rathī́r iva-  -ásthuḥ sutéṣu girvaṇaḥ  abhí tvā sám anūṣata-  índra vatsáṃ ná mātáraḥ

translation.text: SONG-LOVER! like a charioteer come songs to thee when Soma flows. O Indra, they have called to thee as mother-kine unto their calves.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ त्वा॑ शु॒क्रा अ॑चुच्यवुः सु॒तास॑ इन्द्र गिर्वणः पिबा॒ त्व१॒॑स्यान्ध॑स॒ इन्द्र॒ विश्वा॑सु ते हि॒तम्
verses.transliteration: ā́ tvā śukrā́ acucyavuḥ  sutā́sa indra girvaṇaḥ  píbā tv àsyā́ndhasaḥ-  índra víśvāsu te hitám

translation.text: Bright juices hitherward have sped thee, Indra, Lover of the Song. Drink, Indra, of this flowing sap: in every house 'tis set for thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: पिबा॒ सोमं॒ मदा॑य॒ कमिन्द्र॑ श्ये॒नाभृ॑तं सु॒तम् त्वं हि शश्व॑तीनां॒ पती॒ राजा॑ वि॒शामसि॑
verses.transliteration: píbā sómam mádāya káṃ  índra śyenā́bhr̥taṃ sutám  tváṃ hí śáśvatīnām  pátī rā́jā viśā́m ási

translation.text: Drink Soma to inspirit thee, juice, Indra, which the Falcon brought: For thou art King and Sovran Lord of all the families of men.

verses.sanskrit_deva: श्रु॒धी हवं॑ तिर॒श्च्या इन्द्र॒ यस्त्वा॑ सप॒र्यति॑ सु॒वीर्य॑स्य॒ गोम॑तो रा॒यस्पू॑र्धि म॒हाँ अ॑सि
verses.transliteration: śrudhī́ hávaṃ tiraścyā́ḥ-  índra yás tvā saparyáti  suvī́ryasya gómato  rāyás pūrdhi mahā́m̐ asi

translation.text: O Indra, hear Tiraṣchî's call, the call of him who serveth thee. Satisfy him with wealth of kine and valiant offspring: Great art thou.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्र॒ यस्ते॒ नवी॑यसीं॒ गिरं॑ म॒न्द्रामजी॑जनत् चि॒कि॒त्विन्म॑नसं॒ धियं॑ प्र॒त्नामृ॒तस्य॑ पि॒प्युषी॑म्
verses.transliteration: índra yás te návīyasīṃ  gíram mandrā́m ájījanat  cikitvínmanasaṃ dhíyam  pratnā́m r̥tásya pipyúṣīm

translation.text: For he, O Indra, hath produced for thee the newest gladdening song, A hymn that springs from careful thought, ancient, and full of sacred truth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तमु॑ ष्टवाम॒ यं गिर॒ इन्द्र॑मु॒क्थानि॑ वावृ॒धुः पु॒रूण्य॑स्य॒ पौंस्या॒ सिषा॑सन्तो वनामहे
verses.transliteration: tám u ṣṭavāma yáṃ gíraḥ-  índram ukthā́ni vāvr̥dhúḥ  purū́ṇy asya paúṃsyā  síṣāsanto vanāmahe

translation.text: That Indra will we laud whom songs and hymns of praise have magnified. Striving to win, we celebrate his many deeds of hero might.

verses.sanskrit_deva: एतो॒ न्विन्द्रं॒ स्तवा॑म शु॒द्धं शु॒द्धेन॒ साम्ना॑ शु॒द्धैरु॒क्थैर्वा॑वृ॒ध्वांसं॑ शु॒द्ध आ॒शीर्वा॑न्ममत्तु
verses.transliteration: éto nv índraṃ stávāma  śuddháṃ śuddhéna sā́mnā  śuddhaír ukthaír vāvr̥dhvā́ṃsaṃ  śuddhá āśī́rvān mamattu

translation.text: Come now and let us glorify pure Indra with pure Sâma hymns. Let the pure milky draught delight him strengthened by pure songs of praise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्र॑ शु॒द्धो न॒ आ ग॑हि शु॒द्धः शु॒द्धाभि॑रू॒तिभिः॑ शु॒द्धो र॒यिं नि धा॑रय शु॒द्धो म॑मद्धि सो॒म्यः
verses.transliteration: índra śuddhó na ā́ gahi  śuddháḥ śuddhā́bhir ūtíbhiḥ  śuddhó rayíṃ ní dhāraya  śuddhó mamaddhi somyáḥ

translation.text: O Indra, come thou pure to us, with pure assistance, pure thyself. Pure, send thou riches down to us, and, meet for Soma, pure, be glad.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्र॑ शु॒द्धो हि नो॑ र॒यिं शु॒द्धो रत्ना॑नि दा॒शुषे॑ शु॒द्धो वृ॒त्राणि॑ जिघ्नसे शु॒द्धो वाजं॑ सिषाससि
verses.transliteration: índra śuddhó hí no rayíṃ  śuddhó rátnāni dāśúṣe  śuddhó vr̥trā́ṇi jighnase  śuddhó vā́jaṃ siṣāsasi

translation.text: O Indra, pure, vouchsafe us wealth, and, pure, enrich the worshipper. Pure, thou dost strike the Vr̥itras dead, and strivest, pure, to win the spoil.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒स्मा उ॒षास॒ आति॑रन्त॒ याम॒मिन्द्रा॑य॒ नक्त॒मूर्म्याः॑ सु॒वाचः॑ अ॒स्मा आपो॑ मा॒तरः॑ स॒प्त त॑स्थु॒र्नृभ्य॒स्तरा॑य॒ सिन्ध॑वः सुपा॒राः
verses.transliteration: asmā́ uṣā́sa ā́tiranta yā́mam  índrāya náktam ū́rmyāḥ suvā́caḥ  asmā́ ā́po mātáraḥ saptá tasthur  nŕ̥bhyas tárāya síndhavaḥ supārā́ḥ

translation.text: FOR him the Mornings made their courses longer, and Nights with pleasant voices spake to Indra. For him the Floods stood still, the Seven Mothers, Streams easy for the heroes to pass over.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अति॑विद्धा विथु॒रेणा॑ चि॒दस्त्रा॒ त्रिः स॒प्त सानु॒ संहि॑ता गिरी॒णाम् न तद्दे॒वो न मर्त्य॑स्तुतुर्या॒द्यानि॒ प्रवृ॑द्धो वृष॒भश्च॒कार॑
verses.transliteration: átividdhā vithuréṇā cid ástrā  tríḥ saptá sā́nu sáṃhitā girīṇā́m  ná tád devó ná mártyas tuturyād  yā́ni právr̥ddho vr̥ṣabháś cakā́ra

translation.text: The Darter penetrated, though in trouble, thrice-seven close-pressed ridges of the mountains. Neither might God nor mortal man accomplish what the Strong Hero wrought in full-grown vigour.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्र॑स्य॒ वज्र॑ आय॒सो निमि॑श्ल॒ इन्द्र॑स्य बा॒ह्वोर्भूयि॑ष्ठ॒मोजः॑ शी॒र्षन्निन्द्र॑स्य॒ क्रत॑वो निरे॒क आ॒सन्नेष॑न्त॒ श्रुत्या॑ उपा॒के
verses.transliteration: índrasya vájra āyasó nímiślaḥ-  índrasya bāhvór bhū́yiṣṭham ójaḥ  śīrṣánn índrasya krátavo nireké-  āsánn éṣanta śrútyā upāké

translation.text: The mightiest force is Indra's bolt of iron when firmly grasped in both the arms of Indra. His head and mouth have powers that pass all others, and all his people hasten near to listen.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मन्ये॑ त्वा य॒ज्ञियं॑ य॒ज्ञिया॑नां॒ मन्ये॑ त्वा॒ च्यव॑न॒मच्यु॑तानाम् मन्ये॑ त्वा॒ सत्व॑नामिन्द्र के॒तुं मन्ये॑ त्वा वृष॒भं च॑र्षणी॒नाम्
verses.transliteration: mánye tvā yajñíyaṃ yajñíyānām  mánye tvā cyávanam ácyutānām  mánye tvā sátvanām indra ketúm  mánye tvā vr̥ṣabháṃ carṣaṇīnā́m

translation.text: I count thee as the Holiest of the Holy, the caster-down of what hath ne'er been shaken. I count thee as the Banner of the heroes, I count thee as the Chief of all men living.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ यद्वज्रं॑ बा॒ह्वोरि॑न्द्र॒ धत्से॑ मद॒च्युत॒मह॑ये॒ हन्त॒वा उ॑ प्र पर्व॑ता॒ अन॑वन्त॒ प्र गावः॒ प्र ब्र॒ह्माणो॑ अभि॒नक्ष॑न्त॒ इन्द्र॑म्
verses.transliteration: ā́ yád vájram bāhvór indra dhátse  madacyútam áhaye hántavā́ u  prá párvatā ánavanta prá gā́vaḥ  prá brahmā́ṇo abhinákṣanta índram

translation.text: What time, O Indra, in thine arms thou tookest thy wildly rushing bolt to Slay the Dragon, The mountains roared, the cattle loudly bellowed, the Brahmans with their hymns drew nigh to Indra.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तमु॑ ष्टवाम॒ य इ॒मा ज॒जान॒ विश्वा॑ जा॒तान्यव॑राण्यस्मात् इन्द्रे॑ण मि॒त्रं दि॑धिषेम गी॒र्भिरुपो॒ नमो॑भिर्वृष॒भं वि॑शेम
verses.transliteration: tám u ṣṭavāma yá imā́ jajā́na  víśvā jātā́ny ávarāṇy asmāt  índreṇa mitráṃ didhiṣema gīrbhír  úpo námobhir vr̥ṣabháṃ viśema

translation.text: Let us praise him who made these worlds and creatures, all things that after him sprang into being. May we win Mitra with our songs, and Indra, and. wait upon our Lord with adoration.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वृ॒त्रस्य॑ त्वा श्व॒सथा॒दीष॑माणा॒ विश्वे॑ दे॒वा अ॑जहु॒र्ये सखा॑यः म॒रुद्भि॑रिन्द्र स॒ख्यं ते॑ अ॒स्त्वथे॒मा विश्वाः॒ पृत॑ना जयासि
verses.transliteration: vr̥trásya tvā śvasáthād ī́ṣamāṇāḥ-  víśve devā́ ajahur yé sákhāyaḥ  marúdbhir indra sakhyáṃ te astu-  áthemā́ víśvāḥ pŕ̥tanā jayāsi

translation.text: Flying in terror from the snort of Vr̥itra, all Deities who were thy friends forsook thee. So, Indra, be thy friendship with the Maruts: in all these battles thou shalt be the victor.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्रिः ष॒ष्टिस्त्वा॑ म॒रुतो॑ वावृधा॒ना उ॒स्रा इ॑व रा॒शयो॑ य॒ज्ञिया॑सः उप॒ त्वेमः॑ कृ॒धि नो॑ भाग॒धेयं॒ शुष्मं॑ त ए॒ना ह॒विषा॑ विधेम
verses.transliteration: tríḥ ṣaṣṭís tvā marúto vāvr̥dhānā́ḥ-  usrā́ iva rāśáyo yajñíyāsaḥ  úpa tvémaḥ kr̥dhí no bhāgadhéyaṃ  śúṣmaṃ ta enā́ havíṣā vidhema

translation.text: Thrice-sixty Maruts, waxing strong, were with thee, like piles of beaming light, worthy of worship. We come to thee: grant us a happy portion. Let us adore thy might with this oblation.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ति॒ग्ममायु॑धं म॒रुता॒मनी॑कं॒ कस्त॑ इन्द्र॒ प्रति॒ वज्रं॑ दधर्ष अ॒ना॒यु॒धासो॒ असु॑रा अदे॒वाश्च॒क्रेण॒ ताँ अप॑ वप ऋजीषिन्
verses.transliteration: tigmám ā́yudham marútām ánīkaṃ  kás ta indra práti vájraṃ dadharṣa  anāyudhā́so ásurā adevā́ś  cakréṇa tā́m̐ ápa vapa r̥jīṣin

translation.text: A sharpened weapon is the host of Maruts. Who, Indra, dares withstand thy bolt of thunder? Weaponless are the Asuras, the godless: scatter them with thy wheel, Impetuous Hero.

verses.sanskrit_deva: म॒ह उ॒ग्राय॑ त॒वसे॑ सुवृ॒क्तिं प्रेर॑य शि॒वत॑माय प॒श्वः गिर्वा॑हसे॒ गिर॒ इन्द्रा॑य पू॒र्वीर्धे॒हि त॒न्वे॑ कु॒विद॒ङ्ग वेद॑त्
verses.transliteration: mahá ugrā́ya taváse suvr̥ktím  préraya śivátamāya paśváḥ  gírvāhase gíra índrāya pūrvī́r  dhehí tanvè kuvíd aṅgá védat

translation.text: To him the Strong and Mighty, most auspicious, send up the beauteous hymn for sake of cattle. Lay on his body many songs for Indra invoked with song, for will not he regard them

verses.sanskrit_deva: उ॒क्थवा॑हसे वि॒भ्वे॑ मनी॒षां द्रुणा॒ न पा॒रमी॑रया न॒दीना॑म् नि स्पृ॑श धि॒या त॒न्वि॑ श्रु॒तस्य॒ जुष्ट॑तरस्य कु॒विद॒ङ्ग वेद॑त्
verses.transliteration: ukthávāhase vibhvè manīṣā́ṃ  drúṇā ná pārám īrayā nadī́nām  ní spr̥śa dhiyā́ tanvì śrutásya  júṣṭatarasya kuvíd aṅgá védat

translation.text: To him, the Mighty, who accepts laudation, send forth thy thought as by a boat o’er rivers, Stir with thy hymn the body of the Famous and Dearest One, for will not he regard it?

verses.sanskrit_deva: तद्वि॑विड्ढि॒ यत्त॒ इन्द्रो॒ जुजो॑षत्स्तु॒हि सु॑ष्टु॒तिं नम॒सा वि॑वास उप॑ भूष जरित॒र्मा रु॑वण्यः श्रा॒वया॒ वाचं॑ कु॒विद॒ङ्ग वेद॑त्
verses.transliteration: tád viviḍḍhi yát ta índro jújoṣat  stuhí suṣṭutíṃ námasā́ vivāsa  úpa bhūṣa jaritar mā́ ruvaṇyaḥ  śrāváyā vā́caṃ kuvíd aṅgá védat

translation.text: Serve him with gifts of thine which Indra welcomes: praise with fair praise, invite him with thine homage. Draw near, O singer, and refrain from outcry. Make thy voice heard, for will not he regard it?

verses.sanskrit_deva: अव॑ द्र॒प्सो अं॑शु॒मती॑मतिष्ठदिया॒नः कृ॒ष्णो द॒शभिः॑ स॒हस्रैः॑ आव॒त्तमिन्द्रः॒ शच्या॒ धम॑न्त॒मप॒ स्नेहि॑तीर्नृ॒मणा॑ अधत्त
verses.transliteration: áva drapsó aṃśumátīm atiṣṭhad  iyānáḥ kr̥ṣṇó daśábhiḥ sahásraiḥ  ā́vat tám índraḥ śácyā dhámantam  ápa snéhitīr nr̥máṇā adhatta

translation.text: The Black Drop sank in Anṣumatîs bosom, advancing with ten thousand round about it. Indra with might longed for it as it panted: the hero-hearted laid aside his weapons.

verses.sanskrit_deva: द्र॒प्सम॑पश्यं॒ विषु॑णे॒ चर॑न्तमुपह्व॒रे न॒द्यो॑ अंशु॒मत्याः॑ नभो॒ न कृ॒ष्णम॑वतस्थि॒वांस॒मिष्या॑मि वो वृषणो॒ युध्य॑ता॒जौ
verses.transliteration: drapsám apaśyaṃ víṣuṇe cárantam  upahvaré nadyò aṃśumátyāḥ  nábho ná kr̥ṣṇám avatasthivā́ṃsam  íṣyāmi vo vr̥ṣaṇo yúdhyatājaú

translation.text: I saw the Drop in the far distance moving, on the slope bank of Anṣumatîs river, Like a black cloud that sank into the water. Heroes, I send you forth. Go, fight in battle.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अध॑ द्र॒प्सो अं॑शु॒मत्या॑ उ॒पस्थेऽधा॑रयत्त॒न्वं॑ तित्विषा॒णः विशो॒ अदे॑वीर॒भ्या॒३॒॑चर॑न्ती॒र्बृह॒स्पति॑ना यु॒जेन्द्रः॑ ससाहे
verses.transliteration: ádha drapsó aṃśumátyā upásthe-  -ádhārayat tanvàṃ titviṣāṇáḥ  víśo ádevīr abhy ā̀cárantīr  bŕ̥haspátinā yujéndraḥ sasāhe

translation.text: And then the Drop in Anṣumatîs bosom, splendid with light, assumed its proper body; And Indra, with Br̥ihaspati to aid him, conquered the godless tribes that came against him.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं ह॒ त्यत्स॒प्तभ्यो॒ जाय॑मानोऽश॒त्रुभ्यो॑ अभवः॒ शत्रु॑रिन्द्र गू॒ळ्हे द्यावा॑पृथि॒वी अन्व॑विन्दो विभु॒मद्भ्यो॒ भुव॑नेभ्यो॒ रणं॑ धाः
verses.transliteration: tváṃ ha tyát saptábhyo jā́yamāno  -aśatrúbhyo abhavaḥ śátrur indra  gūḷhé dyā́vāpr̥thivī́ ánv avindo  vibhumádbhyo bhúvanebhyo ráṇaṃ dhāḥ

translation.text: Then, at thy birth, thou wast the foeman, Indra, of those the seven who ne'er had met a rival. The hidden Pair, the Heaven and Earth, thou foundest, and to the mighty worlds thou gavest pleasure.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं ह॒ त्यद॑प्रतिमा॒नमोजो॒ वज्रे॑ण वज्रिन्धृषि॒तो ज॑घन्थ त्वं शुष्ण॒स्यावा॑तिरो॒ वध॑त्रै॒स्त्वं गा इ॑न्द्र॒ शच्येद॑विन्दः
verses.transliteration: tváṃ ha tyád apratimānám ójo  vájreṇa vajrin dhr̥ṣitó jaghantha  tváṃ śúṣṇasyā́vātiro vádhatrais  tváṃ gā́ indra śácyéd avindaḥ

translation.text: So, Thunder-armed! thou with thy bolt of thunder didst boldly smite that power which none might equal; With weapons broughtest low the phght of Sushna, and, Indra, foundest by thy strength the cattle.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं ह॒ त्यद्वृ॑षभ चर्षणी॒नां घ॒नो वृ॒त्राणां॑ तवि॒षो ब॑भूथ त्वं सिन्धूँ॑रसृजस्तस्तभा॒नान्त्वम॒पो अ॑जयो दा॒सप॑त्नीः
verses.transliteration: tváṃ ha tyád vr̥ṣabha carṣaṇīnā́ṃ  ghanó vr̥trā́ṇāṃ taviṣó babhūtha  tváṃ síndhūm̐r asr̥jas tastabhānā́n  tvám apó ajayo dāsápatnīḥ

translation.text: Then wast thou, Chieftain of all living mortals, the very mighty slayer of the Vritras. Then didst thou set the obstructed rivers flowing, and win the floods that were enthralled by Dâsas.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स सु॒क्रतू॒ रणि॑ता॒ यः सु॒तेष्वनु॑त्तमन्यु॒र्यो अहे॑व रे॒वान् य एक॒ इन्नर्यपां॑सि॒ कर्ता॒ स वृ॑त्र॒हा प्रतीद॒न्यमा॑हुः
verses.transliteration: sá sukrátū ráṇitā yáḥ sutéṣu-  ánuttamanyur yó áheva revā́n  yá éka ín náry ápāṃsi kártā  sá vr̥trahā́ prátī́d anyám āhuḥ

translation.text: Most wise is he, rejoicing in libations, splendid as day, resistless in his anger. He only doth great deeds, the only Hero, sole Vritra-slayer he, with none beside him.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स वृ॑त्र॒हेन्द्र॑श्चर्षणी॒धृत्तं सु॑ष्टु॒त्या हव्यं॑ हुवेम स प्रा॑वि॒ता म॒घवा॑ नोऽधिव॒क्ता स वाज॑स्य श्रव॒स्य॑स्य दा॒ता
verses.transliteration: sá vr̥trahéndraś carṣaṇīdhŕ̥t  táṃ suṣṭutyā́ hávyaṃ huvema  sá prāvitā́ maghávā no 'dhivaktā́  sá vā́jasya śravasyàsya dātā́

translation.text: Indra is Vritra’s slayer, man’s sustainer: he must be called; with fair praise let us call him. Maghavan is our Helper, our Protector, giver of spoil and wealth to make us famous.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स वृ॑त्र॒हेन्द्र॑ ऋभु॒क्षाः स॒द्यो ज॑ज्ञा॒नो हव्यो॑ बभूव कृ॒ण्वन्नपां॑सि॒ नर्या॑ पु॒रूणि॒ सोमो॒ न पी॒तो हव्यः॒ सखि॑भ्यः
verses.transliteration: sá vr̥trahéndra r̥bhukṣā́ḥ  sadyó jajñānó hávyo babhūva  kr̥ṇvánn ápāṃsi náryā purū́ṇi  sómo ná pītó hávyaḥ sákhibhyaḥ

translation.text: This Indra, Vritra-slayer, this Ribhukshan, even at his birth, was meet for invocation. Doer of many deeds for man’s advantage, like Soma quaffed, for friends we must invoke him.

verses.sanskrit_deva: या इ॑न्द्र॒ भुज॒ आभ॑रः॒ स्व॑र्वाँ॒ असु॑रेभ्यः स्तो॒तार॒मिन्म॑घवन्नस्य वर्धय॒ ये च॒ त्वे वृ॒क्तब॑र्हिषः
verses.transliteration: yā́ indra bhúja ā́bharaḥ  svàrvām̐ ásurebhyaḥ  stotā́ram ín maghavann asya vardhaya  yé ca tvé vr̥ktábarhiṣaḥ

translation.text: O INDRA, Lord of Light, what joys thou broughtest from the Asuras, Prosper therewith, O Maghavan, him who lauds that deed, and those whose grass is trimmed for thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यमि॑न्द्र दधि॒षे त्वमश्वं॒ गां भा॒गमव्य॑यम् यज॑माने सुन्व॒ति दक्षि॑णावति॒ तस्मि॒न्तं धे॑हि॒ मा प॒णौ
verses.transliteration: yám indra dadhiṣé tvám  áśvaṃ gā́m bhāgám ávyayam  yájamāne sunvatí dákṣiṇāvati  tásmin táṃ dhehi mā́ paṇaú

translation.text: The unwasting share of steeds and kine which, Indra, thou hast fast secured, Grant to the worshipper who presses Soma and gives guerdon, not unto the churl.

verses.sanskrit_deva: य इ॑न्द्र॒ सस्त्य॑व्र॒तो॑ऽनु॒ष्वाप॒मदे॑वयुः स्वैः ष एवै॑र्मुमुर॒त्पोष्यं॑ र॒यिं स॑नु॒तर्धे॑हि॒ तं ततः॑
verses.transliteration: yá indra sásty avratáḥ-  -ánuṣvā́pam ádevayuḥ  svaíḥ ṣá évair mumurat póṣyaṃ rayíṃ  sanutár dhehi táṃ tátaḥ

translation.text: The riteless, godless man who sleeps, O Indra, his unbroken sleep, – May he by following his own devices die. Hide from him wealth that nourishes.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यच्छ॒क्रासि॑ परा॒वति॒ यद॑र्वा॒वति॑ वृत्रहन् अत॑स्त्वा गी॒र्भिर्द्यु॒गदि॑न्द्र के॒शिभिः॑ सु॒तावाँ॒ आ वि॑वासति
verses.transliteration: yác chakrā́si parāváti  yád arvāváti vr̥trahan  átas tvā gīrbhír dyugád indra keśíbhiḥ  sutā́vām̐ ā́ vivāsati

translation.text: Whether, O Ṣakra, thou be far, or, Vritra-slayer, near at hand, Thence by heaven-reaching songs he who hath pressed the juice invites thee with thy long-maned Steeds.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यद्वासि॑ रोच॒ने दि॒वः स॑मु॒द्रस्याधि॑ वि॒ष्टपि॑ यत्पार्थि॑वे॒ सद॑ने वृत्रहन्तम॒ यद॒न्तरि॑क्ष॒ आ ग॑हि
verses.transliteration: yád vā́si rocané diváḥ  samudrásyā́dhi viṣṭápi  yát pā́rthive sádane vr̥trahantama  yád antárikṣa ā́ gahi

translation.text: Whether thou art in heaven's bright sphere, or in the basin of the sea; Whether, chief Vr̥itra-slayer, in some place on earth, or in the firmament, approach.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स नः॒ सोमे॑षु सोमपाः सु॒तेषु॑ शवसस्पते मा॒दय॑स्व॒ राध॑सा सू॒नृता॑व॒तेन्द्र॑ रा॒या परी॑णसा
verses.transliteration: sá naḥ sómeṣu somapāḥ  sutéṣu śavasas pate  mādáyasva rā́dhasā sūnŕ̥tāvatā-  -índra rāyā́ párīṇasā

translation.text: Thou Soma-drinker, Lord of Strength, beside our flowing Soma juice Delight us with thy bounty rich in pleasantness, O Indra, with abundant wealth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मा न॑ इन्द्र॒ परा॑ वृण॒ग्भवा॑ नः सध॒माद्यः॑ त्वं न॑ ऊ॒ती त्वमिन्न॒ आप्यं॒ मा न॑ इन्द्र॒ परा॑ वृणक्
verses.transliteration: mā́ na indra párā vr̥ṇag  bhávā naḥ sadhamā́dyaḥ  tváṃ na ūtī́ tvám ín na ā́pyam  mā́ na indra párā vr̥ṇag

translation.text: O Indra, turn us not away: be the companion of our feast. For thou art our protection, yea, thou art our kin: O Indra, turn us not away.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒स्मे इ॑न्द्र॒ सचा॑ सु॒ते नि ष॑दा पी॒तये॒ मधु॑ कृ॒धी ज॑रि॒त्रे म॑घव॒न्नवो॑ म॒हद॒स्मे इ॑न्द्र॒ सचा॑ सु॒ते
verses.transliteration: asmé indra sácā suté  ní ṣadā pītáye mádhu  kr̥dhī́ jaritré maghavann ávo mahád  asmé indra sácā suté

translation.text: Sit down with us, O Indra, sit beside the juice to drink the meath. Show forth great favour to the singer, Maghavan; Indra, with us, beside the juice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: न त्वा॑ दे॒वास॑ आशत॒ न मर्त्या॑सो अद्रिवः विश्वा॑ जा॒तानि॒ शव॑साभि॒भूर॑सि॒ न त्वा॑ दे॒वास॑ आशत
verses.transliteration: ná tvā devā́sa āśata  ná mártyāso adrivaḥ  víśvā jātā́ni śávasābhibhū́r asi  ná tvā devā́sa āśata

translation.text: O Caster of the Stone, nor Gods nor mortals have attained to thee. Thou in thy might surpassest all that hath been made: the Gods have not attained to thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: विश्वाः॒ पृत॑ना अभि॒भूत॑रं॒ नरं॑ स॒जूस्त॑तक्षु॒रिन्द्रं॑ जज॒नुश्च॑ रा॒जसे॑ क्रत्वा॒ वरि॑ष्ठं॒ वर॑ आ॒मुरि॑मु॒तोग्रमोजि॑ष्ठं त॒वसं॑ तर॒स्विन॑म्
verses.transliteration: víśvāḥ pŕ̥tanā abhibhū́taraṃ náraṃ  sajū́s tatakṣur índraṃ jajanúś ca rājáse  krátvā váriṣṭhaṃ vára āmúrim utá-  -ugrám ójiṣṭhaṃ tavásaṃ tarasvínam

translation.text: Of one accord they made and formed for kingship Indra, the Hero who in all encounters overcometh, Most eminent for power, destroyer in the conflict, fierce and exceeding strong, stalwart and full of vigour.

verses.sanskrit_deva: समीं॑ रे॒भासो॑ अस्वर॒न्निन्द्रं॒ सोम॑स्य पी॒तये॑ स्व॑र्पतिं॒ यदीं॑ वृ॒धे धृ॒तव्र॑तो॒ ह्योज॑सा॒ समू॒तिभिः॑
verses.transliteration: sám īṃ rebhā́so asvarann  índraṃ sómasya pītáye  svàrpatiṃ yád īṃ vr̥dhé  dhr̥távrato hy ójasā  sám ūtíbhiḥ

translation.text: Bards joined in song to Indra so that he might drink the Soma juice, The Lord of Light, that he whose laws stand fast might aid with power and with the help he gives.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ने॒मिं न॑मन्ति॒ चक्ष॑सा मे॒षं विप्रा॑ अभि॒स्वरा॑ सु॒दी॒तयो॑ वो अ॒द्रुहोऽपि॒ कर्णे॑ तर॒स्विनः॒ समृक्व॑भिः
verses.transliteration: nemíṃ namanti cákṣasā  meṣáṃ víprā abhisvárā  sudītáyo vo adrúhaḥ-  -ápi kárṇe tarasvínaḥ  sám ŕ̥kvabhiḥ

translation.text: The holy sages form a ring, looking and singing to the Ram. Inciters, full of vigour, not to be deceived, are with the chanters, nigh to hear.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तमिन्द्रं॑ जोहवीमि म॒घवा॑नमु॒ग्रं स॒त्रा दधा॑न॒मप्र॑तिष्कुतं॒ शवां॑सि मंहि॑ष्ठो गी॒र्भिरा च॑ य॒ज्ञियो॑ व॒वर्त॑द्रा॒ये नो॒ विश्वा॑ सु॒पथा॑ कृणोतु व॒ज्री
verses.transliteration: tám índraṃ johavīmi maghávānam ugráṃ  satrā́ dádhānam ápratiṣkutaṃ śávāṃsi  máṃhiṣṭho gīrbhír ā́ ca yajñíyo vavártad  rāyé no víśvā supáthā kr̥ṇotu vajrī́

translation.text: Loudly I call that Indra, Maghavan the Mighty, who evermore possesses power, ever resistless. Holy, most liberal, may he lead us on to riches, and, Thunder-armed, make all our pathways pleasant for us.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं पुर॑ इन्द्र चि॒किदे॑ना॒ व्योज॑सा शविष्ठ शक्र नाश॒यध्यै॑ त्वद्विश्वा॑नि॒ भुव॑नानि वज्रि॒न्द्यावा॑ रेजेते पृथि॒वी च॑ भी॒षा
verses.transliteration: tvám púra indra cikíd enāḥ-  vy ójasā śaviṣṭha śakra nāśayádhyai  tvád víśvāni bhúvanāni vajrin  dyā́vā rejete pr̥thivī́ ca bhīṣā́

translation.text: Thou knowest well, O Ṣakra, thou Most Potent, with thy strength, Indra, to destroy these castles. Before thee, Thunder-armed! all beings tremble: the heavens and earth before thee shake with terror.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तन्म॑ ऋ॒तमि॑न्द्र शूर चित्र पात्व॒पो न व॑ज्रिन्दुरि॒ताति॑ पर्षि॒ भूरि॑ क॒दा न॑ इन्द्र रा॒य आ द॑शस्येर्वि॒श्वप्स्न्य॑स्य स्पृह॒याय्य॑स्य राजन्
verses.transliteration: tán ma r̥tám indra śūra citra pātu-  apó ná vajrin duritā́ti parṣi bhū́ri  kadā́ na indra rāyá ā́ daśasyeḥ  viśvápsnyasya spr̥hayā́yyasya rājan

translation.text: May thy truth, Indra, Wondrous Hero! be my guard: bear me o’er much woe, Thunderer! as over floods. When, Indra, wilt thou honour us with opulence, all-nourishing and much-to-be-desired, O King ?

verses.sanskrit_deva: इन्द्रा॑य॒ साम॑ गायत॒ विप्रा॑य बृह॒ते बृ॒हत् ध॒र्म॒कृते॑ विप॒श्चिते॑ पन॒स्यवे॑
verses.transliteration: índrāya sā́ma gāyata  víprāya br̥haté br̥hát  dharmakŕ̥te vipaścíte panasyáve

translation.text: To Indra sing a Sâma hymn, a lofty song to Lofty Sage, To him who guards the Law, inspired, and fain for praise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वमि॑न्द्राभि॒भूर॑सि॒ त्वं सूर्य॑मरोचयः वि॒श्वक॑र्मा वि॒श्वदे॑वो म॒हाँ अ॑सि
verses.transliteration: tvám indrābhibhū́r asi  tváṃ sū́ryam arocayaḥ  viśvákarmā viśvádevo mahā́m̐ asi

translation.text: Thou, Indra, art the Conqueror: thou gavest splendour to the Sun. Maker of all things, thou art Mighty and All-God.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वि॒भ्राज॒ञ्ज्योति॑षा॒ स्व१॒॑रग॑च्छो रोच॒नं दि॒वः दे॒वास्त॑ इन्द्र स॒ख्याय॑ येमिरे
verses.transliteration: vibhrā́jañ jyótiṣā svàr  ágacho rocanáṃ diváḥ  devā́s ta indra sakhyā́ya yemire

translation.text: Radiant with light thou wentest to the sky, the luminous realm of heaven. ne Deities, Indra strove to win thee for their Friend.

verses.sanskrit_deva: एन्द्र॑ नो गधि प्रि॒यः स॑त्रा॒जिदगो॑ह्यः गि॒रिर्न वि॒श्वत॑स्पृ॒थुः पति॑र्दि॒वः
verses.transliteration: éndra no gadhi priyáḥ  satrājíd ágohyaḥ  girír ná viśvátas pr̥thúḥ pátir diváḥ

translation.text: Come unto us, O Indra, dear, still conquering, unconcealable, Vast as a mountain spread on all sides, Lord of Heaven.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒भि हि स॑त्य सोमपा उ॒भे ब॒भूथ॒ रोद॑सी इन्द्रासि॑ सुन्व॒तो वृ॒धः पति॑र्दि॒वः
verses.transliteration: abhí hí satya somapāḥ-  ubhé babhū́tha ródasī  índrā́si sunvató vr̥dháḥ pátir diváḥ

translation.text: O truthful Soma-drinker, thou art mightier than both the worlds. Thou strengthenest him who pours libation, Lord of Heaven.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं हि शश्व॑तीना॒मिन्द्र॑ द॒र्ता पु॒रामसि॑ ह॒न्ता दस्यो॒र्मनो॑र्वृ॒धः पति॑र्दि॒वः
verses.transliteration: tváṃ hí śáśvatīnām  índra dartā́ purā́m ási  hantā́ dásyor mánor vr̥dháḥ pátir diváḥ

translation.text: For thou art he, O Indra, who stormeth all castles of the foe, Slayer of Dasyus, man's Supporter, Lord of Heaven.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अधा॒ ही॑न्द्र गिर्वण॒ उप॑ त्वा॒ कामा॑न्म॒हः स॑सृ॒ज्महे॑ उ॒देव॒ यन्त॑ उ॒दभिः॑
verses.transliteration: ádhā hī̀ndra girvaṇaḥ-  úpa tvā kā́mān maháḥ sasr̥jmáhe  udéva yánta udábhiḥ

translation.text: Now have we, Indra, Friend of Song, sent our great wishes forth to thee, Coming like floods that follow floods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वार्ण त्वा॑ य॒व्याभि॒र्वर्ध॑न्ति शूर॒ ब्रह्मा॑णि वा॒वृ॒ध्वांसं॑ चिदद्रिवो दि॒वेदि॑वे
verses.transliteration: vā́r ṇá tvā yavyā́bhir  várdhanti śūra bráhmāṇi  vāvr̥dhvā́ṃsaṃ cid adrivo divé-dive

translation.text: As rivers swell the ocean, so, Hero, our prayers increase thy might. Though of thyself, O Thunderer, waxing day by day.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यु॒ञ्जन्ति॒ हरी॑ इषि॒रस्य॒ गाथ॑यो॒रौ रथ॑ उ॒रुयु॑गे इ॒न्द्र॒वाहा॑ वचो॒युजा॑
verses.transliteration: yuñjánti hárī iṣirásya gā́thayā-  -uraú rátha urúyuge  indravā́hā vacoyújā

translation.text: With holy song they bind to the broad wide-yoked car the Bay Steeds of the rapid God, Bearers of Indra, yoked by word.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं न॑ इ॒न्द्रा भ॑रँ॒ ओजो॑ नृ॒म्णं श॑तक्रतो विचर्षणे आ वी॒रं पृ॑तना॒षह॑म्
verses.transliteration: tváṃ na indrā́ bharam̐  ójo nr̥mṇáṃ śatakrato vicarṣaṇe  ā́ vīrám pr̥tanāṣáham

translation.text: O Indra, bring great strength to us, bring valour, Ṣatakratu, thou most active, bring A hero conquering in war.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वं हि नः॑ पि॒ता व॑सो॒ त्वं मा॒ता श॑तक्रतो ब॒भूवि॑थ अधा॑ ते सु॒म्नमी॑महे
verses.transliteration: tváṃ hí naḥ pitā́ vaso  tvám mātā́ śatakrato babhū́vitha  ádhā te sumnám īmahe

translation.text: For, gracious Ṣatakratu, thou hast ever been a Mother and a Sire to us, So now for bliss we pray to thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वां शु॑ष्मिन्पुरुहूत वाज॒यन्त॒मुप॑ ब्रुवे शतक्रतो स नो॑ रास्व सु॒वीर्य॑म्
verses.transliteration: tvā́ṃ śuṣmin puruhūta vājayántam  úpa bruve śatakrato  sá no rāsva suvī́ryam

translation.text: To thee, Strong, Much-invoked, who showest forth thy strength, O Ṣatakratu, do I speak: So grant thou us heroic strength.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वामि॒दा ह्यो नरोऽपी॑प्यन्वज्रि॒न्भूर्ण॑यः स इ॑न्द्र॒ स्तोम॑वाहसामि॒ह श्रु॒ध्युप॒ स्वस॑र॒मा ग॑हि
verses.transliteration: tvā́m idā́ hyó náraḥ-  -ápīpyan vajrin bhū́rṇayaḥ  sá indra stómavāhasām ihá śrudhi-  úpa svásaram ā́ gahi

translation.text: O THUNDERER, zealous worshippers gave thee drink this time yesterday. So, Indra, listen here to those who bring the laud: come near unto our dwellingplace.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मत्स्वा॑ सुशिप्र हरिव॒स्तदी॑महे॒ त्वे आ भू॑षन्ति वे॒धसः॑ तव॒ श्रवां॑स्युप॒मान्यु॒क्थ्या॑ सु॒तेष्वि॑न्द्र गिर्वणः
verses.transliteration: mátsvā suśipra harivas tád īmahe  tvé ā́ bhūṣanti vedhásaḥ  táva śrávāṃsy upamā́ny ukthyā̀  sutéṣv indra girvaṇaḥ

translation.text: Lord of Bay Steeds, fair-helmed, rejoice thee: this we crave. Here the disposers wait on thee. Thy loftiest glories claim our lauds beside the juice, O Indra, Lover of the Song.

verses.sanskrit_deva: श्राय॑न्त इव॒ सूर्यं॒ विश्वेदिन्द्र॑स्य भक्षत वसू॑नि जा॒ते जन॑मान॒ ओज॑सा॒ प्रति॑ भा॒गं न दी॑धिम
verses.transliteration: śrā́yanta iva sū́ryaṃ  víśvéd índrasya bhakṣata  vásūni jāté jánamāna ójasā  práti bhāgáṃ ná dīdhima

translation.text: Turning, as 'twere, to meet the Sun, enjoy from Indra all good things. When he who will be born is born with power we look to treasures as our heritage.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अन॑र्शरातिं वसु॒दामुप॑ स्तुहि भ॒द्रा इन्द्र॑स्य रा॒तयः॑ सो अ॑स्य॒ कामं॑ विध॒तो न रो॑षति॒ मनो॑ दा॒नाय॑ चो॒दय॑न्
verses.transliteration: ánarśarātiṃ vasudā́m úpa stuhi  bhadrā́ índrasya rātáyaḥ  só asya kā́maṃ vidható ná roṣati  máno dānā́ya codáyan

translation.text: Praise him who sends us wealth, whose bounties injure none: good are the gifts which Indra grants. He is not worth with one who satisfies his wish: he turns his mind to giving boons.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वमि॑न्द्र॒ प्रतू॑र्तिष्व॒भि विश्वा॑ असि॒ स्पृधः॑ अ॒श॒स्ति॒हा ज॑नि॒ता वि॑श्व॒तूर॑सि॒ त्वं तू॑र्य तरुष्य॒तः
verses.transliteration: tvám indra prátūrtiṣu-  abhí víśvā asi spŕ̥dhaḥ  aśastihā́ janitā́ viśvatū́r asi  tváṃ tūrya taruṣyatáḥ

translation.text: Thou in thy battles, Indra, art subduer of all hostile bands. Father art thou, all-conquering, cancelling the curse, thou victor of the vanquisher.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अनु॑ ते॒ शुष्मं॑ तु॒रय॑न्तमीयतुः क्षो॒णी शिशुं॒ न मा॒तरा॑ विश्वा॑स्ते॒ स्पृधः॑ श्नथयन्त म॒न्यवे॑ वृ॒त्रं यदि॑न्द्र॒ तूर्व॑सि
verses.transliteration: ánu te śúṣmaṃ turáyantam īyatuḥ  kṣoṇī́ śíśuṃ ná mātárā  víśvās te spŕ̥dhaḥ śrathayanta* manyáve  vr̥tráṃ yád indra tū́rvasi

translation.text: The Earth and Heaven clung close to thy victorious might as to their calf two mother-cows. When thou attackest Vritra all the hostile bands shrink and faint, Indra, at thy wrath.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒त ऊ॒ती वो॑ अ॒जरं॑ प्रहे॒तार॒मप्र॑हितम् आ॒शुं जेता॑रं॒ हेता॑रं र॒थीत॑म॒मतू॑र्तं तुग्र्या॒वृध॑म्
verses.transliteration: itá ūtī́ vo ajáram  prahetā́ram áprahitam  āśúṃ jétāraṃ hétāraṃ rathī́tamam  átūrtaṃ tugryāvŕ̥dham

translation.text: Bring to your aid the Eternal One, who shoots and none may shoot at him, Inciter, swift, victorious, best of Charioteers, Tugrya’s unvanquished Strengthener;

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒ष्क॒र्तार॒मनि॑ष्कृतं॒ सह॑स्कृतं श॒तमू॑तिं श॒तक्र॑तुम् स॒मा॒नमिन्द्र॒मव॑से हवामहे॒ वस॑वानं वसू॒जुव॑म्
verses.transliteration: iṣkartā́ram ániṣkr̥taṃ sáhaskr̥taṃ  śatámūtiṃ śatákratum  samānám índram ávase havāmahe  vásavānaṃ vasūjúvam

translation.text: Arranger of things unarranged, e’en Ṣatakratu, source of might, Indra, the Friend of all, for succour we invoke, Guardian of treasure, sending wealth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒यं त॑ एमि त॒न्वा॑ पु॒रस्ता॒द्विश्वे॑ दे॒वा अ॒भि मा॑ यन्ति प॒श्चात् य॒दा मह्यं॒ दीध॑रो भा॒गमि॒न्द्रादिन्मया॑ कृणवो वी॒र्या॑णि
verses.transliteration: ayáṃ ta emi tanvā̀ purástād  víśve devā́ abhí mā yanti paścā́t  yadā́ máhyaṃ dī́dharo bhāgám indra-  -ā́d ín máyā kr̥ṇavo vīryā̀ṇi

translation.text: I MOVE before thee here present in person, and all the Deities follow behind me.

verses.sanskrit_deva: दधा॑मि ते॒ मधु॑नो भ॒क्षमग्रे॑ हि॒तस्ते॑ भा॒गः सु॒तो अ॑स्तु॒ सोमः॑ अस॑श्च॒ त्वं द॑क्षिण॒तः सखा॒ मेऽधा॑ वृ॒त्राणि॑ जङ्घनाव॒ भूरि॑
verses.transliteration: dádhāmi te mádhuno bhakṣám ágre  hitás te bhāgáḥ sutó astu sómaḥ  ásaś ca tváṃ dakṣiṇatáḥ sákhā me-  -ádhā vr̥trā́ṇi jaṅghanāva bhū́ri

translation.text: The food of meath in foremost place I give thee, thy Soma shall be pressed, thy share appointed.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र सु स्तोमं॑ भरत वाज॒यन्त॒ इन्द्रा॑य स॒त्यं यदि॑ स॒त्यमस्ति॑ नेन्द्रो॑ अ॒स्तीति॒ नेम॑ उ त्व आह॒ क ईं॑ ददर्श॒ कम॒भि ष्ट॑वाम
verses.transliteration: prá sú stómam bharata vājayántaḥ-  índrāya satyáṃ yádi satyám ásti  néndro astī́ti néma u tva āha  ká īṃ dadarśa kám abhí ṣṭavāma

translation.text: Striving for strength bring forth a laud to Indra, a truthful hymn if he in truth existeth.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒यम॑स्मि जरितः॒ पश्य॑ मे॒ह विश्वा॑ जा॒तान्य॒भ्य॑स्मि म॒ह्ना ऋ॒तस्य॑ मा प्र॒दिशो॑ वर्धयन्त्यादर्दि॒रो भुव॑ना दर्दरीमि
verses.transliteration: ayám asmi jaritaḥ páśya mehá  víśvā jātā́ny abhy àsmi mahnā́  r̥tásya mā pradíśo vardhayanti-  ādardiró bhúvanā dardarīmi

translation.text: Here am I, look upon me here, O singer. All that existeth I surpass in greatness.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ यन्मा॑ वे॒ना अरु॑हन्नृ॒तस्यँ॒ एक॒मासी॑नं हर्य॒तस्य॑ पृ॒ष्ठे मन॑श्चिन्मे हृ॒द आ प्रत्य॑वोच॒दचि॑क्रद॒ञ्छिशु॑मन्तः॒ सखा॑यः
verses.transliteration: ā́ yán mā venā́ áruhann r̥tásyam̐  ékam ā́sīnaṃ haryatásya pr̥ṣṭhé  mánaś cin me hr̥dá ā́ práty avocad  ácikradañ chíśumantaḥ sákhāyaḥ

translation.text: When the Law's lovers mounted and approached me as I sate lone upon the dear sky's summit.

verses.sanskrit_deva: विश्वेत्ता ते॒ सव॑नेषु प्र॒वाच्या॒ या च॒कर्थ॑ मघवन्निन्द्र सुन्व॒ते पारा॑वतं॒ यत्पु॑रुसम्भृ॒तं वस्व॒पावृ॑णोः शर॒भाय॒ ऋषि॑बन्धवे
verses.transliteration: víśvét tā́ te sávaneṣu pravā́cyā  yā́ cakártha maghavann indra sunvaté  pā́rāvataṃ yát purusambhr̥táṃ vásu-  apā́vr̥ṇoḥ śarabhā́ya ŕ̥ṣibandhave

translation.text: All these thy deeds must be declared at Soma-feasts, wrought, Indra, Bounteous Lord, for him who sheds the juice,

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र नू॒नं धा॑वता॒ पृथ॒ङ्नेह यो वो॒ अवा॑वरीत् नि षीं॑ वृ॒त्रस्य॒ मर्म॑णि॒ वज्र॒मिन्द्रो॑ अपीपतत्
verses.transliteration: prá nūnáṃ dhāvatā pŕ̥thak-  néhá yó vo ávāvarīt  ní ṣīṃ vr̥trásya mármaṇi  vájram índro apīpatat

translation.text: Now run ye forth your several ways: he is not here who kept you back.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मनो॑जवा॒ अय॑मान आय॒सीम॑तर॒त्पुर॑म् दिवं॑ सुप॒र्णो ग॒त्वाय॒ सोमं॑ व॒ज्रिण॒ आभ॑रत्
verses.transliteration: mánojavā áyamānaḥ-  āyasī́m atarat púram  dívaṃ suparṇó gatvā́ya  sómaṃ vajríṇa ā́bharat

translation.text: On-rushing with the speed of thought within the iron fort he pressed :

verses.sanskrit_deva: स॒मु॒द्रे अ॒न्तः श॑यत उ॒द्ना वज्रो॑ अ॒भीवृ॑तः भर॑न्त्यस्मै सं॒यतः॑ पु॒रःप्र॑स्रवणा ब॒लिम्
verses.transliteration: samudré antáḥ śayate-  udnā́ vájro abhī́vr̥taḥ  bháranty asmai saṃyátaḥ  puráḥprasravaṇā balím

translation.text: Deep in the ocean lies the bolt with waters compassed round about,

verses.sanskrit_deva: यद्वाग्वद॑न्त्यविचेत॒नानि॒ राष्ट्री॑ दे॒वानां॑ निष॒साद॑ म॒न्द्रा चत॑स्र॒ ऊर्जं॑ दुदुहे॒ पयां॑सि॒ क्व॑ स्विदस्याः पर॒मं ज॑गाम
verses.transliteration: yád vā́g vádanty avicetanā́ni  rā́ṣṭrī devā́nāṃ niṣasā́da mandrā́  cátasra ū́rjaṃ duduhe páyāṃsi  kvà svid asyāḥ paramáṃ jagāma

translation.text: When, uttering words which no one comprehended, Vâk, Queen of Gods, the Gladdener, was seated,

verses.sanskrit_deva: दे॒वीं वाच॑मजनयन्त दे॒वास्तां वि॒श्वरू॑पाः प॒शवो॑ वदन्ति सा नो॑ म॒न्द्रेष॒मूर्जं॒ दुहा॑ना धे॒नुर्वाग॒स्मानुप॒ सुष्टु॒तैतु॑
verses.transliteration: devī́ṃ vā́cam ajanayanta devā́s  tā́ṃ viśvárūpāḥ paśávo vadanti  sā́ no mandréṣam ū́rjaṃ dúhānā  dhenúr vā́g asmā́n úpa súṣṭutaítu

translation.text: The Deities generated Vâk the Goddess, and animals of every figure speak her.

verses.sanskrit_deva: सखे॑ विष्णो वित॒रं वि क्र॑मस्व॒ द्यौर्दे॒हि लो॒कं वज्रा॑य वि॒ष्कभे॑ हना॑व वृ॒त्रं रि॒णचा॑व॒ सिन्धू॒निन्द्र॑स्य यन्तु प्रस॒वे विसृ॑ष्टाः
verses.transliteration: sákhe viṣṇo vitaráṃ ví kramasva  dyaúr dehí lokáṃ vájrāya viṣkábhe  hánāva vr̥tráṃ riṇácāva síndhūn  índrasya yantu prasavé vísr̥ṣṭāḥ

translation.text: Step forth with wider stride, my comrade Vishṇu; make room, Dyaus, for the leaping of the lightning.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ऋध॑गि॒त्था स मर्त्यः॑ शश॒मे दे॒वता॑तये यो नू॒नं मि॒त्रावरु॑णाव॒भिष्ट॑य आच॒क्रे ह॒व्यदा॑तये
verses.transliteration: ŕ̥dhag itthā́ sá mártyaḥ  śaśamé devátātaye  yó nūnám mitrā́váruṇāv abhíṣṭaye-  ācakré havyádātaye

translation.text: YEA, specially that mortal man hath toiled for service of the Gods, Who quickly hath brought near Mitra and Varuṇa. to share his sacrificial gifts.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वर्षि॑ष्ठक्षत्रा उरु॒चक्ष॑सा॒ नरा॒ राजा॑ना दीर्घ॒श्रुत्त॑मा ता बा॒हुता॒ न दं॒सना॑ रथर्यतः सा॒कं सूर्य॑स्य र॒श्मिभिः॑
verses.transliteration: várṣiṣṭhakṣatrā urucákṣasā nárā  rā́jānā dīrghaśrúttamā  tā́ bāhútā ná daṃsánā ratharyataḥ  sākáṃ sū́ryasya raśmíbhiḥ

translation.text: Supreme in sovran power, far-sighted, Chiefs and Kings, most swift to hear from far away, Both, wondrously, set them in motion as with arms, in company with Sûrya's beams.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र यो वां॑ मित्रावरुणाजि॒रो दू॒तो अद्र॑वत् अयः॑शीर्षा॒ मदे॑रघुः
verses.transliteration: prá yó vām mitrāvaruṇā-  -ajiró dūtó ádravat  áyaḥśīrṣā máderaghuḥ

translation.text: The rapid messenger who runs before you, Mitra-Varuṇa, with iron head, swift to the draught,

verses.sanskrit_deva: न यः स॒म्पृच्छे॒ न पुन॒र्हवी॑तवे॒ न सं॑वा॒दाय॒ रम॑ते तस्मा॑न्नो अ॒द्य समृ॑तेरुरुष्यतं बा॒हुभ्यां॑ न उरुष्यतम्
verses.transliteration: ná yáḥ sampŕ̥che ná púnar hávītave  ná saṃvādā́ya rámate  tásmān no adyá sámr̥ter uruṣyatam  bāhúbhyāṃ na uruṣyatam

translation.text: He whom no man may question, none may summon back, who stands not still for colloquy,– From hostile clash with him keep ye us safe this day: keep us in safety with your arms.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र मि॒त्राय॒ प्रार्य॒म्णे स॑च॒थ्य॑मृतावसो व॒रू॒थ्यं१॒॑ वरु॑णे॒ छन्द्यं॒ वचः॑ स्तो॒त्रं राज॑सु गायत
verses.transliteration: prá mitrā́ya prā́ryamṇé  sacathyàm r̥tāvaso  varūthyàṃ váruṇe chándyaṃ vácaḥ-  stotráṃ rā́jasu gāyata

translation.text: To Aryaman and Mitra sing a reverent song, O pious one, A pleasant hymn that shall protect to Varuṇa: sing forth a laud unto the Kings.

verses.sanskrit_deva: ते हि॑न्विरे अरु॒णं जेन्यं॒ वस्वेकं॑ पु॒त्रं ति॑सॄ॒णाम् ते धामा॑न्य॒मृता॒ मर्त्या॑ना॒मद॑ब्धा अ॒भि च॑क्षते
verses.transliteration: té hinvire aruṇáṃ jényaṃ vásu-  ékam putráṃ tisr̥̄ṇā́m  té dhā́māny amŕ̥tā mártyānām  ádabdhā abhí cakṣate

translation.text: The true, Red Treasure they have sent, one only Son born of the Three. They, the Immortal Ones, never deceived, survey the families of mortal men.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ मे॒ वचां॒स्युद्य॑ता द्यु॒मत्त॑मानि॒ कर्त्वा॑ उ॒भा या॑तं नासत्या स॒जोष॑सा॒ प्रति॑ ह॒व्यानि॑ वी॒तये॑
verses.transliteration: ā́ me vácāṃsy údyatā  dyumáttamāni kártvā  ubhā́ yātaṃ nāsatyā sajóṣasā  práti havyā́ni vītáye

translation.text: My songs are lifted up, and acts most splendid are to be performed. Come hither, ye Nâsatyas, with accordant mind, to meet and to enjoy my gifts.

verses.sanskrit_deva: रा॒तिं यद्वा॑मर॒क्षसं॒ हवा॑महे यु॒वाभ्यां॑ वाजिनीवसू प्राचीं॒ होत्रां॑ प्रति॒रन्ता॑वितं नरा गृणा॒ना ज॒मद॑ग्निना
verses.transliteration: rātíṃ yád vām arakṣásaṃ hávāmahe  yuvā́bhyāṃ vājinīvasū  prā́cīṃ hótrām pratirántāv itaṃ narā  gr̥ṇānā́ jamádagninā

translation.text: Lords of great wealth, when we invoke your bounty which no demon checks, Both of you, furthering our eastward-offered praise, come, Chiefs whom Jamadagni lauds!

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ नो॑ य॒ज्ञं दि॑वि॒स्पृशं॒ वायो॑ या॒हि सु॒मन्म॑भिः अ॒न्तः प॒वित्र॑ उ॒परि॑ श्रीणा॒नो॒३॒॑ऽयं शु॒क्रो अ॑यामि ते
verses.transliteration: ā́ no yajñáṃ divispŕ̥śaṃ  vā́yo yāhí sumánmabhiḥ  antáḥ pavítra upári śrīṇānáḥ-  ayáṃ śukró ayāmi te

translation.text: Come, Vâyu, drawn by fair hymns, to our sacrifice that reaches heaven. Poured on the middle of the straining-cloth, and cooked, this bright drink hath been offered thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: वेत्य॑ध्व॒र्युः प॒थिभी॒ रजि॑ष्ठैः॒ प्रति॑ ह॒व्यानि॑ वी॒तये॑ अधा॑ नियुत्व उ॒भय॑स्य नः पिब॒ शुचिं॒ सोमं॒ गवा॑शिरम्
verses.transliteration: véty adhvaryúḥ pathíbhī rájiṣṭhaiḥ  práti havyā́ni vītáye  ádhā niyutva ubháyasya naḥ piba  śúciṃ sómaṃ gávāśiram

translation.text: He comes by straightest paths, as ministering Priest, to taste the sacrificial gifts. Then, Lord of harnessed teams! drink of the twofold draught, bright Soma mingled with the milk.

verses.sanskrit_deva: बण्म॒हाँ अ॑सि सूर्य॒ बळा॑दित्य म॒हाँ अ॑सि म॒हस्ते॑ स॒तो म॑हि॒मा प॑नस्यते॒ऽद्धा दे॑व म॒हाँ अ॑सि
verses.transliteration: báṇ mahā́m̐ asi sūrya  báḷ āditya mahā́m̐ asi  mahás te sató mahimā́ panasyate  -addhā́ deva mahā́m̐ asi

translation.text: Verily, Sûrya, thou art great; truly, Âditya, thou art great. As thou art great indeed, thy greatness is admired: yea, verily, thou, God, art great.

verses.sanskrit_deva: बट् सू॑र्य॒ श्रव॑सा म॒हाँ अ॑सि स॒त्रा दे॑व म॒हाँ अ॑सि म॒ह्ना दे॒वाना॑मसु॒र्यः॑ पु॒रोहि॑तो वि॒भु ज्योति॒रदा॑भ्यम्
verses.transliteration: báṭ sūrya śrávasā mahā́m̐ asi  satrā́ deva mahā́m̐ asi  mahnā́ devā́nām asuryàḥ puróhito  vibhú jyótir ádābhyam

translation.text: Yea, Sûrya, thou art great in fame: thou evermore, O God, art great. Thou by thy greatness art the Gods' High Priest, divine, far-spread unconquerable light.

verses.sanskrit_deva: इ॒यं या नीच्य॒र्किणी॑ रू॒पा रोहि॑ण्या कृ॒ता चि॒त्रेव॒ प्रत्य॑दर्श्याय॒त्य१॒॑न्तर्द॒शसु॑ बा॒हुषु॑
verses.transliteration: iyáṃ yā́ nī́cy arkíṇī  rūpā́ róhiṇyā kr̥tā́  citréva práty adarśy āyatī́-  -antár daśásu bāhúṣu

translation.text: She yonder, bending lowly down, clothed in red hues and rich in rays, Is seen, advancing as it were with various tints, amid the ten surrounding arms.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र॒जा ह॑ ति॒स्रो अ॒त्याय॑मीयु॒र्न्य१॒॑न्या अ॒र्कम॒भितो॑ विविश्रे बृ॒हद्ध॑ तस्थौ॒ भुव॑नेष्व॒न्तः पव॑मानो ह॒रित॒ आ वि॑वेश
verses.transliteration: prajā́ ha tisró atyā́yam īyur  ny ànyā́ arkám abhíto viviśre  br̥hád dha tasthau bhúvaneṣv antáḥ  pávamāno haríta ā́ viveśa

translation.text: Past and gone are three mortal generations: the fourth and last into the Sun hath entered. He mid the worlds his lofty place hath taken. Into green plants is gone the Purifying.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मा॒ता रु॒द्राणां॑ दुहि॒ता वसू॑नां॒ स्वसा॑दि॒त्याना॑म॒मृत॑स्य॒ नाभिः॑ प्र नु वो॑चं चिकि॒तुषे॒ जना॑य॒ मा गामना॑गा॒मदि॑तिं वधिष्ट
verses.transliteration: mātā́ rudrā́ṇāṃ duhitā́ vásūnāṃ  svásādityā́nām amŕ̥tasya nā́bhiḥ  prá nú vocaṃ cikitúṣe jánāya  mā́ gā́m ánāgām áditiṃ vadhiṣṭa

translation.text: The Rudras' Mother, Daughter of the Vasus, centre of nectar, the Âdityas' Sister — To folk who understand will I proclaim it — injure not Aditi, the Cow, the sinless.

verses.sanskrit_deva: व॒चो॒विदं॒ वाच॑मुदी॒रय॑न्तीं॒ विश्वा॑भिर्धी॒भिरु॑प॒तिष्ठ॑मानाम् दे॒वीं दे॒वेभ्यः॒ पर्ये॒युषीं॒ गामा मा॑वृक्त॒ मर्त्यो॑ द॒भ्रचे॑ताः
verses.transliteration: vacovídaṃ vā́cam udīráyantīṃ  víśvābhir dhībhír upatíṣṭhamānām  devī́ṃ devébhyaḥ páry eyúṣīṃ gā́m  ā́ māvr̥kta mártyo dabhrácetāḥ

translation.text: Weak-minded men have as a cow adopted me who came hither from the Gods, a Goddess, Who, skilled in eloquence, her voice uplifteth, who standeth near at hand with all devotions.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वम॑ग्ने बृ॒हद्वयो॒ दधा॑सि देव दा॒शुषे॑ क॒विर्गृ॒हप॑ति॒र्युवा॑
verses.transliteration: tvám agne br̥hád váyo  dádhāsi deva dāśúṣe  kavír gr̥hápatir yúvā

translation.text: LORD of the house, Sage, ever young, high power of life, O Agni, God, Thou givest to thy worshipper.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स न॒ ईळा॑नया स॒ह दे॒वाँ अ॑ग्ने दुव॒स्युवा॑ चि॒किद्वि॑भान॒वा व॑ह
verses.transliteration: sá na ī́ḷānayā sahá  devā́m̐ agne duvasyúvā  cikíd vibhānav ā́ vaha

translation.text: So with our song that prays and serves, attentive, Lord of spreading light, Agni, bring hitherward the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: त्वया॑ ह स्विद्यु॒जा व॒यं चोदि॑ष्ठेन यविष्ठ्य अ॒भि ष्मो॒ वाज॑सातये
verses.transliteration: tváyā ha svid yujā́ vayám  códiṣṭhena yaviṣṭhya  abhí ṣmo vā́jasātaye

translation.text: For, Ever-Youthful One, with thee, best Furtherer, as our ally, We overcome, to win the spoil.

verses.sanskrit_deva: औ॒र्व॒भृ॒गु॒वच्छुचि॑मप्नवान॒वदा हु॑वे अ॒ग्निं स॑मु॒द्रवा॑ससम्
verses.transliteration: aurvabhr̥guvác chúcim  apnavānavád ā́ huve  agníṃ samudrávāsasam

translation.text: As Aurva Bhrigu used, as Apnavâna used, I call the pure Agni who clothes him with the sea.

verses.sanskrit_deva: हु॒वे वात॑स्वनं क॒विं प॒र्जन्य॑क्रन्द्यं॒ सहः॑ अ॒ग्निं स॑मु॒द्रवा॑ससम्
verses.transliteration: huvé vā́tasvanaṃ kavím  parjányakrandyaṃ sáhaḥ  agníṃ samudrávāsasam

translation.text: I call the Sage who sounds like wind, the Might that like Parjanya roars, Agni who clothes him with the sea.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ स॒वं स॑वि॒तुर्य॑था॒ भग॑स्येव भु॒जिं हु॑वे अ॒ग्निं स॑मु॒द्रवा॑ससम्
verses.transliteration: ā́ saváṃ savitúr yathā  bhágasyeva bhujíṃ huve  agníṃ samudrávāsasam

translation.text: As Savitar's productive Power, as him who sends down bliss, I call Agni who clothes him with the sea.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निं वो॑ वृ॒धन्त॑मध्व॒राणां॑ पुरू॒तम॑म् अच्छा॒ नप्त्रे॒ सह॑स्वते
verses.transliteration: agníṃ vo vr̥dhántam  adhvarā́ṇām purūtámam  áchā náptre sáhasvate

translation.text: Hither, for powerful kirship, I call Agni, him Who prospers you, Most frequent at our solemn rites

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒यं यथा॑ न आ॒भुव॒त्त्वष्टा॑ रू॒पेव॒ तक्ष्या॑ अ॒स्य क्रत्वा॒ यश॑स्वतः
verses.transliteration: ayáṃ yáthā na ābhúvat  tváṣṭā rūpéva tákṣyā  asyá krátvā yáśasvataḥ

translation.text: That through this famed One's power, he may stand by us even as Tvashṭar comes Unto the forms that must be shaped.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒यं विश्वा॑ अ॒भि श्रियो॒ऽग्निर्दे॒वेषु॑ पत्यते आ वाजै॒रुप॑ नो गमत्
verses.transliteration: ayáṃ víśvā abhí śríyo  -agnír devéṣu patyate  ā́ vā́jair úpa no gamat

translation.text: This Agni is the Lord supreme above all glories mid the Gods: May he come nigh to us with strength.

verses.sanskrit_deva: विश्वे॑षामि॒ह स्तु॑हि॒ होतॄ॑णां य॒शस्त॑मम् अ॒ग्निं य॒ज्ञेषु॑ पू॒र्व्यम्
verses.transliteration: víśveṣām ihá stuhi  hótr̥̄ṇāṃ yaśástamam  agníṃ yajñéṣu pūrvyám

translation.text: Here praise ye him the most renowned of all the ministering Priests, Agni, the Chief at sacrifice;

verses.sanskrit_deva: शी॒रं पा॑व॒कशो॑चिषं॒ ज्येष्ठो॒ यो दमे॒ष्वा दी॒दाय॑ दीर्घ॒श्रुत्त॑मः
verses.transliteration: śīrám pāvakáśociṣam  jyéṣṭho yó dámeṣv ā́  dīdā́ya dīrghaśrúttamaḥ

translation.text: Piercing, with purifying flame, enkindled in our homes, most high, Swiftest to hear from far away.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तमर्व॑न्तं॒ न सा॑न॒सिं गृ॑णी॒हि वि॑प्र शु॒ष्मिण॑म् मि॒त्रं न या॑त॒यज्ज॑नम्
verses.transliteration: tám árvantaṃ ná sānasím  gr̥ṇīhí vipra śuṣmíṇam  mitráṃ ná yātayájjanam

translation.text: Sage, laud the Mighty One who wins the spoil of victory like a steed, And, Mitra-like, unites the folk.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उप॑ त्वा जा॒मयो॒ गिरो॒ देदि॑शतीर्हवि॒ष्कृतः॑ वा॒योरनी॑के अस्थिरन्
verses.transliteration: úpa tvā jāmáyo gíro  dédiśatīr haviṣkŕ̥taḥ  vāyór ánīke asthiran

translation.text: Still turning to their aim in thee, the oblation-bearer's sister hymns Have come to thee before the wind.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यस्य॑ त्रि॒धात्ववृ॑तं ब॒र्हिस्त॒स्थावसं॑दिनम् आप॑श्चि॒न्नि द॑धा प॒दम्
verses.transliteration: yásya tridhā́tv ávr̥tam  barhís tasthā́v ásaṃdinam  ā́paś cin ní dadhā padám

translation.text: The waters find their place in him, for whom the threefold sacred grass Is spread unbound, unlimited.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प॒दं दे॒वस्य॑ मी॒ळ्हुषोऽना॑धृष्टाभिरू॒तिभिः॑ भ॒द्रा सूर्य॑ इवोप॒दृक्
verses.transliteration: padáṃ devásya mīḷhúṣaḥ-  -ánādhr̥ṣṭābhir ūtíbhiḥ  bhadrā́ sū́rya ivopadŕ̥k

translation.text: The station of the Bounteous God hath, through his aid which none impair, A pleasant aspect like the Sun.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अग्ने॑ घृ॒तस्य॑ धी॒तिभि॑स्तेपा॒नो दे॑व शो॒चिषा॑ आ दे॒वान्व॑क्षि॒ यक्षि॑ च
verses.transliteration: ágne ghr̥tásya dhītíbhis  tepānó deva śocíṣā  ā́ devā́n vakṣi yákṣi ca

translation.text: Blazing with splendour, Agni, God, through pious gifts of sacred oil, Bring thou the Gods and worship them.

verses.sanskrit_deva: तं त्वा॑जनन्त मा॒तरः॑ क॒विं दे॒वासो॑ अङ्गिरः ह॒व्य॒वाह॒मम॑र्त्यम्
verses.transliteration: táṃ tvājananta mātáraḥ  kavíṃ devā́so aṅgiraḥ  havyavā́ham ámartyaṃ

translation.text: The Gods as mothers brought thee forth, the Immortal Sage, O Angiras, The bearer of our gifts to heaven.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्रचे॑तसं त्वा क॒वेऽग्ने॑ दू॒तं वरे॑ण्यम् ह॒व्य॒वाहं॒ नि षे॑दिरे
verses.transliteration: prácetasaṃ tvā kave-  -ágne dūtáṃ váreṇyam  havyavā́haṃ ní ṣedire

translation.text: Wise Agni, Gods established thee, the Seer, noblest messenger, As bearer of our sacred gifts.

verses.sanskrit_deva: न॒हि मे॒ अस्त्यघ्न्या॒ न स्वधि॑ति॒र्वन॑न्वति अथै॑ता॒दृग्भ॑रामि ते
verses.transliteration: nahí me ásty ághnyā  ná svádhitir vánanvati  áthaitādŕ̥g bharāmi te

translation.text: No cow have I to call mine own, no axe at hand wherewith to work, Yet what is here I bring to thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यद॑ग्ने॒ कानि॒ कानि॑ चि॒दा ते॒ दारू॑णि द॒ध्मसि॑ ता जु॑षस्व यविष्ठ्य
verses.transliteration: yád agne kā́ni kā́ni cid  ā́ te dā́rūṇi dadhmási  tā́ juṣasva yaviṣṭhya

translation.text: O Agni, whatsoever be the fuel that we lay for thee, Be pleased therewith, Most Youthful God.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यदत्त्यु॑प॒जिह्वि॑का॒ यद्व॒म्रो अ॑ति॒सर्प॑ति सर्वं॒ तद॑स्तु ते घृ॒तम्
verses.transliteration: yád átty upajíhvikā  yád vamró atisárpati  sárvaṃ tád astu te ghr̥tám

translation.text: That which the white-ant eats away, that over which the emmet crawls — May all of this be oil to thee.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अ॒ग्निमिन्धा॑नो॒ मन॑सा॒ धियं॑ सचेत॒ मर्त्यः॑ अ॒ग्निमी॑धे वि॒वस्व॑भिः
verses.transliteration: agním índhāno mánasā  dhíyaṃ saceta mártyaḥ  agním īdhe vivásvabhiḥ

translation.text: When he enkindles Agni, man should with his heart attend the song: I with the priests have kindled him.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अद॑र्शि गातु॒वित्त॑मो॒ यस्मि॑न्व्र॒तान्या॑द॒धुः उपो॒ षु जा॒तमार्य॑स्य॒ वर्ध॑नम॒ग्निं न॑क्षन्त नो॒ गिरः॑
verses.transliteration: ádarśi gātuvíttamo  yásmin vratā́ny ādadhúḥ  úpo ṣú jātám ā́ryasya várdhanam  agníṃ nakṣanta no gíraḥ

translation.text: THAT noblest Furtherer hath appeared, to whom men bring their holy works. Our songs of praise have risen aloft to Agni who was barn to give the Ârya strength.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र दैवो॑दासो अ॒ग्निर्दे॒वाँ अच्छा॒ न म॒ज्मना॑ अनु॑ मा॒तरं॑ पृथि॒वीं वि वा॑वृते त॒स्थौ नाक॑स्य॒ सान॑वि
verses.transliteration: prá daívodāso agnír  devā́m̐ áchā ná majmánā  ánu mātáram pr̥thivī́ṃ ví vāvr̥te  tasthaú nā́kasya sā́navi

translation.text: Agni of Divodâsa turned, as 'twere in majesty, to the Gods. Onward he sped along the mother earth, and took his station in the height of heaven.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यस्मा॒द्रेज॑न्त कृ॒ष्टय॑श्च॒र्कृत्या॑नि कृण्व॒तः स॒ह॒स्र॒सां मे॒धसा॑ताविव॒ त्मना॒ग्निं धी॒भिः स॑पर्यत
verses.transliteration: yásmād réjanta kr̥ṣṭáyaś  carkŕ̥tyāni kr̥ṇvatáḥ  sahasrasā́m medhásātāv iva tmánā-  -agníṃ dhībhíḥ saparyata

translation.text: Him before whom the people shrink when he performs his glorious deeds, Him who wins thousands at the worship of the Gods, himself, that Agni, serve with son s.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र यं रा॒ये निनी॑षसि॒ मर्तो॒ यस्ते॑ वसो॒ दाश॑त् स वी॒रं ध॑त्ते अग्न उक्थशं॒सिनं॒ त्मना॑ सहस्रपो॒षिण॑म्
verses.transliteration: prá yáṃ rāyé nínīṣasi  márto yás te vaso dā́śat  sá vīráṃ dhatte agna ukthaśaṃsínaṃ  tmánā sahasrapoṣíṇam

translation.text: The mortal man whom thou wouldst lead to opulence, O Vasu, he who brings thee gifts. He, Agni, wins himself a hero singing lauds, yea, one who feeds a thousand men.

verses.sanskrit_deva: स दृ॒ळ्हे चि॑द॒भि तृ॑णत्ति॒ वाज॒मर्व॑ता॒ स ध॑त्ते॒ अक्षि॑ति॒ श्रवः॑ त्वे दे॑व॒त्रा सदा॑ पुरूवसो॒ विश्वा॑ वा॒मानि॑ धीमहि
verses.transliteration: sá dr̥ḷhé cid abhí tr̥ṇatti vā́jam árvatā  sá dhatte ákṣiti śrávaḥ  tvé devatrā́ sádā purūvaso  víśvā vāmā́ni dhīmahi

translation.text: He with the steed wins spoil even in the fenced fort, and gains imperishable fame. In thee, O Lord of wealth, continually we lay all precious offerings to the Gods.

verses.sanskrit_deva: यो विश्वा॒ दय॑ते॒ वसु॒ होता॑ म॒न्द्रो जना॑नाम् मधो॒र्न पात्रा॑ प्रथ॒मान्य॑स्मै॒ प्र स्तोमा॑ यन्त्य॒ग्नये॑
verses.transliteration: yó víśvā dáyate vásu  hótā mandró jánānām  mádhor ná pā́trā prathamā́ny asmai  prá stómā yanty agnáye

translation.text: To him who dealeth out all wealth, who is the cheerful Priest of men, To him, like the first vessels filled with savoury juice, to Agni go the songs of praise.

verses.sanskrit_deva: अश्वं॒ न गी॒र्भी र॒थ्यं॑ सु॒दान॑वो मर्मृ॒ज्यन्ते॑ देव॒यवः॑ उ॒भे तो॒के तन॑ये दस्म विश्पते॒ पर्षि॒ राधो॑ म॒घोना॑म्
verses.transliteration: áśvaṃ ná gīrbhī́ rathyàṃ sudā́navo  marmr̥jyánte devayávaḥ  ubhé toké tánaye dasma viśpate  párṣi rā́dho maghónām

translation.text: Votaries, richly-gifted, deck him with their songs, even as the steed who draws the car. On both, Strong Lord of men! on child and grandson pour the bounties which our nobles give.

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्र मंहि॑ष्ठाय गायत ऋ॒ताव्ने॑ बृह॒ते शु॒क्रशो॑चिषे उप॑स्तुतासो अ॒ग्नये॑
verses.transliteration: prá máṃhiṣṭhāya gāyata  r̥tā́vne br̥haté śukráśociṣe  úpastutāso agnáye

translation.text: Sing forth to him, the Holy, most munificent, sublime with his refulgent glow, To Agni, ye Upastutas.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आ वं॑सते म॒घवा॑ वी॒रव॒द्यशः॒ समि॑द्धो द्यु॒म्न्याहु॑तः कु॒विन्नो॑ अस्य सुम॒तिर्नवी॑य॒स्यच्छा॒ वाजे॑भिरा॒गम॑त्
verses.transliteration: ā́ vaṃsate maghávā vīrávad yáśaḥ  sámiddho dyumny ā́hutaḥ  kuvín no asya sumatír návīyasī-  áchā vā́jebhir āgámat

translation.text: Worshipped with gifts, enkindled, splendid, Maghavan shall win himself heroic fame. And will not his most newly shown benevolence come to us with abundant strength?

verses.sanskrit_deva: प्रेष्ठ॑मु प्रि॒याणां॑ स्तु॒ह्या॑सा॒वाति॑थिम् अ॒ग्निं रथा॑नां॒ यम॑म्
verses.transliteration: préṣṭham u priyā́ṇāṃ  stuhy ā̀sāvā́tithim  agníṃ ráthānāṃ yámam

translation.text: Priest, presser of the juice! praise now the dearest Guest of all our friends, Agni, the driver of the cars.

verses.sanskrit_deva: उदि॑ता॒ यो निदि॑ता॒ वेदि॑ता॒ वस्वा य॒ज्ञियो॑ व॒वर्त॑ति दु॒ष्टरा॒ यस्य॑ प्रव॒णे नोर्मयो॑ धि॒या वाजं॒ सिषा॑सतः
verses.transliteration: úditā yó níditā véditā vásu-  ā́ yajñíyo vavártati  duṣṭárā yásya pravaṇé nórmáyo  dhiyā́ vā́jaṃ síṣāsataḥ

translation.text: Who, finder-out of treasures open and concealed, bringeth them hither, Holy One; Whose waves, as in a cataract, are hard to pass, when he, through song, would win him strength.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मा नो॑ हृणीता॒मति॑थि॒र्वसु॑र॒ग्निः पु॑रुप्रश॒स्त ए॒षः यः सु॒होता॑ स्वध्व॒रः
verses.transliteration: mā́ no hr̥ṇītām átithir  vásur agníḥ purupraśastá eṣáḥ  yáḥ suhótā svadhvaráḥ

translation.text: Let not the noble Guest, Agni, be wroth with us: by many a man his praise is sung, Good Herald, skilled in sacrifice.

verses.sanskrit_deva: मो ते रि॑ष॒न्ये अच्छो॑क्तिभिर्व॒सोऽग्ने॒ केभि॑श्चि॒देवैः॑ की॒रिश्चि॒द्धि त्वामीट्टे॑ दू॒त्या॑य रा॒तह॑व्यः स्वध्व॒रः
verses.transliteration: mó té riṣan yé áchoktibhir vaso-  -ágne kébhiś cid évaiḥ  kīríś cid dhí tvā́m ī́ṭṭe dūtyā̀ya  rātáhavyaḥ svadhvaráḥ

translation.text: O Vasu, Agni, let not them be harmed who come in any way with lauds to thee. Even the lowly, skilled in rites, with offered gifts, seeketh thee for the envoy's task.

verses.sanskrit_deva: आग्ने॑ याहि म॒रुत्स॑खा रु॒द्रेभिः॒ सोम॑पीतये सोभ॑र्या॒ उप॑ सुष्टु॒तिं मा॒दय॑स्व॒ स्व॑र्णरे
verses.transliteration: ā́gne yāhi marútsakhā  rudrébhiḥ sómapītaye  sóbharyā úpa suṣṭutím  mādáyasva svàrṇare

translation.text: Friend of the Maruts, Agni, come with Rudras to the Soma-draught, To Sobharî's fair song of praise, and be thou joyful in the light.
